The wave of e-scooters for sustainable transporting, the last mile to and from workplace etc, calls for a helmet that is also foldable to always have it with you. The estimated weight of the helmet is 450-460g

A helmet to be always with you

Hey it's 2020

“We also wanted to make the helmet kind of IoT 'ish. We have embedded in the helmet a highly sophisticated NFC chip, that together with our proprietary software API and if embedded in scooter apps, can make operators create incentives for riding with helmet

The entire development of the backend system and the API we have outsourced to Shape , Copenhagen, an award winning software company with 100+ developers doing advanced apps and backend systems for international clients. 

Built in NFC chip for incentivised riding

In fact our highly sophisticated chip and backend system essentially creates an individual URL for each helmet. So, providers can create incentives and offers to users in specific areas if they see a fit. Our software is even planned to also handle theft and many other cool features. 

All in all, the Newton-Rider helmet, we believe, is in many ways how a helmet should look like and what the urban youth will expect from a modern stylish bicycle helmet of today. 

There is nothing like the future

Go back us now

You can become one of the first in Europe, US and Canada to ride with the helmet, that naturally will comply to the European standard for bicycle helmets, EN 1078 and along Q1 2021 also  to CPSC. Back us now in this limited window to show you are committed to personal safety and freedom of transport in a sustainable way. 

 

Newton-Rider is supported by the state funded Danish Innovation Fund because of our innovative concept and engineering and the project is in an advanced state. We comfortably estimate shipment to take place in Q1 2021 for both European and North American backers.

Mould part for mass production

 

SHIPPING & TAXES

We ship the Newton-Rider helmet to all EU countries and without any extra taxes or VAT. + UK*

Estimated shipping costs for EU and UK backers: EUR 9.00 /1 helmet  EUR 15.00 /2 helmets

*UK Tax and VAT, TBA

At given time nobody knows how the tax situation will develop in regard to the UK leaving effectively the EU after 31.12.2020. We will notify UK backers and present a solution when facts are known.  

We also ship to the US and Canada, currently estimated along Q1 2020.

Estimated shipping costs for US/Canada backers: USD 11,-/1 helmet USD 18,- /2 helmets

Prices do not include taxes and VAT for US/Canada backers. This will be subject to the laws and regulations in US and Canada and will be calculated and paid for before we ship the helmets out to you.

We also ship to rest of world albeit these perks has a slightly higher shipping cost added

Risks and challenges

The Newton-Rider team consists of highly skilled members and we have been working on this project for a long time before we could comfortably launch this Kickstarter campaign. The high goals we set out when we started Newton-Rider has since been tested and improved many times to ensure we can deliver on our promises. The newton-Rider helmet is truly different than all other helmets on the market today and thus we had to invent completely new ways of manufacturing a bicycle helmet. However we are in a good place and have known our manufacturing partners for nearly 10 years. We are confident to deliver a Newton-Rider helmet that is like no other simply because we have done our homework in advance. But we are also realistic. Unexpected things can happen no matter how well plans have been made. We all have experienced how a virus can change the world. Should anything occur that will have influence of our promises we are still professionals and will deal with it in a way that our backers can feel confident about.
story_txt:
Newton-Rider, the bicycle helmet like no otherWe believe the urban youth, embracing mobility and freedom of transport when at the same time refuses to compromise on design and style, need a bicycle helmet that is exactly this... 
Sleek 
Thin
Semi-soft
Foldable
Built in chip for incentivised riding
Comply to EN1078 and CPSC
 The helmetWatch our video here, how the folded Newton-Rider helmet is easily grabbed from your bag and with a simple tap it communicates with any provider that might incentivise riding with our helmet. And last but not least we believe that riding with a helmet finally looks sleek and quite Instagrammable. The teamWe started the Newton-Rider project in early 2019 and are a professional and experienced core team of three. Daniel Bünger, German with a Masters Degree in Engineering specialising in Bio and Nano technologies, Wil Marschall, New Zealander based in the UK and an Industrial Designer and Ulrik Jensen, Danish and Concept Designer.The teamWe decided to try challenge the norm with science and engineeringWe set high goals because we like to challenge and to push boundaries. Nothing has really changed in the way bicycle helmets are manufactured over the last 10-15 years. Helmets are still a hard, polystyrene hat, that for sure makes you safe when riding but are rather bulky and uncomfortable to wear and honestly, they do not make you look a lot prettier either.The complex multi layered helmet construction of only 16 mm was an interesting challenge for usWorlds thinnest bicycle helmetThe Newton-Rider helmet is made with sophisticated calculated compounds of Visco-Elastic and Non-Newtonian materials, the clever engineering and innovative design that makes the helmet not only comply to EN 1078 and CPSC safety standards when only 16 mm thin, but renders the helmet as a never yet seen, semi-soft and flexible helmet for comfort and style. Compared to traditionally made helmets that are completely rigid and require a thickness of 30-35 mm to comply to the same standards, we believe it is rather impressive what we have achieved.A helmet that is sleek and coolMedium hard crashes used to cause concussions as a minimum.A polystyrene helmet is completely hard and works because, in the event of a serious and life threatening crash, it compresses and cracks open instead of your skull. This is good.However when you experience a  medium hard crash, the impact force is not big enough to compress the very hard polystyrene and instead your head will take all the impact force leaving you with a concussion.The soft material in the Newton-Rider helmet works in both instances. It saves your life of course in a serious crash but also it will protect your head in a small or medium hard crash and likely save you from a concussion due to the construction with compounds of Visco-Elastic and Non Newtonian soft impact absorbing materials.Another advantage by the Newton-Rider helmet design is that in the event of a crash, afterward it is not unsafe to continue to ride with, it is still as good as new, unlike a traditionally built polystyrene helmet that has to be discarded after any impact.Comparison of characteristics and properties between polystyrene (EPS) and the Newton-Rider materialThe thing about fit and comfortWe all know how it feels riding with a polystyrene helmet - not really that comfortable. No two heads have the exact same form and shape which is why traditionally helmets come with a variety of foam pads to place inside to somehow try to make the helmet fit. The Newton-Rider Helmet innovative IP protected design principles are not yet seen in the industry and makes the helmet fit any adult skull shape and circumference between 57cm and 60cm in a comfortable way. Thanks to their unique pad concept together with an elastic and flexible liner that adjusts to the head size and shape.

 
Our IP protected  flexible design for fit and comfortAlways with meUrban youth of today not only rides their owned bicycles but has embraced new modalities when it comes to their everyday transporting needs. The wave of e-scooters for sustainable transporting, the last mile to and from workplace etc, calls for a helmet that is also foldable to always have it with you. The estimated weight of the helmet is 450-460gA helmet to be always with youHey it's 2020“We also wanted to make the helmet kind of IoT 'ish. We have embedded in the helmet a highly sophisticated NFC chip, that together with our proprietary software API and if embedded in scooter apps, can make operators create incentives for riding with helmetThe entire development of the backend system and the API we have outsourced to Shape , Copenhagen, an award winning software company with 100+ developers doing advanced apps and backend systems for international clients. Built in NFC chip for incentivised ridingIn fact our highly sophisticated chip and backend system essentially creates an individual URL for each helmet. So, providers can create incentives and offers to users in specific areas if they see a fit. Our software is even planned to also handle theft and many other cool features. All in all, the Newton-Rider helmet, we believe, is in many ways how a helmet should look like and what the urban youth will expect from a modern stylish bicycle helmet of today. There is nothing like the futureGo back us nowYou can become one of the first in Europe, US and Canada to ride with the helmet, that naturally will comply to the European standard for bicycle helmets, EN 1078 and along Q1 2021 also  to CPSC. Back us now in this limited window to show you are committed to personal safety and freedom of transport in a sustainable way.  Newton-Rider is supported by the state funded Danish Innovation Fund because of our innovative concept and engineering and the project is in an advanced state. We comfortably estimate shipment to take place in Q1 2021 for both European and North American backers.Mould part for mass production SHIPPING & TAXESWe ship the Newton-Rider helmet to all EU countries and without any extra taxes or VAT. + UK*Estimated shipping costs for EU and UK backers: EUR 9.00 /1 helmet  EUR 15.00 /2 helmets*UK Tax and VAT, TBAAt given time nobody knows how the tax situation will develop in regard to the UK leaving effectively the EU after 31.12.2020. We will notify UK backers and present a solution when facts are known.  We also ship to the US and Canada, currently estimated along Q1 2020.Estimated shipping costs for US/Canada backers: USD 11,-/1 helmet USD 18,- /2 helmetsPrices do not include taxes and VAT for US/Canada backers. This will be subject to the laws and regulations in US and Canada and will be calculated and paid for before we ship the helmets out to you.We also ship to rest of world albeit these perks has a slightly higher shipping cost addedRisks and challengesThe Newton-Rider team consists of highly skilled members and we have been working on this project for a long time before we could comfortably launch this Kickstarter campaign. The high goals we set out when we started Newton-Rider has since been tested and improved many times to ensure we can deliver on our promises. The newton-Rider helmet is truly different than all other helmets on the market today and thus we had to invent completely new ways of manufacturing a bicycle helmet. However we are in a good place and have known our manufacturing partners for nearly 10 years. We are confident to deliver a Newton-Rider helmet that is like no other simply because we have done our homework in advance. But we are also realistic. Unexpected things can happen no matter how well plans have been made. We all have experienced how a virus can change the world. Should anything occur that will have influence of our promises we are still professionals and will deal with it in a way that our backers can feel confident about.

story:
Meet Ritot - the first projection watch

    It’s been a long time since mankind has stopped peering into the sky at the sun to calculate the time. Clocks were invented for this purpose. The first clock was created thousands of years ago. There were various types of clock, including sundial, clepsydra, hourglass and others. 

    Since then, the evolution of clock has continued and brought to us the first wristwatch. Every year there emerge dozens of new models of wirstwatch, but the operating principle has not changed.

    We live in a new progressive millennium; everything around us progresses and develops. In our opinion, clock design should be both technically innovative and fashionable. Watches demonstrating that humanity does not stand still. These are the watches we bring into life.

 

 

 

 

 

       On the Internet there were talks about a new generation of watches; however, they were just mere talks and nothing specific. Here we offer you the opportunity to see them and become a piece of history by supporting development of Ritot; be the one that boosts the tech world evolution. We are talking about the generation of wristwatches, which project the dial onto your wrist.

 

    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goals

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Featured In

 

 

         

 

     

 

                 

 

    

 

                      

 

 

            

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Notifications

 

 

    Ritot will help you to stay on top of things with vibrating notifications, messages and alerts. Dismiss a notification with a shake of your wrist.

 

  • Incoming Caller ID
  • Text messages
  • Reminders, meetings
  • Emails
  • Calendar Alerts
  • Facebook Messages
  • Twitter
  • Weather Alerts
  • Silent vibrating alarm and timer
  • Notifications for any other Apps

 

 

 

 

 

 

    You can set notifications in the special Ritot App for your phone. All notifications are easy to set, turn on and off.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Features

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

•  Ritot has special projection technology which allows using them at day and night.

•  Due to high quality materials and technical components, Ritot has extended operation life.

•  Our projection technology is absolutely safe for your skin and health.

•  You may change the projection color in one click. There are more than 20 colors available.

•  There are two ways to activate projection: you may touch the button or just shake your hand.

•  The projection disappears automatically in 10 seconds.

•  Waterproof.

•  Size for any hand.

•  Unisex design.

•  24 or 12 hour time display mode.

•  Projection view is changeable for left and right hand.   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There are two models – “Sport” and “Bracelet” Ritot wristwatch:

 

 

 -is a unique design that will fit to any style. This model will complement your unique style. Original leather insert on an aluminum bracelet is made ​​from the highest quality materials. Currently, the watch is available in: white, black, completely black, brown-gold and black-gold .

      

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 -the model’s name speaks for itself. This is no big wristband-like watch. It will look great in combination with your sporty style. The watch case is made of plastic with rubber inserts for a comfortable wear on the arm. The watch strap is fully made ​​of rubber with a convenient padlock. Currently the watch is available in black, white, red, green, blue and yellow.

 

 

 

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Unique design

    We have been working on Ritot for 6 months. During this time we have done a lot of work to design, develop 3D printed Ritot cases and to workout through existing technology to be sure we can develop Ritot.

   

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Watch size:

 

 

 

 

Ritot includes:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Technology   

 

To see the development process, please visit "Updates" section of our campaign.

 

 

    

 

    

 

    The uniqueness of the technology lies in pico projector; it allows projecting a dial with high quality graphics and brightness. The watch doesn't have any buttons, except of one touch sensitive button, with what you can manipulate the projection - run a mechanism of temporary (10 sec) or permanent projection.  

    Currently we don’t have a fully working prototype, the photos in campaign are computer renderings of what we envision the device to look like. 

 

 

    The watch is set up and charged on a specially developed base that comes with the watch.  

 

 

 

 

        

 

 This base allows you to:

•  Change the projection color in one click. There are more than 20 colors available.

 

•  Charge the watch using wireless technology.

•  Choose 24 or 12 hour time display mode.

•  Change the position of projection for your left and right hand.

•  In addition, the base is equipped with an alarm clock.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We want to take a moment to tell you the story behind Ritot

Currently Ritot is based in Ukraine with a US San Francisco office. The company was founded by Michael Medvid. The idea of Ritot Watch came to Michael 6 months ago. After a lot of work with designing together with Andrew the idea became a beautiful concept. With support of Oleg the technology was tested and passed a lot of consultations with different developers and manufacturers to make sure that we can bring this concept into a real working product. Since we understood that people like Ritot Watch, we have moved to the next stage of development.

Estimate development time

    We need your help to develop Ritot and start mass production. Then Ritot will come to reality. You'll be the first to receive Ritot at a price significantly less than future retail price. We hope that you like the Ritot and will be happy to answer your questions and suggestions.

    Prototypes: Currently we don’t have a fully working prototype, the photos in campaign are computer renderings of what we envision the device to look like. Our watches are based on a new projection technology that has proven itself. Our task is to bring our model the closest to the technical ideal. We will do our best to achieve this. You will be able to monitor and even control all production stages and give your suggestions to the first working prototypes.

    Production:  We use advanced technology of high quality that has already been tested and developed by many other companies. The whole production process is monitored at the highest level by well-known professionals in their field.

    Delivery time: We understand the whole seriousness of our work, and we understand that our terms of production and date of perk delivery may change. We will cover all stages of production, so you will be informed of the course of work and the date of delivery. Please support us and make these watches a reality. Thank you!

    Warranty period of the watch: 1 year. In case of any problems, send your watch to us for repair or replacement. Note that we incur all shipping costs.

    Upon successful completion of the campaign, follow the updates section on this page and on our website. In addition, we will contact you to clarify all issues, including delivery, model and size of the watch after the campaign. In the future, we plan to assess the functionality of our website and add personal accounts so you can easily edit your delivery.

 

 

 

 

FAQ

 

1. What if the size of watches does not fit my hand?   

You can send us the watch back and we will change it for another size for free.

2. If I order more that 1 Ritot Watch, how many base chargers will I receive?

  Each Ritot Watch includes base charger. So if you ordered 3 Ritot Watches, you will get 3 base chargers.

3. Does Ritot work with my phone?  

We are planning to work with a lot of phones. Currently we can say that Ritot will work with iOS, Android and Windows Phone. Also we are working on compatibility with other platforms.

 

4. How can I choose model, size and color of my watch?

 

  We will send out a survey after the end of campaign.

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you!

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project thgrough Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!

If you have any questions or you just want to say hello, be sure to contact us at info@ritot.com

For Press Inquiries contact press@ritot.com

 

 

 

PRESS-KIT

story:
Is it FLEXIBLE? Can I workout in it? - Yes.

Check your posture right now.

Back pain at any level is almost universally attributed to our posture. How are you moving? Even with the knowledge of great posture, it is difficult to maintain it while focusing on a task and after our back has fatigued. The Dorsum™ Exospine effortlessly supports your back, follows your movement, and reminds you to maintain great posture.

The quick pace of life is rapidly increasing the risk of back pain and injury. Having the right support that enables solid movement mechanics can reduce the risk of back pain. Modern life is creating jobs that force us to move faster and work longer. All of these demands put extra stress on our shoulders, lower back muscles, and spine. 80% of adults experience back pain at some point in their lives. Here’s where the Dorsum™ Exospine comes in, supporting your lower back without restricting movement.

The most common injuries happen from overuse of our bodies, which are the leading cause of repetitive motion strains. Repetitive motion puts enormous strain on your lower back, which can, in turn, lead to permanent injuries.

Many back alignment products in the market serve different purposes and do not have a significant impact reducing back injuries. The Dorsum™ Exospine exists in a new space we call Flexible Support, focused on prevention rather than rehabilitation.

The Dorsum™ Exospine is focused on postural support and muscular activation. It is not trying to limit the body’s movement; rather, the Exospine encourages it to move properly throughout repetitive movements.

In the market, there are few functional back supports designed for movement. There are posture reminders that are recommended for a short amount of use and back braces that are uncomfortable and restrict movement. The Dorsum™ Exospine is used for better posture while doing sustained repetitive movement.

The Dorsum™ Exospine is for those doing work that requires “hinge” movements. “Hinge” movement jobs are jobs/activities that require bending over and lifting movements that can cause an individual’s back to severely fatigued. The Dorsum Exospine is there to promote muscular activation so that posture can be maintained and overuse injuries limited.

Use it at work, at home, and while doing recreational activities that require repetitive bending of the lower back and shoulders.

The Dorsum™ Exospine is for:

Anyone that does repetitive movements as part of their daily activity.

 

It is comfortable, functional, and it limits injury. 

To support the lower back, we envisioned a device that can be both flexible, yet supportive, and from that vision, we created the Dorsum™ Exospine. It’s exactly as the name describes; a flexible exospine back support that enhances your posture and reminds you to keep your back in the right position and avoid pain.

Start by turning the thumb screw and pulling the top portion upward to your size of Small, Medium, or Large. Then turn the screw back to a tight position.

From the back, open the tab in the bottom of the pocket to insert the spine component all the way inside the sleeve, and close the tab to secure it in place. The exospine is designed to fit different size torsos of Small, Medium, and Large. 

Put on the shoulder straps around your arms.

Close and tighten the waist belt around your hips.

Locate the chest straps and pull outward to feel the support, while closing the straps at the bottom of your chest.

As you move, the Dorsum™ Exospine reminds you to correct your posture without much effort.

 It’s comfortable and can be worn over and under clothing.

 

We used a thermoplastic polymer, a very light and flexible material so it bends and moves with you to support your everyday movements.

Using a 3D air mesh around the sides with a power mesh in the center, all specific fabrics that maximize airflow to keep you comfortable.

The support has a positive feedback loop and 3 points of contact on the spine: the upper, middle, and lower regions of the back.

The positive feedback loop that our brains create relies on multiple factors. If something feels good and you are rewarded for it, your brain will encourage you to seek out that feeling. 

The same can be said of the body. 

When it feels supported it will seek out the feeling to protect itself. When wearing the Dorsum™ Exospine your body is constantly reminded of proper movement and postural function. So when you take the product off, your body will “remember” to some extent those postural cues and be able to move and stabilize more properly without the product on, teaching you what better posture feels like.

The number 1 benefit

From everything the Dorsum™ Exospine can do, it does the best job at reminding you to have proper posture and movement throughout an activity. It does this on what is called a positive feedback loop. It reminds you to stay within the correct posture to activate your proper muscles when lifting/moving, and maintain proper postural/ergonomic techniques so injury is less likely to occur. When you feel something encouraging you to move properly, you’ll be more likely to do it and are much more likely to avoid injury.

The Dorsum™ Exospine supports your lower back and upper back to stabilize your spine.
 

It does not restrict movement, allowing you to activate your core muscle groups, and move freely.
 

It provides all-day comfort to complete an entire day’s work.
 

Effortlessly reminds you to correct your posture so you can focus on doing the task at hand.
 

Maximizes airflow so you can comfortably wear it under or over clothing.
 

It is adjustable to Small, Medium, Large, and XLarge sizes.

Fast drying and moisture-absorbing elastic bands to keep your skin dry.

 

The spine component is removable for easy cleaning and the garment is easily washable.

 

Washable and machine drying safe.

 

We are a passionate team with a mission to create better products that improve people’s health. It all started years ago when I (Leo) excitedly began work as a wildland firefighter. It was my career path and I went into training for fire suppression. The long days were hard, but on the rides back to camp we were greeted by the locals and thanked for coming in to save their towns from the burning fires. Even in such a fulfilling environment, the repetitive work of lifting equipment and carrying heavy packs took a toll on my back, to the point where resting against the sharp edges of a rock felt better than the pain. Though I found satisfaction in my work, the worry and fear of a potential back injury made me rethink firefighting as a career. I couldn’t risk a back injury.

I went to design school and took with me my experience as inspiration and started interviews with other first responders like myself. In conducting the interviews, I could feel the passion of heroic men and women for saving lives, and when I got to the hard questions, I could hear in their voices how a simple back injury crushed their dreams by preventing them from serving others. The more interviews I did, the more I saw the global problem caused by back pain. The courage of first responders to dive into danger to save a life inspired me to dive into creating my company to solve a problem for them, and that marked the beginning of prototyping a vertical flexible back support that years later would become the Dorsum™ Exospine.

After designing outdoor products and health care devices, and receiving design awards from the earlier concepts, I also kept receiving emails from first responders from all over the world telling me they wanted to go back to work and my prototype could help them.

I built a team passionate for helping others and shaped Dorsum into the company it is today, making products that will limit career-ending injuries.

Our first prototypes were designed to be worn over clothing, but they proved to be too hot and bulky.

We reduced the weight and added ventilation using athletic compression fabrics and air meshes for a more breathable and comfortable support.

Explored designs to best align the upper back in the correct position.

We started 3D printing and looked at more ways to reduce material and size but still maintaining the right amount of support.

We made it even more flexible, stronger, and easier to use.

We conducted several rounds of fit tests to select the best design that would add the most comfort & support.

We put it to the test under intensive training exercises doing repetitive motion activities requiring fast bending, twisting, and turning of the torso and spine. Several rounds of sweat tests helped us discover the areas that needed more ventilation.

Back pain can end careers and dramatically change lives for the worse, and we want to help fix that.

We created the Dorsum™ Exospine as an answer to the many stories of career-ending back injuries we have heard and as a way of honoring and showing gratitude to the courageous first responders who participated in our tests. The Dorsum™ Exospine will have a major impact on improving people’s lives and we hope you will join us in our effort to make a difference in back health.

We have many people to thank, many people who have shared their stories of back pain, given feedback, and participated in our product testing. But most importantly, the heroic men and women first responders who risk their health for the safety of others. Your ability to respond to emergencies has truly been an inspiration in our work, and for that, we thank you.
story_txt: Is it FLEXIBLE? Can I workout in it? - Yes.Check your posture right now.Back pain at any level is almost universally attributed to our posture. How are you moving? Even with the knowledge of great posture, it is difficult to maintain it while focusing on a task and after our back has fatigued. The Dorsum™ Exospine effortlessly supports your back, follows your movement, and reminds you to maintain great posture.The quick pace of life is rapidly increasing the risk of back pain and injury. Having the right support that enables solid movement mechanics can reduce the risk of back pain. Modern life is creating jobs that force us to move faster and work longer. All of these demands put extra stress on our shoulders, lower back muscles, and spine. 80% of adults experience back pain at some point in their lives. Here’s where the Dorsum™ Exospine comes in, supporting your lower back without restricting movement.The most common injuries happen from overuse of our bodies, which are the leading cause of repetitive motion strains. Repetitive motion puts enormous strain on your lower back, which can, in turn, lead to permanent injuries.Many back alignment products in the market serve different purposes and do not have a significant impact reducing back injuries. The Dorsum™ Exospine exists in a new space we call Flexible Support, focused on prevention rather than rehabilitation.The Dorsum™ Exospine is focused on postural support and muscular activation. It is not trying to limit the body’s movement; rather, the Exospine encourages it to move properly throughout repetitive movements.In the market, there are few functional back supports designed for movement. There are posture reminders that are recommended for a short amount of use and back braces that are uncomfortable and restrict movement. The Dorsum™ Exospine is used for better posture while doing sustained repetitive movement.The Dorsum™ Exospine is for those doing work that requires “hinge” movements. “Hinge” movement jobs are jobs/activities that require bending over and lifting movements that can cause an individual’s back to severely fatigued. The Dorsum Exospine is there to promote muscular activation so that posture can be maintained and overuse injuries limited.Use it at work, at home, and while doing recreational activities that require repetitive bending of the lower back and shoulders.The Dorsum™ Exospine is for:Anyone that does repetitive movements as part of their daily activity. It is comfortable, functional, and it limits injury. To support the lower back, we envisioned a device that can be both flexible, yet supportive, and from that vision, we created the Dorsum™ Exospine. It’s exactly as the name describes; a flexible exospine back support that enhances your posture and reminds you to keep your back in the right position and avoid pain.Start by turning the thumb screw and pulling the top portion upward to your size of Small, Medium, or Large. Then turn the screw back to a tight position.From the back, open the tab in the bottom of the pocket to insert the spine component all the way inside the sleeve, and close the tab to secure it in place. The exospine is designed to fit different size torsos of Small, Medium, and Large. Put on the shoulder straps around your arms.Close and tighten the waist belt around your hips.Locate the chest straps and pull outward to feel the support, while closing the straps at the bottom of your chest.As you move, the Dorsum™ Exospine reminds you to correct your posture without much effort. It’s comfortable and can be worn over and under clothing.  We used a thermoplastic polymer, a very light and flexible material so it bends and moves with you to support your everyday movements.Using a 3D air mesh around the sides with a power mesh in the center, all specific fabrics that maximize airflow to keep you comfortable.The support has a positive feedback loop and 3 points of contact on the spine: the upper, middle, and lower regions of the back.The positive feedback loop that our brains create relies on multiple factors. If something feels good and you are rewarded for it, your brain will encourage you to seek out that feeling. The same can be said of the body. When it feels supported it will seek out the feeling to protect itself. When wearing the Dorsum™ Exospine your body is constantly reminded of proper movement and postural function. So when you take the product off, your body will “remember” to some extent those postural cues and be able to move and stabilize more properly without the product on, teaching you what better posture feels like.The number 1 benefitFrom everything the Dorsum™ Exospine can do, it does the best job at reminding you to have proper posture and movement throughout an activity. It does this on what is called a positive feedback loop. It reminds you to stay within the correct posture to activate your proper muscles when lifting/moving, and maintain proper postural/ergonomic techniques so injury is less likely to occur. When you feel something encouraging you to move properly, you’ll be more likely to do it and are much more likely to avoid injury.The Dorsum™ Exospine supports your lower back and upper back to stabilize your spine. It does not restrict movement, allowing you to activate your core muscle groups, and move freely. It provides all-day comfort to complete an entire day’s work. Effortlessly reminds you to correct your posture so you can focus on doing the task at hand. Maximizes airflow so you can comfortably wear it under or over clothing. It is adjustable to Small, Medium, Large, and XLarge sizes.Fast drying and moisture-absorbing elastic bands to keep your skin dry.  The spine component is removable for easy cleaning and the garment is easily washable. Washable and machine drying safe. We are a passionate team with a mission to create better products that improve people’s health. It all started years ago when I (Leo) excitedly began work as a wildland firefighter. It was my career path and I went into training for fire suppression. The long days were hard, but on the rides back to camp we were greeted by the locals and thanked for coming in to save their towns from the burning fires. Your ability to respond to emergencies has truly been an inspiration in our work, and for that, we thank you.

story:
Think about every time you shop with a bag…

Do you like to keep your perfectly ripe peaches away from your carton of oat milk?

Do you like to keep your valuables tucked away or, separate your frozen goods？

Do you like your shopping to easy to organize when you get home?

Us, too. Well, we have the perfect bag! Snag this modular multi-pocket SuperCarrier and you'll never see a bruised apple again.

 

 

 

SuperCarrier’s modular compartments can be used for separating any items. Pantry items,  freezer items, produce, meats, cosmetics, toiletries, swimming gear, beachwear, and wet towels. This bag can store anything!

 

 

 

 

SuperCarrier has five separated compartments you can choose to use or push away to fit more in. That way if you need to keep things apart you can just use one of the sections.

 

 

Organized Shopping: No need to worry about spending time packing in a neat and orderly fashion, SuperCarrier’s internal memory will make sure its contents stay organized until you get home. The SuperCarrier has a place for everything!

 

 

Benefit of Modular Multi-Pocket

  • Separate pouch for wine bottles
  • Separate warm foods and cold beverages
  • Separate foods and household detergent
  • Separate soft, easily crushed foods and heavy household products
  • Don’t let Meat contaminate Suzie’s Vegan roasts
  • Put your hot lunch in one section and your frozen goods on the other side
  • Purchase once separated into different plastic bags can now be carried in one reusable bag
  • Keep your beachwear and towels away from food

 

 

 

SuperCarrier is available as a single foldable bag or in a pack of three. With the full pack, you can stuff all three of these reusable bags into one pouch and stow them in your pantry until you're ready to hit the grocery store.

 

 

 

Each bag can be individually folded and stored when not in use.

When not in use,  it can be stored in its own clever pouch to save space while being carried. The smart pouch inside makes the SuperCarrier perfect for storing your facemasks, antiseptic wipes, your phone, wallet, snacks, or sunscreen.

 

 

 

SuperCarrier is bigger than a mere trip to the shops. Its clever design, flexibility, and durable construction make it ideal as a day bag.

 

 

Active folks understand the benefits of being organized - it means more time doing what they love. Fussing in your bag for lost items is time that could have been spent hiking, setting up a campsite before sunset, and making memories.

 

 

Durable & Waterproof

SuperCarrier is made with 100% ripstop nylon, which is lightweight and tear-resistant. Great quality material grocery bags hold tons of groceries, like canned food, water, and milk. The SuperCarrier holds up well against the weight of heavy shopping trips.

 

 

Long Handles & Drawstring Bags

Its long handles allow for holding or carrying on the shoulder. It's the perfect reusable grocery bag for shopping, groceries, travel and storage - so practical for daily use.

 

 

You know your drawstring bag is secure because it cinches tightly at the top of the bag. A traditional bag possibility for something falling out is higher.

 

 

Easy Clean & Machine Washable

The SuperCarrier is machine washable and wipeable! Any spills can be easily sorted and you refresh your bag by popping it in the washing machine.

 

 

 

Our mission is to help humanity. Bag the single-use habit. The SuperCarrier is a compact reusable bag that started it all! A reusable bag is only valuable if it is easy to remember and the SuperCarrier design makes it easy to stow by featuring an integrated stuff pouch, which allows the entire bag to fit easily in your pocket. Cut back on plastic bags with SuperCarrier. 

 

 

About us

ULTIX Outdoors Company was established in London in 2011.

In 2014, we launched our very own 1st generation ULTIX SAS Bike Travel Bag and we sold thousands of cases on various platforms and we still receive great feedbacks. Today, we present to you the ULTIX SuperCarrier 2.0.

Our mission is to let you explore more with less effort. We’re not only providing highly qualified outdoor products, but we’re also helping you shape your best travel memories.

story:
If you have ever gazed up in wonder at the mysterious universe, you will not want to miss this watch from AGELOCER, the new generation of chinese watch brand, who keep exploring the potential of mechanical watch.

 

This watch has a dial made of Aventurine glass to create a panoramic starry sky and perfectly display the current phase of the moon. With AGELOCER, you can carry the stars and moon with you on your wrist.

 

 

Now, you can own a luxurious mechanical watch with a dazzling Aventurine stardust dial at an affordable price.

 

 

 

Breaking free from the typical moon phase window design of other watches in the industry, the moon phase function of AGELOCER is integrated with the dial.

 

 

The Aventurine stardust dial and 3D engraved moon simulate a starry night scene and accurately display the phase of the moon in stunning detail.

 

 

Together with the Swiss design studio BUG ME GmbH, AGELOCER seamlessly integrates the moon phase complication into the star-filled Aventurine dial.

 

 

Through its Sapphire crystal, the moon phase concept is perfectly displayed.

 

 

 

Powered by AGELCOER’s self-designed A4610 Calibre movement, the watch is powerful inside and out:

 

  • The improved Straddle Balance-cock and Barrel provides stable timekeeping and 80 hours of power reserve.

 

 

  • Luxury watch movement polishing process (27 jewels, polished blue steel screws, bronzing lettering, Geneva pattern, sun pattern, fish scale pattern).

 

 

Movement Specifications

Caliber Number: Cal.A4610

Movement Type: Automatic with manual winding

Features: Hour, minute, moon phase

Guaranteed Accuracy: ±15 sec/day

Observed Accuracy: ±6 sec/day

Power Reserve: 80 hours

Other Features: 27 jewels, 28,800 v.p.h

 

No matter from which angle, the panoramic moon phase design on the front or the movement perspective on the back, you can appreciate the beauty of mechanics and art.

 

 

Choose from the optional Italian crocodile pattern leather or 316L stainless steel strap; Adjustable length folding buckle; Spring bar structure that allows quick strap changes.

 

 

 

Polished 316L stainless steel case; Crown with AGELOCER four-leaf clover logo.

 

 

Mohs hardness level 9, second only to diamond, scratch-resistant; Internal Anti-reflective coating, lets you appreciate the beauty of the watch clearly.

 

 

Suitable for wearing while washing or in inclement weather.

 

 

 

Not only in China, AGELOCER's cooperative parts suppliers come from traditional watch manufacturing countries such as Japan, Germany, and Switzerland. Finally, an affordable, high-quality, cost-effective vogue mechanical watch was established in China.

 

 

We adhere to the concept of sustainable environmental protection to ensure that our watches can be used for a long time. We also ensure that it can be repaired under the traditional watch repair process, which greatly improves its actual use value.

story:
,

UW- UNDER WATER, the blue sea, a magnificent gift bestowed by heaven. The 

mysterious sea and marine life motivate us to design. I hope our design could bring you

the same feeling we have – a sense of tranquility, a place to breath in the crazy messy

reality, a 24/7 sanctuary on the wrist with practical function.

 

The Aequorea is inspired by Jellyfish, an awe-inspiring and intriguing creature. It epitomizes the definition of  "Life Fighter “, built as the perfect tool for every situation all year round.

 

The design of Aequorea echoes jellyfish. You could spot the shape of jellyfish over the

entire watch including the luminous crown, the three-dimensional texture of the dial, the

bezel shape, and the unique curved case back.

 

Inspiration of Glowing Jellyfish

 

 

 

The bezel illustrates the silhouette of a jellyfish. It also comes with a one-way rotatable

function and diving recording function. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We used different models of Superluminova according to various dial combinations

(including BG W9, C5, C7 and light blue, etc.). The noteworthy one would have to be

UO01-Jelly dial, which carries a luminous effect of BGW9 on the entire face. This would

definitely be the most extraordinary combo.

 

Superluminova glows are filled evenly on the narrow pits and top of the crown body,

which looks like a luminous jellyfish in the dark.  The processing of filling in the luminous light is all done by handcraft which requires extensive concentration and huge efforts.

 

The technical drawing of the crown

 

The Dial is specially designed as a multi-layer structure. The upper dial and the lower

dial are coated with different colors to make the whole design more stereoscopic and

popping while in the luminous state. Dial's side is formed with a three-dimensional texture. 

 

Multi-layer dial

 

The texture of jellyfish

 

Aequorea is powered by the Seiko NH35A movement.  Seiko is one of the most

respected and horologically important watch companies in the world. The NH series of

movements can be found in many legendary Seiko dive watches and is widely used by

watch brands as it is affordable with good reliability. The NH35A is a dependable

workhorse movement that provides a good balance between budget, performance, and

reliability.

 

The case back of the domed shape is very special. It is embedded with a jellyfish

illustration with the corroded texture to give more depth to the design.

Unique case back inspired by the shape of jellyfish

 

 
 

Ratchet Buckle Clasp is an ideal Wetsuit watch band buckle. The ratchet theory

extension mechanism strikes a perfect balance of both convenience and

safety. Aequorea watch bracelet is an extraordinary well-made 316L stainless steel

watch band. Each link is constructed of 1 round edge solid 316L stainless steel units

with pressure pins. Length adjustment is simple and easy via flexible screw details. The

watch band is a heavy and durable replacement which is hard to found in the

aftermarket watch band market and is perfect for your diving watches.

 

 

 

Perfect for Dive

 

Quality + Design

We build quality and innovative watches at an affordable cost.

Money doesn’t buy respect or real appreciation. A timepiece worth respect and praise

doesn’t necessarily cost a fortune. Not many watches found in the market pay much

attention to details. However, our watches are not ordinary watch. We are confident that

you won’t be disappointed by our attention to details and high quality. Criteria that true

watch collectors really appreciate, value and focus.

 

 

The perfect ratio and size of 42mm diameter are suitable for most people's wrist sizes.

The 316L stainless steel material makes the watch more durable and can accompany

you with many years to come. The strong and scratch-resistant high-quality sapphire

crystal allows users to wear the watch at ease. The use of Superluminova in various

parts makes the watch easy to read time in the dark.

 

Indiegogo perk begins in limited quantities at USD 249. The Aequorea will revert to a regular retail price of USD 449 when in full production.

We’ve worked with the same factories and logistics partners over 10 successful

Kickstarter projects (OVD, UW) and have shipped out thousands of watches around the

world. These relationships have enabled UW Watches to not only lower our costs but to

be assured of the quality of our timepieces and the reliability of our logistics. This is how

we are able to offer superior value at a compelling price point with the UW

collections.

 

 

 

 

We have opted for functional packaging that you will enjoy after unboxing. Your

Aequorea will be delivered in a watch roll made of full grain cowhide leather that will age

beautifully with use. The noble dark green velvet inner lining keeps your

watch protected during all your travels. The watch roll can store up to three watches so

that you can bring your collection with you on all your adventures.  

Each package comes with a unique warranty card, this card uses translucent material,

inspired by the transparent shape of jellyfish.

 

 
 
 

SHIPPING

  • Shipping fees will vary according to your destination and will be automatically added to your pledge, once you confirm your location.
  •  Free shipping within Hong Kong.
  • All backers are liable for their own country's Duty/ VAT/ GST charges.
  • Please see "Risks and challenges" at the bottom of the campaign for more information.

WARRANTY

  • One (1) year warranty from the date of receiving your UW watch. The warranty only covers manufacturing defects.

 

How was it born?

 

Founded by Ricky Lam in 2020, UW Watches is a Hong Kong based brand. It is a sub-

brand of OVD. Ricky aims to make UW a microbrand watch company with a goal to

inject new design concepts into the watch design industry and break the dull traditional

market situation.

ORIGIN: Looking for design concepts in nature, let users have a new impression of

watches.

VISION: Hoping to become a successful independent microbrand. 

DESIGN: Never stop to design and create unique timepieces.

We are OVD group.

 

Please follow us on Instagram & online store.

  We used different models of Superluminova according to various dial combinations(including BG W9, C5, C7 and light blue, etc.). The noteworthy one would have to beUO01-Jelly dial, which carries a luminous effect of BGW9 on the entire face. This woulddefinitely be the most extraordinary combo. Superluminova glows are filled evenly on the narrow pits and top of the crown body,which looks like a luminous jellyfish in the dark.  The processing of filling in the luminous light is all done by handcraft which requires extensive concentration and huge efforts. The technical drawing of the crown The Dial is specially designed as a multi-layer structure. The upper dial and the lowerdial are coated with different colors to make the whole design more stereoscopic andpopping while in the luminous state. Dial's side is formed with a three-dimensional texture.  Multi-layer dial The texture of jellyfish Aequorea is powered by the Seiko NH35A movement.  Seiko is one of the mostrespected and horologically important watch companies in the world. The NH series ofmovements can be found in many legendary Seiko dive watches and is widely used bywatch brands as it is affordable with good reliability. The NH35A is a dependableworkhorse movement that provides a good balance between budget, performance, andreliability. The case back of the domed shape is very special. It is embedded with a jellyfishillustration with the corroded texture to give more depth to the design.Unique case back inspired by the shape of jellyfish 
 
 

Ratchet Buckle Clasp is an ideal Wetsuit watch band buckle. The ratchet theory
extension mechanism strikes a perfect balance of both convenience and
safety. Aequorea watch bracelet is an extraordinary well-made 316L stainless steel
watch band. Each link is constructed of 1 round edge solid 316L stainless steel units
with pressure pins. Length adjustment is simple and easy via flexible screw details. The
watch band is a heavy and durable replacement which is hard to found in the
aftermarket watch band market and is perfect for your diving watches.
 

 
 

Perfect for Dive Quality + DesignWe build quality and innovative watches at an affordable cost.Money doesn’t buy respect or real appreciation. A timepiece worth respect and praisedoesn’t necessarily cost a fortune. Not many watches found in the market pay muchattention to details. However, our watches are not ordinary watch. We are confident thatyou won’t be disappointed by our attention to details and high quality. Criteria that truewatch collectors really appreciate, value and focus.  The perfect ratio and size of 42mm diameter are suitable for most people's wrist sizes.The 316L stainless steel material makes the watch more durable and can accompanyyou with many years to come. The strong and scratch-resistant high-quality sapphirecrystal allows users to wear the watch at ease. The use of Superluminova in variousparts makes the watch easy to read time in the dark. Indiegogo perk begins in limited quantities at USD 249. The Aequorea will revert to a regular retail price of USD 449 when in full production.We’ve worked with the same factories and logistics partners over 10 successfulKickstarter projects (OVD, UW) and have shipped out thousands of watches around theworld. These relationships have enabled UW Watches to not only lower our costs but tobe assured of the quality of our timepieces and the reliability of our logistics. This is howwe are able to offer superior value at a compelling price point with the UWcollections.    We have opted for functional packaging that you will enjoy after unboxing. YourAequorea will be delivered in a watch roll made of full grain cowhide leather that will agebeautifully with use. The noble dark green velvet inner lining keeps yourwatch protected during all your travels. The watch roll can store up to three watches sothat you can bring your collection with you on all your adventures.  Each package comes with a unique warranty card, this card uses translucent material,inspired by the transparent shape of jellyfish.    SHIPPING
Shipping fees will vary according to your destination and will be automatically added to your pledge, once you confirm your location.
 Free shipping within Hong Kong.
All backers are liable for their own country's Duty/ VAT/ GST charges.
Please see "Risks and challenges" at the bottom of the campaign for more information.
WARRANTYOne (1) year warranty from the date of receiving your UW watch. The warranty only covers manufacturing defects. How was it born? Founded by Ricky Lam in 2020, UW Watches is a Hong Kong based brand. It is a sub-brand of OVD. Ricky aims to make UW a microbrand watch company with a goal toinject new design concepts into the watch design industry and break the dull traditionalmarket situation.ORIGIN: Looking for design concepts in nature, let users have a new impression ofwatches.VISION: Hoping to become a successful independent microbrand. DESIGN: Never stop to design and create unique timepieces.We are OVD group. Please follow us on Instagram & online store.

story:
Meet the Cadore VOY Tunable Glasses

One of the downsides of aging is that you often find yourself fumbling for reading glasses or holding a menu at arm’s length just to sort the mulligatawny from the minestrone.

VOY glasses is the new smart eyewear solution! 

These tunable glasses allow you to adjust lens power via a small hidden wheel behind the front of the frame. They were originally created for people who needs multiple reading glasses but can be useful for anybody experiencing frequent changes in eyesight. 

Designed for Everyday Use

Imagine a pair of glasses that can instantly adapt to your vision - VOY glasses was designed for everyday use for crystal clear vision during all activities. These adjustable lens can help you transition from activities that require near vision (reading, knitting, scrolling through TikTok) to activities that require distant vision (driving, sightseeing, playing sports). To endure the rigors of daily use, VOY glasses are made with high quality stainless steel.

Our Goal

At VOY, we believe that clear vision should be accessible to all and not just restricted to those who have access to eye care. With your support, we hope to distribute VOY glasses to areas with limited healthcare and resources. Vision impairment can significantly impact the learning ability of children and the cognitive function of older adults. With VOY glasses, we hope to provide clear vision to these vulnerable communities and improve their quality of life. 

Ease of Use

Using VOY glasses is easy:

  • Just turn the wheel away from the nose for more negative (-) power
  • Turn the wheel toward the nose for more positive (+) power

Accomplishments and Awards 

We launched our first version product in 2020, which brought tremendous support and media coverage to VOY glasses. With the feedback from our early customers, we made significant improvements in the technology of the lens and adopted a sleeker look. 

We are extremely grateful for our earlier customers for making VOY Glasses a reality.  

 

Tunable Ranges: Low, Medium and High

2nd Generation Lens

In addition to the new look, we also made numerous upgrades to the lens technology to improve user experience.


 

 

 

 

Key Features

Stylish Frame

The Cadore frames offer a sleek design fit for men and women of all ages.

Black Eyeglasses

 

Gold Eyeglasses

 

Gold Sunglasses 

VOY tunable technology also available in sunglasses

Specifications


 

 

Risks and Challenges

This project is low risk as these glasses are a proven concept. We developed our first generation  product through the support of this platform in early 2020. We were able to create and deliver our product to thousands of customers despite the obstacles that arose from the pandemic. Through this process, we have streamlined our production and delivery processes. After countless prototypes and extensive testing, we have developed a new high-quality product with a reliable manufacturer. To help minimize risks, we have waited until we have assembled a reliable product before introducing Cadore VOY Glasses on Kickstarter. Both our lenses and frames are in production phase. We are realistic and confident that we can deliver this product to our backers in 2021.

story:
We all have different knees and needs, so why is that all kneepads are the same? E-Knee is a new way to get just the right amount of pressure with the help of Artificial Intelligence, micro-airbags and customizable compression.

The benefits of knee compression:

When you’re walking, hiking or working out, your knees are under stress and pressure, which is why they need support.
They’re also good for technique and positioning. The compression provides better lateral hold, supporting your patella and joints, stabilizing you as you squat, run, or hike.

 

 

When the gyroscope detects powerful motion, the built-in ARM chip will tell the micro compressors to pressurize airbags based on different levels of pressure and motion, all in real-time. E-Knee gives dynamic support where and when you need it.

 

E-Knee detects different levels of air pressure based on initial tightness and saves the data for the next time.  Three preloaded profiles offer the right support in any situation: rest (sitting down), low-intensity (jogging for example), and high-intensity (basketball for example).
Once the gyroscope detects a different activity level, it changes modes within three seconds and instantly inflates or deflates the airbags, which solves the headache issue of regular knee pads that are often too tight or too loose. 

 

E-Knee offers the right fit regardless of your build. The breathable fabric stretches around your leg without restricting your motion while staying firmly in place.

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

E-Knee will help take care of your knees during daily activities:

  • High-impact activities. During the activities like mountaineering/hiking process, the knee joint is heavily loaded. Repeated flexion and extension of the knee joint will accelerate the overuse of knee joints.
  • Jumping involved and directions constantly changed sports. Sports like running, basketball, tennis is an exercise that needs knees working a lot to support you go back and forth and bearing your own weight.  The faster the pace, the heavier the weight, the more irregular the posture, and the more strains on the knees. 
  • Heavy usage in daily movements. During the daily movements where the direction of the knees and toes cannot be consistent. Some lower limb training movements, such as squats, are easily distorted when the direction of the toes force is inconsistent with the direction of the knees.

 

 

1. Slide it on and make it fully cover your knee cap. 

2. Press the button to turn on or off.  

E-Knee is easy to charge either wirelessly or with the included cable. Two control boxes even click together magnetically to charge a single charger and they work with standard wireless chargers.

 

 

The 28-hour battery life when fully charged enables it to provide top-notch support for a weekend outdoors or normal daily usage for 2-3 days. The 28 hrs battery life can always fulfill your different needs and schedules.

 

Size and shipping info will be collected a few days after the end of the campaign. We offer worldwide-friendly shipping. Visit FAQ for more info.

 

The single package includes 1 knee pad with a control box, 1 magnetic USB-A charging cable, 1 carry pouch, and 1 user manual.

This picture shows the 3D rendering image of E-Knee Unique Wireless Charger. The physical prototype is in production as it is decided to include as a valuable add-on only a few days before the campaign launch based on the feedback from our group members. We guarantee that the real prototype looks and works exactly the same as it is presented here and we will update the picture once we got it in hands.

E-Knee Special Wireless Charger is an add-on product for extra purchase. And it works for any compatible devices (cellphones, AirPods..).

 

Charles Wang, the CEO of C-EXO Skeleton Technology Company majored in Electrical Engineering Automation when he was in college. He is an enthusiast of exoskeleton and robots, which made him decide to quit college and started C-EXO Skeleton Technology company in 2014. The same year, he designed and created the first skeletal arm cyborg which wrapped the whole arm part all way down to each finger. This arm cyborg weighed 14 kg is enabled to increase the strength of arm and grip by 60 kg and 40 kg respectively and which was widely used in factory and construction fields.

E-Knee is the product he and his team designed for the general public with auto-adjustments and real-time support to maximize knee comfort during different sports and physical exercises.

Our inspiration for E-knee started from realizing none of the existing knee pads have the functionality of auto adjustments or auto binding, they are either too loose or too tight. Therefore, we decided to take knee support to the next level; for sports lovers and ordinary people alike, with a unique knee pad that offers both real-time and custom size support.

 

After nailing down the "body" of E-Knee, we started to design the control box (the intelligent control module).

We made in total 5 versions of its body, 6 versions of the control box, 5 prototypes, and 7 different color schemes.

 

Measuring Instruction:

Bend your knees slightly, measure the circumference of the:

  • 1. Thigh (7 in/ 18cm above the knee)
  • 2. Calf (5 in/ 13cm below the knee)
  • 3.  We will email you to collect the size when campaign ends or please feel free to submit it here. 

 

You can trust the safety of E-Knee as the whole production process is operated strictly to meet all required safety standards.

To achieve international certification for safe usage, all intelligent control modules (control boxes) are put through several rigorous industrial tests to ensure E-Knee can withstand daily use.

story:
Racing and timepieces have always been sacred partners over the years sharing the same core values like performance, endurance and precision. At Revelot we have always been passionate about supercars and early this year we begun to think about how we can create our version of a supercar watch.

With passion in racing and Motorsport, over the past few months we have been deliberating an idea of infusing a supercar’s soul into a wrist watch. Let us introduce you to the Revelot R9 Veloce Launch Edition. A watch made for racing enthusiasts that want to extend their love and passion for supercars into a timepiece.

 

To give the watch a touch of luxury, the Genta inspired case shape and form compliments the overall supercar characteristics. Gérald Genta (1931-2011) created some of the most iconic models in the watch world notably the Audemars Piguet Royal Oak.

 

From the sapphire glass to the movement, the Revelot R9 Veloce is designed with 7 layers of intricately crafted dials and parts that gives depth and attitude to the watch. Average fashion watches only have 1-3 layers.

Beginning with exterior of the R9 Veloce, we decided to fuse Aluminum, Carbon fiber, Steel and rubber to embody the racing spirit of supercar engineering. We use surgical grade stainless steel coupled with an Aluminum bezel for its durability.

 

The dashboard and speedometer of a supercar plays a major part in R9's design inspiration. The sub-dials and big date window mimics the dashboard of a supercar. Giving clear, precise and vital information to the owner while embodying the racing spirit.

 

The first turbocharged production car engine was used in 1962 on the Oldsmobile Jetfire and the rest was history. With that inspiration, we designed a turbine shaped seconds plate at 6 o’clock position that rotates every second.

 

A Supercar cannot be a supercar without carbon fiber, hence, we have integrated genuine carbon fiber materials onto the watch's case back for the final super touch. This feature is exclusively only for the R9 Veloce Launch Edition on Indiegogo.

 

Under the hood lies the renowned Japanese Miyota Quartz Chronograph engine known for its reliability, durability and superior precision in timekeeping for decades. The Chronograph has a 1/20 sec stop watch feature which is an important element in race watches.

 

Second to diamonds, sapphire crystal glass is added to the watch with a tint of anti-reflective technology guaranteeing clarity, durability and scratch-resistance.

 

The watch is compliant with the 10 ATM waterproof standards which means you can take the watch for a swim. Suitable for all occasions, whether its rain or shine.

 

Rubber is also a material that goes hand in hand with racing. The R9 Veloce strap is made with silicone for maximum comfort and durability. Just like a racing tyre, maximizing traction along your journey on the asphalt.

 

WHAT ABOUT LUME?

YES.

 

 

We always try to keep our products at a fair price for everyone. We have spent the past 3 years in developing sustainable strategies to offer high quality yet affordable products. To achieve this, we sell to you directly from trustable online platforms. For instance, the Revelot’s official website or third-parties site like Kickstarter & Indiegogo. By eliminating unnecessary cost like hiring expensive influencers or celebrities to be seen wearing our watches, we are able to translate the cost to adding in more features and using better materials.

Most of our watch parts are designed and uniquely facbriated from scratch, not just an OEM brands that puts the logo off watches from Aliexpress or Alibaba. We are confident that you will not find an identical watch with our design, specifications and quality on any of those websites.

 

R9 VELOCE LAUNCH EDITION ONLY AVAILABLE ONLINE

The R9 VELOCE launch edition with the carbon case back is only exclusive on Indiegogo, the normal R9 VELOCE will only come with stainless steel case back. Do back it now before the it’s all sold out.One of our founders have over 10 years of experience in watch retailing, that means we have a strong fundamental knowledge of recognizing good quality watches.

 

 

Revelot is a product design team passionate about creating functional fashion products that are  smart, premium and affordable. The company started with the project on Indiegogo & Kickstarter with the  R7  Avantgarde project in 2017,  and today we are launching our latest watch project inspired by supercars. 

We are confident that we will meet our projected delivery dates. Our backers will be in the loop as we communicate updates at every stage of the shipping process. Our factory counterpart stand ready to complete production as soon as we meet our funding goal.

VAT, Import Duty & Tax

Backers from all countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods - depending on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

Shipping Policy

If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you’re not there, the wrong address was provided, or you moved without telling us), it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

story:
Irontide: All-Terrain Shorts that Stand the Test of Water and Time.

Boost your sense of adventure and take your outdoor passions to a whole new level!  Thanks to its revolutionary waterproof pocket, you’ll never fear a wet phone again, as the sealed pockets protect and store any valuables you need, leaving it completely dry. Swim with your valuables in your pocket and hike with everything you need in one place! 

We didn't stop there. In total the Adventure short has 15 amazing features, to fully equip and prepare you for whatever Elements Earth throws at you.

AS ADVENTURE ADDICTS, WE HAVE BEEN FEELING A CRAVING FOR OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES SINCE FOREVER! 

We're a group of passionate adventurers in love with any outdoor activity. We realized that our most valuable and life-saving items were in danger every single time, but there was no convenient solution on the market! 

We went for dry bags, but they were too big and heavy…Also, all our items always got mixed up in there. A phone pouch? Too uncomfortable around our neck and limited to only storing our phone. We were incredibly fed up, and… this is why we came up with our own solution, and finally gone are the days to get mental over a bag.

 

 

 After years of prototyping, product development, and testing, we came up with an ingenious idea. Why don’t we design a short that allows us to carry all our valuables and keep them dry and secure? Combining advanced waterproof technology with durable materials, we devised the only solution to store your valuables securely in one place.

Experience your adventure, and don’t worry about where your valuables are or how you store them.. none of that.

 

 Run, swim, go camping, and live freely. These shorts can withstand it all. Finally, you can store your valuables in your shorts without carrying an extra dry bag or phone pouch. Irontide is your outdoor short, your travel short, your activewear, and your everyday short.


 

 

Our shorts have a built-in waterproof pocket made from Neodymium magnets, which are the world's strongest magnets. This ensures you can swim with your valuables without them getting wet. It has an IPX-8 certification which means it is completely waterproof (and dustproof, air proof!) upto depths of 100ft and was used by a development program by NASA in 2018 where they required the highest performance liquid-tight closure system!

 

 

 The secret is… There’s no secret other than science! You see, we discovered the key to building the most solid waterproof, all-terrain shorts in the market.

Here are some amazing features you don’t want to miss:

● The patented magnetic pockets use the strongest magnets in the world: Neodymium Magnets.

● It has strong, durable TPU strips that keep the seal in place, so no water or dust particles can enter. It is considered hermetically sealed.

● Two distinct magnet strips within the pocket provide double protection and security when in water. The pocket automatically seal shut, leaving no room for any filtration. 

● 100% waterproof, scientifically tested with world standard IPX-8 waterproof testing. It can withstand depths of 100ft indefinitely, keeping all the fun and excitement of jumping in the water.

 

 

 Capture every single inch of your adventure by keeping your phone where you need it most… in your pocket. You no longer need a separate bag to carry your phone. Irontide Shorts also eliminate the need to carry an extra pair of shorts for different activities. With one short, you can do it all: Capture your special moments and go on a terrific adventure with all your valuables secured in one place.

 

Get ready for your next outdoor adventure.

 You’ll get more than just shorts. You’ll get a whole new sense of fun. You’ll eliminate the need to worry about where you put your stuff… and start enjoying your trip.

 

 Kick-off your exciting adventure with super versatile shorts. These shorts have two kinds of pockets to leave no stone unturned. 

First, you’ll see our super-sealed waterproof pocket to keep your valuables dry. Then we added four extra pockets where you can sort and store it all inside. You won’t have to fret about looking for extra bags. 

Also, we don’t want you to lose sleep over keeping dry. 

That’s why Irontide Short has a set of pockets that stay waterless and another set of pockets that can store all your items. 

 

Here are the features of the other special pockets:

● Deep left pockets to keep your valuables secure.

● Tactical pocket made with durable and rugged material to keep your small accessories in place, such as a tactical knife, a lighter, a pen, or pliers.

● Zipped cargo pocket where your large items fit in place easily. Keep your notebook, maps, gloves, and more here.

● Zipped back pocket to access your items right when you need them.

 

 A water drainage system that lets the water clear out of your shorts fast. With a small eyelet in the cargo pocket, they have an instantaneous draining system. Water will empty out before you even notice!

 Also, You know how nasty it feels to be walking around with soggy pants. That's why we engineered mesh pockets that will discharge water automatically.

 Attach your items to your shorts with ease, such as sunglasses, your water bottle, or your car keys.

 You want to be comfortable, right? You bet. We added a special side elastic to make sure these shorts are the most comfortable you can find. You can now hike, do yoga, run and swim with shorts that fit securely.

If you feel that you need some extra support at your waist, we included an extra feature to make these shorts fit just right. We added extra belt loops for a nylon belt to keep your shorts in place during your adventure.

 

 Irontide Shorts are made with Hydrophobic Irontech™ fabric and an effective two-layer system that withstands any outdoor conditions. Whether you’re hiking on a muddy trail while it rains or doing some yoga poses, these shorts won’t chafe. 

And there's more. The fabric is treated for enhanced durability, breathability, and sun protection to make these shorts extra-resistant. You can jump, walk or swim on the same day, with one pair of shorts!

 These shorts do the magic by repelling water away. You’ll feel lightweight quickly and avoid some nasty inner thigh chafing.

 With premium spandex fibers and 4-way stretch fabric, you can twist and turn with ease. You can even do splits, and these shorts still won’t feel it. It’s a super-stretch short right up your alley.

 Irontide shorts are UPF 40+, so you can enjoy your outdoor recreation without experiencing any sunburn on your thighs. These shorts will also dry in a flash.

 Irontide shorts are built to withstand the test of time. With thoughtfully bar-tacked seams, the Irontide short can endure the rugged demands of the wild and impact from hard rocks.

 Irontide Shorts have a breathable fabric that doesn’t get bogged down in sweat. Once you start wearing these shorts, your body will love the sensation of this refreshing fabric. So get ready. You can hike, do yoga or run with these shorts and you’ll still feel comfortable and refreshed.

 Irontide shorts disperse and spread the moisture out, so you don’t feel sticky. By activating evaporating cooling, the shorts release all your moisture to keep you fresh.

 

 

 We have a mission to help people enjoy the outdoors while keeping their belongings in a single safe spot. That’s why we created versatile shorts that you can use to boost your outdoor experience.

 With scientifically tested technology, these shorts can eliminate 99% of odor-producing bacteria. So whether you are in a lake or on a long hike, you’ll always feel fresh.

 When you sweat buckets, your clothing expels nasty odors. That’s why we use Polygiene treatment (silver) that touches the bacterial cell wall and deactivates that nasty bacteria. 

This prevents the bacterias’ ability to release that pigment smell that feeds on your sweat. It also prevents irritation, making these shorts uniquely smell-free and comfortable.

 

 

 Thanks to Irontide Short’s high-end technology, tested by adventure enthusiasts, you can feel refreshed, move around with ease and, most importantly, secure your valuables inside them. You can now go on an adventure with one pair of shorts that you can use for everything.

What if you could:

● No longer pack multiple shorts for different activities.

● Eliminate the need for extra bags to carry all your valuables.

● Pack only what you need in one pair of shorts.

That’s exactly what you’ll get with Irontide shorts.

Because of its versatile look, it can also be worn in style for casual occasions.

 

 Limiting our carbon footprint is our top priority. That’s why these shorts are crafted with eco-friendly materials from sustainability-oriented suppliers.

 

 We care for the planet, and so do our suppliers. That’s why our due diligence process is thorough. When selecting factories, we select those that follow these three factors: social compliance, fair pay and benefits, and ethical responsibility.

 The question is: are you ready for Irontide shorts?

Irontide, your next adventure companion, is here for you.

 

 

 Store your short in our specially designed Irontide bag after your adventures.

$15 USD for all other Indiegogo Backers

 

 

 

 

 In USD: 

 

In GBP:

 

Chat with us below if you have any questions!

 

Our shorts do have some tolerance since they have side elastic.  

 

  • info@irontide.co
