story:
"The largest crater located near the south pole of the moon – the largest crater with over 2500 kilometers in diameter" 

 

Being invisible from people’s sight from earth, the full-of-impact-crater-back of the moon has always been a mystery. It is also home to the South Pole–Aitken Basin (South Pole–Aitken Basin), the largest, oldest and deepest crater on the moon. Who knows what else this mysterious land is home to.

Some private space companies of the United States are planning to join hands with the government to land on the moon again in 2022 conducting research and development with rockets, lunar surface probes, and manned vehicles.

Hopefully by all the rocket science, we would finally be able to find out what is out there one day.

 

 

 

 

The design of “Lunar Crater “is inspired by the spacecraft of the moon landing program.

You can easily see the streamlined design from the watch case, buckle and case back lens which assembles the most attractive design of the spacecraft - its streamlined diagonal mesh skylight.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The center of Dial is inlaid with a 21MM-aluminum-made-3D moon. With Swiss Superluminova luminous coating surface, the moon shine vividly and bright. In darkness, you can read the time through the moon's light height and the shadow position of watch hands.

 

 

 

 

Moon Walker II VS Mars Mission

We once had a very popular design- Mars Mission. This is a comparison of Moon Walker II's luminous intensity with the previous Mars Mission, as the green luminous powder will have a stronger luminosity than red, so it shows that the Moon Walker II will have a greater luminous intensity.

*Test environment: Charged 1 minute under 20 Watt 3000K bulb.

 

 

Derived from the criss-crossing star trails and star positions of Skymap, the luminous indicators are put at different heights from 1 to 12 o'clock to create the scattered moondust effect. The index of the Dial ring is made solid creating a sense that the whole watch is about to take off from the ground.
 
 

 

 

Meteorite from outerspace is used in the lower layer of the dial. This meteorite is we used Muonionalusta in Sweden, an extremely rare material which landed on the earth after a long journey in the outerspace for 4.3 billion years. After professional cut and chemical protective coating, each dial is inlaid with a 0.3mm thick meteorite piece at the bottom. The meteorite has a unique and natural Weidmann pattern with a unique background to make it more appealing and iconic. It echoes the moon in the center with the craters surface.

 

 

 

Inspired by the spacecraft of the moon landing program, the crown of Lunar Crater has an innovative and irregular shape. It requires an extreme planning and production process to achieve the straight and sharp fine details. With all the fine details, it allows a more accurate time adjustments of the watch rotation.

 

 

 

 

Our iconic curved hands design is adopted in Lunar Crater – the perfect match for the 3D moon. The arc design makes the hands walk smoothly around the moon. With such bending hands, it enhances the difficulty to assembly the watch. We have to be extremely careful and cautious so the hand tubes would not get across with each. It is a true masterpiece. The hands of the watch are deliberately made hollow without adding any luminous effect so they would not block the moonlight behind while the shining moon could help with the time reading.

 

 

 

 

The double dome sapphire crystal on Lunar Crater demonstrates the streamline aesthetic. 3 layer of anti-reflection plating is added on the bottom of the sapphire crystal to make the surface look clearer and brighter.

 

 

 

The Movement employs the long reliable Japanese SII NH70A, with 21,600 bph. vibrations, Geneva Waves on Rotor and a power reserve of more than 35 hours.  All contributes to achieve accurate time display.

 

 

 

With CNC cutting process, the buckle has a unique design demonstrating a strong sense of architectural aesthetics.

 
 
 
 
 

The structure of this case is highly complex. A CNC-cut cover is tailor-made to wrap the main case.

 
 
 
 
 

 

The leather strap uses two materials. One is the Italian Crazy Horse leather, rough, wild and unrestrained, while the other one is the Italian cracked belt. The belt has a unique pattern and echoes the texture of the meteorite on the surface. The straps are equipped with quick-release spring bars, allowing users to quickly remove the straps and replace them without any tools.

 

 

 

 

It comes with a vivid 30mm-moon model and a cubic stand. Users could put it on the stage for decoration and appreciate the moon any time they want.

 

HOW IT WORKS

 

 

 

 

As always, packaging plays an important in our story telling. To further extend the theme, the box is made of paper with rock pattern. The box is inlaid with three-dimensional MW characters, in matt black which brings this Lunar Cater a visual shock.

 

 

 

 

From concept to product development, from product development to final visual preparation, the entire campaign took more than 6 months. The complexity of the case and the surface is a real headache for the whole team. We could only finalize the appearance after 2 prototyping.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As a creator who has completed 8 campaigns, we are particularly confident in time control. Our previous backers have been very satisfied with our timely delivery.

 

 

Shipping method: We insist on using a more expensive courier service to ensure that backers receive the watch faster and more safely.

2-year warranty: We provide a 2-year warranty, so that users do not have to worry about the maintenance of this complex watch.

Excellent customer service: Supporters who have pledged our projects will know that we have always been the-easy-to-reach creator. We will keep responding and aid promptly.

 

 

We have 8 successful crowdfunding projects in a row with promising shipments on schedule record. Thanks to all the fans support, we could continue the creation path and passion to explore more innovative design.

 

 

The concept of space is always a key element in our design. We have already come to the 4th watch in the collection. Thank you for everyone who have supported our space series and who support us for the first time .Welcome to the "OVD UNIVERSE" ".

 

 

Chief designer RICKY said, “I enjoy the unfettered lifestyle which creates a boundaryless room for even crazier and freer design. Frankly speaking, this Lunar Crater is one of my favorite designs among my 20-year design journey. I wish I could create a piece better than this in the future.”

story:
Short Summary

After years of seeing Kinky Coexist(c) and the various Pride designs online, it's finally time for merch in the form of small pieces of metal! Now you'll be able to wear the designs online through things like Facebook frames AND be able to wear them in person through these sleek lapel pins; dress up your favorite bag, jacket, or anywhere else you love to add flare. 

Kinky Coexist(c) pins will be 2" wide whereas the Pride pins will be 1.5" wide. Both types will feature two posts on the back to help keep them oriented properly rather than doing the slow spin that single post pins will do. Both sets will also be made with light silver colored metal and colorful enamel that is sure to stand out and share your pride with the world around you.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Funding goes towards being able to produce the various pin designs in bulk.
  • Any additional funding that might be available will help fund future pin designs whether that means Pride designs that didn't get featured in this campaign or completely new designs yet to be created.
  • Should funding fail for any of the designs, the money will be returned to the customers and/or be offered to switch funding to one of the other available designs.

 

The Impact

  • These designs are all about unity and showing people that others like them exist out in the "real world."
  • Each pin that is seen out in events, or even while people are going about their usual lives, is gives people a small starting point for conversation which can lead to better connections and understanding between us.
  • Additionally, as the Kink Positive brand grows and gains more recognition, the easier it is to keep spreading positive education and resources for people to grow.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • Due to the bulk creation process of the pins one of the main risks is not having designs get fully funded since partial orders don't work.
  • One of the other challenges we found in previous pin shipments was dealing with pins breaking through the envelopes during the shipment process and the recent slow down with the postal service. We've found better shipping methods to make sure pins make it to their destination and have extended the expected shipping dates to accommodate for delays in the postal service itself.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Sharing the campaign with your friends and loved ones can always help us gain traction.
  • Make sure to check out our other work like upcoming classes, shirts and additional wearable merch, as well as supporting the events that are on hiatus during covid shutdown.
  • Donate to CashApp, Venmo, and Patreon to help directly fund more Kink Positive education.
story_txt:
Short Summary
After years of seeing Kinky Coexist(c) and the various Pride designs online, it's finally time for merch in the form of small pieces of metal! Now you'll be able to wear the designs online through things like Facebook frames AND be able to wear them in person through these sleek lapel pins; dress up your favorite bag, jacket, or anywhere else you love to add flare. 
Kinky Coexist(c) pins will be 2" wide whereas the Pride pins will be 1.5" wide. Both types will feature two posts on the back to help keep them oriented properly rather than doing the slow spin that single post pins will do. Both sets will also be made with light silver colored metal and colorful enamel that is sure to stand out and share your pride with the world around you.
 

What We Need & What You Get

Funding goes towards being able to produce the various pin designs in bulk.
Any additional funding that might be available will help fund future pin designs whether that means Pride designs that didn't get featured in this campaign or completely new designs yet to be created.
Should funding fail for any of the designs, the money will be returned to the customers and/or be offered to switch funding to one of the other available designs.


 
The Impact

These designs are all about unity and showing people that others like them exist out in the "real world."
Each pin that is seen out in events, or even while people are going about their usual lives, is gives people a small starting point for conversation which can lead to better connections and understanding between us.
Additionally, as the Kink Positive brand grows and gains more recognition, the easier it is to keep spreading positive education and resources for people to grow.


 
Risks & Challenges

Due to the bulk creation process of the pins one of the main risks is not having designs get fully funded since partial orders don't work.
One of the other challenges we found in previous pin shipments was dealing with pins breaking through the envelopes during the shipment process and the recent slow down with the postal service. We've found better shipping methods to make sure pins make it to their destination and have extended the expected shipping dates to accommodate for delays in the postal service itself.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Sharing the campaign with your friends and loved ones can always help us gain traction.
Make sure to check out our other work like upcoming classes, shirts and additional wearable merch, as well as supporting the events that are on hiatus during covid shutdown.
Donate to CashApp, Venmo, and Patreon to help directly fund more Kink Positive education.

story:
A bottle designed to fit in your bag - and life. 

You shouldn't have to think twice about bringing water. 

That's why we reimagined the humble water bottle to always fit - in your bag and life.

Seven years ago, we brought you the original memobottle.   Now, the memobottle is back with a brand new look.

 

Available in Matte Black and Matte White

 

 

 

Designed to fit - everywhere 

Early prototypes shown

Make the most of the space you have. 

The memobottle’s flat, paper-inspired design allows it to fit next to the things you carry every day like laptops and books.

Whether you’re packing for work, play or travel, you'll find space you never knew existed.

 

Made for travel 

Early prototypes shown

Born from a desire to reduce the impact of single-use bottles, the memobottle is designed to ensure you never leave your bottle behind again.

 Its compact nature allows it to fit where other bottles can’t - like handbags, back pockets and cross-body bags. It even fits in aeroplane seat pockets!

You’ll be hydrated anywhere and everywhere you go. That's one less excuse to not carry a bottle, and one more reason to stay hydrated.

 

Built to last

Early prototypes shown

Formed from premium food-grade 304 stainless steel, the new Stainless Steel memobottle is stain-resistant and robust. Its luxurious satin powder-coat is both delicate to the touch and scratch-resistant. 

Gentle curves, laser-etched detailing and a polished mouthpiece perfectly complement the bottle’s durable design.

 

Final Product Specifications

 

 

 

 

 

Design Process   

Early Prototype (painted logos) vs Current Production Sample (debossed and laser etched logos)

At memobottle we are obsessed with the finer details. We geek out on product design on a daily basis, we are driven by design and innovation and are very conscious of the impact that production processes can have on our environment.

With the Stainless Steel memobottle, we wanted to take the essence of the original memobottle, and distill it into an even clearer silhouette. The bottle’s sense of balance and refinement is the result of many, many iterations, both digital and physical.

It follows much trial and error and constant rejection by suppliers who didn’t believe it was feasible or possible to create such a bottle.

We are thankful that we endeavoured, and have reached an outcome that we are all so proud of.

And so it comes with immense joy - and relief - that we are able to finally release this object to the world.

 

Development and production

For the past two years, we have been working on the design and development of the Stainless Steel memobottle, and have been through many revisions of pre-production tooling and testing. Tooling is underway on all four bottles, and many off-tool samples have been reviewed and tested. Once finalised, we will move into full-scale mass production.

 

About us - Born on Kickstarter

 

We are committed to inspiring a more reusable society through the design of considered, convenient, everyday products.

memobottle was founded in 2014 by childhood best mates Jesse Leeworthy, and Jonathan Byrt.  The idea came about due to two frustrations that they experienced; the impact of single-use water bottles, and the inability to fit round bottles in their bags. It turned out that these frustrations were shared by people all over the world.

This is now our 3rd Kickstarter campaign.  Since our first Kickstarter, which helped us launch in 2014, we have built an amazing community of backers and followers that have shared this journey with us. Without you guys - our incredible Kickstarter community - memobottle would not be here today. And it is once again because of you that we are able to continue to innovate and do what we love.

We are a team of 10 passionate individuals based in Melbourne, Australia – driven by design, innovation and a strong desire to improve the state of our environment. This new project is the result of continuous feedback and hard work over the past few years.

 

A mission in a bottle

 

memobottle is proudly a certified B-Corporation, with social and environmental consideration at the forefront of everything that we do. We measure our success via two key metrics - a dual impact model as we like to call it.

The number of single-use bottles diverted from landfill by the use of memobottle products.
 

The days of clean water access we’re able to provide through our partnership with Water.org

To date, we estimate that we have diverted over 100 million single-use water bottles from ending up in landfill.  And through our partnership with water.org, we have provided over 11 million days of clean water to those in need.

We might be 7 seven years into this journey but we are only just getting started.

Thank you for joining us on this journey. Together, we have an exciting future ahead!

 

A big thank you

Bringing a new product to life, and creating a new Kickstarter campaign involves a lot of work. And there are a lot of special people that have helped us along the way.  Here are a few that we feel deserve a special mention.  Thank you guys, for helping this become a reality!

 Cinema Thom - for the filming and editing of our Kickstarter video. The end result was exactly as we had hoped, and you were a dream to work with.

 Single Use Aint Sexy - a big shout out to founder Josh Howard for all of the hard work, workshops and support.  Our collaboration cleaning tablets are an incredible addition.

 The Commons - to the amazing coworking community that has been a second home to us. Special mentions to Kim, Belle, Shannon and Robbie for always being game to step in as talent - you're all lifesavers! 

 Declan White - for mixing the audio in the video.

 James Butler - for campaign photography.

 Calum Shand - for campaign communications design.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

We've made a commitment that everything we do and build needs to add value and help our community live better lives. If they don’t, we should rethink why we’re doing it, and work out a better approach. Our products are designed with the best materials and built to last – tested thoroughly to withstand heavy use. We love that we're still seeing plenty of backers from our first Kickstarter campaign in 2014 still using the rewards they received then.

Reusability and recyclability

Our products are designed to last. When they reach the end of their life, then they are all fully recyclable. Our materials are BPA/BPS free.

Sustainable materials

Our new Stainless Steel memobottles are made from premium food-grade 304 Stainless steel. All considerations have been made to ensure that our bottles can be used for many years into the future, in order for them to be a viable and sustainable alternative to single-use bottles

Environmentally friendly factories

All our factories have been carefully selected and are partners we've been working with for several years. We have team members who visit the factories on a regular basis to ensure that quality, ethical and environmental standards are upheld.

Sustainable Distribution

We plan to optimise our shipping routes by utilising sea freight to transport bulk quantities to local warehouses to reduce our carbon footprint.

Something else

memobottle is a certified B-Corporation with social and environmental considerations at the forefront of everything that we do.

story:
After 4 successful campaigns and 17k+ pledges fulfilled to backers all over the world, we're excited to share our latest project with you:  
 

Nanobag 3.0

The ultimate reusable shopping bag

Ultra-light, ultra-strong, ultra-foldable. You won't believe how small these premium shopping bags pack. These tiny shopping bags are convenient to carry in your pocket at all times, are super comfortable to carry, and easily carries 66lbs (30kg).

 

Wouldn't it be nice to always have a comfortable bag handy?

We consume somewhere between 1 trillion to 500 billion of plastic bags per year, and it’s an unnecessary waste. Reusable bags are great for the environment, but normally they’re bulky or poor quality. Nanobag 3.0 is a premium shopping bag so compact that you'll barely feel carrying it. The compact super-soft fabric easily folds into your pocket, and does away with impractical reusable shopping bags.

 

See our FAQ for info on sizes etc. For our add-on bags, you can add these to your order in the check-out. You need to buy at least one patterned Nanobag 3.0 to be able to add it to your order.

Testimonials from Nanobag 2.0 backers.


 

 

 

We're committed to making you a climate positive product. That means that we give more back to the planet than we take. We consider our bags environmentally conscious, as they contain less materials than other bags in their category and help reduce single use plastic bag consumption. This time we’re also stepping up our tree planting efforts further. For each bag we sell we’ll plant one mangrove tree with the Eden Reforestation Project. Mangrove trees are one of the most effective tools against climate change, and stores ten times more carbon than land based tree species. Mangroves take the carbon out of the air and bind it to the ground, thus preventing it from escaping into the atmosphere. One single mangrove tree can store around 1750lbs (800kg) in its 40 year lifespan.  As an added bonus they prevent soil erosion and help sustain coastal ecosystems.

 

Commitment to excellence

We're committed to creating high-quality products that you'll love. The bags are made with premium custom made fabrics and we've put in place a thorough quality-control and testing process to make sure you receive a great final product. We guarantee that your bags will be of excellent quality.

 

Shipping

We offer FREE International registered shipping to backers pledging for 4 bags and above. All parcels will be shipped with tracked air mail.

 

The team:

Tiptop Things are a group of friends working together to infuse everyday items with premium quality and cutting edge technology. Nanobag 3.0 is our fifth Kickstarter campaign, and you might have seen our earlier Nanobag and Air Deck campaigns. Our mission is to make quality premium products that you will love.

 

Why do we need your support?

We can't do this without you. The funds we raise here will go towards producing our custom made fabric, printing and stitching the bags as well as logistics. Our Kickstarter backers will be the first to have the Nanobag 3.0. 

 

 Moon, River, Ocean, Ice Sheet, Astronaut - Credit: NASA

story:
It’s a story that starts with the ocean. Passing a practice down from generation to generation, theirs is one of the oldest freediving traditions in the world.

 

The AMA diver is a 1960’s style skin diver inspired by a 2000-year-old tradition and celebrates the spirit of the pearl divers of Japan, the AMA.

 

 

 

 

 

 

ALBANY creates timepieces inspired by lesser-known adventurers celebrating a time when the world was full of wonder and exploration.

 

We stand by precision and reliability. We oversee our entire manufacturing process from design to craftsmanship. As passionate caretakers of our planet, we advocate for meaningful integration between exceptional quality and sustainability.

 

 

THEY TALKED ABOUT US

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

 

 

ALBANY’S PURPOSE 

 

A message from the founder.

 

 
 
 
 

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT US ONLINE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

TRIED AND TESTED

 

The AMA diver has received outstanding reviews for its design and quality, story, and inspiration.

 

Reviews across the globe have acknowledged our attention to detail and the exceptional performance expected of a 300m dive watch.

 

We have tested our watches above and below water. They perform in all conditions; From the snowy peaks of the Sierra Nevada to the tropical Indian Ocean, and the heat of the African desert to the icy waters of the Atlantic.

 

 

 

 

 

 

HANDS AND LUME

 

We designed the watch hands to represent the AMA's dive tools, from the knife-like hour and spear-shaped minute hands to the signature harpoon seconds hand.

 

The AMA divers subdued black hour-hand, teal minute-hand emphasized for enhanced practical use, and harpoon seconds-hand make the AMA diver easily readable.

 

Swiss Super-LumiNova® BWG9 has been applied to all three hands, indices, and crown for legibility in all conditions.

 

 

 

 

BEZEL AND CRYSTAL

 

Our anti-reflective domed crystal and bezel insert are made from scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, second in hardness only to diamonds.

 

At 41.5mm, the 120-click unidirectional bezel is easy to grip and extremely precise with no back play.

 

 

 

 

CASE AND CROWN

 

The AMA diver evokes a time of vintage sea exploration. We wanted a design that was sleek and original yet familiar. Introducing our 316L brushed stainless 60’s skin diver styled case depth rated to 300m. All AMA divers are depth tested during manufacturing and after assembly. Our crown features the ALBANY cormorant, a symbol of nobility and bounty.

 

• Comfortable 40mm case with drilled lugs for easy strap changes

• 48mm lug to lug with a 20mm strap size

• 12.8mm in height (Including the domed sapphire crystal)

• A 7mm fully lumed (Swiss Super-LumiNova® BWG9) ergonomic screw-down crown that's easy to grip

 

 

 

 

MIYOTA CALIBER 9039

 

A Japanese inspired watch needs a robust Japanese movement. The heart of the AMA diver is the highly regarded Miyota 9039, the no-date version of the beloved 9015. This automatic movement beating at 28800 bhp is beloved for its smooth second-hand sweep. Its consistent quality and accurate timekeeping make it is a workhorse caliber that will serve you efficiently on your own adventures for many years.

 

 

 

 

CASEBACK

 

The screw-down caseback features an engraving inspired by Iwase Yoshiyuki’s photography of AMA divers from his village, circa the 1950s. This 2000-year-old freediving tradition is a testament to the AMA’s enduring spirit and close relationship to the sea. ALBANY recognizes these lesser-known adventurers with this beautiful image of an AMA looking back across the tides of time on an incredible tradition as it fades in the modern world.

 

 

 

 

 

 

DIAL OPTIONS

 

The AMA diver is available in two dial variants. We have designed each dial to embody aspects of the sea and the AMA story.

 

 

 

 

 

 

BRACELETS

 

The AMA diver is available in three bracelet variations - Premium eco weave, Italian leather, and stainless steel beads of rice.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE UNBOXING

 

In keeping with our Japanese inspiration, we designed bamboo boxes embossed with the ALBANY logo to keep your AMA diver safe and secure. It offers a premium and sustainable solution to traditional watch boxes.

 

A rugged watch roll is paramount to keeping your watches safe from scratches. We use double-waxed canvas with a microsuede lining. Each roll has space enough for those longer journeys with four pouches to carry multiple watches or accessories and includes provision for a watch tool. Fold the flap, roll and wrap the leather strap around to keep everything in place.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

STEP 1 

 

Select your prefered choice:

 

AMA Black Pearl

or 

AMA Bathys Blue

or

AMA Night Dive

 

 

 

 

 

 

STEP 2 

 

A member of the ALBANY team will contact you directly to confirm your order.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SHIPPING

 

We have collaborated with Indiegogo's official shipping partners. The average delivery time will be 5-8 working days and includes tracking and insurance on the full purchase amount.

 

 

 

 

OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABLE PRACTICE

 

Sustainability forms the basis of our watches, and we are committed to setting an ethical example in the watch industry by producing premium yet sustainable items.

 

We strive to infuse each stage of our design and production process with a positive influence. Environmental impact and ethical treatment of humans and animals are an integral part of all our design, development, and production processes at ALBANY.

 

Our products incorporate regenerated and biodegradable materials designed with an emphasis on durability and an extended lifespan. We are actively working with our manufacturing partners across our supply chain to improve consumption while reducing emissions and waste.

 

Long-lasting design - As passionate caretakers of our planet, we advocate for meaningful integration between exceptional quality and sustainability.   Our watches are made from long-lasting stainless steel and utilize automatic movements that require no batteries and will outlast the lifespan of its wearer if properly cared for.

 

Reusability and recyclability - Our products incorporate regenerated and biodegradable materials designed with an emphasis on durability and an extended lifespan.

 

Sustainable materials - We strive to infuse each stage of our design and production process with a positive influence.   Sustainability forms the basis of our watches, and we are committed to setting an ethical example in the watch industry by producing premium yet sustainable items.

 

Environmentally friendly factories - Environmental impact and ethical treatment of humans and animals are an integral part of all our design, development, and production processes at Albany.  We are actively working with our manufacturing partners across our supply chain to improve consumption while reducing emissions and waste.

 

Sustainable Distribution - Our logistics partners promote sustainable growth around the globe. They have set out their sustainability goals prioritizing the reduced use of natural resources and reducing CO2 emissions from their logistics activities.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

 

We have partnered with companies that have exceeded our expectations when it comes to courier services, manufacturing standards, and high levels of quality. We will respect our delivery timeline, and if there are any delays, we will keep you informed or be available to answer any questions - hello@albanywatches.com

 

Backers are responsible for shipping fees and any Duty/VAT/GST charges for their own country, which may vary according to each country’s legal and taxation structure. ALBANY WATCHES CO LLC legally cannot pay for or compensate customers for their own country’s Duties or VAT or GST. Upon purchasing an ALBANY watch, you are acknowledging that you are aware of and intend to pay for your duties or VAT or GST on your purchase. For more information or to calculate your Duty/VAT/GST please visit this website: http://www.thevatcalculator.com/international-v...

We oversee our entire manufacturing process from design to craftsmanship. As passionate caretakers of our planet, we advocate for meaningful integration between exceptional quality and sustainability.  THEY TALKED ABOUT US         ALBANY’S PURPOSE  A message from the founder.     WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT US ONLINE        TRIED AND TESTED The AMA diver has received outstanding reviews for its design and quality, story, and inspiration. Reviews across the globe have acknowledged our attention to detail and the exceptional performance expected of a 300m dive watch. We have tested our watches above and below water. They perform in all conditions; From the snowy peaks of the Sierra Nevada to the tropical Indian Ocean, and the heat of the African desert to the icy waters of the Atlantic.      HANDS AND LUME We designed the watch hands to represent the AMA's dive tools, from the knife-like hour and spear-shaped minute hands to the signature harpoon seconds hand. The AMA divers subdued black hour-hand, teal minute-hand emphasized for enhanced practical use, and harpoon seconds-hand make the AMA diver easily readable. Swiss Super-LumiNova® BWG9 has been applied to all three hands, indices, and crown for legibility in all conditions.    BEZEL AND CRYSTAL Our anti-reflective domed crystal and bezel insert are made from scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, second in hardness only to diamonds. At 41.5mm, the 120-click unidirectional bezel is easy to grip and extremely precise with no back play.    CASE AND CROWN The AMA diver evokes a time of vintage sea exploration. We wanted a design that was sleek and original yet familiar. Introducing our 316L brushed stainless 60’s skin diver styled case depth rated to 300m. All AMA divers are depth tested during manufacturing and after assembly. Our crown features the ALBANY cormorant, a symbol of nobility and bounty. • Comfortable 40mm case with drilled lugs for easy strap changes• 48mm lug to lug with a 20mm strap size• 12.8mm in height (Including the domed sapphire crystal)• A 7mm fully lumed (Swiss Super-LumiNova® BWG9) ergonomic screw-down crown that's easy to grip    MIYOTA CALIBER 9039 A Japanese inspired watch needs a robust Japanese movement. The heart of the AMA diver is the highly regarded Miyota 9039, the no-date version of the beloved 9015. This automatic movement beating at 28800 bhp is beloved for its smooth second-hand sweep. Its consistent quality and accurate timekeeping make it is a workhorse caliber that will serve you efficiently on your own adventures for many years.    CASEBACK The screw-down caseback features an engraving inspired by Iwase Yoshiyuki’s photography of AMA divers from his village, circa the 1950s. This 2000-year-old freediving tradition is a testament to the AMA’s enduring spirit and close relationship to the sea. ALBANY recognizes these lesser-known adventurers with this beautiful image of an AMA looking back across the tides of time on an incredible tradition as it fades in the modern world.      DIAL OPTIONS The AMA diver is available in two dial variants. We have designed each dial to embody aspects of the sea and the AMA story.      BRACELETS The AMA diver is available in three bracelet variations - Premium eco weave, Italian leather, and stainless steel beads of rice.              THE UNBOXING In keeping with our Japanese inspiration, we designed bamboo boxes embossed with the ALBANY logo to keep your AMA diver safe and secure. It offers a premium and sustainable solution to traditional watch boxes. A rugged watch roll is paramount to keeping your watches safe from scratches. We use double-waxed canvas with a microsuede lining. Each roll has space enough for those longer journeys with four pouches to carry multiple watches or accessories and includes provision for a watch tool. Fold the flap, roll and wrap the leather strap around to keep everything in place.          STEP 1  Select your prefered choice: AMA Black Pearlor AMA Bathys BlueorAMA Night Dive      STEP 2  A member of the ALBANY team will contact you directly to confirm your order.        SHIPPING We have collaborated with Indiegogo's official shipping partners. The average delivery time will be 5-8 working days and includes tracking and insurance on the full purchase amount.    OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABLE PRACTICE Sustainability forms the basis of our watches, and we are committed to setting an ethical example in the watch industry by producing premium yet sustainable items. We strive to infuse each stage of our design and production process with a positive influence. Environmental impact and ethical treatment of humans and animals are an integral part of all our design, development, and production processes at ALBANY. Our products incorporate regenerated and biodegradable materials designed with an emphasis on durability and an extended lifespan. We are actively working with our manufacturing partners across our supply chain to improve consumption while reducing emissions and waste. Long-lasting design - As passionate caretakers of our planet, we advocate for meaningful integration between exceptional quality and sustainability.   Our watches are made from long-lasting stainless steel and utilize automatic movements that require no batteries and will outlast the lifespan of its wearer if properly cared for. Reusability and recyclability - Our products incorporate regenerated and biodegradable materials designed with an emphasis on durability and an extended lifespan. Sustainable materials - We strive to infuse each stage of our design and production process with a positive influence.   Sustainability forms the basis of our watches, and we are committed to setting an ethical example in the watch industry by producing premium yet sustainable items. Environmentally friendly factories - Environmental impact and ethical treatment of humans and animals are an integral part of all our design, development, and production processes at Albany.  We are actively working with our manufacturing partners across our supply chain to improve consumption while reducing emissions and waste. Sustainable Distribution - Our logistics partners promote sustainable growth around the globe. They have set out their sustainability goals prioritizing the reduced use of natural resources and reducing CO2 emissions from their logistics activities. RISKS AND CHALLENGES We have partnered with companies that have exceeded our expectations when it comes to courier services, manufacturing standards, and high levels of quality. We will respect our delivery timeline, and if there are any delays, we will keep you informed or be available to answer any questions - hello@albanywatches.com Backers are responsible for shipping fees and any Duty/VAT/GST charges for their own country, which may vary according to each country’s legal and taxation structure. ALBANY WATCHES CO LLC legally cannot pay for or compensate customers for their own country’s Duties or VAT or GST. Upon purchasing an ALBANY watch, you are acknowledging that you are aware of and intend to pay for your duties or VAT or GST on your purchase. For more information or to calculate your Duty/VAT/GST please visit this website: http://www.thevatcalculator.com/international-v...

story:
Hi, I'm Osian from Antur Supply Co - a lifestyle brand curated for the adventurous heart. Having launched in 2018, we established the brand with our signature camping mats and insulated water bottles. Over the past 18 months, I have been designing and developing our most exciting project yet. 

The Problem

Every single pair of jeans I owned did this ?,.. they were restrictive, sweaty, and never fit me properly...no matter how much I spent, I got the same result.

 

I searched for years for functional, durable, breathable, and great-looking jeans that actually fit well,  but it just wasn't out there.

So... I decided to make it!

 

The Solution

Functional, comfortable,  durable, and breathable denim, built for your lifestyle.

We developed jeans that don't restrict your lifestyle. A jean that can adapt, and can be worn at the office,  on your commute,  for nights out,  Sunday walks, and everything in between.

You'll never go back to traditional jeans after you try these.

 

How is our denim different?

The Fabric

Our custom ASX denim fabric is made of a cotton/COOLMAX®/LYCRA® blend for ultimate comfort, free movement, and breathability.

COOLMAX® is designed to keep moisture away from the skin making our denim 30% more breathable than traditional denim.  It also holds thermo-regulating properties, keeping you warmer when it's cold out and cooler when it's warm out.

 

LYCRA® gives our denim 4X the stretch 

 

Reinforced Signature Gusset

We added a gusset panel for stretch, free movement, and durability where you need it most. No more crotch rips!

 

Deep Front Pockets for Women & Men

You heard that right.. DEEP WOMEN'S POCKETS! I recently created a Tiktok video that hit 1.9 million views; showing the deep pockets on our women's denim. We are so glad you love them as much as we do. Women need deep pockets!

If you missed it, here it is again:

 

Ultra-secure Back Pockets

We added a secure flap to the inside of the back pocket to help keep your valuables safe.

 

Water-resistant Coating 

We coated the jeans with SILVERPLUS® finish making the jeans water-resistant, anti-odour, and anti-bacterial.

 

Reinforced Belt Loops, Sustainable Non-leather Backpatch & Extra Strong Thread.

Our denim includes: 

  • Reinforce the belt loops
  • A sustainable backpatch
  • Coats Epic EcoVerde® threading - a 100% recycled premium polyester core spun sewing thread that has been precisely engineered to create durable, attractive seams with greater abrasion resistance

Eco-friendly Metalware

For the metal buttons and trims, we made sure not to use electroplating. By not using electroplating, we were able to create a finish on the trims using a tumbler as opposed to using chemicals for the desired finish. This meant zero chemicals, less water, and less electricity was used to produce them.

Denim Options Overview:

The Antur Performance Denim will come in 2 colours, Solid Black and Mid Indigo

Our Fit Guide

Our Reward Levels

Our reward level system shows the many options and ways you can support the project.  Below are categorized monetary pledges with their correlating rewards. 

 

Back this Project in 3 easy steps:

  1. Decide how many pairs you'd like
  2. Click 'Get This Perk' on the correct perk level
  3. Add in your details and you're good!

Jump to our FAQ if you need more detailed instructions.

 

How to measure

*Late February/ Early March  :)

 

Shipping costs

We're going to collect shipping costs after the campaign ends via BackerKit (this is when we also collect your shipping address,  denim size, and colour variant). Shipping costs have been a little more volatile recently, so we want to make sure we charge you the correct amount based on your location at the time of production. 

We promise to only charge what's reasonable and keep fees as low as possible.

 

Are you outside The UK or USA? 

If you are backing our project outside the UK or the USA you will likely have to pay customs, so please be aware of that extra charge.

Duties and taxes for UK & USA will be covered.

Shipping fees DO NOT count towards customs fees custom fees are a separate charge. 

The customs fee is not a fee we retrieve from you, but a fee you'll pay to the shipping company when the package has entered your country.

 

Here is the shipping cost chart based on location:

European Union

This zone comprises the following countries: 

Return Policy

Our jeans come with a 12-month warranty so we will replace any pair of denim that do not hold up to our claims, or in the unlikely case of a manufacturer defect. We do not offer refunds for any denim that was received through the Kickstarter campaign, but if you need a size change that's absolutely fine.

We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our brand.  As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone involved.

 

Antur story

Hi, my name is Osian,

Adventure, travel, and exploration have always been a very important part of my life. Growing up in North Wales gave me a great appreciation for nature, hikes, and all things outdoors. My life and upbringing here laid the foundation for the journey I was soon to embark on…

In 2018 I sought out to create a lifestyle brand for the adventurous heart- people who appreciate simplistic, high-quality design and style. Antur is a labor of love, where it continues to grow and be an outlet for like-minded spirits through their journey of an adventurous life.

 All of this – everything we’ve done and continues to reach for – wouldn’t be possible without you.

As a growing company, we’re excited for the road ahead and hope that our paths cross with yours somewhere out there.

May you continue to adventure,

Osian

 

Questions?

First time backing an Indiegogo Campaign and need some help? Email us at hello@antursupplyco.com
