story:
Nothing more frustrating than working with the inappropriate tool!

We love to have the right gear for the job. Although we are optimistic and believe in a future where we don’t need to wear masks anymore in daily life, we would always need good respirators to work in dusty places, and face hazards of mother nature.

 

 

 

Sanding, sawing, painting, spraying, varnishing… These activities release a huge amount of particulate matter and toxic fumes that are inhaled and absorbed by the body, leading to many health issues. Ordinary masks are a hassle: they give you sores, they fog up your glasses or protective goggles, they are bulky and heavy, they dramatically reduce the air flow and, even worse, most don't offer the necessary protection.

 

 

 

 

 

Maasc has great advantages for this types of work. The silicone seal prevents inward leakages. That means that all the air you are breathing actually goes through the filter. The dedicated exhaust valves, in addition to the seal, prevents glasses and goggles from fogging up. And the BreatheEase™ active fan system pulls air in, making breathing seamless, ideal for works that requires physical activity. To top all these features you can still count on the top-grade filtration performance.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Wildfires are becoming more common and stronger. They are a significant menace for people all around the world, from the US to Australia, from Indonesia to Brazil. Wildfires are dangerous not only because they destroy everything on their way. The smoke they produce fills the air with particulate matter, which are extremely hazardous for your health. This smoke can spread through thousands of miles and even affect areas in different continents. It is something out of our control that we must protect ourselves against. The majority of masks are unsuited for this type of menace, and will let you breathe polluted air through gaps between the face and the mask.

 

If you live in an area prone to wildfires and its devastating consequences, having Maasc comes in handy as an actual safety equipment for you and your family!

 

 

When we think of air pollution, densely populated areas and heavy industries usually come to mind. But the situations we are exposed to are more common than you think.

Maasc can help you in high-risk areas. By providing top-grade filtration and a soft-touch seal, it guarantees that the air that you are inhaling is rid of harmful substances and particles.

 

 

Air pollution can seriously affect you on two different fronts: small particles and toxic gases. These pollutants affect your body differently. While small particles can penetrate your circulatory system and organs, substances present in toxic gases can interfere with the dynamic of your body cells. The presence of such elements in the circulatory system provokes a chronic state of inflammation in body tissues.

 

 

Disclaimer: Maasc is not yet CE nor NIOSH certified, therefore the device is not intended for medical nor industrial setting use. Maasc is only intended for general protection such as against air pollution. It is clearly not intended for uses related to Covid-19 and we do not claim any anti-bacterial nor anti-viral property.

 

 

 

 

 

We are constantly looking at our environment to propose solutions for our time. Maasc has been passionately and carefully designed thinking of people everywhere in the world. A powered respirator, reusable mask, with modular replaceable parts, that requires the replacement of the filter only, to provide cleaner airflow, seamlessly, wherever you may need it.

We completed our industrial prototype. Worked with various vendors to design our manufacturing tooling and secure our supply chain. With your support we could focus upon bringing to mass production Maasc by building and commissioning the manufacturing tooling, completing the certification process, and launch the first batch production.

We are rewarding our backers with a special deal on the first mass production batch of Maasc! Check out our rewards and perks.

 

 

 

 

 

 Besides the items on the kit, you can also add extra items and accessories. 

 

 

Size guide

Part of the protection Maasc offers comes from its high-quality seal, which guarantees perfect fitting on the user's face. To do so we developed a revolutionary airtight seal that fits perfectly well the various face shapes with a unique configuration when folded on your face. We used thousands of anthropometric data from the DINED database to patent our seal. Our LFGB CE food-grade silicone seal is very soft to the touch and easily adapts to your face. However we come in different shapes and sizes! And that's why we designed three different sizes of seal to adapt to various facial dimensions.

 

 

Download and print our size guide using this link. Choose between A4 or Letter format.

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping estimates by Maasc perk: Maasc will be shipped wherever you are. We use customs-friendly shipping wherever we can, especially to the US, EU, UK, Canada, Middle-East, and Australia.

For some destinations the shipping prices do not include import duties and VAT depending upon the laws and regulation of each individual country.

Please note that the above are estimates and actual costs of shipping may vary depending upon global circumstances.

 

 

 

Maasc is a personal powered air purifying respirator that makes breathing seamless!

 

Airflow system to enhance breathing

The patented BreatheEase™ fan system pulls air through a premium quality filter at a rate of 35L/min, constantly providing a supply of fresh filtered air. We propose you two speeds for when you are walking or practicing moderate exercise and for when you are working more intensively.

Maasc has a one-way airflow, which means the entrance and the end exhaustion of the air occurs separately.

 

 

  1. Air is sucked through the gas filter (pre-filter) and particulates filter, eliminating particles and pollutant gases. The filtering surface is large to reduce the air resistance
  2. Air passes through the fan and is inhaled to ease breathing
  3. The fresh breeze of the airflow eliminates the nuisance of the exhaled air with excess heat and moisture and keeps expelling it out from the Maasc quickly through the exhaustion valve located on the bottom part. Even when the BreatheEase™ Fan is off the outlet valve safely closes when inhaling to allow you to inhale only filtered air.

 

High performance filtration

Maasc protects you from both small particles and toxic gases, with our double protection provided by the particulates and gas filters.

Additionally, the Activated-carbon gas filter (pre-filter) stops hazardous Sulphur Oxide and Nitrogen Oxide gases, as well as odours, something you usually only find in heavy-duty masks far beyond the price point.

 

 

Innovative high grade silicone airtight seal

The LFGB CE food-grade silicone seal avoids leakage of air both inwards and outwards, avoiding the infamous foggy glasses and the ingress of unfiltered air. And more: the soft silicone is cool to the touch and won't mark your face. It seals surprisingly well even for the "beardy" gentlemen!

 

 

We use only premium LFGB European food grade, safe non-toxic silicone with no fillers, BPA, BPS, PVC, and other phthalates. This is the safest silicone in contact with your skin. Our seal, outlet flap valve, and neck strap are made of this high grade and safe silicone.

 

 

 

Integrated electronics enabling smart features

After 3 years of development, we were able to come up with a high-efficiency comfortable respirator capable of protecting you in situations we're increasingly exposed to. Integrated computing power enables Maasc to control LED lights for communication with the wearer as well as for night visibility. After you set up the level of pollution of your area, Maasc's software computes the actual number of hours of usage with the airflow speed and the weight of particles that settle on the filter. As your filter reaches the end of its life, Maasc sends you a smart alert, letting you know it's time to replace the filter to keep your mask running optimally. The BreatheEase™ Fan, filter, and smart capability combined make Maasc a wearable air-purifier that's much more superior to the disposable cloth mask which becomes a humid mess on your face within minutes of wearing it.

Check out the features!

 

 

 

 

 

 

A disruptive & affordable Powered Respirator

 

 

 

 

 

 

Facemasks are turning to be the everyday accessory. In this crisis period everyone has tried one and we know now how much discomfort it creates!

Wearing a mask is not natural and they make breathing more difficult and stressful. Masks leave marks on the face, are bulky & heavy, and often are not fitting well. In brief, we just want to take them out after couple of minutes wearing them!

Lots of solutions out there but good respirators are quite expensive and not necessarily taking care of your breathing comfort!

The crisis might hopefully be over soon but discomfort from inefficient masks is still here! We tried lots of masks but none was addressing our needs. We are a dedicated team with decades of tech-industry experience and we worked intensively to innovate, patent, and build an industrial prototype.

Tired of “just another mask project”; looking for a durable, sturdy, efficient and affordable respirator?

We got you covered!

Let's start by the basic: Maasc is the most comfortable breathing mask for prolonged hours and daily usage! We do believe that above all, the breathing experience has to be the best for you to wear your gear for long hours and be happy to repeat the experience the next day...and the day after, else it is just a gadget!

 

 

 

 

We are currently running pre-certification tests to assess the indicators of safety and filtering efficiency. The results are promising! With your support, we want to certify Maasc for the top-level CE EN12942:1998 harmonized standard.

 

 

A constant challenge during the development of Maasc was the tough safety and environmental guidelines we followed to ensure the product is safe and ready to be used even in heavy-duty situations.

From day one, we have been serious about creating a Personal Protective Equipment company. Our mission is to deliver the safest, most comfortable and affordable powered respirator to enable mass adoption. The current top-grade respirators price point often forces people to use the less adapted solution to their needs, and we find that unacceptable. Comfort is not the first concern of masks manufacturers. With your comfort in mind, we have been developing Maasc for more than 3 years. We could have launched it last year during the “mask hype period” but we were just not ready.

 

 

Your safety is our “raison d’être”. After numerous iterations we developed the least bulky & lightweight powered respirator using flame resistant, sturdy, and soft-touch material. The material used is flame-resistant, which means it can even be momentarily exposed to direct fire with no risk of combustion. The silicone seal and straps are also resistant to high temperature and provide comfortable use, with equally distributed pressure through the soft seal. The seal itself was a big and worthy challenge, resulting in a really comfortable and sealed fit. Replaceable filters without plastic around account for part of the environmental concern. The embarked electronics enables smart capability to automatically alert you when to replace the filter based upon your environment and the usage of Maasc. The use of protected circuit Li-ion batteries against over charge, over discharge, short circuit and overheating and also replaceable was desirable since they are safer and easier to recycle. In compliance with the JEITA guideline (Japanese guideline for lithium batteries) the batteries charging mode is only allowed between 0°C and 45°C ambient temperature, again to increase your safety. All the fastenings are removable as to separate each individual part for correct disposal at the end of the product cycle. The hidden button avoids the use of cables inside the mask, making it safer and sturdier. The magnetic USB cable permits free movements without danger of being caught up.

 

 

 

 

Most of Powered Air Purifying Respirators are equipped with large units of filter | fan | batteries that are attached at your belt or in a backpack. Well this is good for industrial activities but not to go out for our everyday life.

Maasc is designed to solve that!

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

Maasc is made with highly durable materials. Its frames and buckles are made of sturdy and high-density flame-retardant ABS & PC. The seal and neckstraps are made of CE LFGB food-grade silicone. These materials can resist extreme temperature and are classified V-0 according to the UL94 standard. As such, they resist high temperatures without leaking toxic chemicals. Our product is also modular, which mean you can easily replace parts if you need, granting it a long-lasting life cycle. The undergoing certification process creates more durability tests that would help us better estimate the product life cycle of Maasc. Overall, our target is to provide a respirator with a life cycle of at least 5 years.

 

Reusability and recyclability

Maasc is reusable. You can replace the particulates filters and/or the gas filters without the need of any tool. We made sure there is no plastic rim around the filters, better for the environment. Also, the filtering media surface is optimized and you recycle less material compared to a disposable mask that needs about three times more filtering media to operate. As Maasc has a smart function to automatically alert you when your filter is clogged and needs to be replaced, you only recycle filters when it is required – no more, no less. We decided to equip Maasc with protected rechargeable Lithium-ion batteries only. They are the safest on the market and are easy to procure. It is also easy to replace and recycle them. No one want to recycle a device with Lithium batteries inside! All the fastenings designed for Maasc are removable as to separate each individual part for correct disposal at the end of the product life.

 

Our roadmap

 

 

 

 

 

Maasc was founded 3 years ago by José and Adel. We both worked for more than 20+ years in tech-industries. During our trips to Asia and Middle East we suffered firsthand from terrible air quality. We decided to take matters into our own hands, drawing on our expertise to develop a personal powered respirator that solves the issues found in existing products. Coming from the Smart Home and Security industry we first thought that adding smart features to masks would be the right thing to do. After years listening to people facing similar problems we came to the conclusion that our device is to be comfortable for prolonged hours and daily usage. Smart features are essential to improve the safety of the wearer.

Without a talented team we could not go that far. We are lucky to collaborate with a multidisciplinary, talented, and international team of engineers, designers, and business developers.

 

 

Maasc and its partners are constantly developing and improving the product. A recent development is an implementation, with the support of R&D MIT, of more efficient and miniaturized particles and dust sensors. EIT RawMaterials has also been instrumental in developing and implementing motion sensors aided by AI to detect and alert early signs of fatigue of the Maasc’s wearer (funded by the European Institute of Innovation and Technology, a body of the European Union for innovation). These developments are already being considered in the future developments of Maasc to enable it to be used in new environments and applications.
story_txt:
Nothing more frustrating than working with the inappropriate tool!
We love to have the right gear for the job. Although we are optimistic and believe in a future where we don’t need to wear masks anymore in daily life, we would always need good respirators to work in dusty places, and face hazards of mother nature.
 

 

 
Sanding, sawing, painting, spraying, varnishing… These activities release a huge amount of particulate matter and toxic fumes that are inhaled and absorbed by the body, leading to many health issues. Ordinary masks are a hassle: they give you sores, they fog up your glasses or protective goggles, they are bulky and heavy, they dramatically reduce the air flow and, even worse, most don't offer the necessary protection.
 

 
 
 

 
Maasc has great advantages for this types of work. The silicone seal prevents inward leakages. That means that all the air you are breathing actually goes through the filter. The dedicated exhaust valves, in addition to the seal, prevents glasses and goggles from fogging up. And the BreatheEase™ active fan system pulls air in, making breathing seamless, ideal for works that requires physical activity. To top all these features you can still count on the top-grade filtration performance.
 
 
 

 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 

 
Wildfires are becoming more common and stronger. They are a significant menace for people all around the world, from the US to Australia, from Indonesia to Brazil. Wildfires are dangerous not only because they destroy everything on their way. The smoke they produce fills the air with particulate matter, which are extremely hazardous for your health. This smoke can spread through thousands of miles and even affect areas in different continents. It is something out of our control that we must protect ourselves against. The majority of masks are unsuited for this type of menace, and will let you breathe polluted air through gaps between the face and the mask.
 
If you live in an area prone to wildfires and its devastating consequences, having Maasc comes in handy as an actual safety equipment for you and your family!
 

 
When we think of air pollution, densely populated areas and heavy industries usually come to mind. But the situations we are exposed to are more common than you think.
Maasc can help you in high-risk areas. By providing top-grade filtration and a soft-touch seal, it guarantees that the air that you are inhaling is rid of harmful substances and particles.
 


 
Air pollution can seriously affect you on two different fronts: small particles and toxic gases. These pollutants affect your body differently. While small particles can penetrate your circulatory system and organs, substances present in toxic gases can interfere with the dynamic of your body cells. The presence of such elements in the circulatory system provokes a chronic state of inflammation in body tissues.
 

 
Disclaimer: Maasc is not yet CE nor NIOSH certified, therefore the device is not intended for medical nor industrial setting use. Maasc is only intended for general protection such as against air pollution. It is clearly not intended for uses related to Covid-19 and we do not claim any anti-bacterial nor anti-viral property.


 
 

 
 

 
We are constantly looking at our environment to propose solutions for our time. Maasc has been passionately and carefully designed thinking of people everywhere in the world. A powered respirator, reusable mask, with modular replaceable parts, that requires the replacement of the filter only, to provide cleaner airflow, seamlessly, wherever you may need it.
We completed our industrial prototype. Worked with various vendors to design our manufacturing tooling and secure our supply chain. With your support we could focus upon bringing to mass production Maasc by building and commissioning the manufacturing tooling, completing the certification process, and launch the first batch production.
We are rewarding our backers with a special deal on the first mass production batch of Maasc! Check out our rewards and perks.
 

 
 

 

 
 Besides the items on the kit, you can also add extra items and accessories. 
 

 
Size guide
Part of the protection Maasc offers comes from its high-quality seal, which guarantees perfect fitting on the user's face. To do so we developed a revolutionary airtight seal that fits perfectly well the various face shapes with a unique configuration when folded on your face. We used thousands of anthropometric data from the DINED database to patent our seal. Our LFGB CE food-grade silicone seal is very soft to the touch and easily adapts to your face. However we come in different shapes and sizes! And that's why we designed three different sizes of seal to adapt to various facial dimensions.
 

 
Download and print our size guide using this link. Choose between A4 or Letter format.
 
 

 
 

 
Shipping estimates by Maasc perk: Maasc will be shipped wherever you are. We use customs-friendly shipping wherever we can, especially to the US, EU, UK, Canada, Middle-East, and Australia.
For some destinations the shipping prices do not include import duties and VAT depending upon the laws and regulation of each individual country.
Please note that the above are estimates and actual costs of shipping may vary depending upon global circumstances.
 
 

 
Maasc is a personal powered air purifying respirator that makes breathing seamless!
 
Airflow system to enhance breathing
The patented BreatheEase™ fan system pulls air through a premium quality filter at a rate of 35L/min, constantly providing a supply of fresh filtered air. We propose you two speeds for when you are walking or practicing moderate exercise and for when you are working more intensively.
Maasc has a one-way airflow, which means the entrance and the end exhaustion of the air occurs separately.
 
 
Air is sucked through the gas filter (pre-filter) and particulates filter, eliminating particles and pollutant gases. The filtering surface is large to reduce the air resistance
Air passes through the fan and is inhaled to ease breathing
The fresh breeze of the airflow eliminates the nuisance of the exhaled air with excess heat and moisture and keeps expelling it out from the Maasc quickly through the exhaustion valve located on the bottom part. Even when the BreatheEase™ Fan is off the outlet valve safely closes when inhaling to allow you to inhale only filtered air.
 High performance filtrationMaasc protects you from both small particles and toxic gases, with our double protection provided by the particulates and gas filters.Additionally, the Activated-carbon gas filter (pre-filter) stops hazardous Sulphur Oxide and Nitrogen Oxide gases, as well as odours, something you usually only find in heavy-duty masks far beyond the price point.  Innovative high grade silicone airtight sealThe LFGB CE food-grade silicone seal avoids leakage of air both inwards and outwards, avoiding the infamous foggy glasses and the ingress of unfiltered air. And more: the soft silicone is cool to the touch and won't mark your face. It seals surprisingly well even for the "beardy" gentlemen!  We use only premium LFGB European food grade, safe non-toxic silicone with no fillers, BPA, BPS, PVC, and other phthalates. This is the safest silicone in contact with your skin. Our seal, outlet flap valve, and neck strap are made of this high grade and safe silicone.   Integrated electronics enabling smart featuresAfter 3 years of development, we were able to come up with a high-efficiency comfortable respirator capable of protecting you in situations we're increasingly exposed to. Integrated computing power enables Maasc to control LED lights for communication with the wearer as well as for night visibility. After you set up the level of pollution of your area, Maasc's software computes the actual number of hours of usage with the airflow speed and the weight of particles that settle on the filter. As your filter reaches the end of its life, Maasc sends you a smart alert, letting you know it's time to replace the filter to keep your mask running optimally. The BreatheEase™ Fan, filter, and smart capability combined make Maasc a wearable air-purifier that's much more superior to the disposable cloth mask which becomes a humid mess on your face within minutes of wearing it.Check out the features!      A disruptive & affordable Powered Respirator      Facemasks are turning to be the everyday accessory. In this crisis period everyone has tried one and we know now how much discomfort it creates!Wearing a mask is not natural and they make breathing more difficult and stressful. Masks leave marks on the face, are bulky & heavy, and often are not fitting well. In brief, we just want to take them out after couple of minutes wearing them!Lots of solutions out there but good respirators are quite expensive and not necessarily taking care of your breathing comfort!The crisis might hopefully be over soon but discomfort from inefficient masks is still here! We tried lots of masks but none was addressing our needs. We are a dedicated team with decades of tech-industry experience and we worked intensively to innovate, patent, and build an industrial prototype.Tired of “just another mask project”; looking for a durable, sturdy, efficient and affordable respirator?We got you covered!Let's start by the basic: Maasc is the most comfortable breathing mask for prolonged hours and daily usage! We do believe that above all, the breathing experience has to be the best for you to wear your gear for long hours and be happy to repeat the experience the next day...and the day after, else it is just a gadget!    We are currently running pre-certification tests to assess the indicators of safety and filtering efficiency. The results are promising! With your support, we want to certify Maasc for the top-level CE EN12942:1998 harmonized standard.  A constant challenge during the development of Maasc was the tough safety and environmental guidelines we followed to ensure the product is safe and ready to be used even in heavy-duty situations.From day one, we have been serious about creating a Personal Protective Equipment company. Our mission is to deliver the safest, most comfortable and affordable powered respirator to enable mass adoption. The current top-grade respirators price point often forces people to use the less adapted solution to their needs, and we find that unacceptable. Comfort is not the first concern of masks manufacturers. With your comfort in mind, we have been developing Maasc for more than 3 years. We could have launched it last year during the “mask hype period” but we were just not ready.  Your safety is our “raison d’être”. After numerous iterations we developed the least bulky & lightweight powered respirator using flame resistant, sturdy, and soft-touch material. The material used is flame-resistant, which means it can even be momentarily exposed to direct fire with no risk of combustion. The silicone seal and straps are also resistant to high temperature and provide comfortable use, with equally distributed pressure through the soft seal. The seal itself was a big and worthy challenge, resulting in a really comfortable and sealed fit. Replaceable filters without plastic around account for part of the environmental concern. The embarked electronics enables smart capability to automatically alert you when to replace the filter based upon your environment and the usage of Maasc. The use of protected circuit Li-ion batteries against over charge, over discharge, short circuit and overheating and also replaceable was desirable since they are safer and easier to recycle. In compliance with the JEITA guideline (Japanese guideline for lithium batteries) the batteries charging mode is only allowed between 0°C and 45°C ambient temperature, again to increase your safety. All the fastenings are removable as to separate each individual part for correct disposal at the end of the product cycle. The hidden button avoids the use of cables inside the mask, making it safer and sturdier. The magnetic USB cable permits free movements without danger of being caught up.    Most of Powered Air Purifying Respirators are equipped with large units of filter | fan | batteries that are attached at your belt or in a backpack. Well this is good for industrial activities but not to go out for our everyday life.Maasc is designed to solve that! Environmental commitments Long-lasting designMaasc is made with highly durable materials. Its frames and buckles are made of sturdy and high-density flame-retardant ABS & PC. The seal and neckstraps are made of CE LFGB food-grade silicone. These materials can resist extreme temperature and are classified V-0 according to the UL94 standard. As such, they resist high temperatures without leaking toxic chemicals. Our product is also modular, which mean you can easily replace parts if you need, granting it a long-lasting life cycle. The undergoing certification process creates more durability tests that would help us better estimate the product life cycle of Maasc. Overall, our target is to provide a respirator with a life cycle of at least 5 years. Reusability and recyclabilityMaasc is reusable. You can replace the particulates filters and/or the gas filters without the need of any tool. We made sure there is no plastic rim around the filters, better for the environment. Also, the filtering media surface is optimized and you recycle less material compared to a disposable mask that needs about three times more filtering media to operate. As Maasc has a smart function to automatically alert you when your filter is clogged and needs to be replaced, you only recycle filters when it is required – no more, no less. We decided to equip Maasc with protected rechargeable Lithium-ion batteries only. They are the safest on the market and are easy to procure. It is also easy to replace and recycle them. No one want to recycle a device with Lithium batteries inside! All the fastenings designed for Maasc are removable as to separate each individual part for correct disposal at the end of the product life. Our roadmap     Maasc was founded 3 years ago by José and Adel. We both worked for more than 20+ years in tech-industries. During our trips to Asia and Middle East we suffered firsthand from terrible air quality. We decided to take matters into our own hands, drawing on our expertise to develop a personal powered respirator that solves the issues found in existing products. Coming from the Smart Home and Security industry we first thought that adding smart features to masks would be the right thing to do. After years listening to people facing similar problems we came to the conclusion that our device is to be comfortable for prolonged hours and daily usage. Smart features are essential to improve the safety of the wearer.Without a talented team we could not go that far. We are lucky to collaborate with a multidisciplinary, talented, and international team of engineers, designers, and business developers.  Maasc and its partners are constantly developing and improving the product. A recent development is an implementation, with the support of R&D MIT, of more efficient and miniaturized particles and dust sensors. EIT RawMaterials has also been instrumental in developing and implementing motion sensors aided by AI to detect and alert early signs of fatigue of the Maasc’s wearer (funded by the European Institute of Innovation and Technology, a body of the European Union for innovation). These developments are already being considered in the future developments of Maasc to enable it to be used in new environments and applications.

story:
Materials

  •  Leather Type: Full-Grain
  •  Sourced From: Florence, Italy
  •  Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
  •  Inner Lining: Custom engineered black RFID-Proof Fabric

Main Features

  •  Cash Drawer: 20 bills
  •  4 Main Card Slots:  4 Cards (1 per slot)
  •  Pull Tab Pocket: 4 Cards
  •  Hideaway Slot: 4 Cards
  •  Micro SD Slot: Micro SD memory card (Android size)
  •  Nano SIM Card Slot: Nano SIM card (In most phones)
  •  SIM Pin Slot: SIM pin (iPhone SIM pin size)

Colour Combinations

  •  Saddle Tan - Saddle Tan Interior & Exterior
  •  Black - Onyx Black Interior & Exterior

RFID Contactless Protection

  •  How it works: RFID signals are emitted to read your card details every time you scan your contactless card at the supermarket, metro, bar, etc.
  •  You're protected: The signals are stopped entirely and the entire contents of the wallet are protected, which means they can't be scanned while inside your wallet.
story_txt:
Materials

 Leather Type: Full-Grain
 Sourced From: Florence, Italy
 Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
 Inner Lining: Custom engineered black RFID-Proof Fabric

Main Features

 Cash Drawer: 20 bills
 4 Main Card Slots:  4 Cards (1 per slot)
 Pull Tab Pocket: 4 Cards
 Hideaway Slot: 4 Cards
 Micro SD Slot: Micro SD memory card (Android size)
 Nano SIM Card Slot: Nano SIM card (In most phones)
 SIM Pin Slot: SIM pin (iPhone SIM pin size)

Colour Combinations

 Saddle Tan - Saddle Tan Interior & Exterior
 Black - Onyx Black Interior & Exterior

RFID Contactless Protection

 How it works: RFID signals are emitted to read your card details every time you scan your contactless card at the supermarket, metro, bar, etc.
 You're protected: The signals are stopped entirely and the entire contents of the wallet are protected, which means they can't be scanned while inside your wallet. 

 
 
Frequently Asked Questions
Q: Which colours are offered?
A: Tan and black - vegetable tanned leather and brown crazy horse leather. 
Q: What are the dimensions? How big is this feature?
A: Please see the specifications above for a detailed breakdown of the features and dimensions.
Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
A: We provide free shipping to all countries in the world. 
Q: Where do I specify my colour, preferences and address?
A: You will receive a BackerKit (e-survey) 11 days after the date of pledging, where you will be able to supply all such information.
Q: I have another question that isn't answered here, how can I contact you?
A: You may contact us via the following channels, and we will do our best to reply to you within the hour:
- The Indiegogo messaging system
- Through the Indiegogo comments - if you’re a backer
- By email at: cs@filippomorato.com

story:
The struggle is real. Buying lipsticks is an endless process. It takes time, effort, money, and half of our pay checks go behind buying the wrong colors.

It's a massively wasteful trial-and-error process that hasn’t changed in over a century!

LIPSKIT is the world’s first hyper-personalized liquid lipstick dispenser that can make any color you want, with any texture you like, any time you want it. 

The LIPSKIT 2.0 is completely personalized to your skin tone and undertone. 

Hyper-personalized LIPSKIT 2.0

An intuitive, compact lip color kit that comes with 5 bullets (cartridges) of 5ml base colors. It is built on the basis of 'Color Theory', which states that a combination of primary colors of red, yellow and blue, along with white and black, gives you a wide array of colors. The LIPSKIT 2.0 is an ingenious application of color theory for makeup.

 

 

 

 

Have you noticed that a lip shade that makes your best friend look like a Goddess looks totally flat on you? It's because each one of us has a different skin tone and undertone. Your 'Goddess' lip shades are out there, waiting for you to discover them. The LIPSKIT 2.0 is here to help!

LIPSKIT 2.0 personalizes your experience on two levels:

The pigments help you achieve a matte, long-lasting look, but you can even tweak the texture and finish of your lip colors to moist or tint with our jojoba oil-infused 'Moisture Drops'. The possibilities are endless!

Thanks to our two levels of personalization, you don't need to second guess if that bold red you are wearing looks good on you, IT IS LOOKING GOOD ON YOU! 

LIPSKIT 2.0 Bullets custom assembled for your exact skin tone and undertone

With the LIPSKIT 2.0, you can make and store up to 5 colors in the cute reusable pots at any point in time. You can make as much as you want or as little as you want. If you don't like the color you make, the app will tell you how to tweak it to your liking by simply adding a few drops of another base color. Because you have total control over the pumps, you can literally free-wheel and have hours and hours of fun experimenting with different looks. And yes, you can carry the reusable pots with you in your purse for all day touch-ups. 

Your perfect reds, nudes, pinks, or purples are not so elusive anymore.

 

 

If you'd like your lip colors to be moist or even a tint, then simply add a drop or two of our texture-transforming 'Moisture Drop' (included with each kit) enriched with the goodness of 100% pure jojoba oil.

 

Photo by Justin Hofman / Wildlife Photographer of the Year

We envision a world where our passion for makeup doesn't cost us the earth. Current ways of consumption are leading us to a point of no return and if we want to slow down our approach to the tipping point, we must make changes to our behavior now.      

It is estimated that almost 9 out of 10 makeup products sold are wasted every year! And that is because that one lipstick you bought to perfectly match that blue outfit did not get used more than 3 times over its usable life. 

While recyclable and compostable packaging is a step in the right direction, and even if all the 10 products were made with 100% compostable material, there is no denying that the production and logistics behind the 9 wasted products have a massive environmental impact. Not only is plastic, unused makeup, and money wasted, but the wasted carbon emission due to inessential production and logistics is deplorable. The packaging alone is estimated to cause 18 million acres of deforestation annually, according to Forbes.

We do away with this wastage by:

1. Building modular products, where production is limited to a handful of 'cartridges' and the actual factory is literally moved to the user's hand,

2. Making our components reusable, and

3. Giving the user completely personalized color options, so that the problem of a color mismatch does not arise. 

CLEAN: We are just as conscious about what we put on our skin as we are about what we add to the earth. We source the highest quality clean ingredients from the US, Australia, and Japan. Our formulations are tested in independent labs for heavy metal, toxins, and lead content. We are currently in the process of getting EWG certification for all our products.

VEGAN: We are a vegan brand. That means all our formulations are free of any animal-derived ingredients such as beeswax, carmine, etc.

CRUELTY-FREE: We only work with manufacturers that have a cruelty-free manufacturing environment. We do not market our products in countries that mandatorily require animal testing of cosmetic products, which means, none of the products under our brand are tested on animals. We are in the process of getting a cruelty-free certification.

ETHICALLY SOURCED: All the ingredients going into our products are ethically sourced. For example, our gorgeous shimmer add-ons are made of the highest-quality, synthetic, non-plastic mica that’s better for you and better for the earth. Our assembly line is also run by people with special needs.

TEXTURE & FINISH: The lip colors are highly pigmented and waterproof. It lasts all day and is completely mask-proof, so you can confidently wear it under your mask without the fear of smudging. You can even adjust the texture of the colors to moist or tint with our luscious 'Moisture Drops'. LIPSKIT 1.0 customers rave about our pigments!

*You can see the complete Ingredient list in our FAQs.

Stays all day. GoPlay.

 

GoPlay Cosmetics' LIPSKIT 2.0 is the world's fuss-free hyper-personalized DIY lip color kit. But what sets us apart from other available solutions?

We’ve kept our rewards super simple and you can add a lot of fun add-ons to make the LIPSKIT 2.0 truly versatile.

If you love lipsticks as much as we do, then LIPSKIT Queen is definitely for you. With the LIPSKIT Queen, you get one LIPSKIT 2.0 + a 1 year subscription to the LIPSKIT bullets. So you can play around with various looks and never fear running out of the pigments. (psst... LIPSKIT formulation is perfectly safe to use on your eyes and cheeks as well. It works incredibly well as long-stay eyeliner too.)

If you’re buying a kit for your friend as well, then you can add the ‘LIPSKIT BFF’ add-on.

 

Adorable Add ons 

We are expanding the LIPSKIT 2.0 with awesome little add-ons to give you even more creative freedom. Choose your add-ons when you check out and we will add them to your shipment.

TIP: Check out the "Super Saver Pack" add-on to save $$$.

 

HOW TO CLEAN THE LIPSKIT POTS?

 

We hope you see the versatility and practicality of the LIPSKIT 2.0. Our goal is to give you the simplest instant lipstick at the tips of your fingers. LIPSKIT 2.0 also lowers the carbon footprint that the cosmetic industry leaves on our planet yearly.

LIPSKIT is just the beginning. We hope to delight you with more innovations across different categories that give you more while taking away less from the earth.

Mugdha is an engineer with a passion for makeup, 5 full boxes of it! It was the realization that most of the makeup she owned will never be used that made her take stock and want to create something that kept her passion alive while minimizing the wastage attached to it. After speaking to hundreds of fellow makeup users, endless research, and multiple iterations spanning over 2 years she came up with the LIPSKIT in its current form.

She is joined in this endeavor by Neeraj Dhanothia. He obsesses over optimizing processes and ensuring every product that gets shipped out, brings us a happy customer and a lifelong advocate. He's your quintessential finance and operations guy with a passion for sustainability. 

We have received feedback from LIPSKIT 1.0 users and we have made major improvements along the way to add delight to the product. We're extremely excited to bring the LIPSKIT 2.0 to life and in fact, we have the proof of concept, our app is almost ready and our suppliers are just waiting for us to push the button. The clockwork is set up, now all the remains is your support.

 

 

We will keep all our backers posted about production and other relevant updates. You're not just backing a project with us, you are an integral part of the GoPlay movement!  

 

Making sure that your pledge rewards reach you safely is very important to us. Please be aware that shipping and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in your pledge. We will be sending you Backerkit surveys for shipping and taxes at the end of the campaign. 

Our effort is to ensure your orders reach you at the earliest and we have calculated express shipping charges through leading providers, best estimates are provided below. We do live with some uncertainty due to COVID, and we will have a better idea of what the actual lowest cost to you will be closer to the shipping dates.

Please note that the addition of each LIPSKIT BFF add-on will add US$10 to the estimated shipping price. 

Please note that we DO NOT cover taxes when it arrives in your country - you may be subject to these charges. If you are based in the UK, EU or Canada, we have signed up for your local VAT and GST so it will be added to your Backerkit surveys. If you would like more information on taxes and shipping, please write to us on care@goplaycosmetics.com. 

 

Are you a journalist or a blogger? Click here for our press kit.

Follow us on Instagram for more photos - Click here

Follow us on Facebook for more updates - Click here

It works incredibly well as long-stay eyeliner too.)If you’re buying a kit for your friend as well, then you can add the ‘LIPSKIT BFF’ add-on. Adorable Add ons We are expanding the LIPSKIT 2.0 with awesome little add-ons to give you even more creative freedom. Choose your add-ons when you check out and we will add them to your shipment.TIP: Check out the "Super Saver Pack" add-on to save $$$.


 
HOW TO CLEAN THE LIPSKIT POTS?

 
We hope you see the versatility and practicality of the LIPSKIT 2.0. Our goal is to give you the simplest instant lipstick at the tips of your fingers. LIPSKIT 2.0 also lowers the carbon footprint that the cosmetic industry leaves on our planet yearly.LIPSKIT is just the beginning. We hope to delight you with more innovations across different categories that give you more while taking away less from the earth.Mugdha is an engineer with a passion for makeup, 5 full boxes of it! It was the realization that most of the makeup she owned will never be used that made her take stock and want to create something that kept her passion alive while minimizing the wastage attached to it. After speaking to hundreds of fellow makeup users, endless research, and multiple iterations spanning over 2 years she came up with the LIPSKIT in its current form.She is joined in this endeavor by Neeraj Dhanothia. He obsesses over optimizing processes and ensuring every product that gets shipped out, brings us a happy customer and a lifelong advocate. He's your quintessential finance and operations guy with a passion for sustainability. We have received feedback from LIPSKIT 1.0 users and we have made major improvements along the way to add delight to the product. We're extremely excited to bring the LIPSKIT 2.0 to life and in fact, we have the proof of concept, our app is almost ready and our suppliers are just waiting for us to push the button. The clockwork is set up, now all the remains is your support.  We will keep all our backers posted about production and other relevant updates. You're not just backing a project with us, you are an integral part of the GoPlay movement!   Making sure that your pledge rewards reach you safely is very important to us. Please be aware that shipping and taxes are NOT INCLUDED in your pledge. We will be sending you Backerkit surveys for shipping and taxes at the end of the campaign. Our effort is to ensure your orders reach you at the earliest and we have calculated express shipping charges through leading providers, best estimates are provided below. We do live with some uncertainty due to COVID, and we will have a better idea of what the actual lowest cost to you will be closer to the shipping dates.Please note that the addition of each LIPSKIT BFF add-on will add US$10 to the estimated shipping price. Please note that we DO NOT cover taxes when it arrives in your country - you may be subject to these charges. If you are based in the UK, EU or Canada, we have signed up for your local VAT and GST so it will be added to your Backerkit surveys. If you would like more information on taxes and shipping, please write to us on care@goplaycosmetics.com.  Are you a journalist or a blogger? Click here for our press kit.Follow us on Instagram for more photos - Click hereFollow us on Facebook for more updates - Click here

story:
I made this mask a couple months ago after seeing a bunch of people making cool and unique facemasks. I wanted to one-up them and make the coolest mask possible, utilizing skills that are that are unique to me, and so I came up with this interactive voice-controlled facemask that you can make smile on demand. The video of me showing it off pretty much immediately went viral and I was inundated with requests from people who wanted to buy one. We're working very hard to make that reality soon!

 

About Tyler Glaiel

I am a video game programmer & designer who's created games such as Closure, Bombernauts, The End is Nigh (with Edmund McMillen), and a ton of old flash games back in the day. For more information on me, please visit http://www.glaielgames.com/ 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This project was launched by Maestro Media Ventures.

©2020 Maestro Media and Tyler Glaiel

JabberMask US Patent Pending

story:
MUHAN INC is a business that has manufactured over 500 kinds of watches since 2012. As we developed quartz, automatic, digital, etc. watches, we were not satisfied with the battery life that quartz watches had.

There is always a possibility of the battery dying in battery-powered wristwatches (Regardless of the date of purchase). And exchanging your battery every single time the battery runs out, is not healthy for the environment. We focused on the fact that we need an alternative to be able to use a watch every day, conveniently, and without worrying about the battery running out.

 

 

Solar-powered watches have been loved for a while. They are not only more eco-friendly than ordinary battery-powered watches, but they are available to use semi-permanently with sunlight. MUHAN INC has started developing the Scorpion Solar Watch in 2017 to increase the design and quality at a reasonable price. The first product was released in 2018, and the Scorpion Solar Watch V3 was finally released in 2021.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We gave in a lot of time and effort to release the highest quality wristwatch at an affordable price. The SP3357 VS was built with titanium, Swiss-made Luminous, and sapphire glass. Even though it is equipped with chronograph functions, the SP3357 V3 is less expensive than other watches out in the market.

 

 

Unlike quartz watches or automatics from other companies, Solar Watch V3 is powered by charging with light. It works by turning solar power or light into electricity, and the remaining electricity is stored in the secondary battery for later use. Since there’s no need to purchase a replacement battery, it’s convenient and efficient.

Charging just for 2 minutes under the light enables immediate usage and keeps it operating all-day-long. You can use it for 90 days with a full charge, and charging with periodic exposure to light allows for semi-permanent use. (Performance may decline if the battery discharges too often, so frequent charging is a must.)

 

 

 

The SP3357, developed with MUHAN INC’s technology, has a substantially low margin of time error than other automatic wristwatches. When comparing side by side with other pricy quartz wristwatches, the SP3357 shows an equivalent or an even lower margin of time error. At the same time, showing the best durability.

 

 

Titanium is incredibly durable and doesn’t rust. It has the merits of longer usage than other metal materials. Due to difficulties in processing, it’s mostly used for high-end products only, and is also utilized in artificial joints (as a ‘human-friendly’ material).

 

Aside from the watch body, 5-grade titanium has been applied to all parts of the: bezel, case, band, back, button, crown, and buckle. It weighs just half that of a standard metal watch, and is widely used in spacecraft, airplanes, and golf shafts too. The matt silver color also features a unique shade that only titanium can produce.

 

191g (0.42lb) << >> 97g (0.21lb)

 

 

 

 

Titanium's Alluring Deep Charcoal Color

The exterior of the titanium watch similar to gunmetal evokes a modern and future-oriented sentiment and appears like a stainless steel watch of a slightly dark color. Also, the bezel part gilt with gloss strikes a special and sophisticated harmony with the gun gray color and is equipped with the functional aspect of complementing scratches as well.

The titanium metal band in a deep charcoal color unique to titanium displays different hues depending on the viewing angle and lighting, and its robust charm and exceptional tone will allow you to sense varying appeals.

 

 Scorpion Solar Watch V3 Scratch Test

The glass is made from Sapphire Dome Crystal, that has a greater hardness than mineral glass, preventing scratches even over prolonged use. (You’ve probably never seen a watch that’s scratch-free- even after being ran over by a car wheel or being scraped hard by a sharp object). The exceptional light penetrability also clearly displays markings and the second & minute hands.

 

It emits light in the state of absorbs light, not self-illumination.

The Swiss luminous feature is available on the minute and hour hands, and on the dail Swiss luminescence has been specially used to upgrade brightness, continuity, and readability. After the watch absorbs plenty of light, you can easily check the time in the dark indoors or at night. The luminescence doesn’t last permanently and fades away slowly.

 

 

 

 

The Scorpion Solar Watch V3 is equipped with a 50m 5 level air pressure waterproof technology. When the crown is completely locked in, we were able to confirm that there would be no issues at all if the user takes a light shower or goes for a swim. But, you have to make sure to dry your watch thoroughly before controlling the crown or its buttons.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SHINY WITH MATT BAND

 

The wide part on the center of the band is glossy, and the narrow parts on the sides are matt.

The models: SP3357M-BU, SP3357M-WH, SP3357M-BK utilize this type of band.

 

MATT BAND

 

Whole sections of the band are matt. The SP3357M-GY model utilizes this band.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Note that you may also need to pay sales tax or VAT, depending on where you live. ​Check with your country’s policies as these rates vary. We cannot be held liable for any additional customs charges that may occur in your location.

 

 

 

 

 

MUHAN INC has designed, developed, and distributed wristwatches for 9 years from 2012 to 2021. Scorpion Solar Watch V3 newly released based on the evaluations and advice from supporters backing with great interest has been even more perfected than previous Scorpion Solar Watch products.

As of now, a 1-year inspection has been conducted with finished products and not the prototypes, and they are waiting to be produced in the factory. Once the campaign wraps up in success, manufacturing will start the right next day. Everything has been prepared to complete the delivery after 2 months, including the shipping time.

We ask for much interest and support from the backers.

 

2018 - 2019 Hong Kong Watch & Clock Fair

 

 

 

 

 

Warranty Period

: movement warranty (3 years) / 1-time battery warranty (7 years)

  • Free Warranty : if there is an error in time (the maker will bear all costs)
  • Free Repair : hands and index fallen out due to shock, waterproof defect, and other after-sales
  • services occurred from carelessness in use
  • (shipping fee is paid by the user)
  • Paid Repair : glass damage, movement damage due to shock, and other damages occurred from carelessness in use (component cost and shipping fee are both paid by the user)
  • After-sales service is unavailable if : warranty is not serviceable if the watch has been disassembled by the user or by another company. The watch’s band is expandable and cannot be restored of its condition or repaired.

 

Cautions for Use

  • As watches are weak to magnets, leaving them together will lead to malfunctioning movement and may cause failures.
  • Please take off the watch when engaging in exercises like golf and tennis and other tasks that impact the wrist.
  • Frequent shock may damage the movement or lead to hands falling out.
  • If you control the buttons while there’s water on the watch, moisture may get inside.
  • Please make sure to control the buttons after drying.

 

Battery Warranty Provisions

  • When the operating period is under 7 days or performance has declined substantially even with a full charge Charging is inoperative.
  • It’s advisable to charge the Solar Watch at all times, and frequent discharges will lead to declining battery performance.
  • If a delivered reward not yet opened or used has a problem in outer appearance, we will exchange it for a new product if you send us a photo via e-mail.
  • The e-mail address you should send it to is as below: contact.muhan@gmail.com

story:
Sani Amigo is your smart, wearable sanitizing dispenser that takes care of you while you take care of everything else. Equipped with a unique reminder feature that subtly alerts you for regular sanitation, professionals and busy bees can finally sanitize and stay safe—in style.

     

     

    Forget about disposable, one-time use, plastic sanitizer bottles that are bad for the environment and difficult to keep track of. Sani Amigo’s sleek design compliments your personality and your wardrobe, all while ensuring that your hands stay clean while you take on the day.

    Sani Amigo is revolutionizing sanitizing practices in the new normal with intelligent features that go to work for you. With multiple wearable options, Sani Amigo reminds you to protect yourself and those around you with discrete alerts throughout the day.

     

     

    Powered by a coin battery, Sani Amigo does not require charging. The battery is easy to swap out, and is available off the shelf at your local store. Each unit also comes with a side window indicator that lets you keep track of fill level, taking the guesswork out of refilling.

     

    Sani Amigo is for anyone dedicated to keeping themselves and others safe through regular sanitizing practices. From front line workers to grandparents, hustling professionals to students, Sani Amigo empowers its users to take on the day confidently knowing that they are properly sanitized.

     

    This attractive solution to sanitizing is like a reliable friend—it’s always by your side and has the versatility to hold your favorite type of hand sanitizer so that you can forget about staying safe and get back to what matters most.

     

     

    If you’re looking for a convenient, reliable, stylish, and sustainable way to responsibly take care of yourself and the world in this changing world, then Sani Amigo is the product for you. It’s got the design aesthetics to meet the chic professional without sacrificing the functionality required by front line workers!

     

    We've designed this product to be as convenient as possible for you. That’s why it’s powered by a coin battery so that you won’t have another device to charge and always be able to easily replace it!

     

    Sani Amigo allows for you to set personalized time intervals that will remind you to sanitize. These intervals can be adjusted at any time—so if you’re entering a potentially high risk situation—just set more frequent intervals to give you peace of mind!

     

     

    It’s also easier than ever to keep track of fill level with the side window indicator so that you will never be left hanging. The intuitive visual reminder ensures that you’ll have enough to last when you’re out and about—just refill before you leave if you need to!

     

    Sani Amigo is easy to refill, and compatible with most liquids and gels. Designed with sanitizing in mind, whether you like it thick or thin, Sani Amigo will hold it.

     

    Sani Amigo comes in two unique colors with a sleek, modern design. Safety and style go hand in hand to compliment your awesome style and personality!

     

     

    The pandemic has introduced yet another set of sustainability challenges with a giant spike in consumers' use of disposable face masks, gloves, and hand sanitizer bottles. With Sani Amigo, you can do your part to reduce plastic waste with a refillable bottle that will never wear out.

     

    You can do your part to support reusable products all while protecting yourself from viruses and germs! It’s a win-win.

     

    Sani Amigo aims to create a safer, more sustainable world with a refillable hand sanitizer that compliments all wardrobes, personalities, and styles. With a focus on reusable materials and increased peace of mind for users that can be sure they’re staying sanitized throughout their busy day, we hope to cultivate a world where everyone feels safe and to tackle their day.

     

     

    Partners

    Marketing Partners:

     

    Design & Engineering Partner:

    When the pandemic hit, we all had to make adjustments to live a safer and healthier lifestyle in the new normal. Masks were the first step — which transformed from flimsy, unattractive disposables into fashion statements. That’s when it hit us: sanitizer bottles weren’t keeping up. Either there wasn’t sanitizer around, or we’d forgotten it in the car, or it spilled in our travel bags, or the plastic bottles were uncomfortable in our pockets. The list could go on! 

     

    As travelling professionals ourselves, we set out to create an aesthetically pleasing smart gadget that made for a fashionable and convenient sanitizing solution. Whether you're a busy parent, travelling businessperson, or front-line employee, we want to ensure that you always have sanitizer available, and further, that you always remember to sanitize to keep yourself and those around you safe. 

     

    We’ve worked tirelessly to come up with our beautiful design that contributes to any look so that you can go forth in the world confidently without sacrificing your own unique style. We hope that Sani Amigo can play a part in making the new normal a more safe and convenient place to live — we’re so excited to have you join us!

story:
WHAT IS NEW THIS TIME?

THE STELLAR = affordable price + multi-layer dial + mystery appearing hour + diamond cutting reflective index + unique time-telling module + miyota9015 + dome-shaped sapphire crystal + premium watch case

We always want to be the game-changer in the watchmaking industry. We have a rotary engine module - THE ROTARY, a wandering hour module -  THE SPACESHIP, and a moon phase module - THE MOONPHASE. They were huge successes and you can hardly find a microbrand having a complete unique module watch at this price point. And this time we would like to play with the multi-layer dial to give out a stunning mystery-appearance to the watch.

 

A GROUP OF WATCH ENTHUSIASTS

BEHRENS is an independent watch brand formed by a group of watch-lovers from Hong Kong, Germany, British, and Mainland; from which our focus is to turn our design concepts and philosophy into real products via our own manufacturing and production facilities. With our own engineering team and high-tech machinery, we are capable of producing all the parts that we designed and developed based on the modifications that we worked on each mechanical movement. From which our traits are to construct mechanical modules that offer additional complications to the existing movement in order to build our unique timepieces. We have a rotary engine module like THE ROTARY, a wandering hour like THE SPACESHIP, a moon phase module like THE MOONPHASE.

With a group of designers and engineers working perfectly, interesting ideas and developments popping up every day! Be sure to follow us so you won’t miss any upcoming models!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/behrenswatches

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/behrenswatches

We want our watches to be well-made and with a high-end quality, which has been acknowledged and proven by 800+ backers and customers all over the world. We are being discussed on many forums and groups organised by watch lovers.

Our four successful Kickstarter campaigns:

THE MOONPHASE: LINK HERE

THE ALL-ROUND: LINK HERE

THE SPACESHIP: LINK HERE

THE MOONLIGHT: LINK HERE

 

 

THE MULTI-LAYER DIAL AND THE MYSTERY HOUR

Our goal is to make a huge time-telling module together with our signature diamond cutting reflective index. A doughnut-like hour disc rotates mysteriously underneath a spaceship-like structure is what we want to achieve. The huge time-telling module is driven by a set of secret gears combined with unique bearings we invented -- to greatly reduce the turning force and increase the stability of the whole module. We also want it to be futuristic, thus we punched through the hour disc with a CNC machine and filled some of them with lume. The diamond cutting reflective index together with the Swiss Super-LumiNova®is like a futuristic space station in operation.

The whole module is covered by a triangle structure which is made from an alloy of copper, zinc, and nickel-plated with platinum/black. It is processed with CNC and handcrafted polishing. With the 45-degree minute marks printed onto it, the triangle structure is rich in detail with a sense of futurism.

*Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9 is used for numerals, which emits a Blue-Green glow in the dark and looks white in daylight.

*More about Swiss Super-LumiNova® BGW9

https://luciusatelier.com/blogs/news/learn-about-the-swiss-super-luminova-bgw9-lume

 

 

HOW TO TELL THE TIME?

The hour disc rotates 2 cycles per day, with a pointer located at the bottom of the watch to indicate the current hour. The triangle minute hand is placed in the centre. One angle of which is filled with Swiss Super-LumiNova® and is the pointer of the minute hand. You can easily tell the time with the 45-degree marks printed onto the triangle structure.

 

DIAMOND CUTTING REFLECTIVE INDEX

We innovated a new method of index making, the Diamond Cutting Index, in THE MOONPHASE as well as THE ALL-ROUND. It is world-known and loved by many Behrens Original fans. We insist on putting it onto THE STELLAR. The index is cut by a diamond cutter 20 times in two directions; thus the surface of the index is a complex oblique. To give the dial a luxurious touch, light is our major resource. With light reflected on the index’s glossy surface from different angles, a rainbow(chrome) color is created. We believe such a natural phenomenon will attract many of you.

 

MULTI-POLISHING CASE 220% MORE COST

The excellent case design is one of the significant symbols of our watches. It is also widely loved by 800+ BEHRENS ORIGINAL customers. This time, we decided to provide the highest standard case we can get for you all.

The premium watch case we used on THE STELLAR is exactly the same as we use on the premium standard on THE SPACESHIP. There aren't any bad or tier 2 cases in BEHRENS ORIGINAL. All of our cases are the top tier ones which are more than 220% of the cost of normal watch cases.

In order to make it more sharper and smoother, the watch case is manufactured independently into 3 parts- the two lugs; and the body itself, so as to polish them independently. It then gives out a new level of polishing and exquisiteness than a normal case. Such costly production methods could only be found in luxury watch production.

The case is made of 316L stainless steel which is widely used in high-end watches. Multi-polishing methods are applied: including mirror polished on the bezel and the edges of the lugs, horizontal brushed on the sides, vertically brushed on the lugs, and circular brush on the back. And for this time, we redesigned the dome-shaped sapphire crystal in order to have its smooth and clear curve.

Although these production methods are long and costly, and sometimes it is unnoticeable until you have a closer look, we aim to give you the best, attractive, durable, and elegant watch cases.

*Every watch is individually numbered.

 

SLIM WATCH - 7.9MM MECHANICAL WATCH

Slim appearance is the iconic design element of Behrens Original. Our slim design is adored by 800+ Behrens Original backers and supporters.

In order to have a nice mechanical watch with a thin design, we provide the best we can: With the well-designed cutting of the case and the super-high quality redesigned dome-shaped sapphire, our watch provides an incredible slim appearance. The thickness of the watch is only 7.9mm, exclusively the dome-shaped sapphire. With the dome-shaped sapphire, the total height is only 12.3mm.

Every part of our design is uniquely made for reaching our goal: a thin mechanical watch. We have gone under many tests on making a thin, durable watch. Our design team remade the dial part more than five times to remove 10-30C each time. There are no words that can fully describe the hardship we had in the process, but we have put our efforts wholeheartedly into making this unique yet slim mechanical watch.

 

OUR MOVEMENT - MIYOTA 9015

We modify the huge time-telling module from Miyota 9015.

Movement is the soul of all watches and that is exactly what attracts all watch collectors. Our factory has more than 15 years of experience in the Swiss and Japanese movement watchmaking and watch modification.

This time we selected the Miyota 9015 for our movement, which is well-known for its slimness, reliability, and stability. This Japan movement functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 24 jewels, 42-hour power reserve, automatic winding, and a sweep second movement. With a movement of the height of 3.9mm and 26mm overall diameter, it is super slim. Combining both thin body and functionality, this movement is only used in high-class watches. Although the price of this movement is very high, we persist to provide the best we can.

*the first sample comes out 9 months before to test the reliability and stability. It is running very great for months.

 

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL ONLY - 4.3MM THICK

For producing luxurious watches, we persist to use only sapphire crystal for both sides of the watches. Due to the remarkable hardness of sapphires - 9 on the Mohs scale, our watches can hardly be damaged by plain scratches. Thus, we believe that sapphire crystal is the most suitable material for daily wear.

Dome-shaped sapphire crystal is used to give an ultimately slim appearance to the watch. As sapphire is a hard material (A 6mm thick raw sapphire material is used to craft into a 4.3mm dome-shaped crystal), it is beyond difficult to make the dome-shaped sapphire. Since it is costly and time-consuming (our machine can only produce 3 pieces of dome-shaped sapphire crystal max. per day), the yield rate is low.

 

ACCURACY - 7 DAYS, T0, T24 TESTS

Watch modification and movement tuning are our central focus. As such, absolute accuracy is always on our important checklist. We ensure the quality of every part by using strict control testing standards before assembling the watches.

The testing procedure lasts 7 days

Day 1 Before assembling the watches, the movement is fully wound (also known as T0) mechanically. The movement is tested in five positions, crown left, crown up, crown down, dial-up, and dial down. Then given a rest period of 24 hours(also known as T24), the movement is tested again in the five positions.

Day 3 After assembling all the parts together, the watch is put into an auto-winding machine for 1 day. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.

Day 5 The watch keeps putting into an auto-winding machine. The watch would be fully wound and be tested with the same testing procedure on Day 1.

Day 7 Before packing, the watch is fully wound(T0) and is tested in five positions again.

All our watches have to pass all of the above procedures before delivery. We make sure that the accuracy of our watches is highly maintained in -20~+20 seconds/day. We tested the watches in more positions than the normal quality checkups do - we tested the watches in 5 positions while the others tested in 3 positions only.

We need to ensure the watches are adequate in every situation. We then on-wrist tested the sample watches for more than 9 months before we started our Kickstarter campaign. The stableness of BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches is highly guaranteed.

 

ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP -  INTERCHANGEABLE CATCH

We are all perfectionists, we see the pairing of the best leather strap and BEHRENS watches is an obligation. We provide a high quality fine crafted Italian calf leather strap as usual to give you the most comfortable and pleasant wearing experience. The strap with an interchangeable catch on the side of the lugs allows you to change your strap without any special tool.

You can also pick our Horween Leather strap; an American leather producer with high recognition in the watch strap industry has more than 100 years of heritage in hand-craft manufacturer technique. This Horween Leather Brown/Honey Brown achieved an aniline finish with a rich and oily texture, widely used in luxury leather goods.

 

2-YEAR WARRANTY

We are confident about the quality of our watches - BEHRENS ORIGINAL watches. Each watch is backed by a 2-year warranty. We have our own factory and watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance every day before shipping. So rest assured, your precious watches are well taken care of and are ready to give you the most comfortable wearing experience!

 

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE (VAT excluded)

 

TIMELINE

 

THE MODEL(ALL REAL PHOTOS)

 

THE STRAPS

 

PRESS RELEASE

We provide a press release and a set of promotional materials for journals and ambassadors. If you want to feature us, please kindly download them at the link below:

Promotion kit

 

You are always welcome to contact us for more marketing support.

email: info@behrenswatches.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/behrenswatches

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/behrenswatches

We appreciate every each of your support!

 

DECLARATION

Please note that it is our company policy not to lower the declared value of the goods or mark as gift/sample, as it is illegal in most of the countries, we may be blacklisted and charged by the customs. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.

story:
As we sought out face masks that were creative, inspiring and meaningful - and didn’t just have an all-over print - we came up empty-handed. We saw a need for a face mask that not only covers your face, but allows you to add a sense of personal taste, fashion and inspiration to your outfit. 

ZenMoon Masks are a breath of fresh air, a reminder to breathe and to trust that everything is as it should be. The symbols and designs are beautiful, subtle and perfect for those looking for a more sophisticated way to present themselves in public.

 

 

 

 

The Fibonacci Spiral is one of the oldest known symbols. It is a powerful yet spiritual symbol, connecting us to Nature, our Earth and the Galaxy. Our Life Force Energy, known as Kundalini, is a Spiral that flows from the base of our spine. It represents God/Goddess, Life, Energy and Evolving Journey. 

 

 

The Spiral is found in human physiology, animals, plants and minerals in nature as well as weather patterns. This sacred symbol reminds us of our ever evolving journey in life.

The Spirals in our designs are clockwise - sending energy out, and counterclockwise – bringing energy in.

 

 

 

 

The mandala is a diagram, chart or geometric pattern that represents the cosmos metaphysically or symbolically; a time-microcosm of the universe. It can also represent wholeness and a model for the organizational structure of life itself, a cosmic diagram that shows the relation to the infinite and the world that extends beyond our minds and bodies.

 

 

Mandalas may be employed for focusing attention and establishing a sacred space as an aid to meditation.

 

 

 

Sacred geometry ascribes symbolic and sacred meanings to certain geometric shapes and certain geometric proportions. 

 

 

The geometry used in the design and construction of religious structures such as churches, temples, mosques, religious monuments, altars, and tabernacles is often considered sacred.

 

 

 

 

The Fibonacci Spiral connects us to Nature, our Earth and the Galaxy. This sacred symbol reminds us of our ever evolving journey in life. The mandala is a diagram, chart or geometric pattern that represents the cosmos metaphysically or symbolically; a time-microcosm of the universe. 

 

 

Merging these two designs brings together Nature and our Earth with the organizational structure of life itself.

 

 

 

 

Vision, Self Expression, Spirituality, Awakening, Integrity, Freedom, Guidance, Protection & Watchfulness are all represented by the peacock. 

 

 

In Greco-Roman mythology, the Peacock tail has the “eyes” of the stars. In Hinduism, the Peacock is associated with Lakshmi who represents patience, kindness and luck.

 

 

 

 

A connection to several of the most important sacred symbols. While the sun represents the masculine, strength, and power, the moon finds balance with the feminine, calmness, and nurturing.

 

 

The 3rd eye gazes inward towards the self as it connects to universal awareness, and the Fibonacci spiral represents the life force energy and eternal sign of the creative and organizing principles of the universe.

 

 

 

 

We are a woman-owned design and production company with more than 25 years of experience. We have brought products to life, from concept to design to manufacturing, for some of the biggest companies across the globe. 

Now, we are bringing products we believe in directly to you! We value living an inspired, mindful, and compassionate life, and our goal is to deliver that inspiration to your doorstep through beautifully-crafted face masks.

 

 

 

Here’s a quick look at the structure and quality of our Masks.

story:
*Printed designs will only be offered in the standard-sized Använda V2 bag

 

 

 

 

And we make great f*cking bags. And wallets. We also make great f*cking wallets.

In 2018, we launched our first bag (and wallet) and people seriously loved it. We got a lot of great feedback and suggestions from all our backers, and we decided it would probably be a good idea to implement some stuff and come out with a new edition. Because that’s what bag companies do- they keep making bags.

Anyway, we’re super pumped about Använda V2, and we’re pretty sure y’all are gonna love it. Well, you better. ‘Cause they were your f*cking suggestions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company
