story:
Balancing form and functionality were essential to make a convenient, fashionable and effective product. The result is SprayCare™, It provides the security and convenience of always having disinfecting spray available. 
 
 

 

 


 

 

Our team placed great emphasis on the product design to make it an elegant alternative to carrying cumbersome bottles of hand sanitizer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With SprayCare™ you can disinfect any surface with ease. The sanitizing liquid can be directed onto any surface or into the palm of your hand. An LED indicator illuminates when it is time to recharge SprayCare so that you are never left unprotected.

 

 

 

 


 

SprayCare™ uses one of the latest generation atomizers to electronically spray the disinfectant at the touch of a button.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our atomizer dispenses droplets of sanitizer that produces superior coverage. The result is an effective and economical use of the disinfectant.

 

 

Common sprayers are less practical to sanitize common-use objects primarily because the nozzles produce large drops of the dispensed liquid. These larger drops result in uneven application of the disinfectant and leaves some areas unclean.

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SprayCare™ has the capacity to provide more than 40 applications of disinfectant, and each application runs for a total of 3 seconds. With SprayCare you will be protected throughout the entirety of your day.

 

 

 

SprayCare™ has been optimized to work with liquid hand sanitizers. Gels or liquids with higher density than liquid hand sanitizer can damage the device and should not be used.

 

 

 

  • Size: 43x40x15mm
  • Capacity: 5ml
  • Color: Matte black
  • Charging  port: USB-C
  • Battery: Lithium (80mAh)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As a backer of our campaign, you will receive a complete set to start using SprayCare.


 

 

 

 

We are working with reliable couriers to deliver your SprayCare quickly and securely to your door. The courier companies we have chosen provide high standard of service and they all ship globally. SprayCare will be shipped in order of purchase starting March 2021.

 

 

Last February, as I entered a restaurant in Utah, I realized how many times during the day I touch contaminated objects and surfaces. Concerned about COVID-19 and how the virus is transmitted, I started thinking about an easy way to disinfect my hands. The first thing I looked at was my wrist. I figured that having even a few drops of sanitizer in my hands would be enough to keep me safe.

We started seeing more hand sanitizer dispensers in the market, but most of them seemed uncomfortable or bulky. We wanted to build something light-weight, innovate, and that could be worn all the time. After many iterations, we developed a unique solution to disinfect surfaces. 

 

 

We believe that multicultural and inclusive teams generate the most creative ideas. Our members are from the United States, Mexico, and China. We have combined our diverse expertise, backgrounds, and skills to bring you SprayCare™.

We innovate with passion to break paradigms and create cutting edge solutions.

 

 

 

First SprayCare concepts 

First prototypes

Testing second prototype

 

SprayCare PATENT PENDING

A discharge or atomizer device with improved discharge or dispensing effect is disclosed. The atomizer device can be worn by a user as a wrist or arm portable device. The portable device includes a rechargeable battery, an atomizer assembly and a control unit, so that the portable device is configured to spray a jet or cloud of a fluid, in particular a sanitizing fluid.

 

 

You must read and follow the safety precautions of hand sanitizers and SprayCare™ included in our package.

Avoid contact with eyes.

Stay away from ignition sources such as flames, sparks and any types of electrical source, or objects with extreme heat.

Do not use SprayCare™ as an electronic cigarette.

Do not smoke while using SprayCare™ with a liquid hand sanitizer.

 The warranty is void if any safety precautions are violated.

 

Risks and challenges

We do not anticipate setbacks, but we are ready for any that may arise. In the case of additional shutdowns imposed by governments due to COVID-19, we have preemptively made agreements with different manufacturers in Mexico, Singapore and China to avoid delays in the production phase. In a worst case scenario, where the pandemic intensifies, we will do our best to resolve any issue as soon as possible, and we will keep you informed on the progress.
story_txt:
Balancing form and functionality were essential to make a convenient, fashionable and effective product. The result is SprayCare™, It provides the security and convenience of always having disinfecting spray available. 
 
 

 

 
  Our team placed great emphasis on the product design to make it an elegant alternative to carrying cumbersome bottles of hand sanitizer.        With SprayCare™ you can disinfect any surface with ease. The sanitizing liquid can be directed onto any surface or into the palm of your hand. An LED indicator illuminates when it is time to recharge SprayCare so that you are never left unprotected.     SprayCare™ uses one of the latest generation atomizers to electronically spray the disinfectant at the touch of a button.      Our atomizer dispenses droplets of sanitizer that produces superior coverage. The result is an effective and economical use of the disinfectant.  Common sprayers are less practical to sanitize common-use objects primarily because the nozzles produce large drops of the dispensed liquid. These larger drops result in uneven application of the disinfectant and leaves some areas unclean.          SprayCare™ has the capacity to provide more than 40 applications of disinfectant, and each application runs for a total of 3 seconds. With SprayCare you will be protected throughout the entirety of your day.   SprayCare™ has been optimized to work with liquid hand sanitizers. Gels or liquids with higher density than liquid hand sanitizer can damage the device and should not be used.   

Size: 43x40x15mm

Capacity: 5ml

Color: Matte black

Charging  port: USB-C

Battery: Lithium (80mAh)
       As a backer of our campaign, you will receive a complete set to start using SprayCare.    We are working with reliable couriers to deliver your SprayCare quickly and securely to your door. The courier companies we have chosen provide high standard of service and they all ship globally. SprayCare will be shipped in order of purchase starting March 2021.  Last February, as I entered a restaurant in Utah, I realized how many times during the day I touch contaminated objects and surfaces. Concerned about COVID-19 and how the virus is transmitted, I started thinking about an easy way to disinfect my hands. The first thing I looked at was my wrist. I figured that having even a few drops of sanitizer in my hands would be enough to keep me safe.We started seeing more hand sanitizer dispensers in the market, but most of them seemed uncomfortable or bulky. We wanted to build something light-weight, innovate, and that could be worn all the time. After many iterations, we developed a unique solution to disinfect surfaces.   We believe that multicultural and inclusive teams generate the most creative ideas. Our members are from the United States, Mexico, and China. We have combined our diverse expertise, backgrounds, and skills to bring you SprayCare™.We innovate with passion to break paradigms and create cutting edge solutions.   First SprayCare concepts First prototypesTesting second prototype SprayCare PATENT PENDINGA discharge or atomizer device with improved discharge or dispensing effect is disclosed. The atomizer device can be worn by a user as a wrist or arm portable device. The portable device includes a rechargeable battery, an atomizer assembly and a control unit, so that the portable device is configured to spray a jet or cloud of a fluid, in particular a sanitizing fluid.  You must read and follow the safety precautions of hand sanitizers and SprayCare™ included in our package.Avoid contact with eyes.Stay away from ignition sources such as flames, sparks and any types of electrical source, or objects with extreme heat.Do not use SprayCare™ as an electronic cigarette.Do not smoke while using SprayCare™ with a liquid hand sanitizer. The warranty is void if any safety precautions are violated. Risks and challengesWe do not anticipate setbacks, but we are ready for any that may arise. In the case of additional shutdowns imposed by governments due to COVID-19, we have preemptively made agreements with different manufacturers in Mexico, Singapore and China to avoid delays in the production phase. In a worst case scenario, where the pandemic intensifies, we will do our best to resolve any issue as soon as possible, and we will keep you informed on the progress.

story:
What is RobeCurls™? Meet the Curling Headband from RobeCurls™. It is a heat free method of curling your hair inspired by a viral TikTok trend. And did we mention how well it works? Take a look.

 

Unlike the uncomfortable rollers from the 1970s, the patent pending Curling Headband is a fashionable hair accessory you’ll want to be seen wearing, no matter what you are doing. 

Wear it to work out

Or go out. 

It’s so gentle it even works on kids!

No matter where you wear it, be prepared to get compliments on your timeless updo that looks like it is straight out of a magazine.

If you can use a curling iron, you can use the Curling Headband. Just add a little bit of water with a spray bottle or brush, and wrap your hair around it like this:

Wear it for at least 1-3 hours until your hair is dry, and then take it out to reveal those picture perfect curls. 

We hear you. Before we started RobeCurls™, we tried pretty much every heatless curl invention out there, and most of them didn’t work. We got our hair tangled in some, and ended up looking like a poodle with others. That’s why we made our own, and tested it on everyone we know. 

Want proof?

Here are three reasons we know you are going to love it.

1. We have 4+ Stars on Amazon (and that was just for the first prototype!)

2. Inspired by a TikTok hack with almost 50 million views (and happy users)

3. Over 500 women and men have tried our Curling Headband already and sent us their results.

We made sure it worked on:

Short Hair

Long Hair

Super Straight Hair

And a whole lot more!

Based on their feedback, we made the product even better, and are excited for you to try RobeCurls™ 2.0! 

This is no simple tool. Patent pending and upgraded, it's a sleek mean curling machine.  

RobeCurls™ is made out of satin charmeuse (yes, it’s as fancy as it sounds) which promotes healthy hair, reduces frizz, breakage, and split-ends. Inside is a plush microfiber fleece lining that speeds up hair drying time. It also has an integrated wire that allows you to easily and comfortably wrap and secure your hair. So secure you can even wear it while working out!

Includes two matching scrunchies that are so perfect, you might want to order another Curling Headband just for the scrunchies. 

You need your headband to match your outfits and your dreams. That’s why we are releasing it in 5 fun colors. When you back the campaign, you’ll have the choice to pick any one you want, or get all 5 and have a curling party!  

Oh, excuse our manners.

We are a women founded and owned business, and for the last year we have been turning this crazy idea into reality. We’re excited to meet you and happy to answer any questions. Just reach out at hello@robecurls.com and one of us will be on the other end.  

This is Laura’s garage right now.

Last week, 6 pallets arrived at her house. Our first batch of RobeCurls™ ready to go, so we’ll be able to start shipping as soon as the campaign ends on September 8th, and you’ll have the product in your hands by the end of September at the latest!

So why do we need your help?

Although it looks like a lot, this is only the start. Our factory is ready to ship out our next batch, but we need the funds to make it happen. We’re bootstrapping this ourselves and need YOU to help make it a reality.  Thank you for supporting us and helping make this the biggest new “wave” in hair accessories!

So what could go wrong?

Things can always go wrong, but since we already have some product in hand, we think the risk is low.  As long as they don’t discover a new species of murder hornets attracted to curling accessories (you never know in 2020), we should be good to go. We could see some shipping delays, but we are factoring that into our timeline, so even with delays you should receive your product on time.

We are not noobs or boobs. Here are some things that apparently make us more trustworthy. 

Oh yeah, and this is how it's going to happen.

So without further ado...

We could see some shipping delays, but we are factoring that into our timeline, so even with delays you should receive your product on time.
We are not noobs or boobs. Here are some things that apparently make us more trustworthy. 

Oh yeah, and this is how it's going to happen.

So without further ado...

story:
THE INSPIRATION:

My dad passed his love of wristwatches to my older brother and I. My dad and older brother, being Nigerian with an innate appreciation of style, taught me that a good watch went hand in hand with dressing up and looking good. The first watch that I remember getting was a Timex. My dad got my siblings and I one each. I treasured mine and fell in love with what a good watch stood for; style, affordability, durability and a chance to show off your personality. When I could buy my own watches, I couldn't afford high end luxury so settled for lower quality, ‘cheap & cheerful’. I realised early that a lot of affordable watches are made from low quality materials, using cheap engine movements, glass, poor straps, all aimed at minimising costs and making huge profits. Over time, the materials fall apart, fail to function and the watch stops working. For any watch maker, brand honesty and integrity should be your key components.  As a watch enthusiast, I was annoyed that some manufacturers would short-change buyers. I thought to myself, there must a better way, a win win for both watchmaker and customer. And so my journey and research into watch making began. Afterwards, armed with a number of years’ insight and appreciation of the whole process and the industry, I was inspired to do something different; make really affordable watches that were stylish and good quality. This feat was made possible by myself and a small, dedicated team, who also share my passion and vision. We have worked (and will continue to do so) tirelessly for the past two and a half years, designing and redesigning the ‘ideal’ everyday affordable wristwatch. And we achieved it without using substandard materials, made with precision and specifications that set us apart. My first collection, the Inspire Chronograph Collection, is made up of just that. 

 

THE IDEA BEHIND NAME KALOSDIAL:

The word ‘Kalos’ is Greek and means; beautiful, noble, good. For me this was apt and described my brand to a tee, “something beautiful” inside and out. Our dials, being an integral part of our watches, tick this box a 100%. You are drawn immediately to the craftmanship that has gone into making them appeal to anyone with a good eye for fashion. And when it comes to what makes our watches tick, the engine movement is the most vital part and I made sure ours is supported and made of good quality specifications. The Inspired Chronograph Collection is powered by the Miyota 0S21 Japan movement, a proven and accurate engine movement with a battery life of up to 5 years and accuracy of +/-20 second per month. This ensures a seamless transition of time telling from your watch.  

                                                                               

THE VISION FOR KALOSDIAL WRISTWATCHES:

Coming from a developing country means I appreciate that quality usually comes at a very high price.  More often than not, we ‘import’ these items. We put a high value on brands made elsewhere. My question then and my quest now is; why shouldn’t I or anyone be able to buy a good quality watch at an affordable price? And why can’t I create a brand that does just that? My vision comes from an idea that is fueled by hard work and integrity. I want Kalosdial watches to stand shoulder to shoulder with other brands, evolving over time to capture hearts and the market at the same time. This is my vision, a brand that lets you define your style and own it whilst being affordable and still ticking all the boxes when it comes to quality. A good product should never be judged by where it originates from, but by the quality and standards that have gone into making it and, most notably, meeting customer expectations. 

 

WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER:

With your support, Kalosdial watches can change the narrative. By backing my brand and pre-ordering a Kalosdial watch, you will be supporting my vision of creating watches that are; affordable, stylish timepieces that anyone would be proud to own.

I am in this for the long haul, the plan is to plough back and invest in the brand as I listen to the customer and the market. I want to build on what I have done and break barriers going forward with funds raised on Indiegogo. As a start-up, we have current limitations to how far we can go with our product line. The watch casings used for our founders’ collection launch might be generic but they are of high quality. And we have extended this focus to making sure the most important things meet high quality requirements. Our engine movement, parts and specifications attest to this and it is the design and finishing of each watch that makes our brand unique. The funds I raise here will ensure I have a strong foundation to produce the whole Inspire Chronograph Collection as well as help put in motion, the creation and production of my next collection of mecaquartz and automatic in-house watch designs, all of which are currently already on the drawing board. 

 

THE INSPIRE CHRONOGRAPH COLLECTION:

The Inspire Chronograph consist of six watch designs; each has its essence. We say "Be Bold, Live free" with any of our watches for those daring to be different and express their style differently. 

  • The Marvos Gold Chronograph:  Manages to capture a balance of looking sleek yet simple. It's that simplicity that portrays class and tells a lot about the wearer's personality. 'Marvos' is Greek and means Black. Black and Gold are always associated with style and class. Marvos Gold Chrono captures this.
  • Allure Rose Gold Chronograph: Rose gold never looked so good until now. It accentuates a woman's confidence, beauty and intelligence all wrapped around her wrist.
  • Machismo Steel Chronograph:  Is all about confidence, strength and speaks true to its name.
  • Midnight Blue Chronograph: There's almost something quite serene about it, with its beautiful shade of blue and sunray polish. A design that can be worn at anytime, its laid back appearance and its portrayal of calmness will surely get you noticed.
  • The Onyx Elite Chronograph: Like its counterpart, the Marvos Gold Chrono. The Onyx Elite Chrono is associated with style and class with its unique appeal.
  • The Intrepid Luxe Chronograph: It is for those quintessential people who are adventurous and know precisely what they want when making a bold fashion statement. 

 

OUR SPECIFICATIONS:

Our specifications set us apart from other brands because we only used quality parts for our watches, not focusing entirely on profit margins but on customer experience and satisfaction.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

Kalosdial wristwatches, we are building around integrity and honesty. Whenever there is a delay or change at every step of production, we will promptly inform our customers about it through our established communication channels. We would be as direct and open about it as reasonably practicable. Another challenge we may encounter is spreading the word about Kalosdial wristwatches and getting more people on Indiegogo to invest their weight of support in us by pre-ordering our wristwatches. That is why we are appealing to family, friends, and other social media influencers to spread the word massively around and build the Kalosdial Trybe. Our manufacturers are very experienced in the wristwatch industry, and we have built strong working relationships with them, especially when it comes to quality standards. We have also perfected our shipping strategy to ensure all our customers receive their watches in time and good condition.

 

ALL ABOUT PERFECTION:

We are deliberate with our choices. One is to maintain product integrity for the Kalosdial brand sustainably. Our goal for durability and quality is to rank among the bankable assets of our customers. We have studied our prototypes closely and seen there is still room for improvement. We have made specific visible changes.
Consequently, the final production of our watches will be a little higher in quality and more appealing in appearance than the prototypes we have been showcasing. Giving our esteemed customers a better experience and more personal touch with our watches. Here are such significant changes:

●      Slight increase in size for Logo and brand name on the dials of all our watches;

●      Illuminous dial Bartons/hour and minute hands for - Onyx Elite Chronograph, Midnight Blue Chronograph and Intrepid Luxe Chronograph.

●      White stamped ‘Eko Inspired’ silver Logo/brand name instead of black for Midnight Blue Chronograph  and Intrepid Luxe Chronograph for better visibility.

●      Upgraded to 10 ATM Water Resistant instead of 5 ATM Water Resistant for all watch designs.  

 

OUR ENGINE MOVEMENT:

The Miyota 0S21 is a quartz watch movement with zero jewels made in Japan. Its accuracy rating is +/- 20 secs per month with a battery life of 5 years. Making it a very reliable and good engine movement. That’s why we chose to use it for our Inspire Chronograph Collection. To make a statement as an entry level watch Brand that is here for the long haul - We won’t compromise quality for profit margins. 

​

     

     

    PACKAGING:​

    We try to be unique and different in everything we do. We adopted this with our watch boxes, making them as trendy as possible, light yet a safe place to store your watch. All this makes your unpackaging a great experience as well. 

    OUR TEAM: 

    Hi, I am Oludele Adefowope, Founder of Kalosdial wristwatches. I will like you to meet the rest of the team behind Kalosdial wristwatches; their drive and passion made it possible for us to be where we are now. 

     

    CUSTOMS, DUTIES & SHIPPING POLICY INFORMATION:

    International Shipping(worldwide): Backers from all countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods; depending on the import policies of their respective countries. Countries like the US and Canada; backers in these countries may not have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with your country's customs and border protection authority.

    Shipping Policy: Suppose our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you're not there, provided the wrong address, or you changed residence without telling us). In that case, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to re-ship the package. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

    RECOGNITION:

    I want to say a big thank you to everyone, who in their way backed us, pre-ordered any of our watches or sent shout outs to friends, family and colleagues. In no way was it a small feat getting the word out there about Kalosdial wristwatches, being brand ambassadors and being part of the Kalosdial Trybe. It has indeed been an inspiring journey, and you all will always be a part of its success. I am honoured to have you all in the Trybe.

    Oludele Adefowope- Founder of Kalosdial wristwatches

​

 
 

PACKAGING:​
We try to be unique and different in everything we do. We adopted this with our watch boxes, making them as trendy as possible, light yet a safe place to store your watch. All this makes your unpackaging a great experience as well. 

OUR TEAM: 
Hi, I am Oludele Adefowope, Founder of Kalosdial wristwatches. I will like you to meet the rest of the team behind Kalosdial wristwatches; their drive and passion made it possible for us to be where we are now. 
 
CUSTOMS, DUTIES & SHIPPING POLICY INFORMATION:
International Shipping(worldwide): Backers from all countries may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods; depending on the import policies of their respective countries. Countries like the US and Canada; backers in these countries may not have to pay any additional duties, sales tax, VAT. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with your country's customs and border protection authority.
Shipping Policy: Suppose our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and the package returns to our warehouse (either because you're not there, provided the wrong address, or you changed residence without telling us). In that case, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to re-ship the package. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.
RECOGNITION:
I want to say a big thank you to everyone, who in their way backed us, pre-ordered any of our watches or sent shout outs to friends, family and colleagues. In no way was it a small feat getting the word out there about Kalosdial wristwatches, being brand ambassadors and being part of the Kalosdial Trybe. It has indeed been an inspiring journey, and you all will always be a part of its success. I am honoured to have you all in the Trybe.
Oludele Adefowope- Founder of Kalosdial wristwatches

story:
Our fabrics are made with a nanotechnology speed dry feature which makes our trunks one of fastest drying shorts on the market. We've tested our trunks with multiple high-line brands and the results were fascinating. Below is a demonstration of us dipping a $70 bathing suit into water, followed by a HARMONQLO bathing suit.​

Our tags are sewn on both ends, eliminating those annoying tags from poking your back. 

This feature is probably my favorite! We worked extremely hard to construct a mesh liner that will be just as comfortable as your everyday wear. It's constructed from the softest nylon fabric. We designed it with extremely small holes in order that it'll never leave any marks "behind":)

We also made sure to use additional fabric over the waterproof pocket to give a nice feel on your leg. 

If unsure on size or like a looser fit, please take a size up. Feel free to contact me if you need help choosing a size after the survey (joseph@harmonqlo.com).

 HARMONQLO is a young company which was founded in 2018. We had a mission to finally create swimwear for Men which will actually be just as comfortable as your everyday shorts. We worked tirelessly to be able to solve all the issues of traditional swimwear. Finally we launched through Kickstarter and raised $35k to bring our brand to life. The feedback we received was off the charts! We were convinced we created the perfect trunks. But hen we had a few backers who asked us if we could also add a pocket to protect their valuables. That's when we realized we were indeed missing an important feature. We right away jumped back to the drawing board and brought HARMONQLO 2.0 to life. Hopefully now our shorts will be the perfect solution we've all been waiting for. ​

If you follow the size chart carefully, then the shorts will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your shorts for any reason, we will allow you to do that as long as they have not been used and still have the original tags attached. However, you will just need to cover the 2 way shipping. As we are offering our trunks at an extremely high discounted price exclusively on Kickstarter we won't be able to accept any returns.

story:
Introducing CORI MICHELLE

CORI MICHELLE takes "making it your own" style to a whole other level with designs that let YOU choose. 

We are a woman-owned direct-to-consumer women's clothing brand that provides fashion forward styles, prints, and fabrics that allow YOU to choose how much skin to show. We are different because not only do we provide the option to show as much or as little leg as you want, but we also let you choose how much or little bust. This allows each style to be worn for so many different occasions. 

A LITTLE HISTORY:

Our founder and creative director, Cori Michelle Atamer, grew up in Wyoming where fashion and trends were not always top of mind. However, that did not stop her from developing her individual style by wearing colorful prints, flowy fabrics, or whatever she felt suitable for the occasion. This turned many heads and she soon realized that many of the outfits she had in her closet were not fitted for everyday wear. Eventually she moved to LA where she found fashion in everything and her personal style was more accepted. She eventually started a job in the digital marketing industry, where the dress code was open and a little more lenient. While this allowed for more opportunity to wear the pieces in her closet that did not get as much love, there were still many more revealing pieces that were only appropriate for LA’s nightlife. That is when she came up with the idea for her brand to design styles that are not only sexy but have the option to wear for a more modest occasion, such as the workplace or family gatherings.

WHAT MAKES CORI MICHELLE DIFFERENT?

CORI MICHELLE brings innovative dresses, skirts, tops, and jumpsuits with design details:

  • Design patent pending XO Cami that is worn with its accompanying dress or top to provide bust coverage and the illusion that it is one piece. The XO Cami comes with the style and is not sold separately. This gives these styles 3x ways to wear them: Cami with dress/top for a more modest look, just the dress or top for a sexier look, or the cami by itself.

 

  • Dresses and skirts that have buttons from waist to hem that can be buttoned up for a more conservative look or unbuttoned to show more leg.

 

  • Skirts or dresses that have buttons up to the waistline will be sewn together 6-7” down so that there is no gaping around the midsection when standing or sitting.

 

  • Skirts and dresses that meet or exceed fingertip length so that they are appropriate for the office. The skirt also stays in place so you aren’t constantly tugging at the fabric and readjusting throughout the day.
  • Dresses, jumpsuits, and skirts will always have pockets when the style allows.

 

  • Jumpsuits are designed with taller women in mind. The crotch is dropped 2-3" compared to many of the jumpsuits out there which allow taller women to wear them comfortably and still look great on those that are shorter.

 

  • Thoughtful zipper placement for ease of getting out of the garment quickly.

 

SIZING:

Did you know most women do not know how to properly measure themselves for the style they are purchasing and end up with the wrong size?

Our sizing reflects real women’s bodies and recommendations are given specific to each piece. We will let you know if you size should be matched with a waist measurement over a bust measurement, for example.

Cori Michelle will be available in sizes:

XS | S | M | L | XL

 

ECO-CONSCIOUS PACKAGING:

Our customers will be delighted when receiving their packages. Our packaging is beautifully minimalist in design and created from eco-conscious materials.

Our styles are packed in 100% compostable bags, which can be disposed of at home or commercially.

No plastics are used to ship our products to customers.

By wearing CORI MICHELLE, you will be the chicest person in the room, while also helping the environment.

 

PRODUCTION:

Cori Michelle is proudly made in the US and chooses locally sourced manufacturers.

This brings positive change to the fashion industry, by taking a stance against the manipulation of less developed countries where workers are treated poorly. When you buy from me, you are helping the industry move the in the right direction.

Our manufacturers follow all CAL/OSHA health and safety requirements and ensure that our garment workers enjoy safe and ethical working conditions while earning a fair wage. Being local also allows me to visit and develop not only a professional relationship, but a personal one as well.

 

ABOUT CORI:

Cori was born and raised in Jackson Hole, Wyoming where she grew up in both the country and the city. Part of her childhood was spent tending to horses, fixing tractors, and exploring the great outdoors; while the other part was spent enjoying time with friends, shopping, and working on her many projects (some of which led her to where she is today). As a child, some of Cori's fondest memories were spending time with her Grammy, designing and sewing one-of-a-kind outfits for her Barbie dolls. This is the true beginning of her journey to create CORI MICHELLE.

After high school, she attended the University of Wyoming where she received her BS in Business and then moved to the City of Angels where she attended FIDM for Fashion Design. After graduation, Cori pursued a career in advertising and gained knowledge in marketing and management, two skills that would come in handy when starting her own label.

Until recently, Cori’s vision of having her own brand seemed to simply be a dream. And though it felt far-fetched, she could always confide in her Grammy. They would send postcards back and forth to each other many of which would be Grammy supporting and pushing Cori to pursue her dreams. In 2018, her Grammy passed, and Cori knew she could not let her down. A year later Cori started the development of her first mini collection. The development took a halt when COVID hit which pushed her launch date to 2021. In honor of her Grammy, she is launching CORI MICHELLE on April 1, 2021 and she knows she is looking down so proud of her.

 

Your support of this campaign will go towards:

  • Purchasing of fabric and trims
  • The first production run of inventory
  • Purchase of custom garment labels and hand tags
  • Initial digital marketing campaigns
  • The photo and video shoot of the very first collection which includes models, photographers, and retouching fees for our e-commerce website
  • The launch of our e-commerce website
  • Packaging supplies for shipping our products to customers (eco-conscious packing and mailers, marketing materials, etc.)
  • Consulting fees for legal and tax experts
  • Overhead like office supplies, software, and platform fees
  • Development of Fall/Winter 2021 collection

*This campaign funding will not be used to pay Cori any type of capital compensation or salary.

 

After our INDIEGOGO campaign is finished, we are committed to bringing even more fresh colors and styles to our assortment!

We have some very exciting perks available with your donation to this campaign. By pre-ordering, a CORI MICHELLE piece (or a few!), we will be able to fund our first production run.

Simply select the style and size from the perk options, and you will be the first to wear CORI MICHELLE this summer!

*Please note that if a color is out of stock at the time of manufacture, we will reach out to you to select a different color.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

Any contribution amount would be very appreciated and extremely helpful to building our brand.  It is completely understandable if you are not able to make a monetary donation at this time. Please help spread the word about this campaign with your friends, family, and co-workers.

Also, if you have any professional connections that you think would help grow the business, they would be greatly welcomed!

FOLLOW CORI MICHELLE ON SOCIAL MEDIA:

You can help share this campaign via social media on the top right of this page.

Follow us on Instagram @corimichellexo and stay tuned for our website launch at corimichelle.com!

 

Thank you so much for your support. I hope you enjoy the styles as much as I have enjoyed designing them.

XO- Cori Michelle

story:
A door left ajar, a front gate not properly shut, or a literal window of opportunity. A few seconds of confusion before the panic starts to settle in: “Where is Fido? How long has he been gone? And how will we find him?”

Findster Home is the answer to these questions and much more! It lets you and your family monitor your pets’ location and activity whenever you want, wherever you are - making sure you’re prepared for any escape attempts and allowing you to react immediately and decisively. 

 Here’s how Findster Home will improve your life - and protect your pets’!

We’re pet lovers first and foremost, and developed Findster to be the answer to a real-life problem: a way to track Aquiles, a strong-willed dog who just wouldn’t quit escaping. Every pet tracker available requires a contract and monthly fees, so we focused on creating a definitive solution that avoided this.

Findster Home is independent from the cellular infrastructure, so there are no forced contracts or monthly fees for using it. It doesn’t matter whether you’re in New York, Alaska, or Japan - as long as you have an internet connection, you’ll be able to use Findster Home without any problems, and without any monthly costs. Pay once, use it forever!

Also, since it does not depend on the cellular infrastructure, Findster Home can be setup anywhere in the world without restrictions... And you can be sure it’ll work a treat!

Findster Home continuously tracks your pets’ location using the most precise GPS technology. Their position is accurately displayed in real-time on the map, which you and your loved ones can access at any time and anywhere via the Findster App.

At work, on holiday, or even in other countries - wherever you may be, as long as you have an Internet connection, you’ll be able to keep tabs on your furry friends back home. Who said you can’t be in two places at once?

But how can you know if your pet is safe and sound without constantly checking their location? That’s easy: by creating a virtual fence around your home! These are entirely customizable, so you can define them as you see fit: if you live in the suburbs and your cat is welcome to visit the neighbors’ yards, you can define a larger virtual fence and be notified if he leaves the neighborhood instead. 

When a pet escapes or is otherwise missing, time is of the essence. Whenever a fence is breached, you’ll receive an immediate alert on your phone - via text message and the Findster App - so you can act swiftly and bring your four-legged friends back to safety. Other family members will be simultaneously warned, so whoever’s closest can jump into action.

 We don’t always have our phones at hand when we’re at home. Even when that is the case, they’re often on “Silent” mode, which could stop us from noticing an important alert. Because of this, Findster Home includes a loudspeaker and will audibly notify you of any alerts so you don’t miss vital information.

 Let’s say your buddy is a true escape artist who carefully carries out a master plan to break out. The Findster App includes a Radar which will guide you right to their location, so you won’t have to guess which of their favorite spots they went to! They’ll be the ones left guessing how you managed to figure it out so quickly...

 Assuring our pets’ well-being is a full-time job, which involves much more than keeping track of their whereabouts. Findster Home monitors their activity levels throughout the day, so you can know if they’re getting the perfect amounts of exercise and rest. The App will notify you when things could be better, helping you assure your pets are living their best life!

 When it comes to our pets, we always want to be in the loop. With Findster Home, you’ll be able to view a heat map compiling the places where they’ve been spending the most time, plus how much they've walked and at which times of day they were most active. You'll be able to better understand your pets' habits - and if they have a new favorite spot, you’ll be sure to find out!

Our pets are the heart of our families, and we think about them even when we’re not around. Findster Home makes keeping your peace of mind way easier: let’s say your daughter lives 5 miles away from you - she’ll still be able to track Mr. Tail-wagger and make sure he’s safe and sound.
Please note that your data is strictly confidential and only authorized persons can access it! 

Findster Home lets you monitor up to 3 pets at once, maintaining the same level of protection and effectiveness. The more the merrier!

Each Findster Home consists of a Basestation, to be placed within your home, and one or more Pet Modules, attached to the pets’ collar. Each pet’s location and activity information can be accessed using the Findster App on your phone!

We designed Findster Home to be more than family-friendly - it’s family-focused. It’s easy to setup and use, the App is super user-friendly, and we have the best Support Team on hand to help you with any trouble you may encounter. We’re here for you!

 The Pet Modules are lightweight, sturdy and waterproof. They’re rechargeable via USB (the charger is included in each kit), and can be securely attached to any collar using the included strap attachment mechanism

.

 So how come Findster Home does not depend on the cellular infrastructure (and why does this matter)? The answer is our exclusive MAZE communication technology. It allows the Pet Module and the Basestation to communicate wirelessly in a range of up to 6 miles (~10 km) without requiring a cellular connection to send the GPS coordinates.

The data is then sent to the cloud via your home Wi-Fi, and you can access it anywhere with your phone's own 4G connection.

Therefore, Findster is free from mobile network carriers. No carrier = No contract = No monthly fees!

 

Because Findster Home allows the detailed monitoring of your pets’ activity, we looked into how we could build on this, in order to let you take advantage of these health monitoring capabilities with ease and convenience.

Introducing Findster Care! It combines intensive data collection and analysis by AI with the irreplaceable expertise of human Vets, to provide you the best way of taking care of your pet.

With Findster Care, you’ll have access to:

  • A real Vet available 24/7 to answer any pet-related questions you may have, at your convenience;
  • Meaningful, tailored insights on your pets’ health and behavior, based on the activity recorded by the Pet module;
  • Early detection of possible health-related issues, through continuous monitoring of your buddies’ evolution over time;

So, the good news is that this optional service is already available within the Findster App.

The GREAT news is that every Findster Home perk includes a 12-month Findster Care subscription, completely free of charge! 

We’ve been working on Findster since 2014. In fact, you may recall the Findster name from our previous campaign for Findster Duo, the first GPS Pet Tracker without monthly fees. That was three years ago - the campaign was successfully funded by 1700 backers from over 50 countries, and we went on to develop, manufacture, and deliver the product. We continually listened to our backers’ feedback and made available updates for both the modules and the App on a regular basis, as a result.

Since then, we’ve launched our own Online Store and joined Amazon in several markets. Findster Duo is currently used by thousands of people in over 80 countries!

So why did we decide to launch Findster Home on Kickstarter?

On our previous campaign, after we delivered everyone’s orders, we closely monitored the constant feedback and suggestions we received. Thanks to the invaluable feedback from the community, we were able to improve Findster Duo considerably - it went from great to almost perfect!

We feel these two products complement each other: while Findster Duo, our existing solution, is ideal for outdoor adventures, Findster Home, as the name implies, lets you keep track of your buddies while they’re home or on walks around your neighborhood. So what better way to launch it than replicating the process?

Our Team

Our team has the same core as during our previous Kickstarter campaign, including the brilliant Hardware team behind Findster Duo and our MAZE communication technology - and the best Support Team around, to make sure you’re taking the most out of our products.

As our product grew, we identified the need for more resources and expertise in certain areas, and added new faces accordingly.

Hardware, Software, Marketing, Design... we’re all working to bring you the best product possible. All we need is your help and we’ll be golden!

They’ll be the ones left guessing how you managed to figure it out so quickly...

 Assuring our pets’ well-being is a full-time job, which involves much more than keeping track of their whereabouts. Findster Home monitors their activity levels throughout the day, so you can know if they’re getting the perfect amounts of exercise and rest. The App will notify you when things could be better, helping you assure your pets are living their best life!

 When it comes to our pets, we always want to be in the loop. With Findster Home, you’ll be able to view a heat map compiling the places where they’ve been spending the most time, plus how much they've walked and at which times of day they were most active. You'll be able to better understand your pets' habits - and if they have a new favorite spot, you’ll be sure to find out!

Our pets are the heart of our families, and we think about them even when we’re not around. Findster Home makes keeping your peace of mind way easier: let’s say your daughter lives 5 miles away from you - she’ll still be able to track Mr. Tail-wagger and make sure he’s safe and sound.Please note that your data is strictly confidential and only authorized persons can access it! 

Findster Home lets you monitor up to 3 pets at once, maintaining the same level of protection and effectiveness. The more the merrier!

Each Findster Home consists of a Basestation, to be placed within your home, and one or more Pet Modules, attached to the pets’ collar. Each pet’s location and activity information can be accessed using the Findster App on your phone!
We designed Findster Home to be more than family-friendly - it’s family-focused. It’s easy to setup and use, the App is super user-friendly, and we have the best Support Team on hand to help you with any trouble you may encounter. We’re here for you!

 The Pet Modules are lightweight, sturdy and waterproof. They’re rechargeable via USB (the charger is included in each kit), and can be securely attached to any collar using the included strap attachment mechanism
.
 So how come Findster Home does not depend on the cellular infrastructure (and why does this matter)? The answer is our exclusive MAZE communication technology. It allows the Pet Module and the Basestation to communicate wirelessly in a range of up to 6 miles (~10 km) without requiring a cellular connection to send the GPS coordinates.
The data is then sent to the cloud via your home Wi-Fi, and you can access it anywhere with your phone's own 4G connection.
Therefore, Findster is free from mobile network carriers. No carrier = No contract = No monthly fees!

 
Because Findster Home allows the detailed monitoring of your pets’ activity, we looked into how we could build on this, in order to let you take advantage of these health monitoring capabilities with ease and convenience.
Introducing Findster Care! It combines intensive data collection and analysis by AI with the irreplaceable expertise of human Vets, to provide you the best way of taking care of your pet.
With Findster Care, you’ll have access to:

A real Vet available 24/7 to answer any pet-related questions you may have, at your convenience;
Meaningful, tailored insights on your pets’ health and behavior, based on the activity recorded by the Pet module;
Early detection of possible health-related issues, through continuous monitoring of your buddies’ evolution over time;

So, the good news is that this optional service is already available within the Findster App.
The GREAT news is that every Findster Home perk includes a 12-month Findster Care subscription, completely free of charge! 


We’ve been working on Findster since 2014. In fact, you may recall the Findster name from our previous campaign for Findster Duo, the first GPS Pet Tracker without monthly fees. That was three years ago - the campaign was successfully funded by 1700 backers from over 50 countries, and we went on to develop, manufacture, and deliver the product. We continually listened to our backers’ feedback and made available updates for both the modules and the App on a regular basis, as a result.
Since then, we’ve launched our own Online Store and joined Amazon in several markets. Findster Duo is currently used by thousands of people in over 80 countries!

So why did we decide to launch Findster Home on Kickstarter?
On our previous campaign, after we delivered everyone’s orders, we closely monitored the constant feedback and suggestions we received. Thanks to the invaluable feedback from the community, we were able to improve Findster Duo considerably - it went from great to almost perfect!
We feel these two products complement each other: while Findster Duo, our existing solution, is ideal for outdoor adventures, Findster Home, as the name implies, lets you keep track of your buddies while they’re home or on walks around your neighborhood. So what better way to launch it than replicating the process?
Our Team

Our team has the same core as during our previous Kickstarter campaign, including the brilliant Hardware team behind Findster Duo and our MAZE communication technology - and the best Support Team around, to make sure you’re taking the most out of our products.
As our product grew, we identified the need for more resources and expertise in certain areas, and added new faces accordingly.
Hardware, Software, Marketing, Design... we’re all working to bring you the best product possible. All we need is your help and we’ll be golden!

story:
Welcome to Ts-by-Marie!! 

My name is La'Tasha Moore!! I am a girl who wants to share my LIGHT with the WORLD. 

Inspirational T's was created to encourage you to think positively and bring awareness to current issues. 

This idea came from my heart!! I truly value having a Voice and I want to use the Voice that God gave me in the most positive way!! 

Your contribution will help Ts-by-Marie launch letting the World know you have a Voice and you deserve to be heard!! 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to launch full force we are looking to raise 5K!! This will cover the cost of launching which includes marketing, advertising and fulfilling orders on Demand!!

If for any reason we are Not able to reach our goal all contributors will receive a full refund.

The Impact

Fashion is a form of expression that often times represent our beliefs, thoughts, values, feelings, and innermost being.  I want you to make a Statement!! 

Risks & Challenges

This launch is certainly a leap of Faith that I'm taking. I understand that with all new adventures comes risks, challenges, highs and lows, but I am confident that this campaign will NOT be in vain.  Why? Because you're partnering with a vision that lives by the Golden rule-  "Treat other's as you would want to be treated-with respect and love"

If at any time during this campaign we face any challenges I promise to remain faithful, honest, loyal and true to the cause that lead me to start this campaign-Sharing my Light!!

Now that you've read my heart and understand the mission you can decide if this is right for you by partnering with this vision in 1 of 2 ways: 

Make a Contribution of any amount!!

Share this campaign with your friends, family and and social media accounts.

Thank you for your trust and contributions during this Leap of Faith!! 

Let's SPREAD LOVE,JOY AND PEACE to the WORLD!!! 

https://ts-by-marie.myshopify.com/

story:
"THINK OUTSIDE THE SNAPS"

 

Make diaper changes EZer! Easy on you, easy on baby.

Thank you to all of our supporters who have helped us all along the way!

Like a busy bee, we're at it again! We've made some improvements to our original award-winning, patent-pending baby bodysuit design for overall improved quality, appearance, and performance. Plus, we introduce some new arrivals to our product line.

Improvements we made to our original design:

  • Changed the fabric to a softer, more flexible cotton/spandex blend
  • Added a soft elastic sewn inside the binding of the leg seam
  • Modified the stitch along the back seam to allow more flexibility
  • Modified the logo placement to allow for custom printed graphics on the outfit
  • Improved the edge stitching of the closure to make it softer

New product arrivals for fall 2021 / spring 2022:

  • Bamboo baby bodysuit with long sleeves
  • Bamboo rompers in both long sleeves and short sleeves
  • Winter-weight romper in quilted cotton
  • Eco-friendly baby feeding accessories
  • New gift-box sets
  • New color/pattern options

In addition to the improvements to our original design, with this campaign, we're launching a new line of bodysuits and rompers made of luxuriously-super-soft bamboo viscose fabric that is durable, safer, and more comfortable on gentle baby skin. Plus, we've created a new winter-weight romper in quilted-cotton fabric. Plus + plus... we added some eco-friendly baby feeding accessories.

IMPROVEMENTS TO OUR ORIGINAL DESIGN

The original fabric was 100% cotton. We upgraded to a 95% Cotton / 5% Spandex blend for improved comfort, and stretch-ability of the fabric.

Elastic sewn inside the binding of the leg seam

  • The original leg seams only had a regular binding. The new design has a clear and soft elastic sewn inside the binding, which makes the leg opening more flexible with a better, snug fit.

 

Bartack stitching on the hook-and-loop (Velcro®) closure & branded tag

  • We added bartack stitching to the edges of the Velcro® closure to prevent the hooks of the hook-and-loop closure (Velcro®**) from scratching the baby’s skin.
  • The original brand logo was a vinyl heat-transfer print on the back of the garment. We had moved that to the front panel of the garment in the second version. The improvement we will make here is a sewn-on brand label made of soft woven fabric with a printed logo, sewn into the side seam. This will allow for larger custom printing options on front panel (See example below).

 

*** Custom art prints (by World Art by Jason Juranek) ***

  • We replaced the logo at the waistline with a sewn in logo. The chest panel can now be used for Custom Prints and Designs. This particular print graphic is licensed artwork from our dear friend, Jason Juranek, at World Art by Jason Juranek, in our Mom & Baby - Marine Life Collection.

 

Flexible stitching along the back seam

  • The seam on the back panel was originally constructed with top-stitched seam and was not very flexible or stretchy. The new design will utilize a Flatlock cover stitch along the back seam to allow the seam threads to stretch with the fabric.

INNOVATIVE, AWARD WINNING DESIGN

Our innovative design is an improvement on the "Onesie*", which has been around for many years. Our design has been nominated, and received multiple awards from several baby product organizations and groups, including JPMA, Baby Maternity Magazine, and Creative Child Magazine.

  • Front waist opening for convenient access to the diaper
  • Whisper quiet hook and loop fastener
  • Moisture resistant inside lining


EZ-On BaBeez™ is compliant with US government safety requirements (CPSC).

 

NEW ARRIVALS COMING FALL 2021/SPRING 2022

Our innovation continues, as we introduce two romper designs. Winter-weight cotton and Bamboo.

For Fall 2021/Spring 2022, we will be introducing some fabulous new color choices for the cotton/spandex blend baby bodysuits. 

We are also introducing a clothing line made of Bamboo viscose fabric to meet the demands of eco-friendly, sustainable, and natural-resource conscious parents.

Super-soft and durable Bamboo Baby Bodysuit

  • We are expanding our product selections to include "New Arrivals" baby accessories, such as glass feeding bottles, stainless steel sippy cups, burp cloths, blankets, and many more products that are eco-friendly, sustainable, and Mother-Earth friendly.

Our New Arrivals - Coming Fall 2021

With your continued support and contributions, we will steadily move forward to create our Fall 2021 / Spring 2022 designs and colors, and expand our marketing and retail distribution channels. We appreciate you, and all of our loyal supporters. We are excited to bring you more clothing designs and product ideas.

 

NEW IN BAMBOO!

Our new bamboo baby bodysuit features long sleeve design, plus all of the quality improvements we made. Our Fall 2021/Spring 2022 bamboo baby bodysuits will be available in both short sleeve and long sleeve, plus new colors.

Bamboo Baby Bodysuit with Panda Print

Why Bamboo?

  • Bamboo viscose material is naturally antibacterial, antimicrobial, antifungal, hypoallergenic, and UV protection, making it very safe for babies.
  • Bamboo is lightweight and breathable.
  • Comfortable to wear for all seasons. The bamboo fabric has insulative properties – keeps your baby cool in summer, warm in winter.

Some Facts About Bamboo

  •  One of the most eco-friendly, sustainable, natural resources on the planet 
  • One of the fastest growing plants in the world
  • Naturally anti-bacterial
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Moisture wicking
  • Insulative - keeps you cool in summer, warm in winter
  • Luxuriously soft fabric
  • Lightweight and breathable
  • Pill-resistant (won't 'pill' like fleece)
  • Strong and durable fabric fibers
  • UV protective
  •  Does not need pesticides or fertilizers to grow 

COLORS & SIZES

Confirm Color & Size options when you receive your backer survey. Consider the size and age of the baby at time you will receive the product.

Color Options

Size options

  • Newborn
  • 0-3 months
  • 3-6 months
  • 6-9 months
  • 9-12 months
  • 12-18 months

*Confirm Color & Size options when you receive your backer survey. Consider the age of the baby at time you receive the product.

Fabric & Care Instructions

  • 95% Cotton / 5% Spandex
  • High-count, Jersey knit
  • Fasten all garment closures before washing and drying
  • Machine wash cold
  • Wash with like colors
  • Only use non-chlorine bleach, if needed
  • Tumble dry low
  • Remove from dryer promptly
  • Warm iron if needed
  • Imported
  • For bodysuits with printed graphic designs, our printer uses baby-safe inks.

ROMPERS IN BAMBOO AND WINTER-WEIGHT COTTON

Applying a similar “Think outside the snaps” innovation as the EZ-On Babeez™ baby bodysuits, we have developed an amazing romper design that will make diaper changes so much easier, by utilizing a full-access, two-way zipper that starts at one foot, up over the waistline, and back down to the other foot. The Bamboo Romper designs will include both long sleeve and short sleeve. And the winter-weight rompers will only come in long sleeves. Both long sleeve styles of the romper’s from newborn size and up to 3-6 months have a built-in mitten at the cuff to protect precious, gentle faces from baby’s sharp fingernails.

Romper design will be made available in both winter weight cotton and lightweight bamboo.

BAMBOO ROMPERS

Short Sleeve Romper comes with an attached hoodie

Long Sleeve comes with footies, plus with or without mittens:

Sizes with built-in mittens:

  • Newborn
  • 0-3 month
  • 3-6 month

Without mittens:

  • 6-9 month
  • 9-12 month
  • 12-18 month

Features & Benefits:

  • Lightweight
  • Cool in summer, warm in winter
  • Front waist opening for convenient access to the diaper
  • Whisper quiet hook and loop fastener
  • Moisture resistant inside lining
  • 95% bamboo/5% spandex
  • Machine wash
  • Imported
  • Invisible 2 way zipper opening along the legs/waistline area.


QUILTED COTTON ROMPER

Showing with and without built-in mitten.

  • Long sleeve baby romper set in Mint Color includes the romper and a beanie.
  • 100% Cotton Knit in diamond quilted pattern winter-weight fabric

These sizes have built-in mittens:

  • 0-3 months
  • 3-6 months

Regular long sleeves in sizes

  • 6-9 months
  • 9-12 months
  • 12-18 months

Features an Invisible 2 way zipper opening along the legs/waistline area to allow easy access for diaper changes.

 

Both the rompers and bodysuits work in harmony to give parents and baby care-givers an easy solution to changing your baby’s diaper without having to undress the baby completely, or peel back the outfit like a banana. Watch the video below to see just how easy this makes changing a diaper!

Our products provide a brilliant solution to making diaper changes easier, whether you’re traveling in the car, visiting family and friends, spending a day at the park or at the game. Make diaper changes EZ-on, EZ-off, easy on babies and parents.

ECO-FRIENDLY AND SUSTAINABLE BABY PRODUCTS

GAB bee™ is a new brand we are introducing. Generation Alpha Baby (GAB) are babies born 2010 – 2030. These babies are born of Millennials and Generation X parents. These parents understand using plastics and other harmful materials may affect their baby’s health and welfare. GAB bee™ baby products are designed and developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials. Plastic-based bottles and other baby products are additionally harmful to babies as they retain contaminants due to their porosity. 

We're introducing our Borosilicate Glass Baby Feeding Bottle. Organic, Eco-Friendly, preferred by mothers. Also, the silicone nipples are easy to clean, hypoallergenic, and hygienic (silicone does not allow for bacterial growth because it has no open pores). Silicone can be boiled to sanitize and can withstand higher temperatures without off-gassing.

Set includes Borosilicate Glass Bottle with Liquid part measurements, Silicone nipple and Polypropylene Cap/Lock Ring & Handle. Also included is a Silicone anti-Colic straw and a Neoprene Sleeve Cover to prevent glass breakage.

Borosilicate Glass Feeding Bottles, Nipples and Caps

 

Neoprene cover to absorb impact and protect the bottle.

 

colic straw/siphon system

BOTTLE PRODUCT DETAILS

Product is designed and developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials.

  • Borosilicate glass bottle is heat and thermal shock resistant
  • BPA-Free glass
  • Neoprene cover prevents glass breakage
  • “Anti-colic” silicone straw prevents baby’s from ingesting air, causing distress
  • Glass bottle is microwave and dishwasher safe (excluding silicone nipple, silicone straw, polypropylene cap/lock ring/handle
  • Available in 180ml/6oz and 240ml/8oz
  • 180ml/6oz recommended for 3 months+
  • 240ml/8oz recommended for 6 months +
  • Imported

2- pack Silicone sealing disk with PP bottle cap.

  • Fits wide mouth EZ-On BaBeez glass baby feeding bottles
  • NOTE: Not safe for microwave

STAINLESS STEEL SIPPY CUPS

Sippy Cups in Stainless Steel, 3 colors to choose from

This Sippy cup is designed to assure the safety and health of children.  Its double insulation and anti-scalding design are suitable for drinking water, juices, and other baby foods.

  • 8 oz. capacity
  • Sippy cup set includes 1 each: Cup, Cover and Straw
  • Available Colors: Pink, Blue and Green

Materials:

  • Cup Inside: Food-grade stainless steel 304
  • Cup Outside: Food grade polypropylene
  • Cover/Straw: Cover is food-grade Polypropylene; straw is soft silicone

GAB-Bee™ KEEPSAKE GIFT BOX SETS

Generation Alpha Babies (GAB) are the inspiration for these two gift box sets. Both sets will include our Keepsake Box, where you can track and keep your baby’s little treasures, important records, stats, special moments, and mémoires during their infancy for posterity and create lasting memories to be passed on to your child.

Get for yourself or give as a gift. Either set will make a great baby shower gift for new moms and expecting parents.

Designed and assembled in the United States with these babies in mind, GAB-bee products are developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials. The custom Keepsake box is made of biodegradable recycled material. The box itself is made of biodegradable recycled material. 

Keepsake Gift Box - Top and Open views

What's in the GAB bee™ Keepsake Gift Box?

GAB Bee™ Keepsake Gift Box contents

  • 3-pc. Baby ensemble - Bamboo fabric Bodysuit, Cap and Bootie
  • 1 Borosilicate Glass Bottle Set
  • 1 Baby Burp Cloth (9"x 20")
  • 7" Hand-Crocheted Andee Toy

GAB bee™ DELUXE KEEPSAKE GIFT BOX

 

GAB-Bee™ Deluxe Gift Box contents

  • GAB-Bee™ Keepsake Gift Box
  • Bamboo Bodysuit Set (LS or SS) (Preorder)
  • Bamboo Romper (LS or SS) (Preorder)
  • Bamboo Face Cloth 6 Pack (10" X 10")

 

NEWLY ADDED - BAMBOO BABY FACE CLOTH

This set of 6 super-soft bamboo baby face cloths are very soft to the touch for delicate skin. Our organic bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and hypoallergenic, quick-drying, and water absorbent. Get for your baby essentials, or these make the perfect baby shower newborn necessities. May also be used on adult faces for removing makeup and facial washcloths.

  • Pack of 6
  • Imported
  • Machine washable
  • Double-stitched edges, self-finished seam
  • Reactive dyed for colorfastness
  • Weight: 32g per piece

Available color choices: Boys, Girls and Neutral

Boys

 

Girls

 

Neutral

 

REWARDS

Our intensions with this crowdfunding campaign are to expand our product line to include the new bodysuit and romper designs available in new color choices, fabric print designs and cute clothing styles for the upcoming fall 2021 & 2022 seasons that are made of eco-friendly, sustainable materials. Pledge now and SAVE 20% or more off MSRP.

When we achieve our funding goal, and the campaign is completed, you will receive a survey via email to choose and specify your options for size, color, sleeve length, (+ any other variants), also to update or confirm your address for delivery, etc.

Two ways to claim your reward and pledge; either click the reward level of your choice at the right, or click “Back This Project” in the top section of this page. You may modify your pledge, contact info, or cancel at any time, up to the campaign ending date.

Please help spread the word and share with others to let them know what to get you and your baby-on-the-way, or with those who are expecting babies or grandkids.

GOALS

$2,500

  • Order Fall 2021/Spring 2022 production of Bamboo baby bodysuits and rompers
  • Offer at least two or more color/pattern options/variants

$20,000

  • Add two or more selections to color/pattern options/variants
  • Join children's tradeshows scheduled in Fall 2021
  • Increase digital and physical marketing

$60,000 OR MORE (STRETCH GOAL)

  • Expand marketplaces, including international
  • Improve fulfillment operations to handle domestic and international orders

The Inventor, Creator, and CEO of EZ-On BaBeez™...“Necessity is the Mother of Invention.” 

My name is Julieta Recometa, the founder and inventor of the EZ-On BaBeez™. I am a wife, mother of 3, and a doting grandmother of 5 grandchildren. 

My professional career of 35 years included extensive travel and working experience with domestic and overseas manufacturers as trade partners for USA retail companies. Specialties: Apparel private label brand design development with QA, sourcing, production, and technical design expertise in sweater knits, cut and sew knits, fashion accessories, intimate apparel, woven tops and bottoms apparel for women's, men's, children, and home textiles.

“Having recently retired, I began to enjoy time with family and 5 beautiful grandchildren. While I loved looking after the grandchildren, changing their diapers was my least favorite. As I’m sure it is for most new moms, dads, babysitters, and daycare personnel.

"The snap closures were always located at the crotch area, making it a struggle to open and close. Unbuttoning the onesie at the bottom, while carefully removing the diaper was always messy and cumbersome. Due to this, the baby would inevitably start to cry.

"If that was a problem for me, I thought it had to be a problem for all new moms, dads, and other grandparents. That was the 'AHA!' moment! There had to be a better way. I decided to put my work experience to good use!” 

– Julieta Recometa

Giving Back

EZ-On BaBeez™ commits to giving back, or paying it forward, to donate 10% of our profits to a Children's Charities, other charitable organizations or hospitals.

Recipients of donations from EZ-On BaBeez™

  • Galisano Children's Hospital - Fort Myers, Florida
  • Shriner's Children's Hospital - Tampa, Florida
  • Hurricane Harvey families- Waco, Texas
  • National Diaper Bank - 2 subsidiary centers,  in Florida 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Babies will continue to be born, hence there may be a continuing demand for baby clothes, and possibly of the same bamboo bodysuit design in different color and style assortments seasonally. Bamboo fabric is soft and cuddly but inherently a strong and long lasting material, hence we expect our baby garments to meet and/or surpass the acceptable life cycle of the garment (government standard is at least up to 50 washes). With proper care, our Bamboo garment will look as good as new and can be worn by a new baby sibling or passed forward to another baby.

Reusability and recyclability

Bamboo fabric is eco-friendly and one of the most sustainable fabric one can have. It is in fact organic and bio-degradable. Bamboo garments are worn for a long time and typically not thrown out, instead may even be donated, hence maybe in use for many years.

Sustainable materials

Bamboo is said to be one of the most sustainable resources in the world. Bamboo grows abundantly in tropical countries and needs very little water to grow. Bamboo is incredibly easy to grow and matures very quickly, hence can easily be made available for many end uses. The production of bamboo fiber can be made in methods that are not harmful to the environment.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our factories are accredit by third party independent inspection companies to meet the requirements of top European and USA retailers. The factory we used are specializing on children's wear production and meets all the regulatory CPSC children's safety standards.

 

PLEASE FOLLOW, SHARE, AND HELP US GROW

You can help us grow and get the word out when you follow our campaign, and when you share our campaign with others directly from Indiegogo by clicking the social media icons below the funding progress bar towards the top of the campaign page. Or, you may want to join our Facebook groups (see links below)...

Like and Follow us on Facebook

Join our Facebook Group 'Bamboo Baby Clothes by EZ-On BaBeez'

Thank you for all of your love and support.

 

************************************************************************************

*Onsie® is a registered trademark of Gerber, Inc, and is not associated with EZ-On BaBeez™ or La Moda Zona, LLC.

**Velcro® is a hook-and-loop fastener. Velcro® is a registered trademark of Velcro Inc, and is not associated with EZ-On BaBeez™ or La Moda Zona, LLC.

Our design has been nominated, and received multiple awards from several baby product organizations and groups, including JPMA, Baby Maternity Magazine, and Creative Child Magazine.
Front waist opening for convenient access to the diaper
Whisper quiet hook and loop fastener
Moisture resistant inside lining

EZ-On BaBeez™ is compliant with US government safety requirements (CPSC).
 
NEW ARRIVALS COMING FALL 2021/SPRING 2022Our innovation continues, as we introduce two romper designs. Winter-weight cotton and Bamboo.For Fall 2021/Spring 2022, we will be introducing some fabulous new color choices for the cotton/spandex blend baby bodysuits. We are also introducing a clothing line made of Bamboo viscose fabric to meet the demands of eco-friendly, sustainable, and natural-resource conscious parents.Super-soft and durable Bamboo Baby BodysuitWe are expanding our product selections to include "New Arrivals" baby accessories, such as glass feeding bottles, stainless steel sippy cups, burp cloths, blankets, and many more products that are eco-friendly, sustainable, and Mother-Earth friendly.Our New Arrivals - Coming Fall 2021With your continued support and contributions, we will steadily move forward to create our Fall 2021 / Spring 2022 designs and colors, and expand our marketing and retail distribution channels. We appreciate you, and all of our loyal supporters. We are excited to bring you more clothing designs and product ideas. NEW IN BAMBOO!Our new bamboo baby bodysuit features long sleeve design, plus all of the quality improvements we made. Our Fall 2021/Spring 2022 bamboo baby bodysuits will be available in both short sleeve and long sleeve, plus new colors.Bamboo Baby Bodysuit with Panda PrintWhy Bamboo?
Bamboo viscose material is naturally antibacterial, antimicrobial, antifungal, hypoallergenic, and UV protection, making it very safe for babies.
Bamboo is lightweight and breathable.
Comfortable to wear for all seasons. The bamboo fabric has insulative properties – keeps your baby cool in summer, warm in winter.

 One of the most eco-friendly, sustainable, natural resources on the planet 
One of the fastest growing plants in the world
Naturally anti-bacterial
Hypoallergenic
Moisture wicking
Insulative - keeps you cool in summer, warm in winter
Luxuriously soft fabric
Lightweight and breathable
Pill-resistant (won't 'pill' like fleece)
Strong and durable fabric fibers
UV protective
 Does not need pesticides or fertilizers to grow

ROMPERS IN BAMBOO AND WINTER-WEIGHT COTTONApplying a similar “Think outside the snaps” innovation as the EZ-On Babeez™ baby bodysuits, we have developed an amazing romper design that will make diaper changes so much easier, by utilizing a full-access, two-way zipper that starts at one foot, up over the waistline, and back down to the other foot. The Bamboo Romper designs will include both long sleeve and short sleeve. And the winter-weight rompers will only come in long sleeves. Both long sleeve styles of the romper’s from newborn size and up to 3-6 months have a built-in mitten at the cuff to protect precious, gentle faces from baby’s sharp fingernails.Romper design will be made available in both winter weight cotton and lightweight bamboo.

Both the rompers and bodysuits work in harmony to give parents and baby care-givers an easy solution to changing your baby’s diaper without having to undress the baby completely, or peel back the outfit like a banana. Watch the video below to see just how easy this makes changing a diaper!
Our products provide a brilliant solution to making diaper changes easier, whether you’re traveling in the car, visiting family and friends, spending a day at the park or at the game. Make diaper changes EZ-on, EZ-off, easy on babies and parents.ECO-FRIENDLY AND SUSTAINABLE BABY PRODUCTSGAB bee™ is a new brand we are introducing. Generation Alpha Baby (GAB) are babies born 2010 – 2030. These babies are born of Millennials and Generation X parents. These parents understand using plastics and other harmful materials may affect their baby’s health and welfare. GAB bee™ baby products are designed and developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials. Plastic-based bottles and other baby products are additionally harmful to babies as they retain contaminants due to their porosity. We're introducing our Borosilicate Glass Baby Feeding Bottle. Organic, Eco-Friendly, preferred by mothers. Also, the silicone nipples are easy to clean, hypoallergenic, and hygienic (silicone does not allow for bacterial growth because it has no open pores). Silicone can be boiled to sanitize and can withstand higher temperatures without off-gassing.Set includes Borosilicate Glass Bottle with Liquid part measurements, Silicone nipple and Polypropylene Cap/Lock Ring & Handle. Also included is a Silicone anti-Colic straw and a Neoprene Sleeve Cover to prevent glass breakage.Borosilicate Glass Feeding Bottles, Nipples and Caps Neoprene cover to absorb impact and protect the bottle. colic straw/siphon systemBOTTLE PRODUCT DETAILSProduct is designed and developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials.
Borosilicate glass bottle is heat and thermal shock resistant
BPA-Free glass

“Anti-colic” silicone straw prevents baby’s from ingesting air, causing distress
Glass bottle is microwave and dishwasher safe (excluding silicone nipple, silicone straw, polypropylene cap/lock ring/handle
Available in 180ml/6oz and 240ml/8oz
180ml/6oz recommended for 3 months+
240ml/8oz recommended for 6 months +

GAB-Bee™ KEEPSAKE GIFT BOX SETSGeneration Alpha Babies (GAB) are the inspiration for these two gift box sets. Both sets will include our Keepsake Box, where you can track and keep your baby’s little treasures, important records, stats, special moments, and mémoires during their infancy for posterity and create lasting memories to be passed on to your child.Get for yourself or give as a gift. Either set will make a great baby shower gift for new moms and expecting parents.Designed and assembled in the United States with these babies in mind, GAB-bee products are developed using eco-friendly, sustainable materials. The custom Keepsake box is made of biodegradable recycled material. The box itself is made of biodegradable recycled material. Keepsake Gift Box - Top and Open viewsWhat's in the GAB bee™ Keepsake Gift Box?GAB Bee™ Keepsake Gift Box contents
3-pc. Baby ensemble - Bamboo fabric Bodysuit, Cap and Bootie

Our organic bamboo is naturally anti-microbial and hypoallergenic, quick-drying, and water absorbent. Get for your baby essentials, or these make the perfect baby shower newborn necessities. May also be used on adult faces for removing makeup and facial washcloths.
