Available color choices: Boys, Girls and NeutralBoys Girls Neutral REWARDSOur intensions with this crowdfunding campaign are to expand our product line to include the new bodysuit and romper designs available in new color choices, fabric print designs and cute clothing styles for the upcoming fall 2021 & 2022 seasons that are made of eco-friendly, sustainable materials. Pledge now and SAVE 20% or more off MSRP.When we achieve our funding goal, and the campaign is completed, you will receive a survey via email to choose and specify your options for size, color, sleeve length, (+ any other variants), also to update or confirm your address for delivery, etc.Two ways to claim your reward and pledge; either click the reward level of your choice at the right, or click “Back This Project” in the top section of this page. You may modify your pledge, contact info, or cancel at any time, up to the campaign ending date.Please help spread the word and share with others to let them know what to get you and your baby-on-the-way, or with those who are expecting babies or grandkids.GOALS$2,500
Order Fall 2021/Spring 2022 production of Bamboo baby bodysuits and rompers
Offer at least two or more color/pattern options/variants
$20,000
Add two or more selections to color/pattern options/variants
Join children's tradeshows scheduled in Fall 2021
Increase digital and physical marketing
$60,000 OR MORE (STRETCH GOAL)
Expand marketplaces, including international
Improve fulfillment operations to handle domestic and international orders
The Inventor, Creator, and CEO of EZ-On BaBeez™...“Necessity is the Mother of Invention.” My name is Julieta Recometa, the founder and inventor of the EZ-On BaBeez™. I am a wife, mother of 3, and a doting grandmother of 5 grandchildren. My professional career of 35 years included extensive travel and working experience with domestic and overseas manufacturers as trade partners for USA retail companies. Specialties: Apparel private label brand design development with QA, sourcing, production, and technical design expertise in sweater knits, cut and sew knits, fashion accessories, intimate apparel, woven tops and bottoms apparel for women's, men's, children, and home textiles.“Having recently retired, I began to enjoy time with family and 5 beautiful grandchildren. While I loved looking after the grandchildren, changing their diapers was my least favorite. As I’m sure it is for most new moms, dads, babysitters, and daycare personnel."The snap closures were always located at the crotch area, making it a struggle to open and close. Unbuttoning the onesie at the bottom, while carefully removing the diaper was always messy and cumbersome. Due to this, the baby would inevitably start to cry."If that was a problem for me, I thought it had to be a problem for all new moms, dads, and other grandparents. That was the 'AHA!' moment! There had to be a better way. I decided to put my work experience to good use!” – Julieta RecometaGiving BackEZ-On BaBeez™ commits to giving back, or paying it forward, to donate 10% of our profits to a Children's Charities, other charitable organizations or hospitals.Recipients of donations from EZ-On BaBeez™
Galisano Children's Hospital - Fort Myers, Florida
Shriner's Children's Hospital - Tampa, Florida
Hurricane Harvey families- Waco, Texas
National Diaper Bank - 2 subsidiary centers,  in Florida 
Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designBabies will continue to be born, hence there may be a continuing demand for baby clothes, and possibly of the same bamboo bodysuit design in different color and style assortments seasonally. Bamboo fabric is soft and cuddly but inherently a strong and long lasting material, hence we expect our baby garments to meet and/or surpass the acceptable life cycle of the garment (government standard is at least up to 50 washes). With proper care, our Bamboo garment will look as good as new and can be worn by a new baby sibling or passed forward to another baby.Reusability and recyclabilityBamboo fabric is eco-friendly and one of the most sustainable fabric one can have. It is in fact organic and bio-degradable. Bamboo garments are worn for a long time and typically not thrown out, instead may even be donated, hence maybe in use for many years.Sustainable materialsBamboo is said to be one of the most sustainable resources in the world. Bamboo grows abundantly in tropical countries and needs very little water to grow. Bamboo is incredibly easy to grow and matures very quickly, hence can easily be made available for many end uses. The production of bamboo fiber can be made in methods that are not harmful to the environment.Environmentally friendly factoriesOur factories are accredit by third party independent inspection companies to meet the requirements of top European and USA retailers. The factory we used are specializing on children's wear production and meets all the regulatory CPSC children's safety standards. PLEASE FOLLOW, SHARE, AND HELP US GROWYou can help us grow and get the word out when you follow our campaign, and when you share our campaign with others directly from Indiegogo by clicking the social media icons below the funding progress bar towards the top of the campaign page. Or, you may want to join our Facebook groups (see links below)...Like and Follow us on FacebookJoin our Facebook Group 'Bamboo Baby Clothes by EZ-On BaBeez'Thank you for all of your love and support. *************************************************************************************Onsie® is a registered trademark of Gerber, Inc, and is not associated with EZ-On BaBeez™ or La Moda Zona, LLC.**Velcro® is a hook-and-loop fastener. Velcro® is a registered trademark of Velcro Inc, and is not associated with EZ-On BaBeez™ or La Moda Zona, LLC.

story:
Thanks to the use of innovative bone conduction technology and a microphone, you can listen to just about anything you’d normally be able to listen to on your phone or through headphones by simply bringing your finger to your ear. This includes social and email notifications, audio and text messages and even phone calls.

The get™ bracelet decodes sound waves and converts them into vibrations that can be received directly by your ear’s cochlea without the use of your eardrum. Get™ also has advanced vocal coordination to make interactions with vocal assistants, like Alexa, Siri and Google, easier than ever.

With get™, your voice is completely in control.



Get™ uses biometric tracking to monitor your physical activity and generate statistics like the amount of calories burned and if you should spend more or less time exercising. It is perfect for those who like to run, bike, canoe or take fitness classes. Get™ uses that biometric data to notify you when it’s time to do routine functions such as drink water or take a quick activity break.

Get™ also tracks your sleep cycles and can notify you when it’s time to wake up or go to sleep. Our technology merges your sleep activity with your biometric parameters, allowing you to always be at your best.
 




 

Get™ provides completely secure contactless payments using NFC technology and your biometric fingerprint authentication for each transaction. Customizable to your specific needs, our device works with all networks.

Credit card details are safely stored inside your wristband, so pickpocketers can’t get™ them out. In addition, get™ provides unfasten detection, which auto locks credit cards and personal info when the bracelet is taken off. No one can use your get™, but you do have the ability to set up multiple users.



Because get™ doesn’t have a touch-display or buttons, it uses gesture recognition to interpret your instructions. This gesture control feature allows get™ to control specific mobile apps. Unique motion sensors allow you to switch between songs, power your smart TV on or off, adjust your Alexa volume or even flip channels.

Get™ uses haptic vibrations, sounds, and LED signals to provide personal, discrete feedback and notifications to you. Feedback is especially useful when communicating navigation directions. Whether you’re driving, running, hiking or biking, get™ can help you get you there. For example, the band will vibrate once to tell you to turn right and two times to let you know to turn left.
 



Get™ introduces an Italian-inspired product that uses an innovative, clean and environmentally friendly welding process. The bracelet is uniquely made with hi-tech fabrics to be seamless, ultralight, and waterproof up to 10 meters deep. We used an original, patented technique to make several layers of durable, laminated fabric into one perfect band.

The battery lasts up to five days on a single charge and takes only one hour to fully charge. Simply drop it on its wireless dock, and you’ll be good to go in no time.







O2Forest is an Italian company that deals with environmental services, eco-sustainable purchases and renewable energy. Through their projects, they commit to restoring man and nature balance in a modern perspective. O2Forest strives to turn everyday habits into eco-sustainable opportunities and projects for everyone. For the first time, people have an effective, simple, fun and environmentally friendly tool that can change the world without too many sacrifices. 

I'm Edoardo Parini, the founder of get™. As a previous media and interaction designer and current product manager, it is my goal to enhance the relationship between human beings and technology.

Get™ was my project diploma at ECAL in 2015. My focus was on Human-Machine Interface — I was not satisfied with existing smartwatches, their usability, and their excessive costs. I tested several different interactive installations and bone conduction was by far the most intriguing and influential. Soon after acknowledging that I wanted to use bone conduction technology in my device, I watched a remarkable video of gesture recognition — I had to find a way to incorporate this additional technology. I decided the wrist/hand area would be an ideal space to exploit gesture recognition and bone conduction together. I started prototyping and before I knew it, the first version of get™ was born.


 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make get™ a reality. 

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a get™, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of! 



There are always certain risks that can arise at any moment during a project like this. That being said, we’re confident in our ability to produce and have taken all the necessary measures. We have a highly qualified team and have partnered with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. We just need your help to bring everything to fruition. Don’t worry, we’re completely prepared to bring get™ to you, and we have the manpower to make it happen, but if anything comes up along the way, you’ll be the first to know.

story:
INTRODUCING THE 1-Z™ with ZIPPERS FOR DAYS!

The world’s only functional onesie with

Patent-pending WhizTech™ easy-zip technology, revolutionizing workwear for when you have to go. 

 

What is the 1-Z and why does the world need it?

Well, as two Hollywood Costumers with over 30-years of experience (combined), we know a lot about wearing coveralls. We've practically lived in them. Yup, that's how we know that most onesies make it almost IMPOSSIBLE to pee. How can that be, we all gotta pee?
 
But, that's not all we know. Fitting people in all shapes and sizes for costumes means we know A LOT about the world's beautiful array of body types, and how to flatter those figures that traditional workwear designs seem to, well, ignore. 
 

Being a worker bee shouldn’t mean holding your pee, or exposing your nee-nee’s, while you sit with your pants below your knees. Being a film crew member, craftsperson, builder, equestrian, artist, planter, maker, shaker, or good old jumpsuit-enthusiast shouldn't mean feeling frumpy, or looking like you came out of a prison movie. 

TADAAAAA!!!

The 1Z is here to make your days doing all the things that much better and brighter.

With the 1-Z... onesie woes are a thing of the past.
 
 
 
 

The Future Has Arrived

And... you've seen all the future movies, what's everyone wearing?

Jeans and t-shirts?

No...they don't have time for that, they're in the future. Who has time to think about clothes that match in the future? 

After over a decade of wearing an assortment of onesies, jumpsuits, rompers, flight suits, mechanic suits, and other random gems found at surplus stores, we reached a pinnacle and decided it was time to develop our own!

We created the 1-Z™ coverall with patent-pending WhizTech™ zipper technology that is not only functional, we think it’s pretty snazzy too.

Our designs combine form and utility for a onesie that works with you, not against you. 

Did we mention POCKETS?

Why do you want one?  Because you'll look GREAT and feel great in our design...and oh yeah...POCKETS!  All the pockets (hands clapping)!

Designed for living large or small! The 1Z is EZ PZ! We gotchu COVERED...now you can think about ALL the incredible things that you can do with your free time. It's effortlessly cool. Free up your mind. Unzip from behind...well technically the side, buuut you get what we're sayin.
 

And.. can you believe it!?  Made in the USA!

 

We've got you covered so you can save your precious mind-power to create, be, and do! 

 
 
 
Our goal is to offer an inclusive size range and with your help it will get us there even quicker!
 

 

WHAT IS WhizTech™?

WhizTech™ is pretty fun to say, but it's more than a cheeky descriptor. It's a real-life acronym. 

Waistline

Hinged 

Innovative

Zipper

Technology 

It's WIZZARDLY, you can take a WIZ in a WHIZZ...WAHOO!
 
Enough wordplay? Fine. 
 

Modern science agrees...

 

WhizTech™ 1Z - patent pending zipper technology when you gotta, you know…

 

So that's the 1-Z™. Let's tell you a bit about ourselves.

WHO WE ARE

We are: Emilea Rivera and Angelique Paull and together -- We Are WELLD!  

We met at work (on-set) many moons ago, and we've been collaborating ever since. 

We are just two average modern gals. We saw a problem and wondered if we could solve it.

We are movers and shakers. Adventure and curiosity are in our DNA and that spills out in the work we do. How could humanity be faced with such a pressing problem (NO WAY TO PEE IN A COVERALL)? And, how could this problem have gone unsolved for so long? We decided to give it a shot and try and find a solution.

We quickly discovered why this problem had not yet been solved, it's actually pretty hard to do.

Here's what we set out to achieve: Design a coverall that...

- Is a completely fresh take on the classic workwear one-piece garment, that unzips at the bootay, and looks rad!

- We could work in all day, that would protect our bods, and make them look as good as humanly possible in a garment that stylishly but effortlessly covers your WHOLE body. 

- Could fit anyone in all the wonderful varieties of shapes and sizes. I.e. extra tall, extra-long arms, long torsos, apple shapes, pear shapes, all fruit shapes.

-We plan for the 1-Z™ to fit everyone! (note: we feel we've encompassed a great array so far and with your contributions to our 1-Z campaign we can continue to refine our patterns for as much size inclusivity as possible!)

- Respects all people involved up and down the supply chain with fair wages, happy working facilities with lots of human kindness. 

-Honors our planet with closed loop production and ways to upcycle our 1Zs

- Embodies our strong ethos and goal of giving back to our community

- Is durable and can be patched, repaired, or repurposed -- rather than just trashed. 

So, yeah. It took a while and at last...

We are: relieved to offer you relief.

 

We've spent the last year designing, re-designing, and finally creating our most perfected prototype for our proprietary 1-Z™. Thus far our business journey has been fully self-funded, hence the reason we're here today.  Did we mention a global pandemic that ground our industry (film) to a halt? We didn't just sit at home, we decided this was the opportunity to bring a decade long vision into fruition!  We are beyond excited to bring more 1-Z's into the world in a multitude of colors, fabrics, shapes and sizes!  In order to do so, WE NEED YOUR HELP :)

We welcome your help to fund and manifest our vision today!

By backing Welld you're contributing to world peace and sponsoring your own invisible, endangered, magical unicorn. We'll send you photos of them monthly so you can place them on your fridge and feel very good about yourself. 

No, that's not true. 

But really, by backing Welld you are putting your money where your mouth is and voting with your wallet for SLOW FASHION that cares about people and this mama planet.

They say, necessity is the mother of all invention, welp -- peeps gotta work and pee!

Together we are solving small problems that make big differences. 

Go on, act as cool as you think you are, and support our first round of production. 

You're bladder (and friends) will thank you later. 

It's time to advance, fellow Beings of our plant!

Zip into the future with WE ARE WELLD

Be part of the onesie revolution, be part of the movement, be part of the Welld Community!

WE ARE WELLD-- visionary solution based enthusiasts merging form, style, & utility. 

 
 
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR BEING PART OF OUR JOURNEY IN THIS VENTURE. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!
Sharing is caring and WE care :)
 
Psst! Check out our Youtube channel for more snippets, out-takes and extended content!
story_txt:
INTRODUCING THE 1-Z™ with ZIPPERS FOR DAYS!

The world’s only functional onesie with
Patent-pending WhizTech™ easy-zip technology, revolutionizing workwear for when you have to go. 
 




What is the 1-Z and why does the world need it?
Well, as two Hollywood Costumers with over 30-years of experience (combined), we know a lot about wearing coveralls. We've practically lived in them. Yup, that's how we know that most onesies make it almost IMPOSSIBLE to pee. How can that be, we all gotta pee?
 
But, that's not all we know. Fitting people in all shapes and sizes for costumes means we know A LOT about the world's beautiful array of body types, and how to flatter those figures that traditional workwear designs seem to, well, ignore. 
 

Being a worker bee shouldn’t mean holding your pee, or exposing your nee-nee’s, while you sit with your pants below your knees. Being a film crew member, craftsperson, builder, equestrian, artist, planter, maker, shaker, or good old jumpsuit-enthusiast shouldn't mean feeling frumpy, or looking like you came out of a prison movie. 
TADAAAAA!!!
The 1Z is here to make your days doing all the things that much better and brighter.

With the 1-Z... onesie woes are a thing of the past.
 
 


 
 

The Future Has Arrived

And... you've seen all the future movies, what's everyone wearing?
Jeans and t-shirts?
No...they don't have time for that, they're in the future. Who has time to think about clothes that match in the future? 
After over a decade of wearing an assortment of onesies, jumpsuits, rompers, flight suits, mechanic suits, and other random gems found at surplus stores, we reached a pinnacle and decided it was time to develop our own!
We created the 1-Z™ coverall with patent-pending WhizTech™ zipper technology that is not only functional, we think it’s pretty snazzy too.

Our designs combine form and utility for a onesie that works with you, not against you. 

Did we mention POCKETS?
Why do you want one?  Because you'll look GREAT and feel great in our design...and oh yeah...POCKETS!  All the pockets (hands clapping)!

Designed for living large or small! The 1Z is EZ PZ! We gotchu COVERED...now you can think about ALL the incredible things that you can do with your free time. It's effortlessly cool. Free up your mind. Unzip from behind...well technically the side, buuut you get what we're sayin.
 
And.. can you believe it!?  Made in the USA!
 

We've got you covered so you can save your precious mind-power to create, be, and do! 


 



 

 

Our goal is to offer an inclusive size range and with your help it will get us there even quicker!
 


 


WHAT IS WhizTech™?
WhizTech™ is pretty fun to say, but it's more than a cheeky descriptor. It's a real-life acronym. 
Waistline
Hinged 
Innovative
Zipper
Technology 
It's WIZZARDLY, you can take a WIZ in a WHIZZ...WAHOO!
 
Enough wordplay? Fine. 
 

Modern science agrees...

 
WhizTech™ 1Z - patent pending zipper technology when you gotta, you know…

 
So that's the 1-Z™. Let's tell you a bit about ourselves.
WHO WE ARE

We are: Emilea Rivera and Angelique Paull and together -- We Are WELLD!  

We met at work (on-set) many moons ago, and we've been collaborating ever since. 

We are just two average modern gals. We saw a problem and wondered if we could solve it.
We are movers and shakers. Adventure and curiosity are in our DNA and that spills out in the work we do. How could humanity be faced with such a pressing problem (NO WAY TO PEE IN A COVERALL)? And, how could this problem have gone unsolved for so long? We decided to give it a shot and try and find a solution.
We quickly discovered why this problem had not yet been solved, it's actually pretty hard to do.
Here's what we set out to achieve: Design a coverall that...
- Is a completely fresh take on the classic workwear one-piece garment, that unzips at the bootay, and looks rad!
- We could work in all day, that would protect our bods, and make them look as good as humanly possible in a garment that stylishly but effortlessly covers your WHOLE body. 
- Could fit anyone in all the wonderful varieties of shapes and sizes. I.e. extra tall, extra-long arms, long torsos, apple shapes, pear shapes, all fruit shapes.
-We plan for the 1-Z™ to fit everyone! (note: we feel we've encompassed a great array so far and with your contributions to our 1-Z campaign we can continue to refine our patterns for as much size inclusivity as possible!)
- Respects all people involved up and down the supply chain with fair wages, happy working facilities with lots of human kindness. 
-Honors our planet with closed loop production and ways to upcycle our 1Zs
- Embodies our strong ethos and goal of giving back to our community
- Is durable and can be patched, repaired, or repurposed -- rather than just trashed. 
So, yeah. It took a while and at last...
We are: relieved to offer you relief.
 
We've spent the last year designing, re-designing, and finally creating our most perfected prototype for our proprietary 1-Z™. Thus far our business journey has been fully self-funded, hence the reason we're here today.  Did we mention a global pandemic that ground our industry (film) to a halt? We didn't just sit at home, we decided this was the opportunity to bring a decade long vision into fruition!  We are beyond excited to bring more 1-Z's into the world in a multitude of colors, fabrics, shapes and sizes!  In order to do so, WE NEED YOUR HELP :)

We welcome your help to fund and manifest our vision today!
By backing Welld you're contributing to world peace and sponsoring your own invisible, endangered, magical unicorn. We'll send you photos of them monthly so you can place them on your fridge and feel very good about yourself. 
No, that's not true. 
But really, by backing Welld you are putting your money where your mouth is and voting with your wallet for SLOW FASHION that cares about people and this mama planet.

They say, necessity is the mother of all invention, welp -- peeps gotta work and pee!
Together we are solving small problems that make big differences. 
Go on, act as cool as you think you are, and support our first round of production. 
You're bladder (and friends) will thank you later. 
It's time to advance, fellow Beings of our plant!
Zip into the future with WE ARE WELLD

Be part of the onesie revolution, be part of the movement, be part of the Welld Community!

WE ARE WELLD-- visionary solution based enthusiasts merging form, style, & utility. 
 


 
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR BEING PART OF OUR JOURNEY IN THIS VENTURE. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO SHARE, SHARE, SHARE!
Sharing is caring and WE care :)
 
Psst! Check out our Youtube channel for more snippets, out-takes and extended content!

story:
At the center of our passion lies the content, as we understand that the hardware is only as good as the media driving it. That’s why we are dedicated to creating memorable experiences that emotionally connect users to content and to do this, we need the hardware in order to showcase the experiences the way we intended.

We want you to emotionally engage with content like never before. Witness every frame, every scene, and every minute detail of content through crystal clear optics that depict a lifelike image for the definitive cinema experience.

LUCI allows you to watch videos, play games and follow your FPV.  You can also use it as an extra monitor for your coding and designing; or an EVF for your camera. 

 

 

Your Immersive Gaming Experience

Portable and Lightweight 

Weighing just 6.35 oz/180g (about as much as a typical pair of ski goggles), LUCI immers is the lightest headset to hit the market. Its low weight ensures there is no strain on your neck or head. This is made even more comfortable by the soft band and felt cushion on the forehead and around the eyes. It is comfortable to wear the headset in a sitting or standing position and even when laying down. 
 

We have Winners: Headband and Crown

Since the conception of LUCI immers, our engineering team has strived to provide the most comfortable head mount design for immers. After rounds of data collection and analysis, including surveys from hundreds of IGG backers, we are confident that we have found the best ways to wear LUCI immers, in our case two winners, Headband and Crown. When we ship our meticulously put-together package to our customers, the Headband will be included, and the Crown can be purchased separately as an add-on item.

 

In our research, we have found that both the headband and crown are glasses-friendly. The headset fits over glasses so that your vision is unchanged while watching content. The headband is relatively easier to carry, and quicker to put on and take off.

 

With the Crown, users enjoy the benefit of switching between different scenarios: You may flip the headset up when taking a short break or chatting with your friends without taking headset off. Then when you are ready, you may easily turn the headset down to resume your immersive experience with immers.

 Adjustable Pupillary Distance 

You can adjust for the distance between your pupils. This results in a crystal-clear high-resolution image that is perfectly suited to you.
story_txt:
At the center of our passion lies the content, as we understand that the hardware is only as good as the media driving it. That’s why we are dedicated to creating memorable experiences that emotionally connect users to content and to do this, we need the hardware in order to showcase the experiences the way we intended.We want you to emotionally engage with content like never before. Witness every frame, every scene, and every minute detail of content through crystal clear optics that depict a lifelike image for the definitive cinema experience.LUCI allows you to watch videos, play games and follow your FPV.  You can also use it as an extra monitor for your coding and designing; or an EVF for your camera. 
Have you ever desired a personal place separate from your home and work life? A stunning, realistic world that you could become totally immersed in. LUCI is the answer. Imagine after a hard day’s work being able to step into an amazing world based on any movie you select. With LUCI, you become an action hero, adventurer or a traveler in the Lord of the Rings Middle Earth. 
With the USB-C connection, LUCI immers allows you to access the games on your smartphones, PCs, laptops and game consoles.Your private cinema, your way. With a 3840x1080 high resolution display and an incredible 3147 pixel density, the viewing experience is as if you were seeing a screen size of 1023” at a 20m viewing distance, similar to sitting in a theater. Every scene and every episode surrounds you like never before.     Your Immersive Gaming Experience
 
With the USB-C connection, LUCI immers allows you to access the games on your smartphones, PCs, laptops, game consoles and others. Take control of your games in an immersive style. The action will be bigger, clearer, and more powerful. Each game becomes an incredible world of fun. With LUCI immers, gaming will never be the same. 
 
 
Universal Connectivity 
You know how good a USB-C can be. Connect your smartphone and laptops through our USB-C port. PCs, laptops, game consoles can easily be connected via HDMI cable. LUCI immers can also connect to Apple devices via the Lightning to USB-C Adapter. 
 

Video & Games 
Connect your streaming boxes and unlock your favorite TV shows, movies, sports and concerts from the mainstream apps. Enjoy your regular programming in a totally new, incredibly immersive way. Your shows have never looked so good!

 
LUCI Home is our official content platform, which supports Windows, Mac OSX, iOS and Android. LUCI immers is compatible with your favorite content from sources you love, including exclusive content created by our team, or locally stored files.
LUCI immers allows you to enjoy all forms of 2D, 3D, 4K, 8K and 360° content. Our content team is striving to deliver the best content to you. Some of our work has been exhibited in Sundance and Cannes Film Festivals. We also created content for well-known corporations, such as Telsa and LinkedIn. 

 


 
 
In order to create the definitive viewing experience, we have created a totally new standard for visual entertainment. After years of collective effort, research, and testing, LUCI has created the “Immersion-On-Demand” (IOD) standard.
Immersion-on-demand (IOD) is characterized by a supergiant visual screen, high resolution, super high pixel density, high contrast ratio, native 3D effect and fast response time. We have perfected a way to balance the above parameters to deliver stunning visual experiences for the latest mainstream content. LUCI immers is designed based on the IOD standard and along with its ingenious engineering innovations, it allows you to enjoy an immersive entertainment experience anytime and anywhere. 
  
LUCI immers is comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Sitting on a bus ride, standing up during a work break, or laying down at home. Our intention is to create products that deliver a comfortable experience. Portable and Lightweight Weighing just 6.35 oz/180g (about as much as a typical pair of ski goggles), LUCI immers is the lightest headset to hit the market. Its low weight ensures there is no strain on your neck or head. This is made even more comfortable by the soft band and felt cushion on the forehead and around the eyes. It is comfortable to wear the headset in a sitting or standing position and even when laying down.    We have Winners: Headband and CrownSince the conception of LUCI immers, our engineering team has strived to provide the most comfortable head mount design for immers. After rounds of data collection and analysis, including surveys from hundreds of IGG backers, we are confident that we have found the best ways to wear LUCI immers, in our case two winners, Headband and Crown. When we ship our meticulously put-together package to our customers, the Headband will be included, and the Crown can be purchased separately as an add-on item. In our research, we have found that both the headband and crown are glasses-friendly. The headset fits over glasses so that your vision is unchanged while watching content. The headband is relatively easier to carry, and quicker to put on and take off. With the Crown, users enjoy the benefit of switching between different scenarios: You may flip the headset up when taking a short break or chatting with your friends without taking headset off. Then when you are ready, you may easily turn the headset down to resume your immersive experience with immers. Adjustable Pupillary Distance You can adjust for the distance between your pupils. This results in a crystal-clear high-resolution image that is perfectly suited to you. 
0.7 inch Micro-OLED displays, 3147 PPI, 6 times the pixel density of cell phones
 

With rounds of product iteration, we reduced the weight of the lens group, achieved 70°FOV and realized clear images without blurry edges. 

Hundreds of components condensed in one slim body.
 

To truly enjoy long viewing sessions, comfort is essential. We have analyzed extensive data modeling and testing to make your every contact with LUCI immers enjoyable.

We reduced the body weight from 280g to 180g. We shrunk the size to one-third of comparable wearables on the market.
 
 

 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
About LUCI
LUCI is committed to creating content, developing partnerships, and forming communities that drive humanity to new horizons. LUCI believes people crave personal growth through immersive experiences which drive feelings of inspiration, discovery, escape, and happiness. We believe technology and content are stepping stones to achieve deep personal growth and development. We understand that everyone needs a third-place separate from home and the workplace, where you can be yourself. LUCI immers provides you the most feasible approach to immerse in your personal place. Even during short periods of free time, you can dive into the entertainment experience. You no longer have to settle for anything less than perfection. We want to provide an uncompromised product, service and experience to our end-users because we cherish every interaction with you along the lifelong customer journey.The fruits of the labor of our team have yielded the immers, and with your help, we can shape the future of the entertainment experience and make it a reality. We hope you enjoy using it as we have enjoyed building it.  
Risks and challenges
With our years of experience in the headset industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for LUCI.
However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them. For instance, our product includes Bluetooth gadget, which makes it more difficult to ship. In order to ship products safely, it takes a bit more time. Therefore, the speed of shipping may vary from different countries. Our team is making arrangements to expedite shipping now so that we can provide the best service for our backers when we reach our funding goal.
LUCI immers Production Photo

story:
Lightweight, Water Resistant, Heated Hoodie 

Quick heating pockets

Who has never suffered from having to text with their hands frozen? Two heating pockets with dynamic power adjustment keep you warm in any condition. So slide your hands inside and warm yourself up!   

 

Hoodie & backpack

And what if the opposite happens? It’s getting too hot for a hoodie and you’re not very enthusiastic about dragging it in your hands for the rest of the day.  Not a problem! Just convert your hoodie into a backpack within seconds, and keep your hands free while gaining some additional storage.

 

Cycling back pocket

If you’re a cyclist, or you just happen to get on your bike from time to time, you probably know the struggle of accessing your pockets. We bet you will appreciate a safe pocket for your valuables with easy access to the phone, whenever needed.

 

Blackout hood

The cities grow and grow, and public places can be crowded and overwhelming. Sometimes, you really need your space to calm down and focus. Here is your way to isolate yourself from whatever is happening around you: a blackout hood!

 


An RFID blocker

A special pocket that protects your personal data from being stolen by an RFID reader.

 

Velcro for a personalized patch 

 

Face mask

Designed for pandemic times: a neck gaiter, velcro-fastened to the hoodie, so you never lack a face cover when outside. Stay safe and healthy!

 

Practical design

16 pockets, thumb holes, air vents, a KeyChain, holes for headphone cables, built-in microfiber cloth for smartphones or glasses, and even more hidden goodies that you will appreciate in time of need.

 

Water repellent coating

 

Premium clothing

Our pieces are created 100% within the European Union, subject to the highest production standards and all the recycling-related requirements. We use breathable fabrics and nanotechnology textile finishing. Hoodies are made of 90% cotton and 10% polyester and brushed inside for extra softness. We draw abundantly from sportswear solutions when it comes to practicality, lightness, and comfort. 

 

 

Manifesto

 

Team

 

Who are we?

In short, you could call us a group of functional fashion freaks, excited and inspired by the gaming subculture, as well as technological advancements. We love geek culture and premium clothing with a streetwear twist.

Among us, you'll find: an entrepreneur who founded quite a few global brands, such as ALLPlayer or Woolet, a creator and manager of fashion brands amassed under the HubStyle umbrella, and a designer who gained exp points while working with biggest sportswear companies.

We were brought together by our love for functionality, minimalism, and tech innovations. We are fascinated by the changes happening around the world and we believe that fashion needs to follow – to answer new problems and needs. How it looks should be as important as how it works!

Risks & Challenges

Well, it's not the first time we introduce a new product to the market via Kickstarter. We are experienced entrepreneurs who created dozens of successful brands. Fashion retail has been our everyday reality for 20 years, so we know very well how to execute and deliver. The Jay23 brand already exists, and it has all the infrastructure necessary to work.

And so, under usual circumstances, there would be close to zero potential risks here. However, the pandemic has changed how the world works and operates. The whole production process takes place locally and with the use of locally sourced materials, so, thankfully, we shouldn't encounter any delays, caused by e.g. closed borders, before shipment starts. But potential shipment issues could appear if the pandemic forces specific transit regulations between countries.

Also, regardless of the pandemic, bank holidays or customs in your country could delay your receiving of the product. In any case, we promise to keep you informed. Our policy here is full transparency.

story:
Hi, we are shoegloves, the stylish, super fitting and durable shoe covers for indoors. shoegloves are for all those who want to leave a respectful and clean impression at their customers’  or friends’ homes.

Say goodbye to using disposable or poor fitting one size fits all shoe covers. shoegloves look like elegant sneakers and the tight fit makes them safer than most shoe covers.

Features

  • patented closing mechanism - put on and tighten in seconds
  • can be operated with one hand
  • reusable and washable
  • best quality and workmanship - very durable
  • all materials are made in Europe
  • produced in Portugal
  • storage bag included

 

Application examples

Show appreciation to your customers with shoegloves and leave a positive and clean impression.

Suitable for:

  • handymen
  • real estate agents
  • interior designers 
  • outpatient nursing services
  • moving companies
  • insurance agents

Protect your objects from wear and dirt by using shoegloves.

Suitable for:

  • real estate agents
  • car dealerships
  • shipyards
  • moving companies
  • museums
  • private household
  • your private car
  • storing sport shoes
  • the visit of kindergartens

 

What kind of shoe cover are you wearing?

 

The shoegloves principle

shoegloves offer an easy entry and a snug fit

 

shoegloves come with two different soles types

Notice: The final material for the anti-slip sole has not yet been selected, as tests for ISO certification are still running.

 

What We Need

  • We need € 15.000 in order to bring shoegloves to the market, as now the patterns and tools for all shoe sizes need to be produced and the first orders need to be placed. 
  • Also we plan to certify the shoegloves according to the needed features of norm EN ISO 20347 so that you can use the shoegloves for your business.

 

& What You Get

  • You get stylish, super fitting and durable shoe covers for indoors and on top a handy storage bag.
  • shoegloves are made of high quality materials, so you can wash them in the washing machine.
  • You can choose the size of shoegloves. Two shoe sizes are covered by one size of the shoegloves. The size of the shoegloves matches to your  actual shoe size. So if you have shoes in size 43 or 44, you can order the shoegloves with the size 43/44.

The availible shoe sizes are:

  • 47/48
  • 45/46
  • 43/44
  • 41/42
  • 39/40
  • 37/38
  • 35/36
  • 33/34
  • 31/32
  • 29/30
  • 27/28
  • 25/26

The shoegloves are available in 3 colours:

  • black/black
  • beige/black
  • marine blue/black

After ordering you can choose the size and colour. No worry about this :)

 

Be aware of the regulations regarding overshoes in your country. They may not be worn over safety shoes if they are part of PPE.

 

The Impact

There are two different impacts of the shoegloves

  1. You make a good impression on your customers or hosts. Especially in business, shoegloves can be the deciding factor that you get the order.

  2. Help to reshape the world of shoe covers, making them more sustainable.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have successfully overcome the first hurdles and have managed to develop the final product. We have also found an established supplier on the market who is able to produce high volumes.
To make the sole slip-resistant according to ISO 13287 and to certify it, we are currently still looking for the right material.
Also we like to certify the shoegloves according the needed features of EN ISO 20347 that you can use the shoegloves for business applications.

SHIPPING FROM Europe: EU duty free

EU countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain and Sweden.  Products will be shipped from Portugal or Germany. If your shipping address is any of these 27 countries you will NOT have to pay any additional duties, taxes or vat, we got you covered!

Rest of the world: You may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes; it will depend on the import policies of your Country. We recommend talking to custom or border authorities for more information as taxes vary from country to country. If you order from outside the EU, the shipping costs are very high. Therefore, an order is worthwhile only for larger quantities.

Customs - We don't pretend to have intimate customs knowledge of the entire world. We'll work hard to avoid your rewards getting held up at customs, but in the end we can't guarantee you won't experience delays or be charged. There's always a risk. There will no doubt be some twists and turns in the road ahead, but with your help, we'll all arrive at our respective destinations faster, happier, and more productive.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know friends or acquaintances who work in one of the above mentioned professions, we would be very happy if you tell them about this project. Just share this link or post it on facebook, instagram or other social media platforms: https://igg.me/at/shoegloves

 

If you have further questions, like special B2B requests, you can contact us via email: info@shoegloves.de

www.shoegloves.de

 

The Team

& What You Get

You get stylish, super fitting and durable shoe covers for indoors and on top a handy storage bag.
shoegloves are made of high quality materials, so you can wash them in the washing machine.
You can choose the size of shoegloves. Two shoe sizes are covered by one size of the shoegloves. The size of the shoegloves matches to your  actual shoe size. So if you have shoes in size 43 or 44, you can order the shoegloves with the size 43/44.

The availible shoe sizes are:

47/48
45/46
43/44
41/42
39/40
37/38
35/36
33/34
31/32
29/30
27/28
25/26

The shoegloves are available in 3 colours:

black/black
beige/black
marine blue/black

After ordering you can choose the size and colour. No worry about this :)
 
Be aware of the regulations regarding overshoes in your country. They may not be worn over safety shoes if they are part of PPE.
 

The Impact
There are two different impacts of the shoegloves

You make a good impression on your customers or hosts. Especially in business, shoegloves can be the deciding factor that you get the order.

Help to reshape the world of shoe covers, making them more sustainable.

 

Risks & Challenges
We have successfully overcome the first hurdles and have managed to develop the final product. We have also found an established supplier on the market who is able to produce high volumes.To make the sole slip-resistant according to ISO 13287 and to certify it, we are currently still looking for the right material.Also we like to certify the shoegloves according the needed features of EN ISO 20347 that you can use the shoegloves for business applications.
SHIPPING FROM Europe: EU duty free
EU countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Republic of Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain and Sweden.  Products will be shipped from Portugal or Germany. If your shipping address is any of these 27 countries you will NOT have to pay any additional duties, taxes or vat, we got you covered!
Rest of the world: You may have to pay additional import duties or other applicable taxes; it will depend on the import policies of your Country. We recommend talking to custom or border authorities for more information as taxes vary from country to country. If you order from outside the EU, the shipping costs are very high. Therefore, an order is worthwhile only for larger quantities.
Customs - We don't pretend to have intimate customs knowledge of the entire world. We'll work hard to avoid your rewards getting held up at customs, but in the end we can't guarantee you won't experience delays or be charged. There's always a risk. There will no doubt be some twists and turns in the road ahead, but with your help, we'll all arrive at our respective destinations faster, happier, and more productive.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you know friends or acquaintances who work in one of the above mentioned professions, we would be very happy if you tell them about this project. Just share this link or post it on facebook, instagram or other social media platforms: https://igg.me/at/shoegloves
 
If you have further questions, like special B2B requests, you can contact us via email: info@shoegloves.de
www.shoegloves.de
 
The Team

story:
A Swiss company that fights for the ocean.

We produce performance and sustainable swimwear for Men and Women made from plastic that pollutes our oceans.

Made for all water lover. Whether you are a pro or a more casual swimmer, this is for you. 

 

"It feels like a second skin! So comfortable . Plus it fights against the ocean pollution. What else?"

- Nicolas Zoulalian (National swimmer, Multiple 50M Swiss Freestyle champion)

 

"What struck me is how smooth and durable the fabric is."

- Alex Ogbonna (National swimmer, 50M Swiss Butterfly champion)

 

"Finally a swimsuit that matches my expectation."

Mael Allegrini (National swimmer, 50M Swiss Breastroke champion)

 

"They are like a second skin, comfortable and stretch?"

- Elisabetta Cecchet (Swiss Water Polo Women team Captain - Lausanne)

 

" Beautiful colors, a super smooth fabric and a logo that rocks."

-Camille Fasel (Swiss Elite Swimmer - Vevey )

 

"The swimming suit is so comfortable ! It's like swimming naked !"

- Fatima (Swim Coach - Geneva ) 

 

8 000 000 pieces of plastic enter the ocean every day.

640 000 tons of industrial fishing nets harm millions of sea birds  and sea mammals every year.

Enough. It's time to fight for our oceans.  

 

x

The ICON is the brief style for MEN. Iconic, timeless, legendary.

Swimsuit for MEN. 

  • Classic brief style. 
  • Full lining (Front and Back Lining for increased durability).
  • Subliminated waistband.
  • Nylon regenerated pull cords.
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2 x2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, ML (see size charts).
  • Colors : Black, Wine, Navy, Mint
 

The ADEPT is the Low-waist style for MEN. Modern, athletic, epic. 

Swimsuit for MEN.

  • Modern cut (low-waist) trunk style. 
  • Full lining (Front and Back Lining for increased durability).
  • Subliminated waistband.
  • Nylon regenerated pull cords.
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2 x2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, ML (see size charts).
  • Colors : Black, Wine, Navy, Mint

The PARTISAN is the Jammer style for MEN. Performance, power, dedication. 

Swimsuit for MEN. 

  • For those who looks for a better coverage.
  • Extra light and stretch for freedom of movement.
  • Subliminated waistband.
  • Nylon regenerated pull cords.
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, ML (See size charts).
  • Colors : Black, Wine, Navy, Mint

 

All our male models (athletic build) on photo wears the ML size.

If you are unsure, note that our swimwear are stretchable so they will adapt to most body profiles.

  • L size will fit larger build
  • ML size will fit most swimmer body types (regular to large).
  • M will fit athletic builds but that like a tighter fit.
  • S will fit the thinner build
  • XS will fit junior (+12y old)

The VALKYRIE is a one piece fixed back for WOMEN. Athletic and light for the performer. 

Swimsuit for WOMEN. 

  • One piece fixed back laces.
  • Open back.
  • Full lining (Front and Back Lining for increased durability).
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2 x2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, ML (See charts).
  • Colors : Black, Burgundy, Navy, Mint

 

The ASHLEY is a one piece fixed back for WOMEN. All-arround and strong, perfect for all situations.

Swimsuit for WOMEN. 

  • One piece crossed back laces.
  • Wide open back.
  • Full lining (Front and Back Lining for increased durability).
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2 x2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, L(See charts).
  • Colors : Black, Burgundy, Navy, Mint

The LEENA is a one piece crossed laced back for WOMEN. Sharp and fun for the water lover with a tighter fit.

Swimsuit for WOMEN. 

  • One piece crossed laced back. 
  • Wide open back.
  • Full lining (Front and Back Lining for increased durability).
  • Weight fabric : 190G/m2 x2.
  • Fabric composition : 78% Regenerated Nylon / 22% Elasthane.
  • Made of nylon 6 regenerated from post-consumer plastic and fishing nets.
  • Approved by Elite swimmers.
  • Size S, M, L (See charts).
  • Colors : Black, Burgundy, Navy, Mint

 

 

 

All our female models in photos wears the M size.

If you are unsure, note that our swimwear are stretchable so they will adapt to most body profiles.

  • L size will fit larger build
  • ML size will fit most swimmer body types (regular to large).
  • M will fit athletic builds but that like a tighter fit.
  • S will fit the thinner build
  • XS will fit junior (+12y old)

 

Look good inside and outside the pool with our streetwear collection. 

Hoodie Unisex 

  • 100% Organic cotton, 330 GSM
  • Heavy hoodie 
  • Perfect for running outside in the cold, chilling at home or keeping warm between races.
  • Colors : 
  • Red
  • White
  •  Size : S, M, L

Training jogger

  • 100% Organic cotton, 330 GSM
  • Zipped pocket to keep your valuables when you run
  • Perfect for your training and running in the gym, being outside in the cold or keeping warm between two races.
  • Colors : Black
  •  Size : M, L

T-Shirt Men

  • 100% Combed organic cotton, 150 GSM
  • Feel fresh and feel good in this 100% organic cotton. Perfect for everyday use.
  • Colors : 
  • White
  • Black
  •  Size : M, L

Leggings women

  • 90%Nylon/10%Spandex 160GSM
  • Perfect for your training and running in the gym, outside in the cold or to keep warm between two races.
  • Colors : 
  • Red
  •  Black
  •  Size : M, L

Tops women

  • 90%Nylon/10%Spandex 160GSM
  • Perfect for your training and running in the gym, outside in the cold or to keep warm between two races.
  • Includes removable breast padding.
  • Colors : Red, Black
  •  Size : S, M, L

T-Shirt Women

  • 100% Combed organic cotton, 150 GSM
  • Feel fresh and feel good in this 100% organic cotton. Perfect for everyday use.
  • Colors : White, Black
  •  Size : S, M, L

 

Swim Cap PRO Unisex

  •  100% Silicon 60G 
  • +40% more dense than regular swim caps for increased durability
  • Mat texture so it will not slide on your head
  • Certified SGS (will not release any harmful substances in the environment)
  • Colors : White, Black
  •  Size : One size

Neck Warmer

  • 100% Recycled Polyester
  • Ultra-light, breathable.
  • Wind and dust stopper
  • Keep warm for outdoor activities
  • Perfect for your outdoor activities. In some places it is authorized as an alternative to the mask (please check and comply with your local law).
  • Colors : Black
  •  Size : One size.

Waterproof DRY BAG 25L

  • Made of durable recycled PVC.
  • 100 % Waterproof, tested under heavy rain and snow.
  • Will keep your valuables dry at all times.
  • Perfect for going to the gym or to the pool.
  • Colors : 
  • Blue
  •  Size : One Size (25L)

Get the ultimate SHARK REBELLION package for 250 CHF (-35% OFF total value 388.-CHF)

  • 1x Swimwear Men or Women
  • 1x Waterproof zipper sleeve
  • 1x Swim Cap
  • 1x Neck Warmer
  • 1x Hoodie
  • 1x Jogger or Legging/Top set
  • 1x T-Shirt
  • 1x DRY BAG
  • TOTAL : 250.- CHF instead of 388.- CHF (-35%)

We want to prove that it is possible to make sustainable products without compromising on performance. 

Our ultimate goal is to raise awareness about ocean pollution 

We are a proud partner of the NGO HEALTHY SEAS. We share a portion of our profits with them to support their operations to raise awareness and decrease ocean pollution.

We give education workshops to raise awareness about plastic pollution in our oceans. 

We believe that solutions comes with education.

https://www.healthyseas.org/2020/11/02/fight-for-the-ocean-join-shark-rebellion/

We are partner of the Fondation Jan & Oscar, a humanitarian NGO born after the devastating tsunami in December 26th 2004. They have many missions, including helping children in Thaïland access education. They also actively fights ocean pollution and regularly lead beach cleaning activities.

https://www.fondationjan-oscar.ch/en/explore/mission-en/

 

SHARK REBELLION is the initiative of Hoàn NGUYEN-XUAN, a French-Swiss engineer, swimmer and certified PADI Rescue Diver living in Lausanne (Switzerland). 

During his Rescue Diver exam in open water, he was covered by plastic brought in by current. 

Angry and heartbroken, he decided that it was enough and SHARK REBELLION was born.

Passionated about Design, sustainability and sport, Hoàn believes that sport is one of the strongest platform to raise awareness on the ever growing ocean pollution and concerns.

story:
* update 28/10/2021 - 

There is a 10 days cooling off period set by Indiegogo now so new pledges are ready to ship after the 10 days cooling period is completed and pledge locked.    For backers that have not redeemed their coupon codes from the earlier batches, please do so asap as its been more than a year and more than 8 reminder emails have already been sent out.  Shipping cost has increased significantly since then and we would not be able to offer heavily subsidized shipping much further.

A gentle reminder that a new Singapore team has taken over the running of the V1 Mjolnir from the disfunct USA team.  The SG team have improved V1 with V2 and the currents pledges will be the upgraded V2s.   For backers with the phased out V1, the SG team will continue to assist.  Stay healthy and safe!

 

* update 20/04/2021 -  Due to the pandemic, our suppliers are experiencing a shortage in specific fabric colors (black / red / silver).  Therefore we are currently unable to craft these colors.   Time marine, Orange and Space blue is available for pre-order on Indiegogo.

Youtube links to the new V2 is here if you missed the previous update on the comments wall

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8xyp6tsf1k

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbI-UhsEhzk

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZG-KcSad1j0

* update 15/10/2020 - 

Current pledges are ready to ship approx a week after you pledge and pledged locked.    For backers that have not redeemed their coupon codes from the earlier batches, please do so asap as its been close to a year and more than 8 reminder emails have already been sent out.  

*update 16/07/2020 - 

1.  Production of V2 is complete and would be collected by the shippers next week.  Look out for the email with your tracking details and ensure the address is correct & that there would be someone to collect it to minimize mail theft / unclaimed mails / return mails.   Stay healthy & safe! 

2. Till date, there were at least 8 email reminders sent out to the initial backers group to provide their shipping details, color selection and quantity by redeeming their coupon code.  There are a handful that have not done, please help us reduce monthly warehousing & stock management costs by redeeming them as soon as possible.  Do contact us at feb29llc@gmail.com if you need help as per our Jan 6th update.

*update 04/2020 -  Due to the pandemic lockdown, production of V2 was delayed, we estimate shipping for V2 to be in July 2020.   Do contact us at feb29llc@gmail.com if you need help as per our Jan 6th update.   Stay healthy & safe! 

*update 03/2020 -  All redeemed orders have been shipped out.  Due to project progress updates since launch, some information on this page maybe outdated.  Please read our updates tab for the latest happenings.

*update 09/2019 -   We have appointed our V1 distributor for Japan, therefore indiegogo orders for V1 after 09/2019 will not be accepted & shipped to Japan.  V2 can be ordered via indiegogo

A gentle reminder to ONLY contact us through feb29llc@gmail.com.  There are too many avenues where customers can contact us i.e. messenger, facebook, comments board etc which will translate to missed replies.

We do not want to missed any contacts hence we'll focus on replying via feb29llc@gmail.com since it would provide more efficient reply management.  i.e. bulletin board, KS and IGG messengers are unable to attach pictures ot videos.   Comments replies getting pushed downwards etc...

 

 

 

 

Yes...we are worthy....*lol*

 

 

 

Feedback from > 6000 people survey can't be wrong, right? 

These are the top 4 essentials our respondents wanted in a wallet.

1.  Efficient Features

2.  Good Looks

3.  Affordable

4. Slim

If that's what our backers want, we'll make you guys a fxxxking great wallet.

 

 

 

Just chuck in your loose change like how you receive them. Mjolnir would separate them into their respective places!

 

 

 

 

"Ejecting" has become our fidget hobby...

 

a "sticky" wallet is better than a missing wallet

 

 

 

 

SIM + SDHC + SIM TOOL SLOTS

 

 

 

 

immigration forms, cheques or even a love letter for that girl across your desk...maybe

 

 

 

Sticks to ferrometals & you get a instant phone stand!

 

safe for black magnetic strip technology, tested with most major bank atm cards too

 

 

 

Load Testing / tensile strength - btw we don't have any idea why we need our wallet to be stronger than steel...?

 

 

 

All wallet campaigns must have a picture of water sprayed on it... pretty much like a bikini model huh?

card ejector fits 10 cards without raised letters and 5 cards with. Hidden slot fits up to another 2.

NON RFID SHIELD AREA   =   CONVENIENT FOR QUICK TAP CARDS

RFID SHIELD AREA   =    SECURITY FOR YOUR CREDIT CARDS 

 

 

"Extremely functional for a slim wallet!  I fxxxking love it! "   

- Alex Ferdinand, Stock Broker

"Love the unisex design and how it's so functional like a swiss army knife "  

 - Coleen  Gacia, Educator

"Perfect balance between functionality, aesthetics and affordibility! "   

- Scott Easwood, Bartender 

"I got my hands on a early prototype 6 months ago & it's still working great! "   

- Minny, Loyal kickstarter backer

 

       Just imagine the 'LIKES' you'll get from your 8 followers instagram account!  Impressive!

                    

 

 Looks so good that you just want to take it to bed.....sometimes....   

 

 

Big enough for the huge 10,000 yen too

 

 

 

 

We'll be showcasing cool add on options after the campaign ends hence shipping weight may change. Therefore, you will not need to pay for shipping yet until your order is finalized  (for V1 batch)

*update -  V2 orders will be finalized on Indiegogo, no add ons would be made available via indiegogo orders for simplicity.

Why 'NO' to bulky + expensive wallets?

I thought it wouldn't happen to me and all the negative publicity about bulky wallets aggravating back/spine issues were just a hype to buy expensive slim wallets.

Well...it DID happened to me.

It took the surgeon a couple of hours of slicing and dicing to remove these spinal disc that were pressing on my nerves.

Actual pictures of my removed spinal disc and ops site. Yup, fxxxking bad experience..

 

 

 

I once had an EXPENSIVE smart tracking wallet too...

it was supposed to alert me when my wallet went out of bluetooth range,

until I found out that the bluetooth range can be from 10  to 91 metres.

and that's how my wallet got out of the bar without a squeak from the alarm.

 

Even if it rang earlier, I doubt I would have spotted the pickpocket with a room full of partying people...

"Hey, no sweat, I've got GPS tracking too, I'm going to track down this pickpocket!"

The tracker was working well, I tracked it to the trash bin a block down the street.

Now, I've got an EMPTY + SMELLY expensive smart wallet.

 Do you really an expensive smart wallet?  

 

                                       -  JUST HOW MUCH CAN MJOLNIR FIT? -

 

                                          So now....is mjolnir worthy for you?

                         -  IMPROVED CARD SEAT = MINIMIZE CARD FALL OUTS  -

 

Need the latest instruction guides?   Check out the youtube channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChrcoJwBvf1ruClWn_sa3lw/videos​

 

Why on Kickstarter + Indiegogo?

We migrated from traditional mall retailing to Kickstarter because it gives us the 'freedom'  to run our small business exactly how we want.  No exorbitant rents, no expensive "contract" renovations, no expensive marketing, no hidden agendas which prevents us from giving our supporters the best value.

This means we can focus on doing what we love: designing & crafting the things to make your lives better.

This is our 4th Kickstarter project since 2016 and our supporters have steered the direction of our product development & design processes with their valuable feedback.  This symbiotic relationship between us, kickstarter and our supporters should be how the World be like.  A win-win for all.

Thank you for coming on this journey with us.  =)

 

OUR HUMBLE WORKSHOP 

 

 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

With 3 successful campaigns fulfilled, this is our 4th Kickstarter campaign since 2016.

With the experience gathered, we are confident that we will be able to deliver on our promises. Even if things goes southwards, we promise to give you full transparency and solve them in a way that leaves our backers happy and proud to support us.

Manufacturing Risk: Along the supply chain, our part suppliers may run out of raw materials, sometimes something along the way breaks and takes a couple of days to fix. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to craft our products. Should the response by overwhelming, production & shipping would be done in batches and delivery dates would be extended accordingly.
There maybe slight variation of colors during manufacturing, if it is not within our tolerance or not manufactured by the fabric factory, we will remove the stretch goal color selection and offer another color option for our backers.

Shipping Risk: Shipping world wide is no easy feat. Our experienced fulfillment partners would do their best. If you live down the dust path in the middle of nowhere, do allow more time for your pledge to reach you.  

Our default method for shipping is tracked shipping for accountability, however depending on different postal services, the accuracy and frequency of location updates may vary.

We advise customers to opt for the $1 insurance topup, as we are unable to be responsible for stolen or missing packages once your packages are sent out and tracked by the respective shippers.  i.e. USPS, DHL, Domestic postage services.   Kindly email us at feb29llc@gmail.com immediately after your order to request.

Design:  We are constantly fine tuning our designs hence Mjolnir maybe delivered to you with changes / upgrades which may not be reflected in our kickstarter page

Legal & Political Risk: If someone powerful somewhere increases tax or tariffs that we are unable to absorb, we'll need to spread that cost to bring mjolnir to life.  We've done our due diligence to the best of our abilities to minimize any legal liability, we'll update our backers if any pops up along the way.  No matter what, we'll get through it together.  


Duty/VAT charges: “In this world, nothing can be said to be certain except Death and Taxes” - Benjamin Franklin. Do check with your local customs & tax office.

Expectations: We want our backers to experience helpful designs at affordable prices.  We know nothing is perfect and we will constantly improve our designs with the feedback that backers give us.
It may not be perfect but it's still a fxxxking great wallet!

Thanks & shoutouts:
Thanks to  Truxillogical for your awesome chibi avengers drawings.  =)
Our prototype testers - thank you for your feedback - you helped us make a fxxxking great wallet!
story_txt: * update 28/10/2021 - There is a 10 days cooling off period set by Indiegogo now so new pledges are ready to ship after the 10 days cooling period is completed and pledge locked.    For backers that have not redeemed their coupon codes from the earlier batches, please do so asap as its been more than a year and more than 8 reminder emails have already been sent out.  Shipping cost has increased significantly since then and we would not be able to offer heavily subsidized shipping much further.A gentle reminder that a new Singapore team has taken over the running of the V1 Mjolnir from the disfunct USA team.  The SG team have improved V1 with V2 and the currents pledges will be the upgraded V2s.   For backers with the phased out V1, the SG team will continue to assist.  Stay healthy and safe! * update 20/04/2021 -  Due to the pandemic, our suppliers are experiencing a shortage in specific fabric colors (black / red / silver).  Therefore we are currently unable to craft these colors.   Time marine, Orange and Space blue is available for pre-order on Indiegogo.Youtube links to the new V2 is here if you missed the previous update on the comments wallhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D8xyp6tsf1khttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MbI-UhsEhzkhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZG-KcSad1j0* update 15/10/2020 - Current pledges are ready to ship approx a week after you pledge and pledged locked.    For backers that have not redeemed their coupon codes from the earlier batches, please do so asap as its been close to a year and more than 8 reminder emails have already been sent out.  *update 16/07/2020 - 1.  Production of V2 is complete and would be collected by the shippers next week.  Look out for the email with your tracking details and ensure the address is correct & that there would be someone to collect it to minimize mail theft / unclaimed mails / return mails.   Stay healthy & safe! 2. Till date, there were at least 8 email reminders sent out to the initial backers group to provide their shipping details, color selection and quantity by redeeming their coupon code.  There are a handful that have not done, please help us reduce monthly warehousing & stock management costs by redeeming them as soon as possible.  Do contact us at feb29llc@gmail.com if you need help as per our Jan 6th update.*update 04/2020 -  Due to the pandemic lockdown, production of V2 was delayed, we estimate shipping for V2 to be in July 2020.   Do contact us at feb29llc@gmail.com if you need help as per our Jan 6th update.   Stay healthy & safe! *update 03/2020 -  All redeemed orders have been shipped out.  Due to project progress updates since launch, some information on this page maybe outdated.  Please read our updates tab for the latest happenings.*update 09/2019 -   We have appointed our V1 distributor for Japan, therefore indiegogo orders for V1 after 09/2019 will not be accepted & shipped to Japan.  V2 can be ordered via indiegogoA gentle reminder to ONLY contact us through feb29llc@gmail.com.  There are too many avenues where customers can contact us i.e. messenger, facebook, comments board etc which will translate to missed replies.We do not want to missed any contacts hence we'll focus on replying via feb29llc@gmail.com since it would provide more efficient reply management.  i.e. bulletin board, KS and IGG messengers are unable to attach pictures ot videos.   Comments replies getting pushed downwards etc...    Yes...we are worthy....*lol*   Feedback from > 6000 people survey can't be wrong, right? These are the top 4 essentials our respondents wanted in a wallet.1.  Efficient Features2.  Good Looks3.  Affordable4. SlimIf that's what our backers want, we'll make you guys a fxxxking great wallet.   Just chuck in your loose change like how you receive them. Mjolnir would separate them into their respective places!    "Ejecting" has become our fidget hobby... a "sticky" wallet is better than a missing wallet    SIM + SDHC + SIM TOOL SLOTS    immigration forms, cheques or even a love letter for that girl across your desk...maybe   Sticks to ferrometals & you get a instant phone stand! safe for black magnetic strip technology, tested with most major bank atm cards too   Load Testing / tensile strength - btw we don't have any idea why we need our wallet to be stronger than steel...?   All wallet campaigns must have a picture of water sprayed on it... pretty much like a bikini model huh?card ejector fits 10 cards without raised letters and 5 cards with. Hidden slot fits up to another 2.NON RFID SHIELD AREA   =   CONVENIENT FOR QUICK TAP CARDSRFID SHIELD AREA   =    SECURITY FOR YOUR CREDIT CARDS   "Extremely functional for a slim wallet!  I fxxxking love it! "   - Alex Ferdinand, Stock Broker"Love the unisex design and how it's so functional like a swiss army knife "   - Coleen  Gacia, Educator"Perfect balance between functionality, aesthetics and affordibility! "   - Scott Easwood, Bartender "I got my hands on a early prototype 6 months ago & it's still working great! "   - Minny, Loyal kickstarter backer        Just imagine the 'LIKES' you'll get from your 8 followers instagram account!  Impressive!                      Looks so good that you just want to take it to bed.....sometimes....     Big enough for the huge 10,000 yen too    We'll be showcasing cool add on options after the campaign ends hence shipping weight may change. Therefore, you will not need to pay for shipping yet until your order is finalized  (for V1 batch)*update -  V2 orders will be finalized on Indiegogo, no add ons would be made available via indiegogo orders for simplicity.Why 'NO' to bulky + expensive wallets?I thought it wouldn't happen to me and all the negative publicity about bulky wallets aggravating back/spine issues were just a hype to buy expensive slim wallets.Well...it DID happened to me.It took the surgeon a couple of hours of slicing and dicing to remove these spinal disc that were pressing on my nerves.Actual pictures of my removed spinal disc and ops site. story:
Introducing the Copper Clean Wallet, The Luxury ultra-clean wallet from Oligo Effect.

 

CLEAN SCIENCE

The Copper Clean Wallet is forged with the cleanest metal known to man so your wallet will never harbor harmful germs and viruses and will look great for years.

It’s all about carrying what you need and maybe a little extra too.

 

BUILT TO LAST

Engineered from a little underground company called Oligo Effect, the Copper Clean Wallet can carry over 10 cards and 10+ notes without being a thick boy.

With easy access to all your cards at your fingertips, you don't have to worry about digging for the right card or have them all be pulled out at the same time against your will. Enjoy a perfect balance of optimized minimalism with full functionality and ease of use.

Unlike most minimalism wallets you can carry more than just the “minimum” and it’ll always retain its tough metal shape, unlike those dirty leather counterparts.

Despite being designed from the precious metal of copper the Copper Clean Wallet only weighs in at a mere 3 oz making it both incredibly lightweight and durable.

Being created from metal it blocks out unwanted RFID scans. This protects your payment data and prevents any unwanted transmissions from your cards — all without disrupting the speed of use or thickness of the wallet.

Plus, it looks pretty darn incredible.

 

DRESS TO IMPRESS

Taking up your old, torn billfold that you've been (ab)using since the '90s is never a pretty sight, and doesn’t increase your stature among the unfortunate people around to witness it. That old billfold that you've been treating like a filing cabinet for the past 15 years is rarely a pretty sight to put on display.

The metal Copper Clean Wallet doesn't wear out like a stuffed billfold, it's an elegant object to whip out in front of the people you want to impress.

 

OLIGO DYNAMIC EFFECT

What does it mean to be the “Cleanest” wallet? Well, copper, most widely used in the medical field for its antimicrobial properties self sanitizes itself using the Oligodynamic Effect. This property allows the copper ions to kill Viruses on Contact.

Recent studies have shown that copper surfaces kill more than 99.9% of germs and microbes within minutes. While on stainless steel surfaces, leather, and fabric, microbes can survive for weeks.

"This is the cleanest wallet, it’s really strong, and I don't even have to worry about it getting dirty or harboring disgusting germs all over it ever again! "

-Joe P.

It’s the first wallet ever to use this amazing property engineered at the molecular level. The combination results in a wallet that is incredibly bold yet significantly cleaner than any other wallet.

 

KEY FEATURES

With a thin profile, essential capacity, luxury quality, functional design, and insane durability, this could be the last wallet you’ll ever want.

Nano-technology and innovative materials ensure your Copper Clean Wallet looks clean and stays clean no matter what you throw at it or how long you’ve used it.


SHIPPING

We are doing our best to cover duties and taxes for all countries we ship to, however, there might be some regions where this is not possible. We'll keep you posted through our campaign updates.


Shipping fees will be collected after the campaign ends, on the pledge management platform we'll be using. Please check out our FAQs for more information. 

Many campaigns have disappointed their backers by not thinking through their shipping and logistics strategies. That is why we are pleased to let you know that we’ve partnered with the global fulfillment and logistics experts at Easyship.com who are the best in the business at fulfilling crowdfunding rewards and perks at the best possible shipping rates.


About one month prior to shipping rewards, you will be contacted by our global logistics partner to confirm your shipping address. You will also be asked to select your preferred shipping method/speed as well as pay any ancillary fees such as VAT taxes/duties (if applicable to your region). For estimated shipping rates, please visit the FAQs.

 

WHEN

We plan to ship starting in December 2021.

*We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
*ACTUAL SHIP DATES MAY VARY DEPENDING ON YOUR TERRITORY AND CHOSEN SHIPPING METHOD. WE WILL KEEP YOU NOTIFIED OF YOUR PRODUCT SHIP DATE.

WHY ORDER NOW

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

IN PARTNERSHIP WITH


 

SOCIAL MEDIA
