story:
You know how it goes: you have a closet full of jackets for every occasion. Windbreakers, rain shells, big down parkas for the worst of winter. But whichever one you roll with just doesn’t cut it once you’re out the door. What if one jacket was all you needed to stay warm and perfectly dry in all conditions? Using technology originally developed for NASA spacecraft to deliver advanced warmth in a performance silhouette, OROS brings you the Gemini - ultra thin, crazy warm, this is the science of versatility.

The Gemini Jacket replaces a closet full of gear — freeing up physical and mental space to pursue what’s important — your next adventure. The modular Gemini system consists of a protective shell and insulating vest. You can wear the shell and vest separately or combined for ultimate warmth and weather protection.

The feather-light waterproof shell keeps you dry and protected — whether you’re under the streetlights or above the tree line. Technical and versatile, the Gemini shell can be worn alone in warmer months, or combined with the vest to become the ultimate winter jacket — minus the excessive layers and restricted movement.

The performance vest is lined with our advanced SOLARCORE® insulation, guaranteed to keep you warm in the most punishing depths of winter. The vest is the insulation engine that powers the entire 3-in-1 system. Utilizing OROS’ advanced technology, the vest can be worn on its own to deliver targeted insulation for high output activities like cycling and trail running.

OROS transformed Aerogel, NASA’s most advanced insulation, into SOLARCORE® - the most efficient performance insulation ever created.
 


Our proprietary SOLARCORE® insulation outperforms over 200 leading insulations in thermal conductivity test ASTM C518.
 


We developed SOLARCORE® to eliminate the need for excessive layering. The Gemini Jacket replaces a closet full of gear — freeing up physical and mental space to pursue what’s important — your next adventure.
 


 


1. Shell for protection without the insulation

If the weather takes a turn for the worse, the Gemini waterproof shell will provide superior protection from the elements — blocking wind, keeping  you dry, and most importantly, keeping you moving.
 

2. Vest for warmth in motion





3. Layered for changing conditions



When the weather keeps tossing curveballs your way, The Gemini gives you the ability to quickly adapt to your surroundings, no matter what the world throws at you! Layer up or down to optimize your warmth-to-protection ratio.


4. Fully integrated for ultimate protection


When the mercury drops, flip the vest inside-out to secure the vest and shell, using the conveniently color coded snaps, to create a hybrid system perfect for moving through the coldest climates.



 

City and mountains — snow days and summer showers. By designing against two extremes, OROS crafted the Gemini to handle everything in between. The Gemini modular system will take you wherever you need to go. Together or individually, it's the perfect system for:

• Running • Hiking • Cycling • Trail Running •Skiing

• Snowshoe • Travel • Rain Jacket • Dog Walking • Exploring



An Exclusive Design Only Available On Indiegogo

 

Space tech is in our DNA, and this limited-edition jacket is where new beyonds begin.
 



We’re excited to offer this space design exclusively to our Kickstarter backers. This jacket features an exclusive colorway and detailing of the NASA Gemini mission.

In addition to the Indiegogo exclusive space jacket, we are offering the Gemini Jacket in 3 men's and two women's colorways so you can choose the Gemini that reflects your personal style.

story:
Our luxury swimsuits are created from regenerated plastic waste collected from the ocean, and made using responsible and ethical practices. More importantly, they are designed to last.

With your help, we can turn the tide on our damaging consumer culture, one swimsuit at a time. Pre-order your ELLE NAGE swimwear today and together we can ensure a more promising future. 

 

 

The earth’s oceans are the unhappy home to around 165 million tons of plastic waste.

Our throwaway culture has been fuelled by fast-fashion ~ customer demand for new clothes, next-day delivered ~ which results in incredible rates of over-production and textile waste. Much of which ends up in landfill sites and then in oceans.

 

 

At ELLE NAGE, we want to show that there is another way to do things: BUY LESS, LOVE MORE.

 

   

 

On a mission to change how swimwear can be made, bought and worn, we started to question ~ how can we re-condition ourselves to revert to quality over quantity, and manufacture our products without damaging the environment? 

 

 

 

 

 

With your help, we want to create stylish swimwear using ECONYL, a high-performance yarn created from industrial and ocean plastic waste, such as discarded fishing nets.

 

ECONYL regenerated nylon has the same quality and performance as brand new nylon and can be recycled infinite times, forming a closed loop. As well as being a solution for waste, ECONYL reduces the global warming impact of nylon by 90%, compared with the manufacturing of virgin nylon from oil. 

 

 

Vibrant colours and bold prints are fundamental to the ELLE NAGE aesthetic. We want our pieces to brighten the day of the women wearing them. Because, let’s face it, after the past year, everyone deserves to feel uplifted. 

 

 

It is crucial that our pieces not only look amazing but feel amazing too. We have spent months and months working on the perfect fit; from double lining to contouring, every element has been carefully considered. 

 

 

 

R E V I V R E – to live again

Allow yourself to be reborn: reborn after a year of hibernation and reborn with a fresh perspective of what is important ~ now more than ever. You will come alive again in our pieces that are, themselves, reborn from waste and given new life. 

 

 

Andie is sporty and boyish with a feminine twist. With many tricks up her sleeve, she can be whatever you want her to be; an animal print, a timeless spot, tied in a knot for boyish charm, or a bow for a prettier look. She is a good choice for all bust sizes, as her crop top shape and double-lined fabric provide good support for bigger busts. Her solid cream reversible interior offers a cleaner, more minimal aesthetic.

 

 

 

Quietly confident, Ayla is the dependable friend you’ll want to keep by your side; she’s consistently cool, calm and collected. With 2-ways-to-wear, she will get you through any situation. Her triangle shape is a good choice for both small and big busts as the gathered fit provides room for give. Her gingham is a reliable, timeless choice and embodies the essence of summer, while her reversible mango interior looks great against both tanned and paler skin.

 

 

 

Always the loudest in the room, Ada is a classic piece with an unexpected twist. Her happy concoction of colour exudes vibrance and passion, and her asymmetry is unpredictable. Her double-lined fabric will support you in all the right areas, and her contoured shape will celebrate your curves. Her reversible interior is the opposite colourway, offering a prettier look with the majority in pink. Conformist from the front, yet flirtatious from the back, Ada plays with your senses and is not afraid to stand out from the crowd.

 

 

 

One classy lady, Amelie oozes understated chic and timelessness. Her classic 90’s square neck and bold monochrome print is fit for any occasion, whether at the beach, the pool, or paired with shorts for roaming the city streets. Her adjustable straps are a great choice for longer body shapes, and her double-lined fabric and contoured fit will support you in all the right places. Her reversible interior is the opposite colourway, offering a fresh summery look.

 

 

 

 

 

At ELLE NAGE we make your swimwear to last, meaning you can show off your swimwear year, after year, (after year).

 

 

However, we recognise that the wear and tear of wearing something you love so much can take its toll. So your swimwear comes with a free ‘Repair Kit’ made from the authentic off-cuts of the fabric, so that if your swimwear ever gets damaged, you can use your patch to repair it yourself. Now your swimwear that is designed to last, lasts even longer.

 

 

 

One of our brand priorities is to come up with a plan for end-of-life, so that when the time comes, you will be able to send your swimwear back to us to be reborn again, in return for a discount off your next order.

 

 

Sustainability is about preserving the needs of the present without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

From start to finish and back again, the full cycle of our products must cause as little harm as possible. We are always looking to learn and improve our practice as we strive towards being as sustainable as possible. 

 

 

 

 

Part of working towards sustainability is partnering with our wonderful supplier in Bali. They employ people from local communities, embrace sustainable practices and donate $0.10 USD per piece to a range of charities. These include The ZeroWaste Centre, that helps to clean up the world’s oceans, and Bali Wise, which empowers marginalised Indonesian women through access to education. They have also donated to SOS Indonesia to help feed those in need due to COVID-19.

 

 

 

 

Our Market Research survey showed that 74% of women struggled to find swimwear that ticked all the right boxes. That’s where we come in. We provide women with the ease of style, sustainability, quality, fit and unparalleled attention to detail…all in one place. 

With us, you can say goodbye to pre-holiday panic-buying. ELLE NAGE is your reliable friend that is here to stay.

Shopping ethically is hard, so we made it easy. We are here to bridge the gap between the over-priced brands and the fast fashion market, rendering sustainability more attainable and affordable.

By choosing ELLE NAGE you are giving plastic waste a purpose and contributing to positive change.

What’s not to love?

 

 

The name ELLE NAGE (meaning she swims in French) is indicative of the over-riding inspiration for the brand: our women. 

We celebrate all female bodies, and aim to represent relatable reality through raw, stripped-back beauty.

We believe that every woman should feel amazing in swimwear. End of. To verify our fit across all body shapes, we conducted focus groups where different women tried and tested our swimwear, and we were over the moon to receive consistently positive feedback. We found that women were excited about luxury swimwear that combines style and sustainability below £100.

 

 

                                             

We chose crowdfunding over other funding types because we really wanted to grow a community in the process and spark important conversations about how we can encourage positive change for a more conscious future.

 

 

You won't have to choose your sizing today; at the end of the campaign you will be sent a survey where you will be able to select your size.

 

 

 

Hi! My name is Tara and I am the Founder and one-woman-band behind ELLE NAGE. I started my seven-year stint in the fashion industry in the Buying team for a high-street brand. I absolutely loved this experience, in which I developed a passion for creating product and watching it grow from sketch to store. This passion led me to combine my industry knowledge with my love of the ocean to create a swimwear brand that keeps its impact on the planet at the core of its production. 

This brand has been a dream of mine for some years, so I thank you SO MUCH for helping me turn this dream into a reality.

 

 

Your pledge, however big or small, will mean the absolute world to us!

Everything is completely ready to go, and our supplier is currently starting to manufacture our products! But we need your help to fund the collection. 

By backing our campaign you will be eliminating waste this planet doesn’t need, supporting safe working conditions and fair pay, and playing your small part in pushing the fashion industry towards a more conscious future.

After a year of pausing and regaining perspective on what is important, right now is the time ~ more than ever ~ to embrace a responsible lifestyle.

So please make your pledge and spread the word. It's only together that we can re-shape the fashion industry and show that there is another way to manufacture, buy and wear clothing.

 

 

Help doesn’t just come in the form of pledges. We would massively appreciate it if you could make some noise about our project. 

Please kindly forward our campaign by email or share it on any of your social channels!

 

 

We have full confidence in our manufacturing partner and have everything lined up ready to go.

But there is always a chance of things popping up unexpectedly that have the potential to slow things down. But after several years in Fashion Buying, Tara is well experienced in facing and overcoming supply chain issues. If we experience any delays, we promise to be transparent and keep you in the loop.

 

 

A huge shout out and THANK YOU to all the wonderful people who have supported our campaign and chosen to join our community! We can't wait to get to know you better along the way.
story_txt: Our luxury swimsuits are created from regenerated plastic waste collected from the ocean, and made using responsible and ethical practices. More importantly, they are designed to last.With your help, we can turn the tide on our damaging consumer culture, one swimsuit at a time. Pre-order your ELLE NAGE swimwear today and together we can ensure a more promising future.   The earth’s oceans are the unhappy home to around 165 million tons of plastic waste.Our throwaway culture has been fuelled by fast-fashion ~ customer demand for new clothes, next-day delivered ~ which results in incredible rates of over-production and textile waste. Much of which ends up in landfill sites and then in oceans.  At ELLE NAGE, we want to show that there is another way to do things: BUY LESS, LOVE MORE.     On a mission to change how swimwear can be made, bought and worn, we started to question ~ how can we re-condition ourselves to revert to quality over quantity, and manufacture our products without damaging the environment?      With your help, we want to create stylish swimwear using ECONYL, a high-performance yarn created from industrial and ocean plastic waste, such as discarded fishing nets. ECONYL regenerated nylon has the same quality and performance as brand new nylon and can be recycled infinite times, forming a closed loop. As well as being a solution for waste, ECONYL reduces the global warming impact of nylon by 90%, compared with the manufacturing of virgin nylon from oil.   Vibrant colours and bold prints are fundamental to the ELLE NAGE aesthetic. We want our pieces to brighten the day of the women wearing them. Because, let’s face it, after the past year, everyone deserves to feel uplifted.   It is crucial that our pieces not only look amazing but feel amazing too. story:
Meet the Nomad Lane Origami Tote Pack, the most versatile tote bag ever. The bag literally transforms from Tote to Backpack to Crossbody to Carry-On in seconds. We've combined the elegance of a tote, the flexibility of a cross-body, the convenience of a backpack, and the organization & functionality of a travel bag.


Our goal is to create the modern tote for the masses by eliminating common issues like the dreaded "Black Hole" problem. Find what you need, when you need it. The Origami Tote Pack is loaded with internal and external pockets so you can organize all your daily essentials with dedicated compartments for your laptop, water bottle, passport, phone, keys & more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Whether on mobile or desktop, you can easily share the campaign and get $5 cashback for every person who purchases an Origami Tote Pack through your unique link. 

To qualify for the Cashback Program you must:

  1. Have an Indiegogo Account
  2. Back the Origami Tote Pack Campaign

How to share:

  1. Click the Facebook share link at the bottom of the page on mobile, or choose from Facebook, Twitter, or the unique URL on Desktop at the top of the campaign, you can use either the Facebook, Twitter, or the Link button to grab your unique referral URL. You must be logged in to your Indiegogo account to get your unique URL.
  2. Your link will pre-populate, and give you a chance to add a message while sharing your unique URL. 
  3. Simply hit "Post to Facebook" or "Tweet" to share the campaign!

At the end of the campaign, we'll tally up your results and reach out about getting you your cashback!

story:
繼續反抗

Hong Kongers, Never Give Up!

一年多，香港人用血肉、時間、心力、精神追尋公義、民主與自由，如何把這份精神在艱難日子延續下去，告訴身邊人「你絕不孤單」？ 或許 JTHK 系列是你的答案。由日本設計團隊 DDDDDHK 設計，PROJECT R 出品的 T-SHIRTS 及 HOODIES 銳意把香港抗爭與日本心意連結，以衣飾暗地把抗爭「穿」入生活。

In the past year, Hongkongers have gone all out fighting for justice, freedom, and democracy. Millions of us took to streets to safeguard Hong Kong’s autonomy and protest against abuse of police powers. Many have been arrested and tortured; a lot suffered from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and physical injuries.

Despite an uphill battle, we will not stop pursuing justice. Designed by DDDDDHK and produced by Project R, this creative campaign is a way to express our causes in daily life.  We hope to bring these products to the international community as a token for our culture diplomacy.

 

抗爭與日常

Live Our Fight

抗爭來到今天，有些地方已不能明顯表達心跡，但民主思想及意志並不會隨著噤聲改變。JTHK系列以隱喻設計為主調，無論你在香港或者外地，都可以安全及隨心所慾地將其「穿入生活」，表達你的堅持。這不單是一件衣服，更是香港人之間的共鳴。當你見到其他人穿起同一件衫，縱陌路卻有份同路感，你、我、他、她不再孤單。你的日常參與，便是同行的支持與見證。

In this very challenging time, our voice may not be heard, but we refuse to give up. Through this series of designer products, we seek to reignite the hope and solidarity of Hongkongers. We are telling the world our fight must go on till the dawn.  

This series comprises three beautiful designs on high quality hoodies and T-shirts. Each design carries a metaphor for a memory or spirit of the Hong Kong movement. The metaphoric design concept conveys our messages in a subtle way, making anyone (in or outside Hong Kong) feel safe and comfortable to wear them in daily life. So please “put on” our story and connect them to all walks of life.

 

JTHK

JTHK，代表 JAPAN、TAIWAN、HONG KONG 三地緊密合作。產品皆由日本設計、台灣製造、香港統籌策劃而成，經過不斷磨合，互相補位，成就了這個結合三地黃圈的突破性項目。

Designed in Japan, made in Taiwan and executed in Hong Kong (hence aka “JTHK”), this project is an unprecedented collaboration of Hongkongers all over the world. Together, this group of talented, young and energetic Hongkongers have delivered great work to make this project possible.

 

全球流行

World Trending

過去一年多，香港人留下不少民主足印， 一直在國際社會得到普遍認同。我們希望透過此項目把香港人的不屈精神轉化成文化輸出，引起各界持續關注，讓香港的故事繼續流行全球，當中少不了穿上JTHK的你，化身為人肉文宣，一齊傳播信念！

Hongkongers are fighting on the free world’s forefront against tyrannous powers. We hope the free world stands by us in pursuit of universal values (justice, freedom and democracy). By putting on these hoodies and T-shirts, you will help us tell our stories to the world. Please let our voice enlighten freedom fighters in every corner of the globe that they are not alone, and we share their struggles.

 

港日相連

Japan x Hong Kong

三款設計揉合港日兩地語言及文化，把日本元素加進香港事件中，用日本語言說出香港一年多來的傷痕和一直堅守的精神。在港日兩地語言文化互融下，帶出連成一線的共同感。

All the three designs incorporated languages and cultures of Japan and Hong Kong. By including Japanese elements into the stories, the designs carry interconnections of the two and speak stories of the pain and persistence of Hongkongers in the past year.

 

八組能引起香港人共鳴的日本片仮名音節，即使不能發出聲響，心中吶喊依然。喻意如水抗爭，有形若無形。在時代的洪流中，仍可於日常生活上讓掙扎長存藏於若隱若現間。

The pronunciation of this set of eight Japanese katakana can resonate collective voices among Hong Kong protestors (chat with a Hongkonger to find out.) Named after our shared motto, “BE WATER” is a metaphor which means adapting to changing circumstances just like water. This design echoes how Hongkongers keep transforming and find ways to voice out even under oppression.

延伸閱讀 (Read more):

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katakana

 


靈感來自港日標誌性山峰，獅子山背靠富士山令兩地的心意和精神連成一線。

In SOUL, the paired Mt. Fuji and the Lion Rock reflect the connection between Japan and Hong Kong, despite thousands of miles apart.

 

如題「明就明」，便不作解釋了。

*我們會在你支持這版本後告訴你箇中意思。

ROUTE contains subtexts that only HongKongers and those who follow the protests would understand. Some knowledge of Japanese is useful too. This edition is a great way to start conversations with other people in the community.

*We will send you the meaning of the design once you contribute to this perk.

 

HOODIES 背後

Behind the Hood

Hoodies背後其實喑隱藏玄機，戴上帽的一刻會揭露一條繡有「HONGKONGER」的直幡，形態顯然勾起同路人的集體回憶，彰顯我們的心聲及自我認同。設計如港人般靈活變通，隨心戴上，隨機脫下。帽形亦比市面 HOODIES 稍大，能全面包裹頭部。

Another great feature of the hoodies is the hidden stripe with embroidery of the text “HONGKONGER” under the hood. The design concept is from the multi-storey tall vertical banner Hongkongers often display on our mother mountain, Lion Rock, as a form of protest. The action represents the Hongkongers’ aspirations and sense of identity. The stripe can be seen when the hood is lifted and hidden when the latter off. The way it is designed is also an embodiment of our Be Water spirit.  The hood is slightly bigger than standard hoods, creating a full coverage of the wearer’s head.

 

產品詳情

Product Details

 

日本設計．台灣製造．香港營運

Designed in Japan. Produced in Taiwan. Operated in Hong Kong

產品全由日本團隊DDDDDHK設計，團隊為在日港人發起，身體力行以設計及拍攝和後製表達對香港支持。JTHK 一切用料及剪裁均跟市面速成製品不同，布料、網版、縫紉等全由台灣生產及人手印製，顏料亦採用高韌度的日本製品。整個產品策劃經多方考量及與廠商協調下訂造，絕對不是罐頭貨。此外，銷售、協商、客服、宣傳、運輸、溝通等主要由香港 PROJECT R 年輕人團隊合作而成，當中佔多數是剛畢業或在學青年。

These products are designed by DDDDDHK, an initiative started by Japan-based Hongkongers. DDDDDHK strives to show their support to the movement in Hong Kong through their creatives. The materials and cutting of the JTHK series are different from those of the fast-moving fashion market. They are manufactured with high quality cotton fabrics and meticulously printed in Taiwan. The raw materials, including fabrics, printing screens and sewing materials, are sourced in Taiwan and the high-tough pigments for printing from Japan. The entire production plan was done with close collaboration of various parties. The execution, ranging from factory and material selection, sales, customer services, marketing to logistics, are accomplished by a group of young and diligent team of Project R who are mostly students and fresh-graduates.

 

全球黃圈．文宣全球

Global Yellow Economic Circle. Spread Our Voice

利用是次產品合作，擴大黃色經濟圈，把黃圈推至全球合作，你的支持非常重要。JTHK 拒絕使用單一及量產型製品，務求做到顧良心、重品質的黃產品。我們積極把你的支持帶進每一個過程和細節，受惠於不同國家同一理念的同路人。

穿上 JTHK ，參與不同國家的活動，或探訪不同地方，你都能在言談間輕鬆借設計圖案輸出抗爭，講述香港的民主之路，把香港人精神帶到國際，達致全球連結。靠你及我們的努力，讓國際持續關注港人的堅持。

Hongkongers have brought the movement to different platforms. We are building an economic ecosystem comprising pro-democracy businesses, groups and individuals. Our goal is to emerge as an economic, social and cultural power which embraces universal values, thrives globally and is respected by the world.

Through this campaign, we would like to connect with businesses and individuals who share our values and mission. We aim to show the world there exist alternative supply chains which are free from the control of authoritarian regimes. Outside that regime, Hongkongers and anyone in the globe are able to produce beautiful products with sustainability and high quality. 

 

千鳥花基金

Recovery Fund

你的懲罰，不止換來一件貨品，亦能協助有需要的人重獲新生，繼續找尋自由生活。我們會將部分收益撥捐千鳥花基金，基金主要支援全球有需要香港人，讓他們有機會得到心理治療，盡快從 PTSD 及其他情緒困擾中走出陰霾。

This project is simple but meaningful. Not only will you get yourself a product with your contribution, it can also help the needed in their search for a free and easier life. No matter how much you are going to contribute to our campaign, we will allocate a part of the fund raised to the Recovery Fund that assists Hongkongers in need for psychological help to recover from PTSD or other mental issues.

 

支援外國戰線．支持年輕一代

Supporting International Front and Young Generation

PROJECT R 致力聘請香港年輕人，讓他們在亂世中能發展所長，你的支持同時鼓勵更多年輕一代自力更生，讓他們能持續營運。此外，部分收益亦會用作支援外國戰線，希望把你的助力變更擴散。讓我們合力，在全球建立可持續性黃色經濟圈，令外國戰線及年輕人有更大空間發展。

若你希望在商務上透過合作以作支持，PROJECT R 及 DDDDDHK都樂意洽談。

Project R stands with the truth and the storytellers. We will use the profit from product sales to provide employment and start-up opportunities for young Hongkongers. A lot of them have encountered economic hardship due to their participation in this social movement. We will also devote resources to support the international diplomacy front of our movement.   

We wish to collaborate with groups and individuals in the world who share our values and mission. If you want to cooperate with Project R and DDDDDHK, please don’t hesitate to contact us. 

歡迎聯絡 (Contact)

Project R email：cs@renaissancehk.com
DDDDDHK email：hello@dddddhk.com

 

R 來自 RENAISSANCE，有再生、復興的意思。建立以來，PROJECT R 致力構建一個屬於全球香港人的社區及經濟共同體，做到香港人靠香港人，拒絕單一經濟依賴。同時，PROJECT R 以聘請各地年輕人為主，確保年輕人能靠其才能自食其力，保證他們的作品及努力能衝出香港，建立一個屬於香港人的創意品牌。

The “R” stands for “renaissance”, the spirit of rebirth and recovery. Project R is committed to reinvent Hong Kong into a great economic and cultural power which embraces universal values, thrives globally and is respected by the world. We hope to build a global community where Hongkongers can live their dreams and determine their destiny. 

Project R hires young Hongkongers in parts of the world for their talents to shine beyond borders and develop a creative brand for Hongkongers.

自2019年起，香港人於世界各國前展現了捍衛民主自由的決心。作為在日的香港人組織，DDDDDHK致力輸出海外港人的設計、文案、商品等，以展示香港人的核心價值和文化觀點。DDDDDHK亦協助黃色經濟圈同路人，提供商業品牌設計等策劃工作。

Since 2019, HongKongers have demonstrated their determination on defending democracy and freedom internationally. Initiated by Japan-based HongKongers, DDDDDHK commits to cultural diplomacy spreading the core value and cultural perspective of HongKongers through designs, creatives, and products created by overseas Hongkongers. As part of the Global Yellow Economic Circle, DDDDDHK also provides creative and branding services to like minded businesses.

Follow us

Project R

DDDDDHK

 

此系列其實於 2020 年 6 月至 7 月由 DDDDDHK 自家推出，並得到各方同路人支持，包括八百幾個來自28個國家的 BACKERS，高峰期籌得四十多萬港幣，並一度成為 INDIEGOGO的FASHION-FORWARD FINDS HIGHLIGHTS 及 TRENDING CAMPAIGN。可惜受政治環境影響，無奈取消。

This series of design was previously launched by DDDDDHK in June 2020 and backed by over 800 backers from 28 countries with a funding of over HK$400,000. The campaign was even listed on Indiegogo as a “Fashion-forward Finds Highlights” and “Trending Campaign.” Unfortunately, due to the change in political circumstances, the campaign did not proceed to the production stage.

縱然面對重重困難，念念不忘，必有迴響，DDDDDHK 夥拍 PROJECT R 重新推出，為的是更完備的架構，成就更完美的產品，祈望大家能一起與我們克服困難。

Despite difficulties, Project R reached out for partnership with DDDDDHK and relaunched the campaign with a better campaign structure and product quality.

是次合作在用料上均使用台灣及日本製原料，加上由台灣師傅逐件細心印刷，與普通量產型產品不同，每件貨品均通過在台年輕人悉心挑選及溝通而成，加上海外運輸方面也積極使用海外公司，因此成本價頗高。

In this collaboration, all the products were printed by hand individually with high-quality raw materials from Taiwan and Japan. Unlike other mass-produced apparel, the entire production process of JTHK products was carefully planned by an energetic group of Hongkongers all over the world including Taiwan. To refuse influence from the authoritarian regime, we use foreign shippers and couriers to handle our orders.  This new operation model may have increased our costs and pushed up the product prices. That said, we are free from the undue influence of suppliers controlled by the authoritarian regime.  

因應 COVID-19 持續肆虐全球，在可見將來運輸上也受到一定延誤，甚至面臨高成本運輸。但我們會盡力把貨品送到客人手上，請大家耐心等候。

Due to the COVID-19 situation, overseas shipments might possibly experience significant delay and bear a higher delivery fee. But we will try our best to make it to your door.

 

展望

Forecast

JTHK 並非單靠我們，亦需要有你這位同路人的支持，才能達成以上目標。我們希望透過與不同團體合作、透過銷售，找出更多志同道合的同路人，讓一切在買賣中成熟，推出更多產品，擴大黃色經濟圈實力。同時，提升香港年輕人競爭力，協助外國戰線，並支援更多需要情緒支援的香港人。讓我們共同努力，以不同方式繼續支持香港。

We can never achieve our goal without your support. As our brand evolves, we hope to network with like minds and collaborate with other groups and individuals. We look forward to creating more products to enlarge our economic ecosystem and raise the market competitiveness of Hongkongers. We will also provide more help to Hongkongers who suffer from mental health issues.

 

香港人は諦めない！

2019年、多くの香港人は正義、自由と民主のために、警察の暴力に抵抗し、全てをかけて戦いました。逮捕して虐待され、怪我をしたりPTSDを発症したりした人が多数います。

苦しい戦いが続きますが、香港人は正義を求めることを諦めません。DDDDDHKがデザインし、Project Rが生産したTシャツとパーカーを通して、香港人が自由を求める声を届けたいと考えています。

 

戦いと日常

今は自由に意見を口にすることができない時代ですが、私たちは諦めません。Tシャツを通じて、香港人の結束と希望を取り戻したいのです。

私たちのメッセージはデザインに隠されています。だから、どこでも安心して着ることができます。着ることで香港人を応援してください。

 

JTHK

JTHKは日本（Japan）、台湾（Taiwan）と香港（Hong Kong）の絆を意味します。全ての製品は日本でデザイン、台湾で生産され、プロジェクトを実行するのが香港です。全世界の香港人が協力するという前例のないプロジェクトなのです。若くてエネルギッシュで、才能のある香港人たちによって初めて可能になりました。

 

全球流行

World Trending

この一年、香港人は自由世界の最前線で暴政と戦い、民主のために少なくないことを成し遂げました。私たちは正義、自由、民主を求める香港人の不屈の精神を、文化として世界へ届けたい。JTHKを着て、私たちの声を他の人々に伝え、香港人を応援してください。

 

Japan x Hong Kong

3つのデザインには、日本と香港の言葉と文化が融合しています。日本の文字で香港の苦しみと精神的な粘り強さを表し、香港と日本の一体感を出しました。

 

BE WATER

このカタカナの塊りは香港デモ者たちの心に響き、彼らに共鳴をもたらす言葉である。「BE WATER」とは、水のように環境に応じて自由自在に形を変えることを意味する。このデザインは正に香港人の「水になれ」精神に沿って、様々な制限や抑圧の下に己の声を上げようとするものである。

 

SOUL

富士山と香港のシンボルである獅子山のデザインは、日本と香港の心を重ねることを表現しています。

 

 

ROUTE

文字通り、わかる人にはわかるということです。

＊ご注文したお客様に限り、そのデザインに隠されたメッセージを説明します。

 

パーカーついて

Hoodies背後其實喑隱藏玄機，戴上帽的一刻會揭露一條繡有「HONGKONGER」的直幡，形態顯然勾起同路人的集體回憶，彰顯我們的心聲及自我認同。設計如港人般靈活變通，隨心戴上，隨機脫下。帽形亦比市面 HOODIES 稍大，能全面包裹頭部。

パーカーのフードを被る時、「HONGKONGER」という文字が見えます。

後ろの「HONGKONGER」を隠すか見せるかは自由自在で、「水になれ」というモットーの活用の一つとなります。

 

製品情報

 

日本設計、台湾生産、香港運営

在日香港人団体DDDDDHKがデザインします。JTHKの素材はファストファッション用と違って、全部台湾で生産します。顔料は日本の顔料を使用します。営業、生産、カスタマーサービス、宣伝、物流などはほとんどを新卒や学生のPROJOECT Rが担当します。

 

黄色経済圏を作り、世界中に声を届けよう

香港人は抗議活動のほか、色々な形で戦っています。「黄色経済圏」はその一つです。

黄色経済圏とは「デモ支持」を表明しているサービスを利用しようというキャンペーン。今回の生産を通じて、国際的な規模にまで拡大するのです。

私たちの目標は、このキャンペーンによって、独裁国家を経由しない供給チェーンを作ることができるのを世界中に見せることです。独裁国家を経由しなくても、品質が良いものを楽しむことができるということです。

 

千鳥花基金

Recovery Fund

商品を購入することで、支払ったお金の一部は千鳥草基金に寄付されます。千鳥草基金は、デモによってメンタルヘルスの不調の病気を患った人への支援を行います。

 

 

 

海外で戦う若者を応援せよ

抗議活動により、経済的に苦しくなったり、住所を失ったり、自立しなければならなくなった若者が多くいます。PROJECT Rは彼らを雇用する形で、自立できるように支援します。香港人の思いが世界中に届き、「黄色経済圏」ができるように、ご協力をお願いします。

興味・関心がある方は、ご遠慮なく相談してください。

Project R email：cs@renaissancehk.com
DDDDDHK email：hello@dddddhk.com

 

PROJECT RのR はルネサンス（RENAISSANCE）というフランス語で、「再生」「復活」を意味します。PROJECT Rは世界中に進出し、香港人の経済圏を作ることを目指しています。

香港人のブランドを作り、香港人を雇用することにより、彼らが自立できるように支援します。

2019年以降、香港人は世界中に民主と自由を守る決意を示しました。DDDDDHKは日本における香港人組織として、香港人のデザイン、商品などを輸出し、香港人の最も重要な価値観を表します。また、デモを支持する企業にデザインや、ブランド作りのサービスを提供しています。

Since 2019, HongKongers have demonstrated their determination on defending democracy and freedom internationally. Initiated by Japan-based HongKongers, DDDDDHK commits to cultural diplomacy spreading the core value and cultural perspective of HongKongers through designs, creatives, and products created by overseas Hongkongers. As part of the Global Yellow Economic Circle, DDDDDHK also provides creative and branding services to like minded businesses.

Follow us

Project R

DDDDDHK

 

一連のデザインは2020 年 6月〜7月にDDDDDHKによってリリースされました。28カ国の人々に募金していただき、総額は40万香港ドル（535万円相当）に達しました。キャンペーンは「Fashion-forward Finds Highlights」と「Trending Campaign」として、Indiegogoにもリストされています。しかし残念ながら、政治的な原因でこの計画は中止になりました。

それにも関わらず、DDDDDHKはPROJECT Rと連携し、改めて、もっと品質が良いものを作るように努力します。

今回生産した商品は、市販のファストファッションと異なって、独裁政権の国に一切関わっていません。台湾と日本の原材料を使っています。独裁政権による影響を避けるため、海外の物流会社を利用していますので、コストも高くなります。

新型コロナの影響で輸送が遅延し、コストが高くなることが見込まれますが、商品が必ずお客様のもとに届くように努力します。

 

展望

Forecast

色々な団体の協力によって、もっと仲間を集め、事業を拡大し、香港人の知名度を高めることを目指しています。そのために、あなたの力が必要です。

メンタルヘルスに苦しんでいる香港人を支援したいのです。
story_txt:
繼續反抗Hong Kongers, Never Give Up!一年多，香港人用血肉、時間、心力、精神追尋公義、民主與自由，如何把這份精神在艱難日子延續下去，告訴身邊人「你絕不孤單」？ 或許 JTHK 系列是你的答案。由日本設計團隊 DDDDDHK 設計，PROJECT R 出品的 T-SHIRTS 及 HOODIES 銳意把香港抗爭與日本心意連結，以衣飾暗地把抗爭「穿」入生活。In the past year, Hongkongers have gone all out fighting for justice, freedom, and democracy. Millions of us took to streets to safeguard Hong Kong’s autonomy and protest against abuse of police powers. Many have been arrested and tortured; a lot suffered from Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) and physical injuries.Despite an uphill battle, we will not stop pursuing justice. Designed by DDDDDHK and produced by Project R, this creative campaign is a way to express our causes in daily life.  We hope to bring these products to the international community as a token for our culture diplomacy. 抗爭與日常Live Our Fight抗爭來到今天，有些地方已不能明顯表達心跡，但民主思想及意志並不會隨著噤聲改變。JTHK系列以隱喻設計為主調，無論你在香港或者外地，都可以安全及隨心所慾地將其「穿入生活」，表達你的堅持。這不單是一件衣服，更是香港人之間的共鳴。當你見到其他人穿起同一件衫，縱陌路卻有份同路感，你、我、他、她不再孤單。你的日常參與，便是同行的支持與見證。In this very challenging time, our voice may not be heard, but we refuse to give up. Through this series of designer products, we seek to reignite the hope and solidarity of Hongkongers. We are telling the world our fight must go on till the dawn.  This series comprises three beautiful designs on high quality hoodies and T-shirts. Each design carries a metaphor for a memory or spirit of the Hong Kong movement. The metaphoric design concept conveys our messages in a subtle way, making anyone (in or outside Hong Kong) feel safe and comfortable to wear them in daily life. So please “put on” our story and connect them to all walks of life. JTHKJTHK，代表 JAPAN、TAIWAN、HONG KONG 三地緊密合作。產品皆由日本設計、台灣製造、香港統籌策劃而成，經過不斷磨合，互相補位，成就了這個結合三地黃圈的突破性項目。Designed in Japan, made in Taiwan and executed in Hong Kong (hence aka “JTHK”), this project is an unprecedented collaboration of Hongkongers all over the world. Together, this group of talented, young and energetic Hongkongers have delivered great work to make this project possible. 全球流行World Trending過去一年多，香港人留下不少民主足印， 一直在國際社會得到普遍認同。我們希望透過此項目把香港人的不屈精神轉化成文化輸出，引起各界持續關注，讓香港的故事繼續流行全球，當中少不了穿上JTHK的你，化身為人肉文宣，一齊傳播信念！Hongkongers are fighting on the free world’s forefront against tyrannous powers. We hope the free world stands by us in pursuit of universal values (justice, freedom and democracy). By putting on these hoodies and T-shirts, you will help us tell our stories to the world. Please let our voice enlighten freedom fighters in every corner of the globe that they are not alone, and we share their struggles. 港日相連Japan x Hong Kong三款設計揉合港日兩地語言及文化，把日本元素加進香港事件中，用日本語言說出香港一年多來的傷痕和一直堅守的精神。在港日兩地語言文化互融下，帶出連成一線的共同感。All the three designs incorporated languages and cultures of Japan and Hong Kong. By including Japanese elements into the stories, the designs carry interconnections of the two and speak stories of the pain and persistence of Hongkongers in the past year. 八組能引起香港人共鳴的日本片仮名音節，即使不能發出聲響，心中吶喊依然。喻意如水抗爭，有形若無形。在時代的洪流中，仍可於日常生活上讓掙扎長存藏於若隱若現間。The pronunciation of this set of eight Japanese katakana can resonate collective voices among Hong Kong protestors (chat with a Hongkonger to find out.) Named after our shared motto, “BE WATER” is a metaphor which means adapting to changing circumstances just like water. This design echoes how Hongkongers keep transforming and find ways to voice out even under oppression.延伸閱讀 (Read more):https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katakana 靈感來自港日標誌性山峰，獅子山背靠富士山令兩地的心意和精神連成一線。In SOUL, the paired Mt. Fuji and the Lion Rock reflect the connection between Japan and Hong Kong, despite thousands of miles apart. 如題「明就明」，便不作解釋了。*我們會在你支持這版本後告訴你箇中意思。ROUTE contains subtexts that only HongKongers and those who follow the protests would understand. Some knowledge of Japanese is useful too. This edition is a great way to start conversations with other people in the community.*We will send you the meaning of the design once you contribute to this perk. HOODIES 背後Behind the HoodHoodies背後其實喑隱藏玄機，戴上帽的一刻會揭露一條繡有「HONGKONGER」的直幡，形態顯然勾起同路人的集體回憶，彰顯我們的心聲及自我認同。設計如港人般靈活變通，隨心戴上，隨機脫下。帽形亦比市面 HOODIES 稍大，能全面包裹頭部。Another great feature of the hoodies is the hidden stripe with embroidery of the text “HONGKONGER” under the hood. The design concept is from the multi-storey tall vertical banner Hongkongers often display on our mother mountain, Lion Rock, as a form of protest. The action represents the Hongkongers’ aspirations and sense of identity. The stripe can be seen when the hood is lifted and hidden when the latter off. The way it is designed is also an embodiment of our Be Water spirit.  The hood is slightly bigger than standard hoods, creating a full coverage of the wearer’s head. 產品詳情Product Details 日本設計．台灣製造．香港營運Designed in Japan. Produced in Taiwan. Operated in Hong Kong產品全由日本團隊DDDDDHK設計，團隊為在日港人發起，身體力行以設計及拍攝和後製表達對香港支持。JTHK 一切用料及剪裁均跟市面速成製品不同，布料、網版、縫紉等全由台灣生產及人手印製，顏料亦採用高韌度的日本製品。整個產品策劃經多方考量及與廠商協調下訂造，絕對不是罐頭貨。此外，銷售、協商、客服、宣傳、運輸、溝通等主要由香港 PROJECT R 年輕人團隊合作而成，當中佔多數是剛畢業或在學青年。These products are designed by DDDDDHK, an initiative started by Japan-based Hongkongers. DDDDDHK strives to show their support to the movement in Hong Kong through their creatives. The materials and cutting of the JTHK series are different from those of the fast-moving fashion market. They are manufactured with high quality cotton fabrics and meticulously printed in Taiwan. The raw materials, including fabrics, printing screens and sewing materials, are sourced in Taiwan and the high-tough pigments for printing from Japan. The entire production plan was done with close collaboration of various parties. The execution, ranging from factory and material selection, sales, customer services, marketing to logistics, are accomplished by a group of young and diligent team of Project R who are mostly students and fresh-graduates. 全球黃圈．文宣全球Global Yellow Economic Circle. Spread Our Voice利用是次產品合作，擴大黃色經濟圈，把黃圈推至全球合作，你的支持非常重要。JTHK 拒絕使用單一及量產型製品，務求做到顧良心、重品質的黃產品。我們積極把你的支持帶進每一個過程和細節，受惠於不同國家同一理念的同路人。穿上 JTHK ，參與不同國家的活動，或探訪不同地方，你都能在言談間輕鬆借設計圖案輸出抗爭，講述香港的民主之路，把香港人精神帶到國際，達致全球連結。靠你及我們的努力，讓國際持續關注港人的堅持。Hongkongers have brought the movement to different platforms. We are building an economic ecosystem comprising pro-democracy businesses, groups and individuals. Our goal is to emerge as an economic, social and cultural power which embraces universal values, thrives globally and is respected by the world.Through this campaign, we would like to connect with businesses and individuals who share our values and mission. We aim to show the world there exist alternative supply chains which are free from the control of authoritarian regimes. Outside that regime, Hongkongers and anyone in the globe are able to produce beautiful products with sustainability and high quality.  千鳥花基金Recovery Fund你的懲罰，不止換來一件貨品，亦能協助有需要的人重獲新生，繼續找尋自由生活。我們會將部分收益撥捐千鳥花基金，基金主要支援全球有需要香港人，讓他們有機會得到心理治療，盡快從 PTSD 及其他情緒困擾中走出陰霾。This project is simple but meaningful. Not only will you get yourself a product with your contribution, it can also help the needed in their search for a free and easier life. No matter how much you are going to contribute to our campaign, we will allocate a part of the fund raised to the Recovery Fund that assists Hongkongers in need for psychological help to recover from PTSD or other mental issues. 支援外國戰線．支持年輕一代Supporting International Front and Young GenerationPROJECT R 致力聘請香港年輕人，讓他們在亂世中能發展所長，你的支持同時鼓勵更多年輕一代自力更生，讓他們能持續營運。此外，部分收益亦會用作支援外國戰線，希望把你的助力變更擴散。讓我們合力，在全球建立可持續性黃色經濟圈，令外國戰線及年輕人有更大空間發展。若你希望在商務上透過合作以作支持，PROJECT R 及 DDDDDHK都樂意洽談。Project R stands with the truth and the storytellers. We will use the profit from product sales to provide employment and start-up opportunities for young Hongkongers. A lot of them have encountered economic hardship due to their participation in this social movement. We will also devote resources to support the international diplomacy front of our movement.   We wish to collaborate with groups and individuals in the world who share our values and mission. If you want to cooperate with Project R and DDDDDHK, please don’t hesitate to contact us. 歡迎聯絡 (Contact)Project R email：cs@renaissancehk.comDDDDDHK email：hello@dddddhk.com R 來自 RENAISSANCE，有再生、復興的意思。建立以來，PROJECT R 致力構建一個屬於全球香港人的社區及經濟共同體，做到香港人靠香港人，拒絕單一經濟依賴。同時，PROJECT R 以聘請各地年輕人為主，確保年輕人能靠其才能自食其力，保證他們的作品及努力能衝出香港，建立一個屬於香港人的創意品牌。The “R” stands for “renaissance”, the spirit of rebirth and recovery. Project R is committed to reinvent Hong Kong into a great economic and cultural power which embraces universal values, thrives globally and is respected by the world. We hope to build a global community where Hongkongers can live their dreams and determine their destiny. Project R hires young Hongkongers in parts of the world for their talents to shine beyond borders and develop a creative brand for Hongkongers.自2019年起，香港人於世界各國前展現了捍衛民主自由的決心。作為在日的香港人組織，DDDDDHK致力輸出海外港人的設計、文案、商品等，以展示香港人的核心價值和文化觀點。DDDDDHK亦協助黃色經濟圈同路人，提供商業品牌設計等策劃工作。Since 2019, HongKongers have demonstrated their determination on defending democracy and freedom internationally. Initiated by Japan-based HongKongers, DDDDDHK commits to cultural diplomacy spreading the core value and cultural perspective of HongKongers through designs, creatives, and products created by overseas Hongkongers. As part of the Global Yellow Economic Circle, DDDDDHK also provides creative and branding services to like minded businesses.Follow usProject RDDDDDHK 此系列其實於 2020 年 6 月至 7 月由 DDDDDHK 自家推出，並得到各方同路人支持，包括八百幾個來自28個國家的 BACKERS，高峰期籌得四十多萬港幣，並一度成為 INDIEGOGO的FASHION-FORWARD FINDS HIGHLIGHTS 及 TRENDING CAMPAIGN。可惜受政治環境影響，無奈取消。This series of design was previously launched by DDDDDHK in June 2020 and backed by over 800 backers from 28 countries with a funding of over HK$400,000. The campaign was even listed on Indiegogo as a “Fashion-forward Finds Highlights” and “Trending Campaign.” Unfortunately, due to the change in political circumstances, the campaign did not proceed to the production stage.縱然面對重重困難，念念不忘，必有迴響，DDDDDHK 夥拍 PROJECT R 重新推出，為的是更完備的架構，成就更完美的產品，祈望大家能一起與我們克服困難。Despite difficulties, Project R reached out for partnership with DDDDDHK and relaunched the campaign with a better campaign structure and product quality.是次合作在用料上均使用台灣及日本製原料，加上由台灣師傅逐件細心印刷，與普通量產型產品不同，每件貨品均通過在台年輕人悉心挑選及溝通而成，加上海外運輸方面也積極使用海外公司，因此成本價頗高。In this collaboration, all the products were printed by hand individually with high-quality raw materials from Taiwan and Japan. Unlike other mass-produced apparel, the entire production process of JTHK products was carefully planned by an energetic group of Hongkongers all over the world including Taiwan. To refuse influence from the authoritarian regime, we use foreign shippers and couriers to handle our orders.  This new operation model may have increased our costs and pushed up the product prices. That said, we are free from the undue influence of suppliers controlled by the authoritarian regime.  因應 COVID-19 持續肆虐全球，在可見將來運輸上也受到一定延誤，甚至面臨高成本運輸。但我們會盡力把貨品送到客人手上，請大家耐心等候。Due to the COVID-19 situation, overseas shipments might possibly experience significant delay and bear a higher delivery fee. But we will try our best to make it to your door. 展望ForecastJTHK 並非單靠我們，亦需要有你這位同路人的支持，才能達成以上目標。我們希望透過與不同團體合作、透過銷售，找出更多志同道合的同路人，讓一切在買賣中成熟，推出更多產品，擴大黃色經濟圈實力。同時，提升香港年輕人競爭力，協助外國戰線，並支援更多需要情緒支援的香港人。讓我們共同努力，以不同方式繼續支持香港。We can never achieve our goal without your support. As our brand evolves, we hope to network with like minds and collaborate with other groups and individuals. We look forward to creating more products to enlarge our economic ecosystem and raise the market competitiveness of Hongkongers. We will also provide more help to Hongkongers who suffer from mental health issues. 香港人は諦めない！2019年、多くの香港人は正義、自由と民主のために、警察の暴力に抵抗し、全てをかけて戦いました。逮捕して虐待され、怪我をしたりPTSDを発症したりした人が多数います。苦しい戦いが続きますが、香港人は正義を求めることを諦めません。DDDDDHKがデザインし、Project Rが生産したTシャツとパーカーを通して、香港人が自由を求める声を届けたいと考えています。 戦いと日常今は自由に意見を口にすることができない時代ですが、私たちは諦めません。Tシャツを通じて、香港人の結束と希望を取り戻したいのです。私たちのメッセージはデザインに隠されています。だから、どこでも安心して着ることができます。着ることで香港人を応援してください。 JTHKJTHKは日本（Japan）、台湾（Taiwan）と香港（Hong Kong）の絆を意味します。全ての製品は日本でデザイン、台湾で生産され、プロジェクトを実行するのが香港です。全世界の香港人が協力するという前例のないプロジェクトなのです。若くてエネルギッシュで、才能のある香港人たちによって初めて可能になりました。 全球流行World Trendingこの一年、香港人は自由世界の最前線で暴政と戦い、民主のために少なくないことを成し遂げました。私たちは正義、自由、民主を求める香港人の不屈の精神を、文化として世界へ届けたい。JTHKを着て、私たちの声を他の人々に伝え、香港人を応援してください。 Japan x Hong Kong3つのデザインには、日本と香港の言葉と文化が融合しています。日本の文字で香港の苦しみと精神的な粘り強さを表し、香港と日本の一体感を出しました。 BE WATERこのカタカナの塊りは香港デモ者たちの心に響き、彼らに共鳴をもたらす言葉である。「BE WATER」とは、水のように環境に応じて自由自在に形を変えることを意味する。このデザインは正に香港人の「水になれ」精神に沿って、様々な制限や抑圧の下に己の声を上げようとするものである。 SOUL富士山と香港のシンボルである獅子山のデザインは、日本と香港の心を重ねることを表現しています。  ROUTE文字通り、わかる人にはわかるということです。＊ご注文したお客様に限り、そのデザインに隠されたメッセージを説明します。 パーカーついてHoodies背後其實喑隱藏玄機，戴上帽的一刻會揭露一條繡有「HONGKONGER」的直幡，形態顯然勾起同路人的集體回憶，彰顯我們的心聲及自我認同。設計如港人般靈活變通，隨心戴上，隨機脫下。帽形亦比市面 HOODIES 稍大，能全面包裹頭部。パーカーのフードを被る時、「HONGKONGER」という文字が見えます。後ろの「HONGKONGER」を隠すか見せるかは自由自在で、「水になれ」というモットーの活用の一つとなります。 製品情報 
日本設計、台湾生産、香港運営
在日香港人団体DDDDDHKがデザインします。JTHKの素材はファストファッション用と違って、全部台湾で生産します。顔料は日本の顔料を使用します。営業、生産、カスタマーサービス、宣伝、物流などはほとんどを新卒や学生のPROJOECT Rが担当します。 黄色経済圏を作り、世界中に声を届けよう香港人は抗議活動のほか、色々な形で戦っています。「黄色経済圏」はその一つです。黄色経済圏とは「デモ支持」を表明しているサービスを利用しようというキャンペーン。今回の生産を通じて、国際的な規模にまで拡大するのです。私たちの目標は、このキャンペーンによって、独裁国家を経由しない供給チェーンを作ることができるのを世界中に見せることです。独裁国家を経由しなくても、品質が良いものを楽しむことができるということです。 千鳥花基金Recovery Fund商品を購入することで、支払ったお金の一部は千鳥草基金に寄付されます。千鳥草基金は、デモによってメンタルヘルスの不調の病気を患った人への支援を行います。   海外で戦う若者を応援せよ抗議活動により、経済的に苦しくなったり、住所を失ったり、自立しなければならなくなった若者が多くいます。PROJECT Rは彼らを雇用する形で、自立できるように支援します。香港人の思いが世界中に届き、「黄色経済圏」ができるように、ご協力をお願いします。興味・関心がある方は、ご遠慮なく相談してください。Project R email：cs@renaissancehk.comDDDDDHK email：hello@dddddhk.com PROJECT RのR はルネサンス（RENAISSANCE）というフランス語で、「再生」「復活」を意味します。PROJECT Rは世界中に進出し、香港人の経済圏を作ることを目指しています。香港人のブランドを作り、香港人を雇用することにより、彼らが自立できるように支援します。2019年以降、香港人は世界中に民主と自由を守る決意を示しました。DDDDDHKは日本における香港人組織として、香港人のデザイン、商品などを輸出し、香港人の最も重要な価値観を表します。また、デモを支持する企業にデザインや、ブランド作りのサービスを提供しています。Since 2019, HongKongers have demonstrated their determination on defending democracy and freedom internationally. Initiated by Japan-based HongKongers, DDDDDHK commits to cultural diplomacy spreading the core value and cultural perspective of HongKongers through designs, creatives, and products created by overseas Hongkongers. As part of the Global Yellow Economic Circle, DDDDDHK also provides creative and branding services to like minded businesses.Follow usProject RDDDDDHK 一連のデザインは2020 年 6月〜7月にDDDDDHKによってリリースされました。28カ国の人々に募金していただき、総額は40万香港ドル（535万円相当）に達しました。キャンペーンは「Fashion-forward Finds Highlights」と「Trending Campaign」として、Indiegogoにもリストされています。しかし残念ながら、政治的な原因でこの計画は中止になりました。それにも関わらず、DDDDDHKはPROJECT Rと連携し、改めて、もっと品質が良いものを作るように努力します。今回生産した商品は、市販のファストファッションと異なって、独裁政権の国に一切関わっていません。台湾と日本の原材料を使っています。独裁政権による影響を避けるため、海外の物流会社を利用していますので、コストも高くなります。新型コロナの影響で輸送が遅延し、コストが高くなることが見込まれますが、商品が必ずお客様のもとに届くように努力します。 展望Forecast色々な団体の協力によって、もっと仲間を集め、事業を拡大し、香港人の知名度を高めることを目指しています。そのために、あなたの力が必要です。メンタルヘルスに苦しんでいる香港人を支援したいのです。

story:
The Shaper Brush is a new hair styling brush created and provisional patented  pending by Jonathan at JC Prevail. Designed to polish all hair textures; straight, wavy, and curly hair.  Made with both professional and home use in mind. This unique tool is used to finish the perfect hair look.

The head of this brush is made special material that is antistatic and breathable. This means it can smooth out flyaways, tighten up curls,  and defines updos. The handle comes in various colors to match your personality. 

 

The Shaper Brush was created to work on all hair texture and types. Fine or course, straight or curly, it works on all of them. The brushes versatility allows it to tackle the different needs of hair of various styles. 

 

Besides working on different hair textures, it is great for extensions and wigs. It has no bristles, so it wont pull on extensions attachments. How the Shaper Brush can be used on natural hair, it can be used on wig hair.

All these styles were finished with the Shaper Brush. Getting that sleek look with laying down baby hairs. Shaping the extra voluminous looks. Managing those misplaced hairs in updos. Even help create avant-garde looks. The classic styles have use for the brush too.

 

Smooth Frizz

 

 

Sliding the Shaper Brush over frizzy hair, it makes a styled hair presentable. Misting the hair with hairspray can give extra hold.

Revive Curls

 

With a little hairspray, using the Shaper Brush to lift curls back to life.

 

Shape extra curly hair

 

Extra curly hair or back combed hair can be shaped with the Shaper Brush. Use The brush with hair spray and press the curls in the direction of the desired form. 

 

Finish styled hair

 

The Shaper Brush works great with finish hair looks. It can get into delicate styled hair and be used to polish hair looks.  

 

Sectioning

 

The end of the Shaper Brush was designed to be used to part and section hair.

 

 

 

 

 

The angles and thinness of the head allow to get in different areas of hair styles. The wide surface area of the head allow to smooth flyaways and frizz and push up curls into place. 

The textured handle allows the user to have a better grip of the tool as well as giving the tool a beautiful look.

The head of the tool has a sleeve that is changeable, this is so it can be changed between clients and can be washed and reused.

The sleeve is easily changed
 

The key factor to the shaper brush is the material used in the shaper brush sleeve. It is a stretchy breathable and antistatic material. This means it forms around what the hair shape. The air flow through the material allows hairspray to dry while the bush holds the hair in place. The material doesn't easily get hair spray build up, but when it does, it can be washed. The antistatic property makes the hair from standing up while trying control the hair.

 

 

The tool handle comes in three different colors. So you have the choice in what style you like.

 

 

 

 

 

About Me

Jonathan started in hair industry in 2011 after he thought it would be a industry that suited his wild side. He didn't find his true love of hair until he discovered styling and designing hair looks. Diligently working on perfecting and recreating his craft. Since then he has lead fashions shows, worked on many publications and has even won awards. He has stayed in the capital of California yet his work has been seen across the world.

 

In the midst of the quarantine of 2020, Jonathan started working on the Shaper Brush. He started the company JC Prevail to produce the Shaper Brush. He has written the patents, taught himself how to make the tool, and made this a labor of love. Jonathan has been driven to make the Shaper Brush a vital tool for both professional and home use.

story:
Welcome to the Future of Fashion!

We want funding to launch more ethical & sustainable products that feed people in need and make #FeedwithFashion a lifestyle!

Who are ETAN Apparel?

ETAN Apparel is a luxury and ethical fashion brand that feeds people in need for every item sold and we give you, the customer the option to choose who you want to feed for every item you purchase. Our mission is to provide 1M meals by 2025 and provide feeding options to our customers in over 100 countries (we currently offer 5 countries). 

Example of a product page on the ETAN website which asks the customer who they want to feed for every item they purchase

We have 3 core pillars to our brand:

Ethical - We ensure to only work with ethical factories meaning that workers are paid and treated fairly and work in a safe environment with regular breaks.

Sustainability - We are committed to being sustainable as possible from the fabrics we use (check out our Sustainwear range which is growing very quickly) to distributing orders to customers where we have removed all unnecessary plastic packaging and now using sugar cane mailer bags. We also promote and educate our customers on our social channels about recycling and up-cycling and we are constantly looking for ways to be more sustainable.

Charity - We donate money from every order to various charities to help us achieve our goal of feeding those in need. Our aim is to eventually open up our own ETAN Soup Kitchens around the world.

ETAN Women's Ribbed Seamless Set

What do customers think about ETAN?

Examples of customer reviews. More can be found here

How was ETAN created?

The founder, Kevin Patrick came across an article of a gentleman in India who gave up his well-paid job working in a 5* hotel as a catering manager to feed and look after the homeless people of his home town with his own money. The reason why the gentlemen did this was that one day whilst he was driving back home and waiting in the heavy traffic, he saw a homeless person eating his own (or someone/something else's) excretion due to extreme poverty. After seeing this horrific image the gentleman was not able to sleep or live with himself especially working in an industry where a huge amount of food is wasted.

Kevin's family is originally from South India and therefore resonated with this story as he too has seen many homeless people in India begging for food during his travels and wanted to do something to change this. This saddening but uplifting story gave Kevin the inspiration and drive to create ETAN Apparel.

How do you feed people in need?

For every item sold we donate money directly to 3 charities (depending on who is being fed):

Brixton Soup Kitchen - 8 people in need in London with a hot meal each

Akshay Patra Foundation - 1 person in India for a whole month

Penny Appeal - 5 people in need with a hot meal each either in Yemen, Nigeria or Ethiopia

PS. Even if you don't back us, please donate to one of these amazing charities

ETAN Organic Hoodie (Vegan certified and made from organic cotton and recycled polyester)

Why do you need the funding?

We need your help to grow and to feed more people in need in a fashionable way. We look forward to rewarding our backers with our limited edition Signature T-shirts & Hoodies and welcoming them to the ETAN family (which will feed people in need too)! With the funds we not only want to increase our brand awareness campaigns and educate the market on the hunger crisis but we would also like to launch more ethically manufactured, sustainable fashionable products such as: 

Examples of  Vegan approved (by Peta) and ethically manufactured activewear products that we would love to launch to give our customers more choice and as a result feeding more people in need around the world

What are the items being offered as rewards?

We are super excited to be able to offer our backers with a brand new product that will be even more special as every item will have a number on the piece of clothing making it a Limited Edition item and the number will refer too which backer they are i.e. if they are the first, their piece of clothing will have a 1 on it (small and discreet) but it will truly be one off a kind! 

The Signature Collection is going to be our best selling range as it brings beautiful quality with ethical manufacturing and sustainable fabrics finished with new additions such as:

- ETAN Neckline

- ETAN side tab

- ETAN embroidered patch will be added to the clothing which will say - This item fed people in need #FeedwithFashion

We hope these additions will create a very premium looking product that we hope to roll out to our entire range as we keep growing.

The T-shirts will be made from Organic Cotton & Elastane with ETAN printed in the centre chest and the Hoodies will be made from Organic Cotton with ETAN embroidered in the centre chest. Every item will feed people in need too so not only can you help us by purchasing and wearing an ETAN Apparel product but you directly feed people in need and are helping us make #FeedwithFashion a lifestyle! 

How do you pronounce ETAN?

We're glad you asked! ETAN is pronounced eaten - Have you eaten today? The answer is most probably yes but there are millions around the world who would say no and we would like to change that.

ETAN Vegan Certified Cross-Neck Hoodie

Message from the owners of ETAN

Firstly, thank you for taking the time to check out our Indiegogo campaign. We are so passionate and dedicated to make Feeding with Fashion a lifestyle and we're excited that this campaign can help us achieve that faster! We believe every person should have access to good food and although we can't fix the problem overnight we will continue to work tirelessly to make a difference. We are overwhelmed by the response of customers and fans all around the World and we can already see ETAN being recognised as a movement to feed those in need. 

Whether you support us or not  here please do follow us on Instagram and keep an eye on our ever growing range!

Kevin & Sam

ETAN Multi Sport Short Sleeve Top & Tapered Joggers
story_txt: Welcome to the Future of Fashion!We want funding to launch more ethical & sustainable products that feed people in need and make #FeedwithFashion a lifestyle!Who are ETAN Apparel?ETAN Apparel is a luxury and ethical fashion brand that feeds people in need for every item sold and we give you, the customer the option to choose who you want to feed for every item you purchase. Our mission is to provide 1M meals by 2025 and provide feeding options to our customers in over 100 countries (we currently offer 5 countries). Example of a product page on the ETAN website which asks the customer who they want to feed for every item they purchaseWe have 3 core pillars to our brand:Ethical - We ensure to only work with ethical factories meaning that workers are paid and treated fairly and work in a safe environment with regular breaks.Sustainability - We are committed to being sustainable as possible from the fabrics we use (check out our Sustainwear range which is growing very quickly) to distributing orders to customers where we have removed all unnecessary plastic packaging and now using sugar cane mailer bags. We also promote and educate our customers on our social channels about recycling and up-cycling and we are constantly looking for ways to be more sustainable.Charity - We donate money from every order to various charities to help us achieve our goal of feeding those in need. Our aim is to eventually open up our own ETAN Soup Kitchens around the world.ETAN Women's Ribbed Seamless SetWhat do customers think about ETAN?Examples of customer reviews. More can be found hereHow was ETAN created?The founder, Kevin Patrick came across an article of a gentleman in India who gave up his well-paid job working in a 5* hotel as a catering manager to feed and look after the homeless people of his home town with his own money. The reason why the gentlemen did this was that one day whilst he was driving back home and waiting in the heavy traffic, he saw a homeless person eating his own (or someone/something else's) excretion due to extreme poverty. After seeing this horrific image the gentleman was not able to sleep or live with himself especially working in an industry where a huge amount of food is wasted.Kevin's family is originally from South India and therefore resonated with this story as he too has seen many homeless people in India begging for food during his travels and wanted to do something to change this. This saddening but uplifting story gave Kevin the inspiration and drive to create ETAN Apparel.How do you feed people in need?For every item sold we donate money directly to 3 charities (depending on who is being fed):Brixton Soup Kitchen - 8 people in need in London with a hot meal eachAkshay Patra Foundation - 1 person in India for a whole monthPenny Appeal - 5 people in need with a hot meal each either in Yemen, Nigeria or EthiopiaPS. Even if you don't back us, please donate to one of these amazing charitiesETAN Organic Hoodie (Vegan certified and made from organic cotton and recycled polyester)Why do you need the funding?We need your help to grow and to feed more people in need in a fashionable way. We look forward to rewarding our backers with our limited edition Signature T-shirts & Hoodies and welcoming them to the ETAN family (which will feed people in need too)! With the funds we not only want to increase our brand awareness campaigns and educate the market on the hunger crisis but we would also like to launch more ethically manufactured, sustainable fashionable products such as: Examples of  Vegan approved (by Peta) and ethically manufactured activewear products that we would love to launch to give our customers more choice and as a result feeding more people in need around the worldWhat are the items being offered as rewards?We are super excited to be able to offer our backers with a brand new product that will be even more special as every item will have a number on the piece of clothing making it a Limited Edition item and the number will refer too which backer they are i.e. if they are the first, their piece of clothing will have a 1 on it (small and discreet) but it will truly be one off a kind! The Signature Collection is going to be our best selling range as it brings beautiful quality with ethical manufacturing and sustainable fabrics finished with new additions such as:- ETAN Neckline- ETAN side tab- ETAN embroidered patch will be added to the clothing which will say - This item fed people in need #FeedwithFashionWe hope these additions will create a very premium looking product that we hope to roll out to our entire range as we keep growing.The T-shirts will be made from Organic Cotton & Elastane with ETAN printed in the centre chest and the Hoodies will be made from Organic Cotton with ETAN embroidered in the centre chest. Every item will feed people in need too so not only can you help us by purchasing and wearing an ETAN Apparel product but you directly feed people in need and are helping us make #FeedwithFashion a lifestyle! How do you pronounce ETAN?We're glad you asked! ETAN is pronounced eaten - Have you eaten today? The answer is most probably yes but there are millions around the world who would say no and we would like to change that.ETAN Vegan Certified Cross-Neck HoodieMessage from the owners of ETANFirstly, thank you for taking the time to check out our Indiegogo campaign. We are so passionate and dedicated to make Feeding with Fashion a lifestyle and we're excited that this campaign can help us achieve that faster! We believe every person should have access to good food and although we can't fix the problem overnight we will continue to work tirelessly to make a difference. We are overwhelmed by the response of customers and fans all around the World and we can already see ETAN being recognised as a movement to feed those in need. Whether you support us or not  here please do follow us on Instagram and keep an eye on our ever growing range!Kevin & SamETAN Multi Sport Short Sleeve Top & Tapered Joggers

story:
A vision of "Farm to Closet"

The agricultural (“Farm”) products derived from food waste or regenerative sources for made into the Biobased Vegan Material, alternative to leather making handbags for Women’s “Closet”. 

Victoria Campelo, our niece, shot at our farm in West Australia

The grappaSac is made from Grape Vegan Leather, organically from agricultural and designed to be an essential day-to-night bag, weekend and weekdays. For the Farm or Cycling in the Park or At Work or Sunset Drinks. Made from grape leftovers from winemaking...Stalks, Skins and Seeds...repurposed into material that's kind to the environment, sustainable, zero waste, and vegan.

A leather alternative that is :

  • lightweight, durable
  • water resistant 
  • 100% sustainable
  • Guilt-free fashion powered by science

4 Styles in ONE, Timeless Design. The easy convertible system allows a fast change, everyday functionality for the busy, modern woman.  

  1. Backpack
  2. Shoulder bag
  3. Crossbody bag
  4. Clutch handbag

grappaSac is a bag for the next generation using alternative vegan material for leather in order to reduce the environmental impact of livestock towards global Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Net Zero Emissions by 2050. Responsibly sourced. Responsibly produced.

Here's to offsetting your carbon footprint. Designed for a better future. Together.

4 Styles in ONE - Backpack, Shoulder Bag, Crossbody and Clutch Handbag

A space for all your essentials and treasures. Keeping you organized and efficient.

See what’s in Victoria’s grappaSac:

  • Iphone & Tablet & Headphone
  • Skincare & Makeup
  • Pens, Books & Note books
  • Water bottle, Sunglasses & Comb
  • hand sanitizer
  • Passport
  • Key's & Key Wallet

Interior pockets and dividers, 10 pockets in total. 

This is what is in Victoria's grappaSac

Water Resistant and Breathable

grappaSac is made from Sustainable Grape Vegan Leather that guaranteed durability, with characteristics that ensure that it is long lasting - Water Resistance and Breathability.

Our FREE sustainable dust bag can be used as a shopper or dust bag. Made from Certified Organic Cotton, low environmental impact, a balance of nature's ecosystem for positive climate change. 

The bag strap convertible system can be adjusted very easily and conveniently stored in the secure external back pocket of the bag. You won’t lose them, bag and straps are always together!

It allows a fast change…everyday functionality for the busy, modern woman.

Biobased Leather - Grape leather, the official name is VEGEA.

In collaboration with VEGEA, an innovative material characterized by the high content of vegetal, renewable and recycled raw materials: grape leftovers from winemaking, vegetal oils and natural fibers from agriculture.

The resultant material is breathable, water resistant, high temperature resistant with good physical properties and highly sustainable with grape marc as a by-product of the huge volumes of wine produced annually.

VEGEA grape leather is REACH compliant and solvent free. Environmentally friendly, non-toxic, with no odour, zero water, no synthetic or polluting oils and no ecosystem impact. Made in Italy.

Certified Organic Cotton - our dust bag is made from certified organic cotton. It is better for the planet. Instead of toxic pesticides, organic farming uses crop rotation, cover crops and organic fertilizers to create rich life-supporting soil. Pesticides have a bad habit of poisoning groundwater, streams, and rivers, which endangers the people and wildlife that rely on those sources. By replacing dangerous chemicals with natural alternatives and old-school agriculture techniques, farmers are spared dangerous levels of exposure.

Recycled Polyester - our lining is recycled polyester from used water bottles.

Media Coverage

Click to read more...

Hi, I am Jennifer Gardner, the founder of iFarmaissance. grappaSac is designed in Perth, Australia and sourced from Hong Kong. I personally design all products and communicate with the factories daily. My former job was in Senior Management for Universal Group overseeing the 600 worker sample room for COACH handbags. My handbag manufacturing experience allows me to control the whole quality assurance for the grappaSac bag.

Our team of artisans and factories are my ex-colleagues who have been working together for 20+ years for global fashion brands. We create high-quality, low-impact, long-lasting products. We carefully work together to reduce waste, chemicals, and plastics that endanger our planet’s ecosystems. Our timeless basics are designed to last—so making the right choice by the planet can be as simple as putting on grappaSac. 

I have completed the course at University of Cambridge, UK - Business and Climate Change: Towards Net Zero Emission.  

I’ve gained so much from the course. It’s not just about developing my own knowledge on climate change and a low carbon transition, but implementing a way in which I can influence others to bring necessary change to meet our net zero goals. 

No single individual can bring about positive climate change effectively. I have designed my own personal action plan to achieve as much influence as possible. 

I would like to invite you all on the decarbonisation journey to make a change. Together. For our future. Because it’s that future that’s ours to shape and design.

My background

Throwback over 3 decades.

I entered the handbag industry when I was 18, just after finishing my school college, back in 1988.

I learned sewing in the 12 worker sample room of my dad’s handbag factory as a starting point, then making bag patterns, sourcing materials, trims and hardware, production, quality control/ assurance, logistics, exporting and attending many, many trade shows all over the world.

Over the next 15 years, my dad’s factory developed from 100 workers to 600 workers and we found that we needed to develop professional management skills. My Dad sent me to learn all about ISO9000 Quality Management Systems and I became the Head of Delegation, Management Representative for the factory.

Following on from this I moved over to work for an IPO handbag factory, which allowed me to explore the handbag world on a much larger scale. The first client I worked for was Vera Wang (SVVW), then Avon, Tory Burch…and scores of other luxury fashion brands. Finally, my last employed position was overseeing the 600 worker sample room for COACH handbags in a Universal Group handbag factory.

Emerging from this period of COVID-19, my husband and I have built iFarmaissance brands @ifarmbrands together. Our focus has evolved to environmental, economic and social impacts and a sense of social responsibility now drives most of our decision making.

These are few photos of me in front of a sewing machine back in 2003 and a photo of me in March this year sourcing deadstock fabrics in Hong Kong. This is the journey I have been on since 1988, thank you for joining me and I look forward to sharing many special new moments with you in the future….

Brazil is the birth place of our niece, Victoria Campelo, our Brand Ambassador. Join us in our reforestation initiative for her birth place.

ONE TREE PLANTED is a non-profit organization focused on global reforestation. As an environmental charity, they're on a mission to make it simple for anyone to help the environment by planting trees!

For every grappaSac supported we are committing to give back to the environment, create a healthier climate, protect biodiversity and help reforestation worldwide.

And the donation will be in your name as an everlasting show of appreciation for your support.

Our niece, Victoria Campelo

"Bird Tree" Logo Inspiration

The inspiration for our logo was “biodiversity“ – that a single tree can represent a complex ecosystem of birds, insects and other species. We love too that there is a freedom to the movement of the birds that we all have the choice to learn and explore and contribute as part of nature.

“Biodiversity starts in the distant past and it points toward the future” – Frans Lanting

The diversity of nature surrounds us and relies upon us to protect it, but in the end we rely on nature for our survival. It is a reminder that together we can make environmental choices that lift our spirits and - are also good for the Planet…

Our Story

iFarmaissance is a family story, a generational desire to connect farming and fashion and sustainability. The family has a long history of farming in Albany, West Australia and everyone loves the farm life.

Jennifer, the founder, is an award winning product creator of the Knirps X1 case, a German Heritage brand which was granted 4 international product design awards in 2003.

Her life has been dedicated to the handbag Industry and she has been recognized by Global Luxury Brands for her contribution. She brought the concept of “Farm to Closet” to her husband Gary, a Chartered Accountant and sustainable business consultant in Australia and Asia.

Their shared inspiration begins in the harmony of nature. The farming of traditional products that can be ethically sourced – a balance between responsibly sourced natural fibres and innovative bio-materials to make an environmental impact and change for the future.

Together, they created the iFarmaissance brand, a name derived from (I)nnovation related to (Farm)ing and Ren(aissance), a rebirth of the traditions and soul of fashion.

The design vision for GrappaSac is a combination of environmental responsibility and aesthetics. You feel good and confident to have it, and you are proud of your contribution to positive climate change.

story:
As featured on Yanko Design.

Complete with luxe leather, an automatic internal light, smart design, phone-charging power bank, and built-in security system — NALPHI is smart luxury done right.

Every component is purpose-built and designed for comfort, style, ease, and function. NALPHI only uses the highest-grade materials to ensure long-lasting longevity, durability, and quality.

Clever in every way, this smart, luxury leather tote is the handbag you’ve always wanted.

NALPHI uses patented technology to automatically illuminate the interior of your bag when opened — making it easier to find what you need. The built-in InnerGlow LED light turns on the moment you open your bag and turns off after a few seconds.

No need to find a switch or hold up a flashlight, Inner Glow will flood your interior with light exactly when you need it, without hassle or frustration. Never fumble inside your bag again.

 

NALPHI is made from genuine full-grain, natural pigment leather — the same leather used by Europe’s most prestigious luxury houses.

This incredible leather is the highest grade possible and boasts exceptional durability, lifespan, and texture. It is what separates the average bag from top-of-the-line luxury products.

Top to bottom, NALPHI is made exclusively with this luxury-grade, full-grain leather, giving it unprecedented quality for its price.

NALPHI eliminates the markup found in most luxury brands without compromising on materials or design. We do this by cutting out the middleman, selling direct to you, and only offering fair prices. 

Our leather is premium-sourced and highest quality. Our technology is dialed in. Our design is detailed and styled to exquisite taste.

We've done 2 years of extensive User Experience & Usability research before designing. This is why our bag is so different from other bags on the market. We also believe in paying what is right to our employees, and for our materials. This means you get the best quality for the best price in full conscience.

NALPHI is equipped with special JustRight utility spaces for everything you need in your bag. From bottles to keys, keep your everyday items organized and quickly accessible no matter what.

The non-spill bottle loop keeps your water bottle secured inside your bag and easily accessible.

The detachable key loop makes sure your keys are always available within hands reach. 

The cosmetics pouch neatly stores all your makeup needs —keeping them consolidated and ready to go at a moment’s notice.

Scratch-proof pockets protect your phone and sunglasses from your other items in your bag. No more surprise scratches on your screens and lenses!

NALPHI is also big enough to easily fit a MacBook Air or iPad Pro. You can even comfortably accommodate in a 13” MacBook Pro!

The SecureMe warning system automatically sounds an alarm if any unexpected visitors peek into your bag. 

Simply switch it on when you want to secure your bag. If anyone opens the bag, NALPHI will detect it and alert you via a chirping alarm. The sound will also help ward away any potential pickpockets.

Keep your phone and mobile devices charged with EverPower, NALPHI’s 5,000mAh power bank. 

A two-way USB-C port allows you to charge EverPower, as well as any USB-C enabled devices, while a USB-C to USB-A adapter port lets you charge earlier-generation devices.

To recharge the EverPower power bank, simply plug the USB-C charging cable, with its own LED indicator, into the USB-C port. When the power bank is fully charged, the indicator changes color to let you know that it’s ready.

NALPHI features a comfortable design. Wide shoulder straps distribute the pressure on your shoulders, while lightweight materials make sure you don’t have any extra weight from the bag itself.

Carry your bag all day long without a problem. NALPHI is designed to give you a seamless, and comfortable experience inside and out.

Wear it on your shoulder, or turn it into a beautiful backpack.

NALPHI includes ForeverFresh perfume pods that are easily removable and replaceable. The pods hide in a tiny concealed compartment inside the bag, so they stay out of your way. If you ever need to remove them, simply slide them out.

Enjoy fresh scents every time you open your bag.

NALPHI uses two mechanisms to keep your belongings secure — high-end zippers and magnetic closures.

The zippers slide smoothly to open and close your bag, providing full closure with ease. The premium leather tags let you easily pull the zippers while giving a splash of color to the bag.

Magnetic closures let you quickly, easily, and securely access your bag without hassle. The magnetic closures connect with both your InnerGlow light and the SecureMe system, activating them upon opening. They also serve as a secondary, no-thought, automatic seal — that way you can access what you need quickly.

Protective bottom rivets keep the bottom of your bag safe from dust and wear.

Whether you’re a full-time mom, advancing your career, jet-setting to exotic locations, or doing it all at once, your bag should be the last thing you have to worry about.

NALPHI SmartBags are designed to be as dedicated and beautiful as you are.

In material, design, technology, and process, NALPHI excels across the spectrum. Enjoy premium quality, premium precision, and premium caliber with every corner and feature.

Hello, my name is Naina and I am the Founder & Creator of NALPHI, a company with a mission to create high-end luxury bags that balances style, comfort, and usability.

As a professional and a mother, I understand the problems that women face when choosing bags that are meant for work, then end up becoming a rucksack. They're full of useful and a few unnecessary features.

I was tired of carrying beautiful yet heavy bags with thin straps that dug into my shoulders as I juggled between work, home, kids, and occasional yoga classes. In other words, my bag needed to have a laptop, iPad, notebook, sunglasses, make-up, wallet, keys, lunch, a water bottle, snacks for kids, and yoga clothes at all times! Furthermore, with my busy schedule, I needed to quickly retrieve the correct items from my bag — all from one big black hole. Sound familiar?

According to a prominent usability researcher, Anya Meyerowitz, a woman spends close to 162 days searching for things in her bag. If this wasn't enough, what happens when we have to search for our keys in the dark? We use our phone light to get the keys, but then…no charge, right? Phew, now that's another problem that we have. Late nights out, long outdoor work, or a situation where we can't charge our phone. Hmm...so we carry a 'power bank'. But then we forget the power bank as it’s charging on the desk. The list goes on and on and on. And, I was a living testament to that research.

My company was created out of my desire to create the perfect bag that serves the purpose of being comfortable, stylish, and high on the usability-factor. Being a designer by profession and having spent years in the fashion industry — both in Italy and India — I refused to let fashion run over functionality and finally decided to take the matter in my own hands. This was the genesis of NALPHI, a company where we believe that a woman’s bag should be beautiful AND practical. So, we designed a beautiful bag made with the finest quality leather that solves the most critical and common problems faced by a busy, modern woman.

Our logo, the dolphin, defines us the best — a harmony between elegance and intelligence. This is our aim. We will continue to listen to all the challenges you face and continue to create beautiful products.
