This is why our bag is so different from other bags on the market. We also believe in paying what is right to our employees, and for our materials. This means you get the best quality for the best price in full conscience.NALPHI is equipped with special JustRight utility spaces for everything you need in your bag. From bottles to keys, keep your everyday items organized and quickly accessible no matter what.The non-spill bottle loop keeps your water bottle secured inside your bag and easily accessible.The detachable key loop makes sure your keys are always available within hands reach. The cosmetics pouch neatly stores all your makeup needs —keeping them consolidated and ready to go at a moment’s notice.Scratch-proof pockets protect your phone and sunglasses from your other items in your bag. No more surprise scratches on your screens and lenses!NALPHI is also big enough to easily fit a MacBook Air or iPad Pro. You can even comfortably accommodate in a 13” MacBook Pro!The SecureMe warning system automatically sounds an alarm if any unexpected visitors peek into your bag. Simply switch it on when you want to secure your bag. If anyone opens the bag, NALPHI will detect it and alert you via a chirping alarm. The sound will also help ward away any potential pickpockets.Keep your phone and mobile devices charged with EverPower, NALPHI’s 5,000mAh power bank. A two-way USB-C port allows you to charge EverPower, as well as any USB-C enabled devices, while a USB-C to USB-A adapter port lets you charge earlier-generation devices.To recharge the EverPower power bank, simply plug the USB-C charging cable, with its own LED indicator, into the USB-C port. When the power bank is fully charged, the indicator changes color to let you know that it’s ready.NALPHI features a comfortable design. Wide shoulder straps distribute the pressure on your shoulders, while lightweight materials make sure you don’t have any extra weight from the bag itself.Carry your bag all day long without a problem. NALPHI is designed to give you a seamless, and comfortable experience inside and out.Wear it on your shoulder, or turn it into a beautiful backpack.NALPHI includes ForeverFresh perfume pods that are easily removable and replaceable. The pods hide in a tiny concealed compartment inside the bag, so they stay out of your way. If you ever need to remove them, simply slide them out.Enjoy fresh scents every time you open your bag.NALPHI uses two mechanisms to keep your belongings secure — high-end zippers and magnetic closures.The zippers slide smoothly to open and close your bag, providing full closure with ease. The premium leather tags let you easily pull the zippers while giving a splash of color to the bag.Magnetic closures let you quickly, easily, and securely access your bag without hassle. The magnetic closures connect with both your InnerGlow light and the SecureMe system, activating them upon opening. They also serve as a secondary, no-thought, automatic seal — that way you can access what you need quickly.Protective bottom rivets keep the bottom of your bag safe from dust and wear.Whether you’re a full-time mom, advancing your career, jet-setting to exotic locations, or doing it all at once, your bag should be the last thing you have to worry about.NALPHI SmartBags are designed to be as dedicated and beautiful as you are.In material, design, technology, and process, NALPHI excels across the spectrum. Enjoy premium quality, premium precision, and premium caliber with every corner and feature.Hello, my name is Naina and I am the Founder & Creator of NALPHI, a company with a mission to create high-end luxury bags that balances style, comfort, and usability.As a professional and a mother, I understand the problems that women face when choosing bags that are meant for work, then end up becoming a rucksack. They're full of useful and a few unnecessary features.I was tired of carrying beautiful yet heavy bags with thin straps that dug into my shoulders as I juggled between work, home, kids, and occasional yoga classes. In other words, my bag needed to have a laptop, iPad, notebook, sunglasses, make-up, wallet, keys, lunch, a water bottle, snacks for kids, and yoga clothes at all times! Furthermore, with my busy schedule, I needed to quickly retrieve the correct items from my bag — all from one big black hole. Sound familiar?According to a prominent usability researcher, Anya Meyerowitz, a woman spends close to 162 days searching for things in her bag. If this wasn't enough, what happens when we have to search for our keys in the dark? We use our phone light to get the keys, but then…no charge, right? Phew, now that's another problem that we have. Late nights out, long outdoor work, or a situation where we can't charge our phone. Hmm...so we carry a 'power bank'. But then we forget the power bank as it’s charging on the desk. The list goes on and on and on. And, I was a living testament to that research.My company was created out of my desire to create the perfect bag that serves the purpose of being comfortable, stylish, and high on the usability-factor. Being a designer by profession and having spent years in the fashion industry — both in Italy and India — I refused to let fashion run over functionality and finally decided to take the matter in my own hands. This was the genesis of NALPHI, a company where we believe that a woman’s bag should be beautiful AND practical. So, we designed a beautiful bag made with the finest quality leather that solves the most critical and common problems faced by a busy, modern woman.Our logo, the dolphin, defines us the best — a harmony between elegance and intelligence. This is our aim. We will continue to listen to all the challenges you face and continue to create beautiful products.

story:
How To Back:

 

1. Click Back this Project Below:

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge.

2. Payment:

Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign. 

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information:

Don't worry about that yet! You will get to select your size, color choice and submit your shipping information on a survey we will send when the campaign ends. 

 

 

 

 

And we’re no strangers to the barefoot lifestyle.

What began as a beach sock in 2008, quickly evolved into shoes with ultra-thin outsoles. We listened to our customers and evolved our products towards their unified vision. We continually improved our process, people and product to provide our customers with service and attention to detail that we pride ourselves on.

Now our mission is to get the word out about the barefoot lifestyle and its many health benefits, which is why we’re excited to be bringing you Sockwa X10.

 

 

 

 Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
We are a French Designer brand from Paris

 

 

The Designer

Leo is a young but really talented designer. He started to design clothes at the age of 17 . He created his first streetwear brand with a friend. However it wasn't enough for him and he dreamt bigger. He really wants to create more than just clothes. He wants to make a lifestyle. He spent 1 year in a Design School and one other year in the famous fashion school in Paris: ESMOD. After that, he started to develop Deleo and created the first pieces of the brand. He wanted to develop a real lifestyle in Paris: he went out with his friends total look Deleo. He went to clubs or good restaurants to promote the new brand. He started to make the brand famous and created the first part of his new marketing strategy: Pop up stores. His vision is similar to a Music artist. He wants to create a community and make pop up tours & make parties. However before that he needed to know if his pieces were pleasant. He had his first fashion show during a Parisian fashion week contest. He won the Public Prize with 90% votes. The story in the making... 

What We Need & What You Get

We know people like our product. At present we are available exclusively in France. Now we wanted to develop the brand, produce the collection and have a pop up store. We need 100 000 euros for that. We estimate the cost of the production at 40 000 euros. We would like to keep the production in France or maybe in Europe because it's really important for us to retain the best quality and share the French fashion know-how. We really like to work on details like our designer's vision and it's important to be able to do that. Our strategy is based on the Pop up store. For that we need to develop a decor for our Pop up. We estimate that at 20 000 euros. We need to rent places too. It will cost 15 000 euros. The last part of our plan is communication. We really need to create partnerships with influencers and do a big advertisement campaign to make the brand more famous. this is one of the most important issues. We need to pay for shooting, models, influencers, magazines and Events. This will create the lifestyle of Deleo and make the brand different. We want to have events in Paris, Saint Tropez and Cannes to promote the Pop up store the following day. If you make us bigger than we expect, we will come to make your city crazy with a Deleo tour in the USA or in Japan. We want to change the idea of the luxury brand being too calm and boring. Our goal is to make a luxury brand more cool and modern. It's time to change the luxe with the new Deleo Lifestyle.

To help us to develop our brand we propose to you to obtain our new pieces from our last fashion show early. Be careful, it is limited. This access allows you to buy pieces of our collection even if you do not reside in France.

 

The Impact

Today LVMH and other big Fashion groups have the monopoly of the fashion world. In 2021, it's time to remake a new fashion and luxury brand independent and more modern. After the Coronavirus, the world needs to have fun. Paris is an incredible city where you can have fun while enjoying the pleasures of luxury. Parisian youths have fun, you should too. Make Deleo the brand that will revolutionize the codes of luxury. Help us to share the lifestyle. Be part of the Deleo lifestyle. 

It's also important to keep and continue the French know-how and continue to develop new styles in Paris. Our designer has done everything in his workshop until now. We want to sell French design, French quality and ethnic products. It's necessary for us to confront fast fashion and fight for all those who are exploited. 

Perks 

 

to see the work https://www.instagram.com/reel/CLpMbuDo5c5/?utm...

Also see the work:  https://www.instagram.com/reel/CN2o0k1IgX1/?utm...

 

Risks & Challenges

Our most important challenge is to receive enough pre-orders to be able to reduce our manufacturing costs which are very high. We work with a good factory and with expensive fabric. The more pre-orders we have , the easier it will be for us. We count on you..

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry, if you like the style, the brand or the project come to see us on instagram! A share can be a good way to help us too!

@deleofromparis

We are also seeking investors, contact us at deleostyle@gmail.com  

Thank you.

story:
CHELA - Handcrafted convertible leather Bag that Adapts to Your Life. Made in Argentina

Hi! I'm Niki, CHELA's creator. After years of looking for the perfect convertible bag, I decided to design one myself. That is how the idea of CHELA was born, almost two years ago!

CHELA quickly transforms from a gorgeous functional backpack into a stunningly chic tote.

 

CHELA IS IN STOCK!

After a successful launch and the delivery of more than 200 bags, we are offering a special price + a free leather pouch to the Indiegogo community! CHELAs are ready to be shipped worldwide!

 

HANDCRAFTED IN ARGENTINA

Each CHELA is handcrafted by artisans in Argentina, using highest quality leather. Decades of tradition and mastery are woven into every cut and stitch, resulting in a leather piece you will enjoy for many years.

 

 

 

It took 17 prototypes to develop CHELA, iterating between materials, mechanisms, and sizes. I have been personally testing it for two years and I'm amazed by how this high quality leather looks better and better with time.

MAIN FEATURES

Through the 17 prototypes, years of testing, and all the feedback we received, we added several features to CHELA. Here are some of the features that make CHELA the perfect accessory:

POCKETS

Day-to-night. Carry everything you need for your day and be prepared for the unexpected. We designed CHELA's interior so that everything you carry is organized and easily accessible.

 

CHELA has many functional pockets: a laptop cushioned sleeve, a bottle holder, 2 easy-access back pockets, a hidden pocket, and a key holder. And yes, you can detach the interior.

Pack it all. Take everything you need with you. CHELA will look amazing both as a shoulder bag and as backpack.

 

DETACHABLE ZIPPED INTERIOR

This is one of CHELA'S most exciting features. If you need extra space, simply unzip the interior and duplicate your carrying capacity.

 

 

We made the interior machine washable so that makeup accidents or beverage spills are easily remedied.

Interiors are interchangeable so you can transfer the interior - with all its contents - into a different CHELA.



COLORS

There are 4 color options.

MATERIALS AND DETAILS

When it comes to material we demand the best and accept nothing less. With Chela you will be getting the best Argentinean leather. 

As years go by, the leather will become softer without losing its durability. CHELA is a bag you will keep forever. Leather handcrafting is a pillar of the Argentinean tradition, alongside dancing Tango, drinking Mate and playing soccer.

 

 

 

CHELA's construction is of the highest quality, with extreme attention to detail.

CARRY YOUR CHELA EVERYWHERE

 

 

 

 

CHELA'S STORY

I am an architect born and raised in Buenos Aires, Argentina. My passion for design was born when I was 12 years old and my grandmother ("La Bobe") bought me a sewing machine and taught me how to use it. Since then, I have always created and altered my own clothes and designed my own leather jackets.

Two years ago I moved to New York City and realized I didn't have a functional and chic bag that could be used the entire day. I didn't like what was on the market so I started working on CHELA.

I began with a cardboard model, and from there I made the first leather prototype. On a trip to Buenos Aires I started working side by side with a family of leather artisans who have three generations in the craft. We worked on every improvement and design tweak together. 

I started using CHELA every day and people stopped me in the subway or on the streets to ask where I bought such a great bag. I realized then that there are other women with the same needs, and that I wanted to share CHELA with everyone.

story:
The Impact on the planet

Long-lasting design

We are a Zero waste sustainable brand, to minimise our impact on the planet we choose a circular production, to not generate unwanted items we decided to make only what is really needed, the life of our products start with our customers order. Our ethical business model blends ecological integrity with fairness to all the persons involved in the production process. Everything is designed to last and lovingly handmade in our London studio. We work tirelessly to test the durability and performance of every product.

Reusability and recyclability

All our fabric waste is reused to create Zero Waste accessories and stamp our labels. We offer repairs, when possible, and we will take back the products when they will reach the autumn of their life and transform them into a new textile using the technique of quilting. We work hard on keeping our products away from landfill. We only use compostable Eco-friendly packaging made from recycled materials

Sustainable materials

All our products are 100% Plastic-free and Biodegradable. We source our fabric form a BCI certified UK mill. Our creations are made by 100% cotton, coated with a vegan wax that makes it water repellent. For linings we use dead stock natural fabrics. The buttons are made by Corozo nut, also known as ''Vegetable Ivory''.

Environmentally friendly production

There are no factories involved in our production process: everything is handmade on-demand in our London studio. Sustainability policy and transparency is key when we choose our suppliers. They are all UK based: this is fundamental to reduce as much as we can our carbon footprint.

Sustainable Distribution

Our on-demand order system helps us drastically reduce our carbon footprint. Once an order is ready we ship it directly to the final customer without using any intermediaries. We communicate clearly with all our customers and offer made-to-measure options, to avoid disappointment with sizes and therefore minimising exchanges and returns.

Risks & Challenges

We have years of experience in the fashion industry, in both manufacturing and sales. We believe we will be able to successfully fulfil all the orders once the campaign ends. However, this is our first crowdfunding campaign and there may be unexpected challenges down the road. In these difficult times we understand that Coronavirus might have a potential impact on manufacturing and delivery. It’s difficult to know how the situation will evolve, and as of April 2021, our UK suppliers are working with reduced staff and the fabric production it will take longer than in normal times, but we put that in account. We do not rely on factories, everything is handmade in house by skilful seamstresses, but delays are still possible. Transparency is our priority, and our backers will be the first to know if anything changes in our delivery timeline. We are perfectionists!!! What you are seeing are prototypes, so expect the final product to be more polished and of supreme quality.

story:
100% FUNDED ON KICKSTARTER!

Nordberg Watches' vision is to help people open their eyes to mechanical watches and to lower the barriers to enter the watch community. We do this by creating affordable and uncomplicated entry watches that will ignite a watch interest for the broader market. 

After successfully selling out our first collection, Nordberg Kattegatt, we asked our customers what they were looking for in the perfect watch. The answer we received was: A slightly smaller all-around watch with a simple design and an automatic movement, on a stainless steel bracelet at a superior price. Consequently, with the close involvement of our active followers, the Nordberg Skagerrak was born, drawing inspiration from the surroundings of the Swedish west coast.

We have understood that many of you, just like us, are looking for a watch that goes back to basics - without parts from the moon, meteors or sunken boats. With this in mind, we designed the Nordberg Skagerrak with focus on the Swedish heritage of simplicity and robustness. The watch comes in two editions: Day and Night, limited to 250 pieces.


Day: Inspired by the sunrise of icy winter mornings on the island Tjörn, just outside Gothenburg, we designed the Nordberg Skagerrak: Day Edition. The white, matte color of the dial symbolizes the biting cold synonymous with the Nordics. The dark blue second hand reflects the Skagerrak ocean, which is constantly in motion and therefore never completely freezes to ice. The beautiful contrast between the two colors is a sight to behold and is stunningly replicated in the Nordberg Skagerrak: Day Edition. 

 


Night: Swedish summer nights are short – the sun barely sets behind the horizon! This results in a truly breathtaking color combination observed when the sun rests for a couple of hours before rising to signal the start of a gorgeous new summer day. Those first yellow rays of the morning sun, reflected by the sharp yellow second hand, piercing the dark summer night sky in Strömstad are what inspired us when we created the Nordberg Skagerrak: Night Edition. The yellow second hand is a legacy from our first collection, Nordberg Kattegatt.

The two second hands combined have the same color scheme as the Swedish yellow-blue flag. The indices are designed with the bare cliffs along the west coast in mind. The collection is limited to 250 watches with two years of international warranty, where you as a customer get to choose your own unique number between 1-250. Maybe your lucky number is still available?

 

 

Skagerrak is the part of the Atlantic ocean uniting Sweden, Norway and Denmark. The importance of the sea lies in its historical features, such as enabling exploration, adventure travels and relations between the Scandinavian countries and the rest of the world - from the Viking Age to modern time.

 

Above is the complete watch kit that will be delivered to you along with the Nordberg Skagerrak. Apart from the watch itself, you will find the following in your watch package:

  • A Nordberg Watches box
  • A watch certificate, stating your limited edition number and the reference number of the collection
  • A bracelet pin remover
  • An instructions manual

Furthermore, you will get to choose your very own NATO strap of the five above. Instructions on how to change between your stainless steel bracelet and the NATO strap using the bracelet pin remover will be provided in the instructions manual.

 

The Nordberg Watches team consists of four Swedish watch enthusiasts: Jakob, Henrik, Johan and Charlie, with a close connection to the Swedish west coast. The name Nordberg Watches originates from the surname Nordberg which is Johan's mother's family name. In Swedish, Nord means north and Berg means mountain, which suits our focus on nature as well as the simplicity and unique environment of the Nordics.

The idea behind Nordberg Watches was born when we realized that there are a lot of people who have a growing interest in watches but are a bit lost in their research, just as we once found ourselves. It is difficult to navigate the watch market, and the barriers to enter the watch community are high. With Nordberg Watches, we make automatic watches available to people who, like ourselves, do not have a huge watch budget. Over the years, many have asked us for help finding the right watch. We are passionate about helping people explore and develop their interest in watches and the mechanics behind them. Therefore, we create affordable and uncomplicated entry watches that will help ignite an interest in automatic movements for the broader market. We welcome all watch enthusiasts, whether you are a first timer or an experienced watch collector, to participate in our community. 


We aim to deliver the Nordberg Skagerraks in November 2021. As you can read in Risks and Challenges below, this is our current estimation based on all the information we have today. If anything unexpected happens, delays may occur. The only thing we can assure you is that we will ALWAYS update you with both good and bad news before, during and after the campaign.

Additionally, the campaign goal of 450 000 SEK is what we have decided to be the lower limit for us to be able to proceed to production, and not the cost of the 250 watches. 


Our first watch collection, Nordberg Kattegatt, was limited to 50 pieces. It is a diver watch, measuring 42mm in diameter, inspired by the Kattegatt ocean surrounding Gothenburg, our home town. The Nordberg Kattegatt is powered by a Japanese Miyota 8215 movement. 

Nordberg Kattegatt sold out in only one week from its launch in February 2020, outside of Kickstarter. The feedback from our followers during this phase was overwhelming, and we became hooked on to the watch development process: from the first idea to the final shipment to our customers. This experience led us to move on to our next project, Nordberg Skagerrak, the day after the shipment of the last Nordberg Kattegatt.

We love watches and the process of making them. Doing this as a group of friends, together with the watch community in an iterative process is both incredibly fun and rewarding. Inspired by the Swedish heritage and nature, we want to continue creating and designing simple and robust watches with automatic movements, together with you.


 

A cornerstone of Nordberg Watches' strategy is our communication with the watch community and our desire to constantly receive constructive feedback. Below, we share our personal contact information, where you can get in touch with us if you have any questions or if you simply want to discuss watches with us. We also encourage you to ask your questions in the comments section here on Kickstarter, so that more people can read your questions and our answers.

We are four watch enthusiasts (nerds) and would love to talk with more of you like-minded people out there. We will continuously update you on how the project is progressing, in both ups and downs, and will ensure that the campaign page's FAQ is up-to-date. Take care of yourselves, and do not hesitate to contact us at the slightest thought!
story_txt:
100% FUNDED ON KICKSTARTER!Nordberg Watches' vision is to help people open their eyes to mechanical watches and to lower the barriers to enter the watch community. We do this by creating affordable and uncomplicated entry watches that will ignite a watch interest for the broader market. After successfully selling out our first collection, Nordberg Kattegatt, we asked our customers what they were looking for in the perfect watch. The answer we received was: A slightly smaller all-around watch with a simple design and an automatic movement, on a stainless steel bracelet at a superior price. Consequently, with the close involvement of our active followers, the Nordberg Skagerrak was born, drawing inspiration from the surroundings of the Swedish west coast.We have understood that many of you, just like us, are looking for a watch that goes back to basics - without parts from the moon, meteors or sunken boats. With this in mind, we designed the Nordberg Skagerrak with focus on the Swedish heritage of simplicity and robustness. The watch comes in two editions: Day and Night, limited to 250 pieces.Day: Inspired by the sunrise of icy winter mornings on the island Tjörn, just outside Gothenburg, we designed the Nordberg Skagerrak: Day Edition. The white, matte color of the dial symbolizes the biting cold synonymous with the Nordics. The dark blue second hand reflects the Skagerrak ocean, which is constantly in motion and therefore never completely freezes to ice. The beautiful contrast between the two colors is a sight to behold and is stunningly replicated in the Nordberg Skagerrak: Day Edition.  Night: Swedish summer nights are short – the sun barely sets behind the horizon! This results in a truly breathtaking color combination observed when the sun rests for a couple of hours before rising to signal the start of a gorgeous new summer day. Those first yellow rays of the morning sun, reflected by the sharp yellow second hand, piercing the dark summer night sky in Strömstad are what inspired us when we created the Nordberg Skagerrak: Night Edition. The yellow second hand is a legacy from our first collection, Nordberg Kattegatt.The two second hands combined have the same color scheme as the Swedish yellow-blue flag. The indices are designed with the bare cliffs along the west coast in mind. The collection is limited to 250 watches with two years of international warranty, where you as a customer get to choose your own unique number between 1-250. Maybe your lucky number is still available?  Skagerrak is the part of the Atlantic ocean uniting Sweden, Norway and Denmark. The importance of the sea lies in its historical features, such as enabling exploration, adventure travels and relations between the Scandinavian countries and the rest of the world - from the Viking Age to modern time. Above is the complete watch kit that will be delivered to you along with the Nordberg Skagerrak. Apart from the watch itself, you will find the following in your watch package:
A Nordberg Watches box
A watch certificate, stating your limited edition number and the reference number of the collection
A bracelet pin remover
An instructions manual
Furthermore, you will get to choose your very own NATO strap of the five above. Instructions on how to change between your stainless steel bracelet and the NATO strap using the bracelet pin remover will be provided in the instructions manual. The Nordberg Watches team consists of four Swedish watch enthusiasts: Jakob, Henrik, Johan and Charlie, with a close connection to the Swedish west coast. The name Nordberg Watches originates from the surname Nordberg which is Johan's mother's family name. In Swedish, Nord means north and Berg means mountain, which suits our focus on nature as well as the simplicity and unique environment of the Nordics.The idea behind Nordberg Watches was born when we realized that there are a lot of people who have a growing interest in watches but are a bit lost in their research, just as we once found ourselves. The Nordberg Kattegatt is powered by a Japanese Miyota 8215 movement. Nordberg Kattegatt sold out in only one week from its launch in February 2020, outside of Kickstarter. The feedback from our followers during this phase was overwhelming, and we became hooked on to the watch development process: from the first idea to the final shipment to our customers. This experience led us to move on to our next project, Nordberg Skagerrak, the day after the shipment of the last Nordberg Kattegatt.We love watches and the process of making them. Doing this as a group of friends, together with the watch community in an iterative process is both incredibly fun and rewarding. Inspired by the Swedish heritage and nature, we want to continue creating and designing simple and robust watches with automatic movements, together with you. A cornerstone of Nordberg Watches' strategy is our communication with the watch community and our desire to constantly receive constructive feedback. Below, we share our personal contact information, where you can get in touch with us if you have any questions or if you simply want to discuss watches with us. We also encourage you to ask your questions in the comments section here on Kickstarter, so that more people can read your questions and our answers.We are four watch enthusiasts (nerds) and would love to talk with more of you like-minded people out there. We will continuously update you on how the project is progressing, in both ups and downs, and will ensure that the campaign page's FAQ is up-to-date. Take care of yourselves, and do not hesitate to contact us at the slightest thought!

story:
Sad Fact

High heels are a symbol for hard working, strong and confident women.

However, we all know that it is painful to wear high heels.

Every woman has a wish, hope and longing for a comfortable pair of high heels.

But nobody has granted this wish to her.

We just accept it because our grandmothers, mothers, sisters and girlfriends keep telling us that we have to suffer for beauty.

They properly did not know that high heels are the root for 61% of foot problems.

One of the big problems for women on heels are bunions.

Every year over 100.000 women pay an average price of USD 5540 to remove bunions and use 4 to 6 months recovering.

It is truly a high price for women to pay.

It is about time that we change this fact for all at once.

 

 

 

Every woman needs a good pair of high heels, even better if it also protects her feet.

Let us introduce The Heart.

The Heart is an innovative pair of high heels. It is created to support the natural gait, to protect big toes, to give comfort and confidence. 

The Heart has 4 patent pending features:

  1. Shape – protecting the big toes
  2. A deeper heel cup with Auxetic foam
  3. Insole with Auxetic foam
  4. Outsole with Auxetic structure

 

We have changed the pointed shape because it damages the big toes.

Big toes are essential to us if we would like to walk, jump, run, dance etc.

A deeper heel cup is to stabilize your feet in high heels so you don’t slide down.

Auxetic is the main technology we use in our high heels because according to researches it performs and absorbs better than other commercial products.

Auxetic has a negative Poisson's ratio property which makes a material go either hard or flexible when it is exposed to pressure.

In other words Auxetic foam will absorb the pressure from the balls of the foot and Auxetic structure will spread the material when there is pressure and back again, when the pressure are gone. Just like the movement of the natural gait. 

 

 

 

High heels need to fit your feet perfectly in order to walk properly. However, finding a pair of high heels that fit your feet is very hard, because it varies from brands to brands. Furthermore if your feet are different from a standard size.

Have you ever tried a pair of high heels that are too tight at width? And thought that the solution for this problem is to choose a size bigger – does it help – no!

The length becomes big and makes you swoop in high heels.

It matters to us that you have a perfect pair of high heels because a good fitting gives a better comfort.

It will increase your confidence and power to conquer the World.

This is only exclusive for all Indiegogo backers as thank you for helping us get started!

 

 

 

 

We truly believe that The Heart will make a difference for a hardworking woman.

However, we need 100 women to help us to bring The Heart to life.

The money we are funding will create our first production orders of shoes, including all the tooling, molds and components that these complex designs need across custom made shoes.

If we reach our goal, we will create the online training program, so you will get a sustainable solution for wearing high heels. In fact we are the only shoes brand in the World, that provides this service. 

Without your help, women on heels repeat the vicious circle and nothing will change for our children and the present high heels will continue to damage their feet

- generation after generation.

We need to stop this!

Please help us to change this sad fact for femininity.

 

 

 

 

Everyone needs essential black comfort heels in their closet. Especially if you use it as workwear. They go with everything and make anything look great, so you don’t need to worry about the aftermath.

We got your back.

Our first collection contains The Heart in 2 different heights – 50mm & 70mm in black leather.

If the goal stretches we will reward you with different heel types, leathers and colors which will be available for all of you to pick. All the gifts will be added into your order for free. Gifts are at the goal DKK 500,000 and DKK 2,000,000.

For example if we reach  DKK 100,000 we will provide the training program for you. And If we reach DKK 200,000 the timeglass heels will be avaible but only in black color. So you can choose between the stilletto or timeglass heel. You have to order 2 times before you can get one of each. If we reach DKK 600,000 the colors in this box will be avaible to choose both in leather and heels. 

 

 

We will send you a guide on how to measure your feet – length and width - once the campaign closes.

However, below is our size chart with 3 widths.

If you cannot see your size, please don’t worry, we make the shoes based on your feet.

 

 

 

 

A bunion surgery costs an average USD 5540 and it doesn’t guarantee that you can avoid bunions afterwards. Besides particular bunions surgery, women in the USA spent an average USD 123 on comfort solutions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Creator

Hi beautiful soul, my name is Lam Pham.

I have 10 years’ experience in the fashion industry and I am the inventor of high-tech high heels, The Heart. I have used 3 years to study the foot problems and the pains following by wearing high heels. All my knowledge and knowhow about high heels and the latest technology are used to develop The Heart. The Heart support the natural gait during the walk.

My vision is to save femininity from the collective pains we have for 1000 of years.

It has been a long journey since the footwear industry is dominated by men so it had been challenged but I can assure you that I won’t give in and this is only the beginning.

Please help us so we can help more women.

 

Official Advisor – Dr. Bent Nielsen

Dr. Bent R. Nielsen is chef podiatrist and lead of the podiatrist department at Gentofte Hospital from 1987 – 2011. He has 44 years of experience in anatomy, physiology and infectious pathology. He is also president at Fodsundhed – an association for healthy feet where they guide how to maintain healthy feet. Dr. Bent has helped with understanding the anatomy of the foot, as well as foot disorders.

He will help with exercises when we get started with online training.

 

Frederikke Vagn-Hansen Kessner

Frederikke is our fitness expert and has 9 years of experience as a personal trainer, group fitness instructor and health coach. She will help you go through sweaty and fun training hours in our training program. With a strong knowledge on how the body functions, Frederikke will show you how to build a strong body that can support you in years to come while still enjoying wearing high heels in your daily life.

 

Freya Hong Nguyen

Freya Hong is our yoga teacher and she has a high vibration of good energy. She will help you with healing and teach you to be mentally strong. She will help you how to love your body more and how to release negative energy. Freya Hong is also a school teacher, so if you have headaches with kids, please feel free to ask her.

 

Our Team and Partners

We are a small team that works incredibly together and there are more than 25 people who help us bring this dream alive for all of you. They are experts in last/molds, designer, production partners, consultants, shoemakers and marketing partner.

 

 

 

 

 

We feel confident that we can fulfill these orders in the time specified, but there are always things beyond our control.

Lam Pham has led the productions/projects of different fashion brands as buyer/ manager and works closely with the suppliers and she always optimizes the supply chain. So we can deliver the orders as promised.  We've navigated through completely unexpected issues and always kept our communication channels with customers open and active so that you always feel connected to us and the company that you are helping launch!

The one thing we will be working on through this process is getting the custom-fitting process down perfectly. This may take some additional adjustments, but we are dedicated to find the solution everyone needs.

In short, we know what we're doing, and you can feel assured that we will fulfill our promise to deliver The Heart to you, so it can help you to conquer the World.

If any unforeseen issues come up, we will share them with you, our cherished backers, and solve them with our highly capable team who are dedicated to making this company a success.

Refund:

If your size are in our size chart, we are happy to refund your order. However if your size are custommade, it is hard for us to resell the shoes. Therefore it is impossible for us to offer refund. It also applies when your size are 2 different sizes but they are in our size chart. Fx your left foot is a size 5 with a narrow width and your right foot is size 5 but has a normal width. Or your left foot is a size 5 but right foot is 5.5. 

However we only collect happy customer, so please write to you and we will find a solution together. 

Supply Chain Risk:

We're incredibly proud of our supply chain. If something happens, we will always let you know and solve the time delay as quickly as possible!

Major Force:

We're based in Kolding, Denmark, and our factories are located in Europe and Asia and the goods need to be shipped to our warehouse in different places just as USA, Europe and Asia to make the shipping and customs smoother. If there is a major force, a pandemic or that we will get held up in customs, we will let you know.

And whatever happens, we'll get through it together.

That is a promise.

Learn more at Indiegogo.

story:
Fashion-Function-eco-Friendly

Fashion's environmental impact is major and changes to be more sustainable are essential. But we believe this doesn't mean sacrificing style.

 

Features

Recycled materials

  • Our nylon materials, both body and lining, are made of 100% recycled plastic, or post consumer PET
  • Recycled bottles are collected, shredded and turned into pellets. The pellets are spun into thread and finally woven to make fabric

​

Impeccably crafted with attention to detail

  • Easy entry zippers
  • Stress tested straps and handles
  • Durable, water resistant, and lightweight
  • Custom lining, webbing, buckles, zipper pulls, and chains

 

 

                                                         

Utilitarian elements

  • Pockets for whatever essentials you have in tow - glasses, cell phones, keys, credit cards, license, passport, etc
  • Protective compartments for your iPad/ tablet/ laptop
  • Removable shoulder straps - hands free when you need it

 

 

Versatile

Whether you're...

  • Headed for work or a jaunt in the countryside
  • About town or a night out
  • Traveling to a weekend away

ReVMP has you covered!

 

All inclusive

  • Something for EVERYONE who loves great styling, practicality, and shares the passion for sustainability

 

Packaging

  • Our bags are lightly packed with water soluble peanuts as opposed to wads of paper, reducing waste and transportation carbon footprint by shipping in smaller boxes
  • Each item is wrapped in a reusable dust bag also made of 100% recycled PET which can be repurposed as a handy sack for errands
  • Our shipping box is FSC-CERTIFIED made of 100% recycled paper and is itself recyclable

 

Responsibility

  • We are committed to responsible manufacturing and ethically sourced materials. Our factory operates at the highest level of standards and prides itself on giving back to the local community
  • ReVMP will participate in 1% for the Planet naming as beneficiary 5GYRES, "an organization empowering action against the global health crisis of plastic pollution through science, education, and adventure"

 

 

Styles

TIMOR - Bucket bag

  • Signature logo chain
  • Removable shoulder strap
  • Interior zip pocket & 2 slip in pockets
  • Dimensions: 11"H, 12"L, 7"W
  • Retail price: $150
  • Colors: Onyx, Ocean, Moss (as shown)

 

BISMARK - Tote bag

  • Signature logo ornament
  • Protective iPad/ tablet/ laptop compartment
  • Interior zip pocket & 2 slip in pockets
  • Dimensions: 13"H, 18"L, 6'W
  • Retail price: $160
  • Colors: Onyx, Ocean (as shown)

 

BANDA - Flap Shoulder bag

  • Signature logo chain
  • Interior zip pocket & 2 slip in pockets
  • Dimensions: 10"H, 13"L, 4'W
  • Retail price: $130
  • Colors: Onyx, Ocean

 

BAFFIN - Belt bag

  • Adjustable strap
  • Easy entry double zip top
  • Exterior back zip pocket
  • Interior 2 slip in pockets
  • Dimensions: 7"H, 10"L, 2"W
  • Retail price: $110
  • Colors: Onyx (as shown), Moss, Ocean

 

SARGASSO - Weekender bag

  • Removable shoulder strap
  • Easy entry double zip top
  • Exterior double zip pocket
  • Interior 2 slip in pockets
  • Protective iPad/ tablet/ laptop compartment
  • Sleeve to slip on to your roller case
  • Dimension: 12"H, 18"L, 8"W
  • Retail price: $220
  • Colors: Onyx (as shown)

 

SIGSBY - Backpack

  • Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Easy entry double zip top
  • Exterior front double zip compartment
  • Exterior side pockets
  • Interior zip pocket & 2 slip in pockets
  • Protective iPad/ tablet/ laptop compartment
  • Sleeve to slip on to your roller case
  • Dimension: 17"H, 11"L, 7"W
  • Retail price: $220
  • Colors: Onyx (as shown), Moss

 

BEAUFORT - Briefcase

  • Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Easy entry double zip top
  • Exterior front double zip compartment
  • Interior zip pocket & 2 slip in pockets
  • Protective iPad/ tablet/ laptop compartment
  • Sleeve to slip on to your roller case
  • Dimension: 13"H, 17"L, 5"W
  • Retail price: $180
  • Color: Onyx (as shown)

 

Who we are

Inspired to bring to market a collection of accessories that are at once sustainable, functional, and chic, three industry veterans and longtime colleagues shared our expertise in pursuit of our passion.

OUR MISSION

  • To deliver sustainable, chic, quality products at accessible prices
  • Work with manufacturers that share our values
  • Give back with donations to an organization committed to making the planet a greener place
  • Continue to seek out and utilize new types of recycled materials

 

 

We are delighted to share our vision with a compelling and eco-friendly collection of accessories aptly named ReVMP. We hope you are as excited as we are to discover the world of ReVMP. 

 

Follow us

www.shopRevmp.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReVMPNY

Instagram: revmpny

 

Contact us

info@vmpnygroup.com

 

Support us

Click on the pink 'Back it' icon to:

  • Fund us

  • Pre order with a discount

Get our link out to EVERYONE you know

 

Your support will help us fund our first production run and realize our objective to build ReVMP into "The global GO TO brand" for fashionable and eco-friendly accessories, and our commitment to repurposing waste. And don't forget each purchase helps support the health of our precious oceans.

Wear ReVMP and SPREAD the LOVE!

THANK YOU!

 

Challenges


During these unprecedented times everything is taking a little longer. Please bear with us as we experience a longer than usual production lead time. Expected delivery is May 2021. We promise it'll be worth the wait!
story_txt:
Fashion-Function-eco-Friendly
Fashion's environmental impact is major and changes to be more sustainable are essential. But we believe this doesn't mean sacrificing style.

 
Features
Recycled materials

Our nylon materials, both body and lining, are made of 100% recycled plastic, or post consumer PET
Recycled bottles are collected, shredded and turned into pellets. The pellets are spun into thread and finally woven to make fabric

​
Impeccably crafted with attention to detail

Easy entry zippers
Stress tested straps and handles
Durable, water resistant, and lightweight
Custom lining, webbing, buckles, zipper pulls, and chains

 
 
                                                         
Utilitarian elements
Pockets for whatever essentials you have in tow - glasses, cell phones, keys, credit cards, license, passport, etc
Protective compartments for your iPad/ tablet/ laptop
Removable shoulder straps - hands free when you need it
  VersatileWhether you're...
Headed for work or a jaunt in the countryside
About town or a night out
Traveling to a weekend away
ReVMP has you covered! All inclusiveSomething for EVERYONE who loves great styling, practicality, and shares the passion for sustainability Packaging
Our bags are lightly packed with water soluble peanuts as opposed to wads of paper, reducing waste and transportation carbon footprint by shipping in smaller boxes
Each item is wrapped in a reusable dust bag also made of 100% recycled PET which can be repurposed as a handy sack for errands
Our shipping box is FSC-CERTIFIED made of 100% recycled paper and is itself recyclable
 Responsibility
We are committed to responsible manufacturing and ethically sourced materials. Our factory operates at the highest level of standards and prides itself on giving back to the local community
ReVMP will participate in 1% for the Planet naming as beneficiary 5GYRES, "an organization empowering action against the global health crisis of plastic pollution through science, education, and adventure"

story:
Pulse Athletic Apparel is the first heart based fitness brand. Designed for utmost comfort, durability, and breathability for high intensity athletic activities anywhere from marathon running and HIIT workouts to day to day tasks, like working from home. Pulse was founded based on intention, driving an inclusive community and emphasizing affordability without compromising quality. We believe that you should spend money on experiences, not stuff, but here’s the stuff that let’s you experience life. 

 

At the baseline, Pulse Athletic Apparel is a Chicago based fitness startup working to make high-quality activewear more affordable and accessible. Because you shouldn’t have to sacrifice your bank account for your well-being. 

We live our lives through meaningful actions. Pulse’s mission is to build an authentic community and encourage that community to be intentional with their actions. We want to help people find what empowers them to push through. Running, lifting, yoga, dance — whatever it is that gets their bodies moving and hearts racing.

We want Pulse Athletic Apparel to be everyone’s go-to for affordable, inclusive activewear. But we also hope to be a source of empowerment, a community that encourages people to Pulse Forward.

Any revenue we make from sales goes directly back into the business, and we’ve been lucky to have a group of people who donate their time and energy to helping us grow.

We’re a small team but a bigger family. Our exec board is our founder & CEO and Chief Content Officer. We’ve got dedicated brand ambassadors and energetic interns who believe in us and our vision. They’re really the driving force behind it all.

In the last few months, we’ve been able to grow through influencer collaborations and non-profit partnerships. Some of Pulse's designs have been represented by doctors, dancers, health coaches, fitness gurus, and more. We partnered with the American Heart Association in February for American Heart Month, and it has paved the way for partnerships we currently have in the works.

 

Increased funding would help make more of these partnerships possible, increase product development to include a greater variation in size inclusivity and begin integration of hydration monitors with a technology component. At the end of the day, we want to grow our communities and give back to the ones that served us. We also want to expand our reach, provide more inclusive sizing options, and work with manufacturers to create more Pulse activewear exclusives.

Above are a few of the designs we have been able to create and get into the market, We are excited to share below, some designs we have been working on to get produced. With our sets, we emphasize compression, durability, and breathability. Let Pulse take care of quality and comfort, so you can take care of your health and wellbeing. 

 

What We Need 

Let's Break it down:

  • $10000 for product development, size variation and inclusivity, and content creation

We plan on using funding for the following: 

- manufacturing and production, bringing sketches and designs of the following pieces into a broader size range for inclusivity, (3XS- 7XL.) We are working to bring the following design into a broad product offering,with sketches below: 

 

-Product design and development:

-Creating a comprehensive resources for fitness workouts, nutrition, and mind-body elements of well-being for the community

What You Get

  • Being a founding pulse supporter makes way for perks! Check these out:
    • Pledge $1 or more: Social Media Shoutout
    • Pledge $15 or more: Social Media Shoutout, Founder Note, & Sticker
    • Pledge $75 or more: Social Media Shoutout, Founder Note, Sticker, & Pulse Sweatshirt 
    • Pledge $300 or more: Social Media Shoutout, Founder Note, Sticker,  Pulse Sweatshirt & 30 minutes of Pulse Fame
    • Pledge $500 or more: Social Media Shoutout, Founder Note, Sticker,  Pulse Sweatshirt, Pulse Bottoms & 30 minute IGTV Interview 
    • Pledge $1000 or more: Social Media Shoutout, Founder Note, Sticker,  Pulse Sweatshirt, Pulse Bottoms, 30 minutes IGTV Interview, and design/name a Pulse item or Set after you
    • * Please note, current sweatshirt sizes available are S-2XL (these are loose fitting)
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use funding to begin increasing our size variation spectrum from each spectrum (2XS & 3XL, then 3S & 4XL and so forth,) once this is accomplished we will continue product development, and hire fitness experts for content creation 

Checkout some of our styles in action:

 

 

     

     

    Meet the founder. 

     

    Karishma Bali runs a full marathon every year.

    Since 2016, running has been her source of peace and power. Karishma credits running as being “pivotal” in her personal and professional development. It’s how she centers herself when life gets a little too dynamic, and it’s how she finds clarity when her businesses call for next steps. Running motivates Karishma to continue to find her passions and cultivate them.

    As an avid runner, Karishma knows how important quality activewear is, but she also knows it doesn’t have to break the bank. She created Pulse Athletic Apparel to help make comfortable, luxury activewear affordable and accessible, so others can find and cultivate their passions too.

    Submitting Information

    Once our project is successfully funded, we’ll be able to send you a form to collect information (e.g., identification, shipping addresses, sizes).

     

    Shipping Costs

    Shipping for all international orders outside of the USA will be $20USD.  Please include this amount in your Kickstarter pledge when you're submitting the pledge. The average number of days for shipping may vary based upon origin and destination.  Also, please bear in mind any duty or taxes on import into your country will be your responsibility, so please be aware of those potential costs.

    Returns

    We understand navigating sizing can be difficult when supporting a new brand, we will do exchange your item if needed. As our brand drives afforability at the forefront, our margins are really tight we will have to charge you for the freight shipping cost of any returns.

     

      Risks & Challenges

      As a new fitness start up, brand awareness is always difficult to navigate. We launched in the summer of 2020, right in the middle of a pandemic. We've been overwhelmed with the community we’ve already managed to build. One of our challenges is continuing to grow that community. But we believe staying true to ourselves helps people not only believe in our products but the movement we stand for. In addition, we work very closely with our manufacturers and suppliers to ensure our pieces are at high caliber in quality and delivered in a timely manner. The most common risk would be production delays in manufacturing. While we maintain continuous communication with all aspects of our team- design, production, and logistics- there is a slight possibility of a delay. We ensure updates at each stage to keep you fully informed. Breaking through the "glass ceiling" in a competitive market is something we are overcoming by constantly tweaking our strategies, research and development, and marketing. Supporting Pulse isn't only supporting a brand. It’s supporting our entrepreneurial journey as well. We’re new at this, but we’re relentlessly working and we’re committed. We know our passion will overcome the learning curve.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • Help us make some noise! Love what we stand for? Does it get your PULSE up? Email, tweet, post, re-post, story, tell your mom, tell your grandma, tell anyone and everyone! Become a founding supporter just by helping us make some noise! Here are our social platforms where you can connect with us:

        • IG: @pulseathleticapparel

          Twitter: pulseaa

          FB: https://www.facebook.com/pulseathleticapparel

          LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/pulse-athletic...

      • Check out the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Short Summary

We are a new designer brand focusing on modern and colorful designs. All of our designs are custom made and original. We are selling online at Zarre.co and are eventually aiming to take our products into retail.

  • Zarre was founded by 26-year-old Jeremy Sacks in Las Vegas, Nevada.
  • Contributors will help us reach our goal of moving into a retail space and grow our company further.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Right now we are raising funds to help us move into a retail space and further grow the company as a whole.
  • Our perks include our best products at a discounted price.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will go to the improvement and betterment of the company (Hosting costs, print costs, hiring employees etc).

 

The Impact

  • We feel our designs are unique and will bring a different feel to the designer and fashion industry.
  • We LOVE the idea of bringing color to the world. We want to be a brand that promotes creativity, brilliance, and happiness.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word for us, we would greatly appreciate it!
  • Follow us on Instagram to stay in the loop for new products/designs. @ZarreCo
  • Use IndieGoGo share tools, it would really help us out!

story:
Step into a new generation of leggings with our game-changing 8-2-8 Leggings, an evolution in activewear. Our revolutionary new technical fabric featuring the world's highest silver thread-count makes this the most durable, versatile and comfortable pair of leggings you’ll ever own, packed with performance-boosting details so you'll always meet your #fitspo goals, no matter the peak, class, or challenge.

 

                                              

Perfect for: Yoga, strength training, the gym, pilates, travel, running errands, lounging at home, hanging out with friends ... and more. 

 

Engineered with our revolutionary new Argent Flex™ fabric featuring a patented blend of nylon, Lycra and the highest percentage of pure silver thread on the market, these leggings are bacteria-fighting, odor-proof, and moisture-wicking designed to withstand the toughest of workouts.  Added with a focus on comfort, these leggings will keep you feeling fresh from dawn to dusk.

 

Combining unique odor-blocking, quick-drying technology and stretch on a detail-driven silhouette, 828 Leggings takes your workouts—and your look—to the next level.

Whether you're lifting weights, perfecting your form, practicing your om, or cycling to the beat, 828 Leggings provides the support and lift you need while staying fresh, dry, and looking and feeling your sharpest. 

Wherever your day takes you—from boot camp to the gym to bar-hopping or even just a marathon binge of your favorite show—our premium 828 Leggings are designed to stay fresh, dry and sleek day after day, and wear after wear, so you can always show off your perfect form.  

                                           

Your go-to leggings can contain up to a BILLION bacteria cells after just one week.

 

When you sweat, bacteria reproduces and rapidly crosses your skin, seeping into your leggings. This results in foul odor that lingers on both your body and your leggings.

Designed with flawless fit in mind, 828 Leggings includes details such as a hidden drawstring and four way stretch that are made to be squat-proof and core-tightening from dawn to dusk. 

                                           

More than just good looks, 828 Leggings is woven with our proprietary Argent Flex fabric - a high-performance fabric offering the highest amount of silver woven into any activewear on the market today, instantly killing 99.9% of odor-producing bacteria upon contact.  

Plus, our unique blend of silver, Lycra and nylon offers you the flexibility and unmatched four-way stretch to move confidently and effortlessly throughout your day.

No matter the workout or challenge, 828 Leggings has you covered with a high-performance fabric that's as dynamic as you are. Our patent-pending Argent Flex fabric works as hard as you do, with a record 40+% of bacteria-fighting, odor-killing silver, making sure you stay fresh and at the top of your game. 

Quality Threads Without the Price Tag

Nylon, sport Lycra, and silver — Argent Flex fabric features premium threads hand-selected to withstand the toughest workouts with the perfect fit and effortless comfort. Using a blend of premium threads designed to fight off odors, kill bacteria and provide the perfect four-way stretch, 828 Leggings will keep you looking and feeling your best -- no matter what your day brings.  

Unlike most leggings that are designed for one or two activities, 828 Leggings is designed to be as versatile as you are with a squat-proof, opaque finish ideal for running, hitting the gym, yoga, and everything in between. 

See how 828 Leggings stacks up. 

 

 

We’re here to shake up the activewear market with technologically savvy leggings that are long-wearing, fresh-smelling and moisture-wicking but don’t sacrifice on style or high-end details.

We collaborated with Vartest Laboratories in New York, New York for three stand-alone tests. Vartest is known within the textile industry around the world, and accredited to ISO/IEC 17025 by the American Association for Laboratory Accreditation.

Argent Flex™ fabric endured the following tests:

Very simply, Argent Flex™ fabric has a first-rate combination of antibacterial, moisture wicking and repellency functions, unlike anything available in the activewear market today.

 828 Leggings comes in three iconic styles in black, blue and our signature combo -- black and blue. You'll have a chance to choose your style after the campaign ends. 

Made for all shapes and strengths, our leggings range from Small to Extra Large. We'd love to help you find the perfect fit - you'll choose your size after our campaign ends and you can always send us a message if you have any questions. 

By coming to Kickstarter, you're not only able to get in on the ground floor -- helping us actively shape the future of Brut Force Athletics -- but also help us eliminate middlemen, meaning more savings for you. For a limited time we're delivering our ultra-premium quality leggings for our Kickstarter backers (you!) at our lowest prices possible.

Becoming a backer grants you access to our exclusive rewards and lowest prices possible -- ever. As a backer, you’ll also be part of our founding story and be among the first to receive your pair of 828 leggings so you can set off on your own adventure.

Inspired by a shared love of fitness, wellness and a background in physical education, Brüt Force Athletics designs and produces comfortable, durable and technologically advanced activewear for lifestyles on the go.

Get a peek at some of the action happening behind the scenes to bring the 828 Leggings to life - a journey that has been more than two years in the making drawing inspiration from all areas of performance including dance and strength training to design the perfect pair of leggings for performance and comfort.

 

 Like what you’ve seen? Join our community of active insiders, get updates on our progress and share the 828 story with your friends, family or coworkers by clicking one of the buttons below. We want to hear from—and push new boundaries with—you!

 Whether you're lifting weights, perfecting your form, practicing your om, or cycling to the beat, 828 Leggings provides the support and lift you need while staying fresh, dry, and looking and feeling your sharpest. 
 Wherever your day takes you—from boot camp to the gym to bar-hopping or even just a marathon binge of your favorite show—our premium 828 Leggings are designed to stay fresh, dry and sleek day after day, and wear after wear, so you can always show off your perfect form.                                              Your go-to leggings can contain up to a BILLION bacteria cells after just one week. When you sweat, bacteria reproduces and rapidly crosses your skin, seeping into your leggings. This results in foul odor that lingers on both your body and your leggings.Designed with flawless fit in mind, 828 Leggings includes details such as a hidden drawstring and four way stretch that are made to be squat-proof and core-tightening from dawn to dusk.                                             More than just good looks, 828 Leggings is woven with our proprietary Argent Flex fabric - a high-performance fabric offering the highest amount of silver woven into any activewear on the market today, instantly killing 99.9% of odor-producing bacteria upon contact.  Plus, our unique blend of silver, Lycra and nylon offers you the flexibility and unmatched four-way stretch to move confidently and effortlessly throughout your day.

 
 

 
No matter the workout or challenge, 828 Leggings has you covered with a high-performance fabric that's as dynamic as you are. Our patent-pending Argent Flex fabric works as hard as you do, with a record 40+% of bacteria-fighting, odor-killing silver, making sure you stay fresh and at the top of your game. Quality Threads Without the Price TagNylon, sport Lycra, and silver — Argent Flex fabric features premium threads hand-selected to withstand the toughest workouts with the perfect fit and effortless comfort. Using a blend of premium threads designed to fight off odors, kill bacteria and provide the perfect four-way stretch, 828 Leggings will keep you looking and feeling your best -- no matter what your day brings.  Unlike most leggings that are designed for one or two activities, 828 Leggings is designed to be as versatile as you are with a squat-proof, opaque finish ideal for running, hitting the gym, yoga, and everything in between. See how 828 Leggings stacks up.     We’re here to shake up the activewear market with technologically savvy leggings that are long-wearing, fresh-smelling and moisture-wicking but don’t sacrifice on style or high-end details.We collaborated with Vartest Laboratories in New York, New York for three stand-alone tests. Vartest is known within the textile industry around the world, and accredited to ISO/IEC 17025 by the American Association for Laboratory Accreditation.Argent Flex™ fabric endured the following tests: Very simply, Argent Flex™ fabric has a first-rate combination of antibacterial, moisture wicking and repellency functions, unlike anything available in the activewear market today. 828 Leggings comes in three iconic styles in black, blue and our signature combo -- black and blue. You'll have a chance to choose your style after the campaign ends. Made for all shapes and strengths, our leggings range from Small to Extra Large. We'd love to help you find the perfect fit - you'll choose your size after our campaign ends and you can always send us a message if you have any questions.  By coming to Kickstarter, you're not only able to get in on the ground floor -- helping us actively shape the future of Brut Force Athletics -- but also help us eliminate middlemen, meaning more savings for you. For a limited time we're delivering our ultra-premium quality leggings for our Kickstarter backers (you!) at our lowest prices possible.Becoming a backer grants you access to our exclusive rewards and lowest prices possible -- ever. As a backer, you’ll also be part of our founding story and be among the first to receive your pair of 828 leggings so you can set off on your own adventure.Inspired by a shared love of fitness, wellness and a background in physical education, Brüt Force Athletics designs and produces comfortable, durable and technologically advanced activewear for lifestyles on the go.Get a peek at some of the action happening behind the scenes to bring the 828 Leggings to life - a journey that has been more than two years in the making drawing inspiration from all areas of performance including dance and strength training to design the perfect pair of leggings for performance and comfort.   Like what you’ve seen? Join our community of active insiders, get updates on our progress and share the 828 story with your friends, family or coworkers by clicking one of the buttons below. We want to hear from—and push new boundaries with—you!                                                       .

story:
We have always been wanting to make mixed reality smart glasses. Cyxus- lightweight, stylish and super portable- we are getting closer to our ideal.

Flawless materials, luxury American design, and HEV-Absorb technologies for lenses come together in the distinguished and versatile Cyxus eyeglasses. It's more than a simple pair of glasses, it's your day-to-day essential eyeglasses pair and it does things other eyewear can't.

Our team has developed this photochromic general use sunglass that we would love to bring to market with the assistance of Indiegogo.

The Photochromic lens is irradiated by ultraviolet rays and short-wave visible light in the sun, the color becomes darker, and the light transmittance decreases; the light transmittance of the lens increases indoors or in the dark, and the color fades and brightens. The Photochromic glasses can adjust the light transmittance through the color change of the lens so that the human eyes can adapt to the changes of the ambient light, reduce visual fatigue, and protect the eyes.

Many drivers often wear a pair of sunglasses when driving. When driving in the sun or snow, sunglasses can protect the eyes from the long-term irritation of strong light. However, when the car suddenly drove from the light to the dark, wearing black glasses became a burden instead. It is too inconvenient to wear it for a while and pick it up for a while. Is there any good way to relieve the driver's distress? Yes, you should wear color-changing glasses. In the sun, it is a pair of black sunglasses, with dark glass lenses blocking the dazzling light. In a softly lit room, it becomes the same as ordinary glasses, transparent and colorless.

We have a variety of lenses for you to choose from, including anti-blue light lenses, sleep lenses, and anti-fog lenses.

As our screening time has increased, we will receive more Blu-rays.

Blue Light is the range of the visible light spectrum that has a short wavelength. Artificial blue light from computer screens, phones, tablets, and LEDs can be highly harmful, especially because we use these devices on a daily basis and for long periods of time.

The harm of blue light to the human body are: eyestrain, dry eyes, red eyes, eye fatigue, headaches, neck pain, reduction of melatonin production and change of sleeping cycles (circadian rhythms).

TR90 Polymer Material

 

Sustainable eyeglass frames made in TR90, from recycled material.

TR90 is a kind of polymer material with memory. It is the most popular ultra-light frame material in the world. It can reduce the burden on the bridge of the nose and ears and is suitable for everyone.

It has the characteristics of super toughness, impact resistance, high-temperature resistance, low friction coefficient, etc., which can effectively prevent damage to the eyes and face caused by the fracture and friction of the frame during exercise. Because of its specific molecular structure, it has good chemical resistance and is not easy to deform, melt and burn in high-temperature environments.

TR90 material does not release chemical residues and meets European requirements for food-grade materials.

The main function of Photochromic glasses is to absorb ultraviolet rays, thereby protecting eyesight. The damage of ultraviolet rays to the human eye is Omni-directional. It can cause abnormal proliferation of the eye conjunctiva, damage to the corneal protein and lipids, cortical cataracts in the lens, etc. It can also easily cause keratitis and macular degeneration. Nowadays, the high-altitude ozone layer is getting thinner, and the ultraviolet light content in sunlight is constantly rising, and the damage to human eyes is much greater than before. Therefore, Photochromic Lenes can reduce eye damage.

 

Wearing Photochromic glasses indoors is no different from ordinary glasses. Therefore, wearing a pair of color-changing glasses in environments such as snow walking, scorching sun, driving, etc. can always protect your eyes.

Difficulty in falling asleep and poor sleep quality are common problems of modern people. People usually choose to take sleeping pills or melatonin to relieve sleep problems, but the side effects are very serious.

 

Phototherapy is a physical therapy method that uses light-emitting devices to generate light of different wavelengths and intensities to stimulate autonomic nerves and brainstem network structure, regulate blood circulation and endocrine function, regulate menstrual cycles, and improve symptoms. Light stimulates the retina through visual signals, acts on the visual light receptors of non-cone cells and non-rod cells, and regulates the function of the pineal gland through the non-sensory conduction pathway of the optic nerve. The anatomical basis of this pathway has been confirmed to be the same as that of the optic chiasm. The endogenous biological clock in the upper nucleus triggers the rhythmic secretion of melatonin from the pineal gland, which results in a stationary state during the day and increased synthesis at night. Melatonin acts on the suprachiasmatic nucleus and other parts to induce sleep, thereby improving sleep.

 

How about Cyxus anti-fog lens?

An anti-fog lens is a kind of special lens that can prevent fog. Ordinary anti-fog glasses are not long-lasting. After spraying the anti-fogging agent multiple times, the lens will be blurred. At the same time, the anti-fogging agent containing chemical composition can damage the eyes to a certain extent. Therefore, human beings need high-quality and harmless anti-fog glasses. Cyxus glasses can not only anti-fog but also block harmful blue light to protect our eyes

In today's world wearing a mask is essential in keeping yourself and others safe from the spread of COVID-19. Wearing a mask and glasses can cause fog to interfere with clear vision. Cyxus's anti-fog lenses are the solution to always see clearly, no matter the conditions.

Cyxus Technology Group Ltd was established in 2009, an enterprise that is focused on E-commerce. The general headquarters in the United States set up a branch in China.  

We are committed to creating a healthy and enjoyable life for people in the age of digital age. For ‘committed to creating a healthy and enjoyable life for people in the age of digital technology age’ as the idea, we created the global brand ’Cyxus’ and registered trademark in many countries.

At present, we have developed blue light blocking lenses, anti-fog lenses, photochromic lenses, sleeping lenses, and customizable glasses. In the future, we will continue to focus on making glasses and explore more possibilities.

With the development of the company and globalization, Cyxus will continue to explore other emerging markets and broaden sales channels. Our products are sold all over the world, covering the United States, Canada, Mexico, Europe, Australia, China, Japan, Southeast Asia and other countries and regions. We are serving more than 300 million customers worldwide.

Cyxus not only produces eyeglasses but also brings you the greatest comfort of vision in the digital age.

Friendly Design Multifunctional Eyewear:

- Anti-Fog Coated Lenses

- Blue Light Blocking Lenses

- Impact Resistant Polycarbonate

- Relieve Migraine

- Anti Eye Fatigue

- Recycled Material

- High Quality

- FDA Certificate

- CE Certificate

We create the best pair of glasses in the world, composed of hand made traditional classic glasses frames with the most advanced (Space Lenses). With premium blue light blocking and anti-fog lenses. It's more than a simple pair of glasses, it's your day-to-day essential eyeglasses pair and it does things other eyewear can't.

The detail of anti-fog glasses

Optician for Photochromic Glasses

Optician for Anti-fog Glasses

All Cyxus eyeglasses come with Anti-Scratch Coating and UV Protection Coating that are both absolutely free. We also offer coatings of Anti-blue light (also known as the blue light filter), anti-fog, photochromic and sleeping. You can freely choose the functions you need.

Note:

1. Prescription glasses are customized services. It needs to spend 5-7 business days to produce.

2. We will pass the glasses demand to the manufacturer when the buyer completes the order, will not accept cancel the order no matter whether the glasses be finished.

3. Prescription glasses are custom products and all the prescription glasses will be double quality check before ship, we will not provide a replacement or return if it is not about the quality issue.

Shipping Details

Cyxus anti-fog blue light blocking glasses are shipping worldwide. Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying for customs, duties, taxes, or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. If the customs/duties are not paid and the shipment is returned to us, you will be refunded, minus the shipping cost.

Our team has years of experience manufacturing premium eyewear with very strict quality control inspections. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit.

We are thoroughly cleaned and sealed prior to packaging. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at support@cyxus.com.
