story:
This is due to the exposure to more bacteria and germs than normal in your daily life.

We don't want you to suffer - we want you to enjoy your travels!

That is why CleanseBot can sanitize and disinfect all hotel surfaces AND UV-C light helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses. 

In fact, the CleanseBot was tested by an independent third party showing how it killed 99.99% of E.coli!

 

 The areas with the most germs and bacteria include light switches and television remotes in addition to the bedspread. In one study out of the University of Houston, researchers tested 19 surfaces in hotel rooms for bacteria and found that main room light switches had an average of 112.7 colony-forming units of bacteria per cubic centimeter. 

MSNBC reports in a study of hospital cleanliness that a top limit of only FIVE colony-forming bacteria per cubic centimeter is recommended for maximum cleanliness.

Even discounting the need for hospital-like cleanliness - these numbers are staggering.

 

 CleanseBot is the world's ONLY smart travel robot designed with YOU in mind.

CleanseBot is a smart robot with artificial intelligence and 18 sensors built in. It uses FOUR UV-C lamps to blast away 99.99% of germs and bacteria on ANY SURFACE.

But most importantly, on your hotel bed.

Hotels are notorious for germs and bacteria and you don't want to worry about that when you're traveling - whether you are traveling for work or for fun!

Just set the CleanseBot down on the bed, turn it on for either 30 or 60 minutes, and go about your day while it sanitizes and disinfects your bed sheets and blankets!

Not only does CleanseBot kill germs, bacteria, and dust mites, but UV-C light has been proven in many studies to actually help prevent the spread of airborne viruses, too. 

CleanseBot is the ONLY thing like this in the world! 

 

 See How BBC Talked About Us

 

  Your bed is your sanctuary. When you rest, you want the best quality sleep and to not worry about germs, mold, bacteria, or dust mites.  

 

  • The CleanseBot will never get stuck in the bed or fall off of a bed. The CleanseBot has 18 smart AI sensors to keep the robot going. 
  • CleanseBot is the world’s first robot which focuses on sensors specifically for materials and fabrics and not simply hardwood or flat surfaces. 
  • The CleanseBot Team has tested the CleanseBot on more than 40 different types of materials and fabrics for sheets and blankets, as well as testing different sizes and shapes of beds, in order to gather and analyze all data and create the best AI and sensors.
  • The CleanseBot wheels are patent-pending technology which can run over any surface. No other technology like this exists.

 

Remove the handle cover and simply place the CleanseBot underneath the blanket on any bed and press the power button once for a 30-minute run and twice for 60 minutes. The CleanseBot will use its four UV-C lights to clean in both directions at the same time! Sanitize and disinfect your sheets and blankets simultaneously. The CleanseBot has 18 sensors and smart mapping technology, so it will never fall off the bed or get stuck.  

For the top of the blanket, put the CleanseBot on top of the comforter and turn it on to let it continue sanitizing. It will automatically sense there is nothing above it and only use the lights facing downward. With patented wheel technology, the CleanseBot can climb over any lumps and bumps in blankets and mattresses! 

 

To sanitize and disinfect any surface, place the handle cover on the CleanseBot and pick it up to clean with ease! It will only use the bottom UV-C lights so your eyes will be protected, and with no mess and no chemicals, it is safe to use around pets and children!  

  Sanitize hotel pillowcases, toilet seats, light switches, bathroom fixtures, TV remotes, and more in Handheld Mode.   

 In your home, you can use CleanseBot to sanitize toys for your children and pets, disinfect messy areas, and sanitize devices like cell phones, keyboards, tablets, and the interior of cars.  

 

For Power Bank Mode, use the USB-C port to power any device.

We have partnered with the Panasonic battery factory to bring you exclusive access to some of the world’s most advanced battery technology. We have integrated Li-ion cells and power management systems into the CleanseBot hardware to give you a handy portable charger with a 3700 mAh battery to charge all of your devices at lightning speed while you’re on the go.

Panasonic is the world's leader in portable power, and by integrating their leading Li-ion cells and power management systems into Cleansebot's hardware, playtime extends to almost TWICE that of a standard battery. 

The CleanseBot fits easily into all backpacks and every suitcase! It’s only slightly bigger than a cell phone and almost as smart! 

 

  • We have tested the CleanseBot with an independent third-party testing center, the Guang Zhou Institute of Microbiology and the Guangzhou Testing Center of Industrial Microbiology.
  • The test run is called the Sterilization and Disinfection Equipment Disinfection Efficacy Appraisal Test and analyzed the efficacy of the CleanseBot on E. coli 8099.
  • The tests were run using the CleanseBot and recorded at UV-C strength of 1500 mu w/cm2 and UV-C wavelength of 254 nm.
  • The test results show that with only 30 seconds of exposure of UV-C light on the E. coli bacteria, the killing rate was greater than 99.99%. This proves how effective the CleanseBot is!

 

 A time-lapse test from our studio.

 
  • Convenience - It is light and easy to use, and you can just turn it on and go!
  • Pocket Sized - Convenient travel size, lightweight and easy to pack!
  • Extra Power Bank - Need quick charging on the go? It is also a portable charger!
  • Healthy Life - Don't get sick when traveling!
  • Press and GO - For clean, safe beds just press power and leave it alone!
  • Stay Healthy - CleanseBot kills 99.99% of germs and bacteria and helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses!  

 

 It starts with built-in artificial intelligence with mapping technology, then adds 18 sensors and two patents, one of which covers the wheel technology to keep it moving over any type of blanket and mattress.”

“The CleanseBot’s compact size packs a major punch - it kills 99.99% of germs, bacteria, and dust mites, and even helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses!”

Toss CleanseBot into your suitcase or carry on and never have to worry about icky hotel germs ever again!

 

  • There are currently NO OTHER PRODUCTS LIKE CLEANSEBOT ON THE MARKET. We have no direct competitors!
  • When you support CleanseBot, you are supporting the future of cleanliness and health while traveling anywhere in the world.
  • CleanseBot is truly the world’s ONLY travel-friendly compact smart robot using UV-C light to sanitize and disinfect every part of your hotel room, from beds to glasses to toilet seats.
  • The closest competitors to CleanseBot right now are large hospital-grade sanitizing robots used in operating rooms, which are still few and far between, and at-home UV-C lamps, which are not portable or for every surface.

 

CleanseBot will be providing FREE global shipping with EU US CA AU HK tax paid.  

 

We chose to go with Indiegogo and crowdfunding for many reasons. One of those is because manufacturing and production are expensive and we need the help! Another one is because crowdfunding allows us to hear feedback and ideas DIRECTLY FROM YOU, the customer, which we can use as a reference in the final part of the design process. A third reason is that we are introducing a brand new product into the market. We want to educate consumers and connect with early adopters and people who are interested in what we are creating. In order to afford to place a large-scale order with our manufacturer, we need YOUR help. Placing a larger order means we are able to get the cost per unit down lower, which allows us to pass those savings on to you.

  1. Our trusted manufacturing partners need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a larger manufacturing run. This is why we have set our funding goal to $5000. By hitting this funding goal, we are able to put in a larger order to our manufacturing partners enabling us to serve customer demand.
  2. Crowdfunding allows us to design without compromise and run a company we are proud to work for. We owe our existence to our backers, who help us design the most thoughtful carry solutions on the planet. We imagine a world where for-profit companies treat their employees, partners, customers, and communities as peers, and where the quality of output is not hindered by the need to squeeze out maximum profit. Your support helps us to realize that goal. Thank you. 
  3. We truly believe in Indiegogo as a platform, where like-minded entrepreneurs and early adopters bring together innovative, disruptive, and sophisticated projects to life. We already support a dozen projects from other people on Indiegogo with our own money - we put our money where our mouth is.

By doing an Indiegogo campaign, we will be able to bring the CleanseBot to market!

Cleansebot's Ready For Shipping​




 
 
 This is due to the exposure to more bacteria and germs than normal in your daily life.We don't want you to suffer - we want you to enjoy your travels!That is why CleanseBot can sanitize and disinfect all hotel surfaces AND UV-C light helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses. In fact, the CleanseBot was tested by an independent third party showing how it killed 99.99% of E.coli!

The CleanseBot will use its four UV-C lights to clean in both directions at the same time! Sanitize and disinfect your sheets and blankets simultaneously. The CleanseBot has 18 sensors and smart mapping technology, so it will never fall off the bed or get stuck.  For the top of the blanket, put the CleanseBot on top of the comforter and turn it on to let it continue sanitizing. It will automatically sense there is nothing above it and only use the lights facing downward. With patented wheel technology, the CleanseBot can climb over any lumps and bumps in blankets and mattresses!  
 
 
 To sanitize and disinfect any surface, place the handle cover on the CleanseBot and pick it up to clean with ease! It will only use the bottom UV-C lights so your eyes will be protected, and with no mess and no chemicals, it is safe to use around pets and children!    Sanitize hotel pillowcases, toilet seats, light switches, bathroom fixtures, TV remotes, and more in Handheld Mode.    In your home, you can use CleanseBot to sanitize toys for your children and pets, disinfect messy areas, and sanitize devices like cell phones, keyboards, tablets, and the interior of cars.   
 
 
 For Power Bank Mode, use the USB-C port to power any device.We have partnered with the Panasonic battery factory to bring you exclusive access to some of the world’s most advanced battery technology. We have integrated Li-ion cells and power management systems into the CleanseBot hardware to give you a handy portable charger with a 3700 mAh battery to charge all of your devices at lightning speed while you’re on the go.Panasonic is the world's leader in portable power, and by integrating their leading Li-ion cells and power management systems into Cleansebot's hardware, playtime extends to almost TWICE that of a standard battery. The CleanseBot fits easily into all backpacks and every suitcase! It’s only slightly bigger than a cell phone and almost as smart!  
 
 
We have tested the CleanseBot with an independent third-party testing center, the Guang Zhou Institute of Microbiology and the Guangzhou Testing Center of Industrial Microbiology.
The test run is called the Sterilization and Disinfection Equipment Disinfection Efficacy Appraisal Test and analyzed the efficacy of the CleanseBot on E. coli 8099.
The tests were run using the CleanseBot and recorded at UV-C strength of 1500 mu w/cm2 and UV-C wavelength of 254 nm.
The test results show that with only 30 seconds of exposure of UV-C light on the E. coli bacteria, the killing rate was greater than 99.99%. This proves how effective the CleanseBot is!
 
  A time-lapse test from our studio. 
  
 
 
Convenience - It is light and easy to use, and you can just turn it on and go!
Pocket Sized - Convenient travel size, lightweight and easy to pack!
Extra Power Bank - Need quick charging on the go? It is also a portable charger!
Healthy Life - Don't get sick when traveling!
Press and GO - For clean, safe beds just press power and leave it alone!
Stay Healthy - CleanseBot kills 99.99% of germs and bacteria and helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses!  
 
  It starts with built-in artificial intelligence with mapping technology, then adds 18 sensors and two patents, one of which covers the wheel technology to keep it moving over any type of blanket and mattress.”“The CleanseBot’s compact size packs a major punch - it kills 99.99% of germs, bacteria, and dust mites, and even helps prevent the spread of airborne viruses!”Toss CleanseBot into your suitcase or carry on and never have to worry about icky hotel germs ever again! 
 
 
There are currently NO OTHER PRODUCTS LIKE CLEANSEBOT ON THE MARKET. We have no direct competitors!
When you support CleanseBot, you are supporting the future of cleanliness and health while traveling anywhere in the world.
CleanseBot is truly the world’s ONLY travel-friendly compact smart robot using UV-C light to sanitize and disinfect every part of your hotel room, from beds to glasses to toilet seats.
The closest competitors to CleanseBot right now are large hospital-grade sanitizing robots used in operating rooms, which are still few and far between, and at-home UV-C lamps, which are not portable or for every surface.
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 

 CleanseBot will be providing FREE global shipping with EU US CA AU HK tax paid.   
 
 We chose to go with Indiegogo and crowdfunding for many reasons. One of those is because manufacturing and production are expensive and we need the help! Another one is because crowdfunding allows us to hear feedback and ideas DIRECTLY FROM YOU, the customer, which we can use as a reference in the final part of the design process. A third reason is that we are introducing a brand new product into the market. We want to educate consumers and connect with early adopters and people who are interested in what we are creating. In order to afford to place a large-scale order with our manufacturer, we need YOUR help. Placing a larger order means we are able to get the cost per unit down lower, which allows us to pass those savings on to you.
Our trusted manufacturing partners need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a larger manufacturing run. This is why we have set our funding goal to $5000. By hitting this funding goal, we are able to put in a larger order to our manufacturing partners enabling us to serve customer demand.
Crowdfunding allows us to design without compromise and run a company we are proud to work for. We owe our existence to our backers, who help us design the most thoughtful carry solutions on the planet. We imagine a world where for-profit companies treat their employees, partners, customers, and communities as peers, and where the quality of output is not hindered by the need to squeeze out maximum profit. Your support helps us to realize that goal. Thank you. 
We truly believe in Indiegogo as a platform, where like-minded entrepreneurs and early adopters bring together innovative, disruptive, and sophisticated projects to life. We already support a dozen projects from other people on Indiegogo with our own money - we put our money where our mouth is.
By doing an Indiegogo campaign, we will be able to bring the CleanseBot to market!

story:
There are plenty of potential dangerous out there, exposed to long under the sun, get cut by some unknown edges, and drying sensation caused by the air tightness of clothing. But you still need to go out, go to work.

No worries. ProTekt is the best solution of all of these problems, it's breathable, cut-resistant, anti-UV.

ProTekt uses the strongest material in the market, which is strong enough to prevent cutting,  can ProTekt you anywhere, from anything.

 

ProTekt Jacket has unique anti-UV function, no matter how long you are exposed to
the sun, it will always ProTekt you from sunburn.

 

Protekt can protect you in all weather from rain, ice and snow. Even a sudden downpour, Protekt can keep you body dry and comfortable as normal.

 

A multiple seal design is applied to Protekt combination to seal the hood, sleeve cuffs and lower hem. They are all seal-able to keep out the wind and prevent small leaking.

 

Protekt is especially designed with extra parts to block raindrops, wind, dust and other small particles.

 

ProTekt is very breathable and heat dissipation. It can quickly dissipate the heat away from your body and cool you on hot days

 

Protekt is an incredibly comfy piece of clothing you will want to wear every day wherever you go. No matter you are in the subway, cafe, park, or mall.

 

Very breathable and heat dissipation can quickly remove the heat you produce away from your body and cool you on hot days. Fold and pack in your bag after exercise without taking up much space.

 

 

 

Timeline

story:
Thank You For Visiting Our Page!

 

A Bit About Us

We're a forward thinking group of eyewear enthusiasts who truly care about our planet. As much as we love cool and trendy products, we hate the negative environmental impact they can have.

We've all been made aware of the damaging effects of climate change. Its this revelation that's fuelled our idea to create non-harmful, high quality products that benefit both the consumer and the industry.

Renzà brings you fashionable, eco-friendly sunglasses that protect your vision and keep you looking stylish all at the same time!

 

 

What Makes Renzà Special?

Unlike other brands, we create products exclusively from natural, sustainable materials. Most sunglasses are produced from petroleum based plastic, which we all know is toxic for our environment.

We work specifically with suppliers who promote sustainability and contribute towards the fight against climate change. 

Orders are also shipped in recycled and biodegradable packaging, further reducing the use of plastic and ensuring your shopping experience is as eco-friendly as possible.

 

Made From Sustainable Materials

Bamboo

A strong and durable plant that has economic and cultural significance in many parts of the world. Bamboo grows rapidly and requires less land, making it a perfect candidate for climate change mitigation.

 

Plant Based Acetate

As a replacement for standard petroleum plastic, we produce our frames from acetate, a plant based plastic that comes from wood fibres. 

 

Recycled Wood

A highly ethical way of creating our products is through the use of recycled wood. Wearing our wood frames gives you individuality, while being totally bio-friendly. 

 

With Polarized Lenses That Protect Your Vision

Our eyes are exposed to bright and harsh sunrays throughout the day, which over time can cause serious damage. All our frames are fitted with UV400 polarized lenses that block harmful UV rays and eliminate glare.

 

Why Back Renzà?

You'll be the first among your friends to own a pair of our amazing sunglasses, making you stand out from the crowd.  

With every order placed, an amount goes to our suppliers who are active in sustainable forestation and planting trees in endangered areas. 

Your support greatly helps our mission of making the shopping industry more sustainable and aiding the fight against climate change!

 

Choose One Of Our Amazing Perks

Select one of the Pledge £ perks at the top to claim lifelong discount on all Renzà products. The more you pledge, the higher your discount will be!

Reserve a pair of sunglasses to get 50% off our official retail price. But hurry, this offer only lasts 30 days!

Backers also receive free merchandise! We're constantly looking to improve our service and your feedback on product samples is imperative to our cause.

 

The Renzà Collection

From our first collection, we have chosen five frames for you to choose from. We are offering these frames at HALF our retail price, only for our amazing backers :) 

Cuban inspired clubmaster sunglasses. With light orange tint lenses to symbolize sunrise and a dual brown bamboo frame. 

Dimensions: Frame 141mm - Lens 51mm

 

Classic style for that retro Tom Cruise look. Featuring a solid wood frame, grey acetate lenses and acetate temple tips.

Dimensions: Frame 144mm - Lens 52mm

 

Two-tone bamboo frames with a real beach vibe. Sustainable wood frames that provide a natural feel, accompanied by grey round lenses.

Dimensions: Frame 136mm - Lens 47mm

 

Emulating bamboo are these duel colour sunglasses that can be worn by both men and women. With grey classic lenses. 

Dimensions: Frame 142mm - Lens 52mm

 

The ultimate statement when it comes to pilot inspired eyewear.  Durable wood frame complete with grey aviator lenses.

Dimensions: Frames 142mm - Lens 47mm

 

We Need Your Support!

Your pledge will have a huge impact on our mission to help eradicate harmful materials from the fashion industry. This is no easy mission so we need as much support as possible!

You could also really help us by sharing our campaign with your friends and family. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools at the top to share our page on social media, your blog or group chat. 

Remember, if we don't reach our full funding goal with Indiegogo, we all get nothing. To make sure this doesn't happen, we have teamed up with people who we believe will grow our audience and make our campaign succeed.

 

Where Your Funds Will Go

We want to expand our collection and bring our backers new accessories & clothing that are produced from organic materials, using renewable energy. 

Your money and support will allow us to source the most ethical materials to continuously create new and exciting products from. 

YOU could make all this possible!

 

Your Sunglasses Come With..

 

Bamboo Sunglasses Case

A unique and ecological way of storing your shades. Made from strong and durable bamboo, this awesome case protects your sunglasses when you're not wearing them.

 

Your Sunglasses Are Shipped In..

 

Your order will arrive in recycled, biodegradable packaging that's plastic free!

 

Supporter Feedback

Samples were given out to our supporters, who have spoken highly of the products and the ethos behind them.

We've also been inundated with positive feedback from people who back our mission of making shopping more eco-friendly.

 

Meet The Renzà Team

 

 

Lawrence

Founder & Managing Director

 

 

Christine

Client Relationship Manager

 

 

Naved

Head Of Marketing

 

 

Furqan

Chief Designer

 

Our Partners Are Eco-Certified

 

 

Our suppliers hold certificates from Eco-Governing bodies that promote sustainable forest management globally. This means that all supplies used by our company come from responsible sources who are equally as dedicated in helping our environment.

 

 

With every order placed, a small donation goes towards planting trees in endangered areas around the world. Our partners have teamed up with One Tree Planted, an environmental charity with a mission to help global reforestation. One dollar plants one tree!

 

Where Is Renzà Headed?

Our mission will never be finished. We will continue working with responsible suppliers to provide our backers with amazing, ecological products.

By doing so, our funds will go towards organisations who can make a real difference by making our world a greener, safer place.

This year, we plan to expand our product range to include organic cotton clothing and sustainable wood watches. Watch this space!

 

When Will I Receive My Order?

Backers receive their order within 45 days after the campaign finishes. Turnaround time is 30 days but we're giving ourselves an extra 15 in case of delays due to the pandemic. 

Our backers will be kept up to date with production and shipping every step of the way until your order is received.

 

Follow Us On

 

Official Website

www.renzawear.co.uk

 

Thank You For Your Support!

story:
NOW SHIPPING!

HURRY, SALE ENDS SOON.

Pricing Will Increase In the next 48 Hours.

 

OUR STORY

 

In 2016, while living abroad, the creators of ATMOBLUE experienced hazardous air levels for the first time. While various masks on the market offered protection from larger particles such as sand and pollen, very few masks effectively filtered smaller particles such as bacteria and PM2.5. This was how the idea to create a wearable, air purification system came to mind.

After months of research and development, the team created ATMOBLUE, launching an initial prototype in Asia. The feedback was incredible. ATMOBLUE received rave reviews, publications and awards. Today, building on top of their initial success and prototype, the team behind ATMOBLUE is ready to introduce a new and improved version to the world!

Significant upgrades have been made to ATMOBLUE including new and improved batteries, in-built mask controls, upgraded long-lasting HEPA filters (150 hours of use time), as well as a newly designed and patented head strap. In addition to these upgrades, ATMOBLUE has been updated to fit within FCC and UL standards and is currently undergoing certification reviews for US and global sales. ATMOBLUE is currently RoHS, SRCC and QCQ, certified. By funding this campaign, you will be first in line for ATMOBLUE.

At this time, you may only purchase ATMOBLUE via our crowdfunding campaign. Please avoid third party websites and sales links as they are fraudulent. Unfortunately this is quite common with successful campaigns.

For additional questions such as investment and distribution inquiries feel free to contact us at support@atmoblue.com or directly to our campaign inbox.

We look forward to this journey and can’t wait to get ATMOBLUE into your hands! 

 

FEATURES

 

 

Replaceable H13 HEPA Filters

 

  • Blocks 99.97% of air particulates 
  • Average use time is 150 hours
  • High Quality, Multi-Fold design

Traditional filters are flat and are quickly consumed. Our unique filters are made of up meticulous folds, compressing the flat surface area of two 9.5 squared inch sheets, into two compact filter blocks which slide right into your mask

 

 

N95 < N99 < H13 HEPA Filters

You may have heard the term N95. This simply means 95% of air particles are being captured. At the higher end of the spectrum, N99 (99%) masks are offered for more industrial applications such as painting or waste cleanup. Moving one step further ATMOBLUE's, H13 HEPA filters block 99.97% of particles which are 0.3 microns in diameter or larger. To give you a bit of context, one strand of human hair is about 75 microns across!

Our high-end H13 HEPA filters use melt-blown, nonwoven fabrics, to block harmful chemicals, bacteria, viruses, pollen, pollutants, smoke, micro-dust, odor and more

 

 

Innovative Air Flow Technology

  • Dual, high-speed, centrifugal fans continuously supply filtered air to create a refreshing breathing environment.
  • Three airflow control settings. Users adjust speeds as needed
  • Positive Air Pressure allows users to breath effortlessly with zero resistance.

The term positive airflow means excess air or “positive air” being pushed into the mask and out through its vents. Because of this solution positive air pushes out exhaled air increasing the overall effectiveness of the mask by removing unwanted bacteria from the breathing zone. 

Designed for the most extreme conditions ATMOBLUE’s multiple airflow settings allow users to switch between light mode, when sitting idle on the train or a car, to high strength when jogging through the city or on the job.

Depending on your use, such as fan speed, your rechargeable ATMOBLUE system runs continuously from 3 – 5 hours. When battery life is running low a red indication light notifies users when to recharge. Simply plug into any USB port until your indicator light turns white again. 

 

 

Lightweight silicone seal

Dermatologically friendly silicone creates a soft but airtight seal keeping good air in and bad air out. ATOMBLUE wont leave marks on your face after each use and can be worn with glasses without fogging up vision.

ATMOBLUE’s fresh air system combined with our unique silicon solution give users a truly enjoyable breathing experience. That means, no nasty scent or moist fabric touching your face.

  • Designed to fits various face sizes.

Our unique silicon seal was designed with users in mind. We compiled data of over 1000 individuals faces and created a unique solution which adapts to various sized faces. ATMOBLUE's soft, lightweight silicone seal contours around users faces leaving enough room for movement and flexibility. 

 

 

 

Patented head strap

Our patented head strap system allows users to move about comfortably in any direction. If you’ve ever worn a mask you know how frustrating head straps can be as they cause unnecessary pressure behind your ears or simply fall off your head when moving around.

With our unique strap-channel design, the continuous head-strap flows through the mask, around your neck and head, creating a full range of continuous motion.

Designed with athletes in mind we used high-quality,  flexible, materials allowing for a stretch when using your mobile device or looking around your periphery. ATMOBLUE’s strap system in combination with our soft silicone seal allows for a tight, secure fit with superior comfort and style. 

 

 

Compact design & Interchangeable skins

Showcase your unique style with ATMOBLUE's modular skin system. Available in four color configurations: Smoke, Pearl, Cement Grey, and Light Pink

Replaceable covers allow your mask to transform and adapt to your style and environment. Simply remove the magnetic HEPA caps and pop off the front of the mask. Once you’ve chosen one your ideal color skin, simply attach and go.

Designed to be worn around your neck when not in use or in your carrying bag, ATMOBLUE’s compact design features a lightweight design of only 190 grams.

 

 

APP control (Unlocked With Stretch Goal)

As an added bonus, all ATMOBLUE units come standard with built-in software & APP control. The device management APP provides real air-time quality indicators, tracks personal metrics and most importantly offers dynamic air flow controls.

Our patented i02 air control algorithm allows users airflow to automatically adjust according to their activity. If the user suddenly picks up speed, say while working or exercising, the APP automatically increases fan speed, reducing breathing resistance and offering more fresh air on demand. Over time we plan to release new updates to the mask for extended capabilities.

 

With the ATMOBLUE app users can interact with their mask, confirm filter life, personalize airflow settings or simply check the air quality index in their area.

 

STRETCH GOAL

Once the following Stretch Goal is met we will be unlocking the following upgrades for free! Share with your friends and loved ones to get more cool perks with your ATMOBLUE. 

ATMOBLUE App - $2,500,000 USD – Device Management Application unlocks Enhanced Capabilities such as filter change notifications, auto airflow and more.

 

 

PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT

ATMOBLUE: Product development overview showcasing discoveries and challenges as we moved from concept through manufacturing. 

 Early Concept Sketch

 

TEAM

The team behind ATMOBLUE is made up by an international team of strategists, designers and engineers, who are on a mission to provide clean air, water and food to all.  

In 2016 the team created ATMOBLUE to help offset the negative impacts caused to humans by toxic air.
story_txt:
NOW SHIPPING!HURRY, SALE ENDS SOON.Pricing Will Increase In the next 48 Hours.Not Your Average Air-Mask
ATMOBLUE is the world’s first wearable, smart air purifier. Our patented air filtration system uses industrial grade, replaceable filters, blocking 99.97% of air particulates. 
ATMOBLUE's unparalleled breathing experience utilizes many of the cutting edge technologies found in high-end purifiers today, but offers the added benefit of mobility, style and comfort. With excess air being produced on-demand, ATMOBLUE users always have access to fresh, filtered air.
 
 
Awards

At the higher end of the spectrum, N99 (99%) masks are offered for more industrial applications such as painting or waste cleanup. Moving one step further ATMOBLUE's, H13 HEPA filters block 99.97% of particles which are 0.3 microns in diameter or larger. To give you a bit of context, one strand of human hair is about 75 microns across!Our high-end H13 HEPA filters use melt-blown, nonwoven fabrics, to block harmful chemicals, bacteria, viruses, pollen, pollutants, smoke, micro-dust, odor and more   Innovative Air Flow Technology
Dual, high-speed, centrifugal fans continuously supply filtered air to create a refreshing breathing environment.
Three airflow control settings. Users adjust speeds as needed
Positive Air Pressure allows users to breath effortlessly with zero resistance.
The term positive airflow means excess air or “positive air” being pushed into the mask and out through its vents. Because of this solution positive air pushes out exhaled air increasing the overall effectiveness of the mask by removing unwanted bacteria from the breathing zone. Designed for the most extreme conditions ATMOBLUE’s multiple airflow settings allow users to switch between light mode, when sitting idle on the train or a car, to high strength when jogging through the city or on the job.Depending on your use, such as fan speed, your rechargeable ATMOBLUE system runs continuously from 3 – 5 hours. When battery life is running low a red indication light notifies users when to recharge. Simply plug into any USB port until your indicator light turns white again.   Lightweight silicone sealDermatologically friendly silicone creates a soft but airtight seal keeping good air in and bad air out. ATOMBLUE wont leave marks on your face after each use and can be worn with glasses without fogging up vision.ATMOBLUE’s fresh air system combined with our unique silicon solution give users a truly enjoyable breathing experience. That means, no nasty scent or moist fabric touching your face.Designed to fits various face sizes.Our unique silicon seal was designed with users in mind. We compiled data of over 1000 individuals faces and created a unique solution which adapts to various sized faces. ATMOBLUE's soft, lightweight silicone seal contours around users faces leaving enough room for movement and flexibility.     Patented head strapOur patented head strap system allows users to move about comfortably in any direction. If you’ve ever worn a mask you know how frustrating head straps can be as they cause unnecessary pressure behind your ears or simply fall off your head when moving around.With our unique strap-channel design, the continuous head-strap flows through the mask, around your neck and head, creating a full range of continuous motion.Designed with athletes in mind we used high-quality,  flexible, materials allowing for a stretch when using your mobile device or looking around your periphery. ATMOBLUE’s strap system in combination with our soft silicone seal allows for a tight, secure fit with superior comfort and style.    Compact design & Interchangeable skinsShowcase your unique style with ATMOBLUE's modular skin system. Available in four color configurations: Smoke, Pearl, Cement Grey, and Light PinkReplaceable covers allow your mask to transform and adapt to your style and environment. Simply remove the magnetic HEPA caps and pop off the front of the mask. Once you’ve chosen one your ideal color skin, simply attach and go.Designed to be worn around your neck when not in use or in your carrying bag, ATMOBLUE’s compact design features a lightweight design of only 190 grams.   APP control (Unlocked With Stretch Goal)As an added bonus, all ATMOBLUE units come standard with built-in software & APP control. The device management APP provides real air-time quality indicators, tracks personal metrics and most importantly offers dynamic air flow controls.Our patented i02 air control algorithm allows users airflow to automatically adjust according to their activity. If the user suddenly picks up speed, say while working or exercising, the APP automatically increases fan speed, reducing breathing resistance and offering more fresh air on demand. Over time we plan to release new updates to the mask for extended capabilities. 

 
With the ATMOBLUE app users can interact with their mask, confirm filter life, personalize airflow settings or simply check the air quality index in their area. STRETCH GOALOnce the following Stretch Goal is met we will be unlocking the following upgrades for free! Share with your friends and loved ones to get more cool perks with your ATMOBLUE. ATMOBLUE App - $2,500,000 USD – Device Management Application unlocks Enhanced Capabilities such as filter change notifications, auto airflow and more.  PRODUCT DEVELOPMENTATMOBLUE: Product development overview showcasing discoveries and challenges as we moved from concept through manufacturing.  Early Concept Sketch 
Form-finding with 3D Printed Prototypes 
 
ATMOBLUE is born!TEAMThe team behind ATMOBLUE is made up by an international team of strategists, designers and engineers, who are on a mission to provide clean air, water and food to all.  In 2016 the team created ATMOBLUE to help offset the negative impacts caused to humans by toxic air.

story:
We are not just about having the idea but committed fully to make it happen. We promise that the first dispatch of orders will be on 10th of September.Thank you for your support!

SHENZHEN WATCH & CLOCK QUALITY TEST CENTRE

（Founded in 2004,, is one of the most authoritative watch quality inspection organization of China. Meanwhile it’s the first of third party testing organization which owns CNAS and CMA certifications in China.）

The ELITE passed the standards of the QB/T 1249-2013<Mechanical Watches>, including 14 quality inspections(Usage reliability、Power reserve、Daily rate、Water resistance test、Cosmetics、Tension resistance.. etc). Test result:Superior Quality

 

Men have always been fascinated by the mechanism working behind the finished product. For this time, we wish to design and create a dress watch that satisfy this pursue of mechanic aesthetics on your wrist while being a perfect fit for the professional elite. This mechanical watch is different. Behind the classic legible dial, you will find the micro-mechanical structure that not only presents the watch with an exquisite delicate appearance but also way less bulky unlike sports and divers watches. The watch aims to present you as a sophisticated specialist at work. Its scratch and wear resistant features along with the stable movement are to help you conquer any occasions.

 

  • Why is The Elite worth adding to your collection?

Is there a micro-rotor watch in your watch collection? Now it’s time to move on! The Elite, with unique movement shape, is distinctive to the mechanical watches you carried. When you open your watchbox and see this watch - it will certainly stand out amongst the rest. The reason of it’s rarity is that processing a micro-rotor movement needs high technology and precision work. The ordinary automatic mechanical movement separates the rotor while the micro-rotor is integrated with other parts of the movement. This technique requires to maintain the aesthetics and stability while reducing some parts of the movement which makes it extra demanding in terms of the internal design and precision of the watch.None collectors don’t want to have such an one-of-a-kind watch in his watch box! It's time to own something different!

     

     

    At a price of 199 US dollars, we offer the same or even better high-quality materials-sapphire crystal, sturdy stainless steel case, exquisite and stable movement as our competitors, so we believe that we have defeated all of the competitors in this category of watches. And all boderry watches come with a full two-year-warranty.

     

     

    The dress watch is also our daily tool watch.Before designing, we think that a dress watch should be:

    • Automatic Mechanical Watch(Saves the trouble of manual winding);
    • Light-weight and Comfortable to Wear;
    • Legible Indication;
    • Wear and Scratch Resistance;
    • Stability and Accuracy;

     

     
    What makes THE ELITE excel in this field?

     

    Micro-rotor Movement

    The Elite uses a reliable customized Hangzhou AAA-class self-winding 5000B mechanical movement with 30 jewels. It does not need battery to achieve a long-lasting and stable performance. The natural movement of swinging the watch can be converted into energy and powers the watch and enable the watch to store up to 42 hours of energy. You can also manually wind the watch by turning the crown.

     

    Quality Inspection

    For producing a dress watch, the absolute accuracy is the key on our inspection checklist. Before assembling the watch, we strictly supervise the quality of each part of the components through thorough testings with high standards.

    We ensure that the accuracy of the watch maintained at -20~+20 sec/day. Unlike regular quality check, we test the watch in 5 more positions to make sure that the watch meets the standard in any situation.

     

    Sapphire Crystal

    Smooth, curvaceous and incredibly sturdy, the watch that you have always imagine. The glass surfaces on the front and back of the watch are made of sapphire crystal with rigidity second to diamond and with excellent scratch resistant.

     

    Watch Case

    To increase the durability while maintaining a solid structure, The Elite uses sturdy stainless steel shell. The case is sandblasted to soften all edges and through mold opening, perforation, scouring, sanding and polishing, over 100 procedures were performed on the whole to provide this durable case.

     

    Watch Dial

    When designing, we wish to maintain the functionality and readability of the watch. This unique floating digital pin took us 3 months to be the final choice. Paired with slender, soft-curved willow hands, the dial looks exceedingly elegant as a whole.

     

    Watch Band

    The strap is made of cowhide leather and hand-made. The shiny high-quality cowhide ensures that the strap is soft, durable and will not easily peel off. (it will become softer as it is used more often)

     

    50m Water-resistant

    The splashes and rain will not stop the watch running. The Elite is 5ATM standard waterproof.

    How are we going to make this watch?

    Each piece of The Elite watch is assembled by the masters at our company with their exquisite and skillful craftsmanship who have been working in this field for over 15 years.

     

    SHIPPING

    • To thank the supporters around the world, all orders are free shipping worldwide

    • All backers are liable for their own country's Duty/ VAT/ GST charges.

    WARRANTY

    • Two (2) year warranty from the date of receiving The ELITE watch. The warranty only covers manufacturing defects.

OxiWear initial prototype. Since then we have made the device 50% smaller and thinner.

Potential Delays 

Although we aim to provide rewards before the scheduled date, due to COVID-19 delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues. Including:

  • Certification delays
  • Production delays
  • Supplier delays

Currently, we have an initial prototype of OxiWear but we were unable to post a video with the prototype due to COVID-19 restrictions. Hence the campaign is marked as concept. As soon as the video is completed we will post a video with the OxiWear fitness device demo and update the campaign to prototype.

Certification delays
Production delays
Supplier delays

As soon as the video is completed we will post a video with the OxiWear fitness device demo and update the campaign to prototype.

story:
LAVIVER is a New York based luxury brand inspired by Kashmiri craftsmanship and a revival story with artisanship, quality, functionality and design taken to a whole new level. Here, the profit margins are minimized to allow for every luxury enthusiast to own a masterpiece by eliminating the middlemen that inflate product costs unnecessarily.

           

Our team of entrepreneurs come from diverse backgrounds - fashion design, engineering, marketing, sales and manufacturing. The focus solely is to produce a masterpiece of a product by using traditional craftsmanship techniques of Kashmir for down-to-earth prices. The incorporation of the four unique indigenous skills - walnut wood craftsmanship, crewel embroidery, zarri workmanship and paper-mache art has become an essential part of our brand identity.

           

 The first portfolio of our collection consists of the insights from Indian, European and Mongolian civilizations. To implement the exquisite factor in the making of our bags that is generated on the basis of the idea of REVIVAL, we have opted using specialized skilled techniques in manufacturing the present assemblage of bags.

               

Exclusively designed with the revival of traditional arts in mind, the iconic 'ZARANSH' embodies the spirit of vintage and luxury. The bag incorporates skilled craftmanship techniques like walnut wood craft and paper mache from the valleys of Kashmir to create a vintage-era magic.

           

              

      

                 

             

This shoulder is crafted of smooth cowhide leather and has a hair-on fur flap in blue. It features a unique arch profile and a gold Laviver logo on the front. The bag opens to a sapphire blue interior with plenty of slots and pockets, perfect for everyday use.

               

           

The flap of 'ZARANSH' incorporates a special hair-on fur hide to compliment to its special design structure.

              

 

            

ZARANSH, with the name inspired by the ancient mythologies of rich Kashmiri heritage, our desire to create beautiful, quality products that are also highly functional has been a top priority. This elegant handbag can be converted into a backpack for a more adventurous look.

                

             

This luxury leather bag is not just an aesthetic masterpiece, but an asset - something you can gift your loved ones in the future. As the leather gets older it attains a vintage glow enriching its texture further. 'ZARANSH' will definitely yield a touch of patina to its overall elegance turning into a valuable asset over a period of time. 

             

                

      

             

Designed specially for men, this piece of art has walnut wood crafts used in the carving of the organization board from the beautiful valley of Kashmir. 

       

Multiple pockets and compartments have been created in 'LAWERAN' internally for accommodating stationary and gadgets up to 14" in size. Additional slots like Pen Holder / Bottle Holder / Key Strap have also been provided for clutter free organized storage.

A unique lock system supporting high security assurance of your belongings has been designed and incorporated in the bags structure furthermore enhancing the elegant outlook of 'LAWERAN'.

       

'LAWERAN' has been made with supreme quality hardware accompanied by exclusive draping of old fashioned leather complimented with soft and natural fur flap for a complete vintage look positioning its classic style in vogue.

The ageing of 'LAWERAN' will definitely result in a vigor of elegance becoming one of the most valuable asset over a period of time. The more the leather gets older, the more it attains a vintage appeal with the enrichment of extra sheer to its texture.

                

                  

               

This elegant designer bag comes with a unique lock system with gold plated hardware, which not only adds to the aesthetic beauty, but also secures your valuable belongings.

                  

              

The  over engineered multiple compartments accommodates all your stationary gadgets up to 14" in size. It has an exclusively handcrafted Kashmiri walnut wood organization board with multiple pockets for all laptop accessories.

                 

With our high grain leather, the surface will continue to age with its use over time and provide an elegant vintage feel. With the right care, 'LAWERAN' will withstand decades of use, keeping your valuable laptop safe.

          

             

                

              

               

              

                 

             

       

             

     

Here is a glimpse of our raving fans on our 800+ private Facebook group commenting on our bags. 

                  

       

      

     

 

 

Risks and challenges

There are almost no risks involved when it comes to our backers. Our team shall be in close communication to ensure a timely delivery of the products only in the case of unforeseen delays. Due to intermittent COVID related lockdowns in India, there might be a slight delay in shipment, which will be communicated to our backers. But as of July 2021, we do not foresee any unexpected delays. We have a strong partnership with our manufacturing facilities who helped us with our first prototypes. We just need your support to kickstart this revolutionary product serving the luxury fashion industry. Laviver has been evolving over the years with a solid experience of producing 150 plus designer leather prototypes in the luxury fashion business. We are just waiting for the total number of orders and as soon as we are confirmed with total number, the manufacturers are ready to go ahead with production. Positioning the brand in the luxury fashion is a challenging task and we are moving forward with the best of our efforts to accomplish it.

Long-lasting design

How long will our leather last? Short answer - More than a lifetime! The quality of the leather pretty much dictates how long the leather lasts. At Laviver, we only use high grain leather (also known as full grain leather). We won’t waste our time guessing how long faux leather would last. This is something you definitely need to avoid. Bonded leather is the lowest grade leather, made from scraps and has a very short life span. Genuine leather is the next level when it comes to leather quality. It doesn't last as long due to the lower grade grain. In 2nd place is top grain leather. It is pretty durable, but won't last as long as our full grain leather. This is what most brand names sell as "top quality". Finally, we have High Grain leather - the cream of the crop leather money can buy. With proper care, it surpasses all of its counterparts in durability, strength , design and beauty. This type of leather develops a beautiful design and character as it ages with daily use. This is what we pride ourselves with at Laviver.

Environmentally friendly factories

At Laviver, we are focused on the revival of the ancient technique of tanning with plant extracts. Bark, wood, berries, roots and leaves are used to color and preserve the hides, producing far less harmful waste, and a biodegradable leather.

Something else

We are focused on creating an entire job market for traditional craftsmen of Kashmir and other local communities that have partnered with us on this amazing project. LAVIVER MANIFESTO • The quality of the leather is recognized by the grain constitution present on it and we have taken every effort to qualify this aspect. • Along with leather sheaths our team members have also decided to use the age old fur hides in the making of our designs, an elegant and yet a definite addition in the list of our distinct features. • The elegant hue concoctions have been developed using the ‘vegetable tanning technique’, a natural way of creating color palettes. This technique has specially been used to avoid the allergic reactions that are caused using the chemical dyes and at the same time keeping things organic. • The ageing of leather indeed results in a vigor of drama becoming one of the 'most valuable asset' over a period of time. The more the leather ages, the more it attains a vintage appeal with the enrichment of extra sheer to its texture. • Our team at LAVIVER has taken special pride of presenting the collection of master pieces which has been designed by a selected combination of the inspirations taken from the beauty of the ‘Kashmiri craftsmanship’ along with a rustic touch of ‘old fashioned’ leather and fur hides.

story:
Better Athletics is a startup, functional athleisure brand for those who demand common-sense options. With your backing, we aim to offer sustainable products with a commitment to function, fit, comfort, and performance.

Our signature product the versatile 6-in-1 athletic short that features the following options:

  1. Wear them as swim trunks
  2. Wear them as gym shorts
  3. Wear them linerless
  4. Wear them with a compression short liner
  5. Wear them with a mid-length liner
  6. Wear them with a legging liner

This patent-pending concept is unlike anything currently available for sale in the athleisure market. The standard shorts feature a detachable compression short liner that can be removed and reattached based on the wearer’s preferences, intended activities, weather conditions, or desired level of support and personal comfort. Insertable liners can be purchased separately and offer the wearer the ability to switch their liner out for a different length and/or design.

And with this signature product, Better Athletics is the first-ever and only functional athleisure brand.

Our main objective over the coming years is to disrupt the athletic wear industry, by developing better athleisure that offers a range of functional benefits to consumers. 

We believe in being better and doing better. We’re driven by a constant desire to improve ourselves and uplift others.

The three "I"s that make us better:

Integrity. Live purposefully, authentically and strive to be a better version of yourself. We believe in being honest, just, and transparent with colleagues, customers, and the broader community even when it feels difficult. We hold ourselves to “better” standards. 

Ingenuity. We are passionate lifelong learners committed to finding innovative solutions to common challenges. We strive to be better and bring unique thought to the table every day.

Inclusivity. We believe in being part of a community where all voices and backgrounds are welcome. No one should ever feel left out based on their race, gender, sexual orientation, ability, or religion. We depend on these differences to enable us to think differently and offer a better, more informed product. 

We strive to offer functional athleisure with options that meet the diverse and evolving needs of our consumers. 

The outer shell of the swim trunks/athletic shorts features comfortable 4-way-stretch polyester material made from upcycled plastic bottles. There will be various pockets and storage compartments on the outer shell and a zip fly. The shorts will be made available in 5", 7", and 9" inseam options.

Unlike the uncomfortable mesh netting liners that typically come permanently attached to swim trunks, we'll offer a breathable nylon/spandex blend compression short liner that is simple to zip in and out. Our liner will feature a hidden pocket large enough to fit a smartphone, a horizontal fly opening, and a separating and supporting pouch for the male privates. 

 

Depending on your preferences and activity for the day, you'll have the ability to leave the liner in or zip it out by lifting the zipper cover flap and unzipping the invisible zipper that spans the inside circumference of the waistband. 

Wearers will also be the option of switching the liners out for different lengths, depending on style preference and functional needs. 

Why purchase two different pairs of shorts, when you can wear the same pair of great shorts six different ways? 

Any true athleisure enthusiast knows, there are many scenarios in which you might leave a liner in or take it out - Better Athletics puts the power of choice into your hands. 

Keep the liner in for:
•    Heavy-duty sport activity
•    Moisture management to wick sweat away
•    Keeps things cool, comfortable, and dry
•    Prevents infection and chafing. 
•    Liners are built to provide enough support and compression for men so they don't need a jockstrap.
•    Reduced muscle fatigue
•    Strain prevention
•    Lower risk of muscle soreness
•    Improved perceived exertion
•    Increased power & better jumping ability
•    Better muscle oxygenation
•    Comfort preference
•    Improved strength recovery (after lifting weights)
•    Groin support
•    Cold day


Take the liner out for:
•    Washing separately if you still want to wear the shorts, but with different underwear
•    More freedom and range of movement
•    Leisurely or sedentary activity
•    Comfort preference
•    Breathability during a hot day
•    A more relaxed fit
•    Switching to a longer length liner
•    Switching out for a different liner design

The global athleisure market size is projected to touch USD 517.5 billion by the year 2025, according to a new report by Million Insights. It is anticipated to grow at a CAGR of 8.1% through the forecast period of 2019-2025. We believe the market for functional athleisure is growing significantly in the US and globally.

Our objective is to become the leading retailer of functional athleisure.

Better Athletics has developed a unique, patent-pending concept that brings function, style, and comfort to your athleisure.

We're looking for your help to take this to the next level by developing a prototype, 3D animations, and an initial supply of 1,000 shorts to be made available to backers of this campaign.  

By supporting this campaign you'll be amongst the first to own a game-changing product that will launch the functional athleisure movement.

If we do not reach our entire goal, we'll focus on the development of a prototype and test various other methods of liner attachment (i.e. VELCRO, buttons, hooks, etc.) to ensure the most comfortable and functional solution. Depending on the amount raised, we'll use funds to develop a 3D animation of the shorts to help bring the concept to life. Funds may also be used for other types of product development, marketing, market research, and other overhead costs and promotional activities. 

>When it comes to offering a "better" product...

We're the inventors and purveyors of functional athleisure. We will focus on product refinement and innovation in our pursuit of achieving our mission. Over the next few years, Better Athletics will introduce additional before seen functional athleisure products.

>When it comes to contributing to a better planet...

Better Athletics will commit to minimizing waste; upcycling materials to make our products whenever possible, and using eco-friendly or recycled packaging. We will look to continuously improve sourcing, delivery, production processes, and fabric upcycling efforts. A portion of our proceeds will benefit environmental conservation efforts. 

>When it comes to attracting "better" customers...

We will sell products primarily through e-commerce and will reach our target audience through a mix of influencers; fashion bloggers; and health and wellness community groups. We will develop loyal customers through living our values and delivering high-quality products that the modern-day customer requires.

>When it comes to building "better" partnerships...

Our plan is to hire staff and partner with individuals and organizations that are committed to our purpose and aligned with core values. We will prioritize partnering with minority- and women-owned businesses and enterprises (MWBE) whenever possible. 

The athletic wear space is crowded, which presents a challenge as Better Athletics looks to establish itself in the athletic apparel industry. However, our passion for invention and thinking of things in newer, better ways will position us as a disruptor in the athletic wear space. We firmly believe that other industry players have their heads in the clouds and no longer understand what it means to be true innovators in an industry that has offered the same old products for decades. 

Through our offering of common-sense functional athleisure that actually solves common pain points in the apparel industry, we will dedicate ourselves to paying attention to the diverse needs of our future consumers. 

While we do not yet have a prototype for our detachable liner with an invisible zipper, our patent application covers various methods of attaching the liner to the outer shell of the shorts. Should one method of attachment be better than the other, we'll continue to refine our approach, learn, and shift our approach accordingly. This might result in minor delays in product development down the line, but will be very well worth it when the final product is produced. 

Think you could use a pair of shorts like these and want to see this vision come to life? There are many ways to support the launch of Better Athletics' detachable liner shorts:

  • Your contribution of any amount goes a very long way
  • Share this campaign with your friends & family using Indiegogo's "share" features
  • We're on a constant journey of bettering ourselves - any advice on launching pre-seed-stage fundraising is valuable
story_txt:
Better Athletics is a startup, functional athleisure brand for those who demand common-sense options. With your backing, we aim to offer sustainable products with a commitment to function, fit, comfort, and performance.
Our signature product the versatile 6-in-1 athletic short that features the following options:

Wear them as swim trunks
Wear them as gym shorts
Wear them linerless
Wear them with a compression short liner
Wear them with a mid-length liner
Wear them with a legging liner

This patent-pending concept is unlike anything currently available for sale in the athleisure market. The standard shorts feature a detachable compression short liner that can be removed and reattached based on the wearer’s preferences, intended activities, weather conditions, or desired level of support and personal comfort. Insertable liners can be purchased separately and offer the wearer the ability to switch their liner out for a different length and/or design.

And with this signature product, Better Athletics is the first-ever and only functional athleisure brand.
Our main objective over the coming years is to disrupt the athletic wear industry, by developing better athleisure that offers a range of functional benefits to consumers. 

We believe in being better and doing better. We’re driven by a constant desire to improve ourselves and uplift others.
The three "I"s that make us better:
Integrity. Live purposefully, authentically and strive to be a better version of yourself. We believe in being honest, just, and transparent with colleagues, customers, and the broader community even when it feels difficult. We hold ourselves to “better” standards. 
Ingenuity. We are passionate lifelong learners committed to finding innovative solutions to common challenges. We strive to be better and bring unique thought to the table every day.
Inclusivity. We believe in being part of a community where all voices and backgrounds are welcome. No one should ever feel left out based on their race, gender, sexual orientation, ability, or religion. We depend on these differences to enable us to think differently and offer a better, more informed product. 

We strive to offer functional athleisure with options that meet the diverse and evolving needs of our consumers. 

The outer shell of the swim trunks/athletic shorts features comfortable 4-way-stretch polyester material made from upcycled plastic bottles. There will be various pockets and storage compartments on the outer shell and a zip fly. The shorts will be made available in 5", 7", and 9" inseam options.

Unlike the uncomfortable mesh netting liners that typically come permanently attached to swim trunks, we'll offer a breathable nylon/spandex blend compression short liner that is simple to zip in and out. Our liner will feature a hidden pocket large enough to fit a smartphone, a horizontal fly opening, and a separating and supporting pouch for the male privates. 


 
Depending on your preferences and activity for the day, you'll have the ability to leave the liner in or zip it out by lifting the zipper cover flap and unzipping the invisible zipper that spans the inside circumference of the waistband. 

Wearers will also be the option of switching the liners out for different lengths, depending on style preference and functional needs. 

Why purchase two different pairs of shorts, when you can wear the same pair of great shorts six different ways? 
Any true athleisure enthusiast knows, there are many scenarios in which you might leave a liner in or take it out - Better Athletics puts the power of choice into your hands. 
Keep the liner in for:•    Heavy-duty sport activity•    Moisture management to wick sweat away•    Keeps things cool, comfortable, and dry•    Prevents infection and chafing. •    Liners are built to provide enough support and compression for men so they don't need a jockstrap.•    Reduced muscle fatigue•    Strain prevention•    Lower risk of muscle soreness•    Improved perceived exertion•    Increased power & better jumping ability•    Better muscle oxygenation•    Comfort preference•    Improved strength recovery (after lifting weights)•    Groin support•    Cold day
Take the liner out for:•    Washing separately if you still want to wear the shorts, but with different underwear•    More freedom and range of movement•    Leisurely or sedentary activity•    Comfort preference•    Breathability during a hot day•    A more relaxed fit•    Switching to a longer length liner•    Switching out for a different liner design


The global athleisure market size is projected to touch USD 517.5 billion by the year 2025, according to a new report by Million Insights. It is anticipated to grow at a CAGR of 8.1% through the forecast period of 2019-2025. We believe the market for functional athleisure is growing significantly in the US and globally.
Our objective is to become the leading retailer of functional athleisure.

Better Athletics has developed a unique, patent-pending concept that brings function, style, and comfort to your athleisure. 
We're looking for your help to take this to the next level by developing a prototype, 3D animations, and an initial supply of 1,000 shorts to be made available to backers of this campaign.  
By supporting this campaign you'll be amongst the first to own a game-changing product that will launch the functional athleisure movement.
If we do not reach our entire goal, we'll focus on the development of a prototype and test various other methods of liner attachment (i.e. VELCRO, buttons, hooks, etc.) to ensure the most comfortable and functional solution. Depending on the amount raised, we'll use funds to develop a 3D animation of the shorts to help bring the concept to life. Funds may also be used for other types of product development, marketing, market research, and other overhead costs and promotional activities. 


>When it comes to offering a "better" product...
We're the inventors and purveyors of functional athleisure. We will focus on product refinement and innovation in our pursuit of achieving our mission. Over the next few years, Better Athletics will introduce additional before seen functional athleisure products.
>When it comes to contributing to a better planet...
Better Athletics will commit to minimizing waste; upcycling materials to make our products whenever possible, and using eco-friendly or recycled packaging. We will look to continuously improve sourcing, delivery, production processes, and fabric upcycling efforts. A portion of our proceeds will benefit environmental conservation efforts. 
>When it comes to attracting "better" customers...We will sell products primarily through e-commerce and will reach our target audience through a mix of influencers; fashion bloggers; and health and wellness community groups. We will develop loyal customers through living our values and delivering high-quality products that the modern-day customer requires.
>When it comes to building "better" partnerships...
Our plan is to hire staff and partner with individuals and organizations that are committed to our purpose and aligned with core values. We will prioritize partnering with minority- and women-owned businesses and enterprises (MWBE) whenever possible. 


The athletic wear space is crowded, which presents a challenge as Better Athletics looks to establish itself in the athletic apparel industry. We firmly believe that other industry players have their heads in the clouds and no longer understand what it means to be true innovators in an industry that has offered the same old products for decades. 
Through our offering of common-sense functional athleisure that actually solves common pain points in the apparel industry, we will dedicate ourselves to paying attention to the diverse needs of our future consumers. 
While we do not yet have a prototype for our detachable liner with an invisible zipper, our patent application covers various methods of attaching the liner to the outer shell of the shorts. Should one method of attachment be better than the other, we'll continue to refine our approach, learn, and shift our approach accordingly. This might result in minor delays in product development down the line, but will be very well worth it when the final product is produced.
