story:
Introducing the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt. A "Tribrid" T-shirt/undershirt/base layer with built-in "smart" cooling powered by nature.

 

Awe-inspiring features of Cool Human® Fabric Technology

 

 

The amazing properties of the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt listed above  are borne from 2 equally important components: 

 AND

Endothermic Cooling: Its just science. 

Almost every “cooling shirt” out there works by the same principle: evaporation. Sweat is wicked away from the body to the outside, and the wind evaporates it, thus cooling the wearer.

But we wanted something better. Something that works beyond evaporative cooling, even in high humidity or low wind environments where evaporative cooling doesn't work. 

Enter Xylitol, an all-natural sweetener sugar alcohol found in some fruits, white birch and corn. 

You've most likely added xylitol to your coffee or experienced the fresh cool feeling of it in toothpaste or gum.

This is what happens when you put xylitol in water. Keep your eye on the thermometer readout. 

 

The temperature drops!! This is called an endothermic (heat absorbing) reaction. The reaction draws heat from the surroundings, thus lowering the temperature.

So:

Wouldn't it be amazing to put this natural compound onto a shirt so that when you sweat, the water in your sweat reacts with the xylitol in an endothermic reaction to make you feel cooler? 

This is exactly what we have done with the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt.

How does it work?

Infused in the fabric itself is xylitol, which absorbs heat from the wearer's skin in an endothermic reaction caused by the water in your very own sweat (Perspiractive™ technology). So the hotter and sweatier you get, the cooler your shirt feels.

**Caution about xylitol and dogs/cats

Each year, there are more than 200,000 cases of pet poisoning in the U.S., many of them caused by household substances that are perfectly harmless to you and I. But just because something is safe for people doesn't mean it won’t hurt our beloved pets. Some of the most dangerous dog/cat poisons are foods and medications we take on a daily basis like supplements, mouthwash, tooth paste, gum, chocolate, and peanut butter.  Xylitol is one of those items that is perfectly safe for humans but that can be very poisonous for dogs and cats.  Consumption of xylitol by dogs and cats can result in undesired symptoms ranging from mild hypoglycemia to liver failure and death. Many large companies that sell millions of shirts a year use xylitol in their apparel as a cooling agent. And although I am not aware of a single case in which apparel containing xylitol has sickened a dog or cat, be sure to be mindful that this shirt contains xylitol as a cooling agent. For your information, the most comprehensive list I've ever seen on items containing xylitol can be seen here (https://info.peeva.co/blog/products-that-contai...). I' have also applied to put my product and company on this list. Pets give us so much, especially during this pandemic. Please keep them safe.

Revolutionary smart-release micro-vesicle delivery system.

The real technology of the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt comes from multi-layered micro-vesicles (microscopic sized balls containing multiple oil and water phases) that are able to sense the level of moisture from the body based on the environment, and act accordingly to cool you.  

Micro-vesicles have an oil phase containing "water-hating" molecules like squalane, and a water phase with water loving molecules like the cooling xylitol. 

 When the fabric is dried and is made into garments this water layer becomes dehydrated and the xylitol is inactive. 

However, when the wearer starts to sweat the water layers rehydrate and then the  xylitol dissolves and is released and the cooling reaction begins. The cooling sensation occurs only where the sweat or moisture is. After some time, the wearer will start to cool down and should stop sweating. As the garment dries out, the reaction stops and goes back to the dehydrated state again.

This process can be seen in the movie below.

 

 

 

 

Sweat-activated Perspiractive™ fabric with real endothermic cooling

The thermographs below show a clear difference in shirt temperature before and after hard exercise where xylitol is present, when the water in the wearer's sweat reacts with the xylitol  in a cooling endothermic reaction.

Removal of the shirt after hard exercise also shows that the cooling is not just limited to the shirt fabric, the body is cooler as well.

To measure the amount of cooling generated by the micro-vesicle technology, the temperature of the fabric was measured after adding water. The results shown in the graph indicate that the initial temperature was as much as 5 degrees C (9 degrees F) lower than untreated fabric before washing.  

Due to the slow-release properties of this technology, the cooling effect was retained; the xylitol decreased the temperature of the fabric by 3.5 degrees C (6.3 degrees F) even after 50 washes. 

Cooling regardless of external conditions

Because the surrounding heat is consumed in the endothermic reaction, the feeling of the fabric against the skin is cool, regardless of whether or not there is any outside wind. So you even get cooling under conditions in which evaporative cooling shirts don’t work, such as high humidity, indoors, or when there is little wind.

Xylitol--a truly amazing natural compound

In addition to its cooling effect, Xylitol has numerous other beneficial effects which have been shown in the scientific literature, including:

Functions as a natural antibacterial, antifungal and antiviral.

Has high moisture retention

Stimulates the production of collagen to counter the effects of aging

Increases bone volume and bone mineral content, protecting against osteoporosis

And its completely non-toxic and safe. Not only has it been consumed by humans for the last 50 years in fruits, chewing gum, candies, mints, and oral care products, it is also used to treat middle ear infections in young children.

Skin protective function

Additional components in the micro-vesicles shown earlier include squalane, a hydrogenated form of a moisturizer produced naturally by your own skin cells in the skin lipid layer but that declines with normal aging. It is commonly extracted from plants such as olives.

Squalane reduces inflammation and keeps the skin hydrated and fresh. Boosting hydration can help your skin appear more vibrant and healthier, while its antioxidant effect also decrease skin damage and free radicals which can accelerate the aging process. Regular use can also boost collagen production, resulting in firmer skin.

And Silk Protein, a natural protein obtained from natural silk noils (fibers, fibroin) from the cocoon of the silk worm. This produces excellent moisture binding properties & a silky smooth feel.

Cool Human® perspiractive™ fabric: Comfort through moisture retention and release

Just as with the control of "smart" cooling based on the environment, the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt offers "smart" moisture management via these same micro-vesicles. 

Moisture retention when its dry

In a dry environment, the water phase is dehydrated. As moisture is released from the skin in the form of sweat, the micro-vesicle absorbs it and becomes rehydrated. The increased humidity of the garment allows for increased comfort. 

When humidity between the skin and the fabric increases to excess due to exercise or sweating, the micelle structure becomes saturated. Because the outermost layer of the micelle is hydrophobic (water-hating), it repels the excess moisture and pushes it out of the fabric.

FABRIC PRODUCTION TECHNOLOGY 

Impressive as it is, the finishing technology of the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt that gives the shirt its amazing cooling and moisture management properties is only half the story. The fabric production technology is just as important. 

TACTEL® 

The Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt  is made with TACTEL®, also known as the "cotton alternative." 

”TACTEL® garments are softer and lighter than most other fabrics and feel very comfortable next to the skin. In fact, the name TACTEL® is derived from “tacto,” which is Latin for “touch."  

 

TACTEL® is absorbed much more quickly than cotton and spreads out over the fabric much more, which allows for the faster drying. In fact, TACTEL® dries 8 times faster than cotton. 

TACTEL® is also three times stronger than natural fabrics such as cotton. This ensures enhanced durability and comfort that exceeds natural materials. The Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt offers 4-way stretch to ensure ease of motion. 

Due to the extreme stretchiness of the fabric, for freedom of body movement, the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt can be worn loose or tight one size down based on the preference of the wearer. 

Super-high 50 gauge weave

Gauge is simply the number of needles per unit of length. Low gauge fabrics have a very loose weave. They don’t last very long and easily become damaged. 

All of the above fabrics have the same magnification, at 1000X.

The fabric for the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt is made from fine ultra-high gauge fabric (50 gauge). In fact, this is one of the highest gauges of fabric available in the world for its weight. This not only makes the fabric ultra strong, allowing your garment to live for twice the lifetime of a normal garment, thus saving you money, but it also provides more square area for xylitol to bind, thus increasing the cooling effect and cooling duration. 

And it feels amazing too!

A "Tribrid" Shirt you can use for the office, travel, or gym

The fabric is wafer thin, but the super-high gauge fabric allows for multi-purpose use. Because the gauge is so high, its not as transparent as other fabrics are at even 100 grams/meter. This means that you can wear it as a T-shirt as well as an undershirt or base layer with almost no added bulk! 

UV-cut

Due to its extremely high 50 gauge construction, Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt fabric is certified as UPF15 for sun protection. Despite being so thin, it blocks out around 96% of the harmful UV rays of the sun. A typical cotton T-shirt is only at about UPF5.

Strong and Abrasion-resistant

At less than 75 grams/meter, the fabric is wafer thin, but don't mistake that for being weak. Due to its high gauge and TACTEL® construction, it’s extremely strong and dense.  This streamlines your body for optimum sports performance and maximizes comfort when you need to be most active. 

Super-light 

Yarn from the fabric of the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt is only 20 denier. This is equivalent to 9,000 meters (29,528 feet) of yarn weighing just 20 grams (0.7 oz.).

Packs small and light

Roughly 25% lower volume and weight than typical undershirts.

Natural anti-bacterial/anti-fungal/anti-viral effect

Xylitol has been shown in the scientific literature to directly inhibit the growth of bacteria and fungi as well as the RSA virus (respiratory syncytial virus), an enveloped RNA virus.

Safety and Sustainability

Safe. Our fabric processing with xylitol, an odorless natural compound, complies with OEKOTEX safety standards, and thus, our fabric processing is head and shoulders above other cooling treatments that use synthetic and foul-smelling chemicals to achieve the same effect for a much shorter duration.

Sustainable. In addition, our fabric processing is compliant with ZDHC guidelines for the use of safer chemistry for a cleaner planet.  The ZDHC Foundation oversees implementation of the Roadmap to Zero Programme. We, along with them, believe in a world where things are made with zero use and discharge of hazardous chemicals.

Additionally, we optimize fabric usage to ensure that the width of the fabric during production is optimum so fabric waste is minimized to the greatest extent possible.  Fabric waste is one of the biggest problems in the garment business, with up to 20 tonnes of fabric going into landfills per year.

Minimization of environmental effect. The use of super-high gauge fabric means increased garment durability, which means an increased garment lifetime and decreased waste.

Responsible water-saving. Because of xylitol’s inherent antifungal and antibacterial properties, you don’t need to wash the shirt as much as other shirts, thus increasing the life of the shirt, increasing the durability of the cooling effect, and saving valuable water.

Styles & Sizes

There will initially be 2 styles: Crew and Deep-V. 

 

Colors: Black, Grey 

 

Rewards

Add-ons

Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Arm Sleeves.  As indicated in the rewards, we are also offering Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Arm Sleeves for $16, made with the same endothermic fabric. If you wish to order these, add on the extra perk to your pledge during checkout of the main perk. 

Arm sleeves sizing and colors

Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Neck Gaitor (add on $19 to your pledge).  With double layered Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling fabric. Unique bell shaped cut to increase coverage over the back of the neck, ear loops to prevent slippage, and adjustable elastic to adjust for perfect fit. 

Timeline

Given the COVID-19 pandemic, I am giving myself plenty of time to get the shirts made and shipped out to backers as early as possible.

They don’t last very long and easily become damaged. All of the above fabrics have the same magnification, at 1000X.The fabric for the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt is made from fine ultra-high gauge fabric (50 gauge). In fact, this is one of the highest gauges of fabric available in the world for its weight. This not only makes the fabric ultra strong, allowing your garment to live for twice the lifetime of a normal garment, thus saving you money, but it also provides more square area for xylitol to bind, thus increasing the cooling effect and cooling duration. And it feels amazing too!A "Tribrid" Shirt you can use for the office, travel, or gymThe fabric is wafer thin, but the super-high gauge fabric allows for multi-purpose use. Because the gauge is so high, its not as transparent as other fabrics are at even 100 grams/meter. This means that you can wear it as a T-shirt as well as an undershirt or base layer with almost no added bulk! UV-cutDue to its extremely high 50 gauge construction, Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt fabric is certified as UPF15 for sun protection. Despite being so thin, it blocks out around 96% of the harmful UV rays of the sun. A typical cotton T-shirt is only at about UPF5.Strong and Abrasion-resistantAt less than 75 grams/meter, the fabric is wafer thin, but don't mistake that for being weak. Due to its high gauge and TACTEL® construction, it’s extremely strong and dense.  This streamlines your body for optimum sports performance and maximizes comfort when you need to be most active. Super-light Yarn from the fabric of the Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Shirt is only 20 denier. This is equivalent to 9,000 meters (29,528 feet) of yarn weighing just 20 grams (0.7 oz.).Packs small and lightRoughly 25% lower volume and weight than typical undershirts.Natural anti-bacterial/anti-fungal/anti-viral effectXylitol has been shown in the scientific literature to directly inhibit the growth of bacteria and fungi as well as the RSA virus (respiratory syncytial virus), an enveloped RNA virus.Safety and SustainabilitySafe. Our fabric processing with xylitol, an odorless natural compound, complies with OEKOTEX safety standards, and thus, our fabric processing is head and shoulders above other cooling treatments that use synthetic and foul-smelling chemicals to achieve the same effect for a much shorter duration.Sustainable. In addition, our fabric processing is compliant with ZDHC guidelines for the use of safer chemistry for a cleaner planet.  The ZDHC Foundation oversees implementation of the Roadmap to Zero Programme. We, along with them, believe in a world where things are made with zero use and discharge of hazardous chemicals.Additionally, we optimize fabric usage to ensure that the width of the fabric during production is optimum so fabric waste is minimized to the greatest extent possible.  Fabric waste is one of the biggest problems in the garment business, with up to 20 tonnes of fabric going into landfills per year.Minimization of environmental effect. The use of super-high gauge fabric means increased garment durability, which means an increased garment lifetime and decreased waste.Responsible water-saving. Because of xylitol’s inherent antifungal and antibacterial properties, you don’t need to wash the shirt as much as other shirts, thus increasing the life of the shirt, increasing the durability of the cooling effect, and saving valuable water.Styles & SizesThere will initially be 2 styles: Crew and Deep-V.  Colors: Black, Grey  RewardsAdd-onsCool Human® Endothermic Cooling Arm Sleeves.  As indicated in the rewards, we are also offering Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling Arm Sleeves for $16, made with the same endothermic fabric. If you wish to order these, add on the extra perk to your pledge during checkout of the main perk. Arm sleeves sizing and colorsCool Human® Endothermic Cooling Neck Gaitor (add on $19 to your pledge).  With double layered Cool Human® Endothermic Cooling fabric. Unique bell shaped cut to increase coverage over the back of the neck, ear loops to prevent slippage, and adjustable elastic to adjust for perfect fit. TimelineGiven the COVID-19 pandemic, I am giving myself plenty of time to get the shirts made and shipped out to backers as early as possible.

story:
Meet E-01 Wallet: For Minimalist

 

The slim profile of the latest E-01 Wallet is designed for people that love to just keep things simple. Thanks to advancements in technology, gone are the days of having to stuff your wallet full of redundant items along with old receipts and receipts. Centered around a minimalist lifestyle, the E-01 Wallet is the simple solution in providing you with a compact and functional wallet, fitted with three elastic pockets to organize your essential cards for any outing.

 

Why E-01 is Better: A Wallet Designed to Stretch

The shortfall of various minimalist wallets on the market today is that they tend to be focused on being stylish, rather than functionality.  Minimalist wallets comprised of leather tend to be stretched out over time, while others focused around aluminum or carbon fiber may not be a comfortable fit in your pocket.  That's where the E-01 wallet comes in.  Designed with simplicity and comfortability in mind, the E-01 is a cost-effective solution to a better-fitted wallet. The beauty of our durable, elastic design is that the E-01 Wallet stretches and wraps tightly around your cards.  Whether you carry six cards or a single card, the E-01 Wallet will maintain its elasticity and hold your cards in place.  

Thin & Compact

Designed to Access with Ease

4 colors to choose from (Black, Grey, Red, & Yellow)

Finished with Quality Elastic

 

 

 

 

As seen on 

\

 

Rewards

Stretch Goals

 

E-01 Wallet: A Minimalist Wallet for the Digital Age

Prior to the pandemic, traveling outside without a wallet could absolutely feel limiting. The concept of a digital wallet and the relevant tools were there, but it was more of a fancy gadget to be tinkered with rather than a daily necessity.  And then Covid-19 happened and a many things changed seemingly overnight.  

 

The emergence of the pandemic led to an increasing necessity of contactless services and social, thus propelling the the transition into a fully digital age many times over.  The days of carrying clunky cash and numerous cards in your wallet is slowly becoming a thing of the past, as many vendors and services have now upgraded their contactless services and policies as a necessary response to the pandemic.   This transition is has proven to be more convenient, in addition to being safer and secure.  Meaning now you only have to carry some essential cards with you such as identification and credit cards.  

 

There are so many wallets out there to choose from, either too bulky or so minimal that there isn’t a way for you to organize your cards. Our wallet was designed minimal as possible but also functional, two sleeves for cards with an additional sleeve for emergency cash. E-01 wallet is super light, able to hold 2-5 cards easily plus some emergency cash.

Some prototype samples

 

Meet the Team

story:
Motivation

Voice activated technology is growing more and more everyday but often times it's not easily accessible unless you happen to be near a device capable of it.  Something as simple as answering a phone can be difficult if your hands are full.  In addition, wearing earbuds all the time is not ideal for most people since they block your hearing and don't always look fashionable.  For our first product, we have created convenience and accessibility to voice services anytime you need while also keeping your arms, ears and hands free. 

 

 

About Us

Based out of Southern California, Zinfanite Technologies Inc. is a new innovative wearable technology company. Our team is filled with individuals with quite a bit of product development experience especially with electronics and software.  Our vision is to make technology easy to use by anyone. To do this, Zinfanite is especially focused on voice activated technology.  We also believe that you do not have to sacrifice style for functionality with technology that looks natural. 

 

 

Product Features 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Zinfanite has finished our electrical and mechanical design.  We are working on software and will be beta testing in the next few months.  We need funding to help pay for FCC certification, tooling and also finalizing the design for production.  By supporting us as an early adopter, you not only get a huge discount but will also get to help guide how the product works moving forward.  We are confident that you will not be disappointed. 

 

 

Benefits

  • Provides easy accessibility when hands are occupied
  • Easily carried (weighs ~1oz)
  • Integrates and blends with your outfit
  • You can easily call 911 in case of an emergency
  • Can be operated at any age
  • Can be operated with little technological expertise
  • Connects to Alexa services (Plan to add Google and Siri post launch)
  • Bluetooth
  • Take it with you without worrying about it getting wet

 

The Impact

Our product is made to improve communication not only among individuals, but many business's as well. VAM has the potential to impact hospitals, retail stores, restaurants, delivery services, management, and more. 

  • Mission: Make technology that brings convenience and simplicity to everyone.

  • Values: We value honesty and quality in our actions and product.  We will do everything we can to keep our supporters informed and bring the best product to market.

 

Risks & Challenges

For the most part, we at Zinfanite have done quite a bit of work to ensure the feasibility of the product.  Here are some risks and how we are addressing them:

  • Battery Life
    • We have picked out extremely lower power components.  Our engineers, will fine tune both hardware and software to get the most battery life possible given the small form factor.
  • Voice Detection
    • We are working on improved noise cancellation and voice isolation to make sure voice commands are processed with minimal effort while at the same time avoiding false detections.
  • Audio output quality
    • We are experimenting with enclosure design and speakers to ensure that you get premium sound quality especially for voice communication.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would really appreciate support in our social media accounts. Awareness is is key for new startups, therefore following us, giving us a like, sharing our posts, sharing our website with friends and family is very helpful. You can also share this Campaign with the Indiegogo sharing tools. Thank you for your support.

 

Instagram : @Zinfanite

https://www.instagram.com/zinfanite/

Facebook : @Zinfanite

https://www.facebook.com/zinfanite/

Email: info@zinfanite.com

Website:  http://www.zinfanite.com

 

Miners Discover Zinfanite!

 

A New Element is Created!

A New Element is Created!

story:
Aloha! A pair of plant-based sneakers designed explicitly for a sockless and eco-conscious lifestyle.  Thanks to TREE fiber, the natural properties of quick drying, breathable, and odor resistant are able to perform on LONOs and translate directly to our feet.

Simplify your life! The perfect pair for going to yoga, ball games, training, hikes and more. If the gyms and studios are closed, simply slip into these comfortable sockless sneakers and begin your home workout. Get in and get moving!

 

You can also take it easy with these comfortable sockless shoes. Walk the dogs, run some errands, take a stroll, relax, and enjoy. 

TREE FIBER dries 3x faster than merino wool in the same conditions, making it the ultimate material to fight against sweat. As a matter of fact, we've been making shoes all wrong with polyester. It's like putting your feet in plastic bags - no wonder they stink!

The same goes for water-proof sneakers, they are chemical coating and plastic membrane that suffocate your feet. Whereas LONO is determined in keeping things natural. The key feature of anti-bacterial power from tree fiber prevents foul smell after drying.  So get wet, get dry, and get going!

 
 
 
 

LONO is determined in making the transition from man-made material to organic, biodegradable materials. Our goal is to reduce waste and pollution while translating sustainable resources into shoes with remarkable functionality.

 

The use of animal by-products such as wool and leather is a big NO-NO for LONO.

 

Our amazing TREE fiber is produced from tree bark originating in a sustainably managed forest certified by the FSC. The non-toxic solvent used in the process has a remarkable 99% recovery rate, keeping the cycle self-sustainable. 

Why would you want to step in a crude oil puddle, the main ingredient in regular EVA insoles? Here we replace it with a cleaner and greener choice of plant-based oil without sacrificing support and comfort, which Castorfoam provides.

Poppin' and bouncin' with our Popcorn sole, in partnership with BLOOM USA to create a performance foam out of algae as a replacement for plastic and petrochemical based recipe.

(More info can be found on bloomtreadwell.com)

 

We work with Tree-Nation, who've been planting trees since 2006—over 5 million trees! The ultimate goal is to fight and raise awareness of climate change. For every pair of LONO you back, a tree will be planted with growth updates.

 

 

 

 

(some colors might not be available)

We've sent over 200 pairs around the world to test them out and everyone loves them!

Check out our Instagram @ lonowear

 

Nothing beats the feeling of being barefoot. That's why we use all-natural materials to mimic that raw connection between the human body and nature.

 

You realize there is a need, and you come up with an answer based on your knowledge and experience. You want to do good. With some creativity and hard work, good things can happen. We're all unique; each of us has a gift, a strength that we can direct towards creating a better world.
 

Hi I'm Ben. I live just outside the concrete jungle of Hong Kong, in a mountain village near a bamboo forest. I've been making sneakers for ten years and I've seen how the industry has compromised the planet to make a dime out of every pair. LONO is something that I can do, where I can apply my skills and my abilities. My ultimate goal is nothing less than a revolution in restructuring the footwear industry into a sustainable and socially responsible model.

 

You don't change the world by flipping a switch, but you can start by turning off the lights. Every single positive step that you take counts. And there's no single approach to changing the world. It means that we, each of us, can decide how we'd like to live and how far we'll go to protect this little blue planet we call home.

Designing the perfect shoe is an iterative process, and while we try our best to perfect the look, functionality and spirit of the shoes, the final product may have design tweaks which are different than the pictures you see here. But rest assured that every change we make is done with, you - our great supporters, in mind.

 

 

 

Estimated Delivery: September 2021

But rest assured that every change we make is done with, you - our great supporters, in mind.

story:
Specifications & Summary

Materials

  • Leather Type: Full Grain 
  • Sourced From: Florence, Italy
  • Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
  • Inner Lining: Black RFID-Proof Fabric

RFID Contactless Protection

  • How it works: RFID signals are emitted to read your card details every time you scan your contactless card at the supermarket, metro, bar, etc.
  • You're protected: The entire contents of the wallet are protected from RFID signals - which means they can't be scanned while inside your wallet.

Main Features (maximum capacity)

  • Cash Drawer: 30 bills
  • Interior Slots: 8 Cards
  • Business Card Slots: 6 Cards
  • Contactless Slot: 2 Cards

Colour Options

  • Tan – Florentine Vegetable Tanned Leather
  • Black - Florentine Vegetable Tanned Leather

Dimensions

  • Open Length: 18cm
  • Open Height: 10cm
  • Closed Length: 9cm
  • Closed Height: 10cm

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q: Are these the only colours offered?
  • A: Should demand rise, there is potential for a stretch reward colour to be introduced.
  • Q: What are the dimensions? How big is this feature?
  • A: Please see the specifications above for a detailed breakdown of the features and dimensions.
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
  • A: We provide free tracked shipping to all countries in the world. We will offer express shipping as an add-on once the campaign ends.
  • Q: How much will I have to pay in duties? 
  • A: Nothing - £0 - We are aware this is an expensive wallet and our shipping carrier covers duties into your country and you won't be charged.
  • Q: Will I be able to track my package?
  • A: Yes, shortly after shipping you will receive an email with a direct tracking link to your specific package. The link will become active after 3 working days.
  • Q: I have another question that isn't answered here, how can I contact you?
  • A: You may contact us via the following channels and we will do our best to reply to you within the hour:
  • The Indiegogo messaging system
  • Through the Indiegogo comments - if you’re a backer
  • By email at: CS (at) FilippoMorato (dot) com

Risks & Challenges

This will be our forth Crowdfunding venture, with our previous being huge successes where we navigated through all the stages (R&D right through to shipment happening without any hitches).

In order to ensure the best possible outcome, the product you see on the campaign is the final production sample - made by the very same technique that your wallets will be.

There have been over 12 months of prototyping to fit all the features into one spectacular wallet, and now we've finalised the entire production line, all the way through to the packing and shipping.

We understand that crowdfunding can bring up unexpected hiccups, but we've been preparing ourselves for every eventuality - including going over our goal. We have two backups for every step of the way - manufacturers, packers, shippers - so that we'll definitely deliver on time.

We will keep an open channel with you, our backers, by conveying our thoughts to you every step of the way through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you're always in the loop.

Our project was featured on the Backers Only Newsletter and we’d like to invite you to join its growing community of Kickstarter and Indiegogo backers - You'll receive exclusive access to amazing Early Bird offers and freebies delivered right to your inbox. Click here to subscribe.

https://www.backersonly.com

story:
How? Well, it's what you get when you cross an antique Yugoslavian clockmaker’s tool, the irresistible attraction of magnetism and a holistic worldview.

 

 

They promised us The Cloud, and we got fog. Quantify yourselves, they said, then they sold our data. Instead of progress, we got crapification. Instead of liberation, we got surveillance.

Our devices used to be clever, not 'smart', and our tools used to be physical objects, not applications. And things were made to last. Were we more human then?

Do you ever feel overwhelmed by the inescapability of the digital world? Or stupefied by a constant barrage of (mostly useless) information? 

If too much modern tech is messing with your mind and bothering your balance, we developed DayDisc for you. 

 

 

We have ventured into forgotten realms of the past on an archaeological and philosophical journey. We wanted to rediscover how our ancestors were so capable before screens, wifi, and AI.  

And we've brought something useful back to the future:

 

 

DayDisc is the fruit of our labour - a necklace that’s also a new kind of activity tracker.

It’s radically simple, and amazingly effective. It tracks only what really matters to you, using simple and timeless analogue technology.

Hidden magnets firmly hold the tracking orbs which you manually move around the disc to keep track of your completed activities.

The DayDisc Challenge is simple, achievable and rewarding: just take 12 opportunities to work toward your goals, every day. 

By counting only what truly counts, it keeps you focused and clearly shows your investment in yourself, rapidly helping you form the habits that boost your wellbeing.

Don’t take our word for it. We’ve shared DayDiscs with a small group of trailblazers, scattered around the planet, and they've shared their experiences: 

 

 

It's time for the analogue tech revival! DayDisc is already changing lives, and it changed ours, and we're pretty sure it can change yours too.

So, if being an early-adopter in a grassroots global eco-wellness movement sounds exciting, please consider making a pledge to our campaign now.

 

 

What makes personal development so challenging?

The concept of self improvement is pretty straightforward. You already know the key steps to  successful change. Intent. Focus. Consistency. All that jazz.

And in recent years, technology companies have developed all kinds of complicated gadgets - the 'Wearables', that were supposed to make it all easier.

Only, they don’t. Why?

 

 

The trouble is that, far from aiding focus, these devices are specifically designed to distract. By manipulating the reward centres of our brain, they develop a stranglehold on your attention span. This creates a vicious cycle that makes it harder than ever to reach your goals. 

And by forcing us to adapt to how they work, they erode our autonomy and ingenuity.

 

 

Besides, giving a third party access to your most personal information in this way is a pretty big deal. Can you trust its accuracy? And can you trust the company not to sell it, or get hacked? 

Smart devices don’t last that long either. They’re part of a cycle of planned obsolescence, designed to be made redundant by a slicker, ‘smarter’ version after a year or two.

After immersing ourselves in online reviews, it became clear that many users of digital activity trackers or ‘wearables’ have unsatisfying experiences with them.

Surely there’s got to be a better way?

 

 

Of course there is! That’s why we’ve developed DayDisc.

A special kind of tracker that focuses on what attracts you, not what distracts you.

Using just the fundamental forces of magnetism and willpower, DayDisc converts your best intentions into impressive outcomes. Engage in a personal daily ritual with your DayDisc, and you’ll quickly develop the productive habits that you set your mind to. Designate specific, significant activities that will upgrade your lifestyle, as you might with a coach, and use your DayDisc to count and track them. 

 

 

No software - you are the operating system. No battery - you are the power source.

DayDisc is a striking, gender-fluid talisman specially engineered for self-development. Intuitive and reliable, it uses principles of design and of psychology to build up the positive feedback loops that lead to lasting change. By making it easy to begin and sustain new and improved patterns of behaviour, DayDisc ensures you invest time in yourself.

Daydisc is grounded and ergonomic, positive not pushy. It motivates you to achieve your own personal daily revolution, with the action of moving the tracking orb around the dial with a magnetic 'click' giving you discreet multi-sensorial feedback on your progress.

Every morning, set your intention to complete 12 repetitions of an action in one day. And DayDisc will keep you on track.

 

 

*there are no prescribed uses of DayDisc. The list of possible uses is only limited by the imagination. We look forward to hearing about the way people will use theirs.

 

 

How you use your time determines almost everything about you: your personality, the state of your health, your beliefs and opinions, skills and talents – you name it.

We are always becoming what we can be. This means change is inevitable, let's make it for the better... 

So get started with DayDisc, and take charge of your change today.

 

 

Studies have shown that approximately 80% of New Year’s resolutions fail! So clearly, we need better ways to stay motivated - new approaches are needed for your journey towards achieving long-term goals and resolutions.

First, it’s important to think a bit more carefully about your goal. To give yourself the best chance of success, goals should be:

Simple but significant
Trackable so you can monitor your progress
Realistic and relevant
Timebound so you can get regular

But getting feedback on your performance and progress is important too, as part of breaking your goals down into achievable chunks. There are loads of great books available on habit formation, but it always boils down to the habit loop:

DayDisc is designed to help you close the loop and thrive.

 

 

There are loads of different ways you can use the magnetic tracking orbs that come with each DayDisc, but these three patterns have worked particularly well for us and our founding community of users:

The Focus Orb: 

Use your favourite colour Orb to track the transformation of a single intention into a single habit. Pick one thing you want to do more often. Aim to complete 12 repetitions of that particular activity each day. Each time you manage it, move your orb to the next slot on your DayDisc.

Congratulations! That’s one orbit. A simple, clear, effective way to begin and sustain positive change.

Mind, Body, and Spirit Orbs: 

Choose three Orbs and assign them to different types of activities. For example, you could use one for something Mind related, one that’s Body focused, and another that’s Spirit centric. Use the orbs to track your activities in all three domains simultaneously.

This pattern is quite a challenge, but very rewarding. DayDisc’s orbs can stack in the same slot, so don’t worry if your goals overlap – this can create some pretty cool shapes and dynamics!

Reminder Orb: 

Pick an Orb to live on your fridge, or desk lamp, or somewhere handy and visible. It will remind you of your daily goal whenever you see it.

Bonus: you can also use it to remind yourself of meetings, appointments, or deadlines, by pre-positioning in the appropriate groove, eg. 4pm = groove 4. (Use this in conjunction with another pattern)

We’re also looking forward to hearing about patterns we haven’t discovered yet, so please experiment, have fun and let us know what you come up with in the comments!

 

 

Timeless construction. Timely functionality.

We designed DayDisc to pay homage to the eternal values of beauty and usefulness. It represents the Sun, and abides by principles of Sacred Geometry. DayDisc’s proportions are determined by the Golden Ratio.

 

 

The radial design is due to DayDisc’s original archetype as a watchmaker’s tool. But rather than making clocks, this is a tool that creates time. 

The partitioning of the circle into twelve is an ancient method of segmenting time. Look at the Zodiac for example. Babylonian philosopher-priests used a base-12 counting system for a practical reason: it offers more whole fractions, making it easier to divide and subdivide.

 

 

This means that, with DayDisc’s twelve grooves, you can easily break down your progress throughout the day into sets and subsets. The circuit can be split into ½, ⅓, ¼, ⅙, giving you an easy, versatile way to plan and track your activities.

 

 

With DayDisc, your information isn’t uploaded anywhere. It stays where it’s needed most: with you. This makes it intrinsically stable, reliable, and sustainable. And with multiple orbs to play with, it’s also pretty versatile.

 

 

Each DayDisc comes with a commitment card.

DayDisc is based on the polar opposite of planned obsolescence – something we like to call planned permanescence. Like the pyramids, or Stonehenge, or buried treasure. Planned permanescence makes for maximally sustainable objects.

 

 

“It has to work forever.”

That was a key underlying principle in DayDisc’s development. You pledge once for DayDisc, and it lasts forever, delivering a lifetime of value and more. It doesn’t get much more sustainable than that.

DayDiscs are guaranteed for the lifetime of your bloodline. Pretty much the only way to invalidate the warranty is to cast it into the fires of Mount Doom.

We would be honoured if you took your DayDisc to your grave, or considered it an heirloom object to be kept in the family. 

Just a quick occasional polish will always restore its full shine.

 

 

Wellness is huge now, and a growing market with lots of serious research in the field of behavioural studies and psychology to explain what makes us tick, and keeps us ticking healthily.

We have gone deep into the literature during the design of DayDisc to make sure it follows proven psychological formats that will help you to improve your daily life and overall wellbeing.

DayDisc’s Western influences include the science of behaviour modification, Skinner operant conditioning, Cognitive Behavioural Theory, and many coaching schemes.

But many of us in the West are missing out on the benefits of a holistic worldview that understands the universe and ourselves as manifestations of a single subtle energetic being.

A lot of healing and harmony can be found in becoming sensitive to our true nature. And the technological obsession of western culture often distances us from the simplicity of this truth.

 

 

DayDisc signifies a return to respect for the intrinsic properties of things. Circles are cyclic. Magnets are magnetic. Metals are strong. And we are active beings. These elements combine to create a vortex in the Aether which will empower your life.

To find that missing piece, we looked back, and to the East.

 

 

 

“F***ing magnets, how do they work?”

 Miracles - Insane Clown Posse

Who doesn't love magnets? A mysterious attractive force... And super useful, right?

From the first compass 3000 years ago in China to the Large Hadron Collider, people love putting magnets to ingenious uses. But we had to check they were safe!

Magnets are considered safe by the US National Center of Complementary and Alternative Medicine (NCCAM), and magnetic therapy devices are actually in rising demand due to the impressive results and benefits users have obtained.

Neodymium magnets like ours have been shown to increase microcirculation, and are increasingly being used to treat chronic pain syndrome, arthritis, wound healing, insomnia, headaches, and several other illnesses.

 

 

The torus is the fundamental form of balanced energy flow. Energy passes through one vortex, along  the axis, out the other vortex, wraps back around and renews. It's the shape of some of nature’s most powerful phenomena: tornados, whirlpools, black holes, and energy fields around planets and the sun. But it’s also found around living organisms.

This is what Shamanic Practices & Energy Medicine refer to as the Aura, Luminous Energy Field, “Light Body,” or Biofield in the scientific community. It radiates out in a toroidal shape, and through its interaction with the environment we can become depleted or recharged. We can be in flow or stuck, open or shutdown, healthy or sick.

The basic idea of DayDisc is to promote energy flow, so it's fitting that it should have its own toroidal magnetic field. 

 

 

Just like with your goals, DayDisc is a reflection of your personal style. There are thousands of combinations, so pick your favourites to build something unique.

 

> Select the metal that suits you, from luminous Brass or bright Steel 

> Choose one or more of our carefully curated luxurious necklace options, from Sterling     silver (bright or dark), and 14kt gold-filled chains, to Desserto, an award-winning     vegan leather made from cactus (and hand-rolled Ahimsa silk as a stretch goal)

> Choose any extra Orbs from gold, silver, nickel, gunmetal.

 

If you’re ready to take that next step and join our ever-expanding DayDisc circle, come on in! DayDiscs make great gifts, so consider treating a loved one... 

 

 

 

From prototype, to production:

story:
Protection you can wear every day.

The Ares Defender Tactical Shirt was originally created to provide cutting-edge wearable apparel to law enforcement, military, and first responders. Aptly named after the Greek god of war, the Ares Defender™ is military-grade technology inspired by NASA's Mars Rover Mission.

The shirt's core is our patented SWX™ textile. Not only is it cut, tear, abrasion, puncture, flame resistant, and thermally rated, it is USA-made and Berry Amendment Compliant.

The Ares Defender was designed by the operators at Shadow Works, a service-disabled veteran-owned small business.  All of our apparel is designed with inspiration and input from our diverse team; 2 Navy SEALs, a former ATF Chief, a US Army Officer, and a British Military Veteran.

FEATURES

 

DETAILS

 

CONSTRUCTION

Our goal was to create a tactical shirt that brought mil-spec gear to your daily life. In order to do that, we started the only way we know; with our dynamic SWX™ protective textile.  

Our patented SWX™ textile combines military-level protection with everyday comfort and style. Not only is SWX™ cut, puncture, tear, and flame resistant, but it is also durable, breathable, and machine washable.

Designed by our ATF Chief and Navy SEALs, the Ares Defender was created to exceed the standards of current military-spec gear. By combining the unparalleled protective qualities of SWX™ with moisture-wicking, fire-resistant DriFire™ panels, and Kevlar® thread, the Ares Defender delivers the most comprehensive levels of everyday protection. 

 

SHIRT COMPARISON

 

STYLES | COLORS | SIZE | FIT

 

STYLES

 

COLORS

 

SIZE | FIT | HOW TO MEASURE

 

PROCESS AND TIMING

 

PROCESS

We are proud to be a veteran-owned, USA Made company that makes cutting-edge, high-quality apparel utilizing our patented SWX™ textile. Our US-based supply chain guarantees all aspects of manufacturing from textile creation to shirt assembly are completed with our direct supervision. Our team has decades of experience working with dynamic textiles at the highest standards.

 

TIMING

ABOUT US

Shadow Works is a Service-Disabled Veterans Owned company with 100% of its products produced in the USA.

Our team has worked for US Special Operations Command (SOCOM), the US Department of Defense, Department of State, Department of Justice, Alcohol, Tobacco & Firearms (ATF), Department of Homeland Security, NASA, Aerospace Industry, and British Military in demonstrating an unwavering commitment to protecting our families.

Our aim is to continue this commitment by providing you with the ultimate in personal protection by developing the most innovative and highest quality puncture, cut, tear, abrasion, fire-resistant, and thermally rated textile in the marketplace.

story:
We are initially launching the Monmouth Classic Edition; an automatic wristwatch which comes with three interchangeable straps; a stainless steel Milanese strap, a black Italian leather strap and a black silicone rubber strap. 

British design draws it's inspiration from a steeped history of heritage, tradition and innovation. Combined with unwavering commitments to the highest quality materials and craftsmanship; we aim to bring this vision of British design to your wrist.


The Monmouth comes as standard with three unique straps, allowing you to customise your Monmouth for every occasion. 

Closely associated with numerous classic dive watches; a Milanese strap is a timeless look. Our stainless steel Milanese strap is robust and comfortable, and features quick release spring bars which facilitate easy strap changes. The strap is adjustable and can be resized to your wrist.

Sourced from Italy; our black Italian leather straps provide a more formal look. The straps are sanded and finished to a high standard; producing a soft and breathable feel. The leather straps also feature quick release spring bars.

The adventurer's choice of strap; a black rubber strap will also be included with your Monmouth. Our rubber straps are made with premium grade silicone, which results in a strong, soft and fully waterproof strap, whilst being hypoallergenic and kind to the wearer's skin. Our rubber straps contain no plasticizers.

The Monmouth uses premium grade 316L stainless steel. 316L is surgical grade stainless steel which is infused with molybdenum to provide a superior corrosive resistance.  Designed to be both durable and eye catching, the case has been finely brushed. 

Our case is 42mm in diameter, with a lug to lug measurement of 20mm.  Other dimensions can be found further down the page.

Inspired by the unrelenting swell of the Atlantic Ocean, our screw down case backs are artistically engraved with a design that features a unique serial number and the Shoreham crest.

Our screw down crowns are also engraved with the Shoreham crest.

 The Monmouth features a deep black glossed dial. The dial has twelve raised, lumed indices, with a narrowed 3 o'clock marker which creates a striking symmetry and displays a date window.

The syringe style minute and hour hands are lumed with fluorescent Swiss BGW9 Super-LumiNova®. The lollipop second hand is also lumed with BGW9 and its tip is coated in scarlet, enhancing its visibility and providing a subtle slice of flair.

The Monmouth houses an automatic NH35A movement. The movement is powered by the movement of your wrist and requires no batteries.

Our movements are made by Seiko, Japan's largest and most well known watchmaking company. Seiko are world renowned for producing resilient and accurate movements. The NH35A movement is fully hacking and utilises Seiko's magic lever technology which results in accurate and reliant timekeeping.

Our movement contains 24 jewels and is capable of a vibration frequency of up to 21,600/hour. The Monmouth has a power reserve of over 41 hours and can be hand wound.

A must for a watch designed for adventure; sapphire crystal provides a much higher scratch resistance than the mineral glass alternative found in some watches. Surpassed only by diamond in terms of hardness, sapphire crystal is highly durable and virtually scratchproof.

Our sapphire crystals are covered in an anti-reflective coating, to minimise glare and ensure visibility at all times.

The Monmouth features a unidirectional 120 click ceramic bezel. A ceramic bezel is more lightweight than metal alternatives and is scratch resistant, hard wearing and resistant to UV damage.

The bezel is fully lumed with premium grade Swiss BGW9 Super-LumiNova®.

As a dive watch; we wanted to ensure the Monmouth can be relied on at substantial depths. The Monmouth provides a water resistance of ​300m/30 ATM.

The Monmouth uses premium grade BGW9 Super-LumiNova®. With a crisp white daylight appearance, the Monmouth comes alive at night with a luminous blue glow.

The indices, hands and ceramic bezel are all lumed, giving off an intense and long lasting fluorescent glow.

  • Case Diameter: 42.1mm (excluding crown)
  • Case Length: 50.5mm
  • Case Thickness: 14.1mm

 

  • Lug to Lug Width: 20mm
  • Crown Diameter: 7mm
  • Sapphire Crystal Thickness: 4mm

 

  • Weight of Watch (excluding strap): 83g
  • Weight of Watch Including Leather Strap: 108g
  • Weight of Watch Including Stainless Steel Milanese Strap: 135g
  • Weight of Watch Including Silicone Rubber Strap: 104g 

 

The Monmouth comes with a 12 month international warranty, which is registered to the unique serial number on the case back of your Monmouth. We are also able to provide out of warranty repairs and services.

Shoreham was founded by two friends, based in Wales, who share a passion for horology. It had been a long held dream of ours to produce an innovative British timepiece that reflected this passion. 

 

Following a trip to Baselworld in 2018, the idea for the Monmouth was born. Excited and inspired by a wide range of impressive timepieces, we began to think. What if we could produce a watch that provides the same function, durability and elegant design but at a much lower price?

 

We launched the Monmouth on Kickstarter in March 2021 and were overwhelmed with the response we received, meeting our funding goal within 15 hours! We have now entered production and following strict quality assurance checks, we aim to start shipping the Monmouth in late July/early August 2021.

Learn more about us on our website

Follow us on instagram @shorehamwatches

If you have any queries, please email us at enquiries@shorehamwatches.com
story_txt:
We are initially launching the Monmouth Classic Edition; an automatic wristwatch which comes with three interchangeable straps; a stainless steel Milanese strap, a black Italian leather strap and a black silicone rubber strap. British design draws it's inspiration from a steeped history of heritage, tradition and innovation. Combined with unwavering commitments to the highest quality materials and craftsmanship; we aim to bring this vision of British design to your wrist.The Monmouth comes as standard with three unique straps, allowing you to customise your Monmouth for every occasion. Closely associated with numerous classic dive watches; a Milanese strap is a timeless look. Our stainless steel Milanese strap is robust and comfortable, and features quick release spring bars which facilitate easy strap changes. The strap is adjustable and can be resized to your wrist.Sourced from Italy; our black Italian leather straps provide a more formal look. The straps are sanded and finished to a high standard; producing a soft and breathable feel. The leather straps also feature quick release spring bars.The adventurer's choice of strap; a black rubber strap will also be included with your Monmouth. Our rubber straps are made with premium grade silicone, which results in a strong, soft and fully waterproof strap, whilst being hypoallergenic and kind to the wearer's skin. Our rubber straps contain no plasticizers.The Monmouth uses premium grade 316L stainless steel. 316L is surgical grade stainless steel which is infused with molybdenum to provide a superior corrosive resistance.  Designed to be both durable and eye catching, the case has been finely brushed. Our case is 42mm in diameter, with a lug to lug measurement of 20mm.  Other dimensions can be found further down the page.Inspired by the unrelenting swell of the Atlantic Ocean, our screw down case backs are artistically engraved with a design that features a unique serial number and the Shoreham crest.Our screw down crowns are also engraved with the Shoreham crest. The Monmouth features a deep black glossed dial. The dial has twelve raised, lumed indices, with a narrowed 3 o'clock marker which creates a striking symmetry and displays a date window.The syringe style minute and hour hands are lumed with fluorescent Swiss BGW9 Super-LumiNova®. The lollipop second hand is also lumed with BGW9 and its tip is coated in scarlet, enhancing its visibility and providing a subtle slice of flair.The Monmouth houses an automatic NH35A movement. The movement is powered by the movement of your wrist and requires no batteries.Our movements are made by Seiko, Japan's largest and most well known watchmaking company. A ceramic bezel is more lightweight than metal alternatives and is scratch resistant, hard wearing and resistant to UV damage.The bezel is fully lumed with premium grade Swiss BGW9 Super-LumiNova®.As a dive watch; we wanted to ensure the Monmouth can be relied on at substantial depths. The Monmouth provides a water resistance of ​300m/30 ATM.The Monmouth uses premium grade BGW9 Super-LumiNova®. With a crisp white daylight appearance, the Monmouth comes alive at night with a luminous blue glow.The indices, hands and ceramic bezel are all lumed, giving off an intense and long lasting fluorescent glow.

story:
Introducing Stay White! 

Stay White Heel Protectors were created to help keep shoes protected and clean while you go through your everyday life. For those who love sneakers to everyday people, Stay White gets the job done so your shoes remain pristine.

 

 

Product Outlook

In 2020, the total global sneakers market was valued at approximately 79 billion U.S. dollars. It was forecast to reach a value of 119.5 billion U.S. dollars by 2026 growing at an impressive compound annual growth rate from 2020 to 2026 of 7.1%. In recent years, the global demand for athletic footwear has increased significantly. This heightened demand for footwear, like sneakers, can be attributed to increased health awareness amongst consumers. This growth will potentially favor the demand for the Stay White Shoe Heel Protectors that solve the issue of worn-out heels. Growth in the number of sneakerheads will also drive demand for innovative and stylish solutions that extend the life of these sneakers, further favoring the demand for Stay White Shoe Heel Protectors.

 

 

#StayWhite

The Stay White Shoe Heel Protectors…true to their name…will protect the heels of your sneakers, ensuring that your kicks stay fresh for longer.

 

 

Unique Features 

Quality

The Shoe Heel Protectors use high-quality materials that will make them more durable. Your sneakers will be protected from being worn out!

 

Affordability 

The Shoe Heel Protector is competitively priced and is affordable!

 

Comfortability 

The ankle snap is designed to fit the shoe smoothly and comfortably for the ankles. Shoe Heel protectors are designed to be stylish with various prints and colors making them more attractive and personalized. 

 

Water Resistance

The ankle snap and bottom snaps are designed to brace on the shoe perfectly with water resistance, so the shoe doesn't slide in wet conditions. Underneath the shoe protector, there are groves for the water to bypass through

 

Passion Meets Protection

For some, shoes are just shoes. However, for others, shoes are a passion. Keeping them clean is just one of the responsibilities they have. With Stay Cool, you no longer have to set hours aside to continuously scrub and take care of your shoe. We understand that your passion needs protection! You can now go about your everyday life without having to worry about scuffing your shoe. Take care of your passion and protect it! 

 

 

Any Shoe, Anytime

You can use Stay White on any sneaker due to the flexible material. High top or low top, Stay White has you covered! No matter where you're going or your outfit, since Stay Cool comes in a variety of colors and designs, it's easy to match your fit! 

Any Shoe, Anytime!

 

 

Make A Statement!

 

 

Be Passionate!

 

 

Protect the Kicks!

story:
About Us and Our Story

Black & Cremè is a re-education, sustainable, and eco-awareness boutique. People, land, and fibre are at the core of our boutique. We are here to align fashion back with the Earth. Black & Cremè collaborates with small businesses, designers, and manufacturers who have taken steps toward aligning with the people, land, and fibre. Black & Cremè represents the connection to the Motherland Africa, the soil, people all over the Earth with different complexions, the texture of fabrics, the colors of cloth, and the Melanin that flows through our Soul. Our eco-fashion, vegan bags, and sustainable accessories are a combination of neutral, trendy, chic, sexy, classy, and glamorous styles. Our items are timeless that will leave your closet and jewelry box with memories that last a lifetime. Each item you see on our boutique has been sourced and curated consciously with love.

Black & Creme was created from a desire to see scholarly research combined with sustainable fashion.  Our CEO noticed that there was not a space for Black-owned businesses to express their love that is connected to the people, land, and fibre. As a result, she used her PhD research, love for fashion, and her Spirituality to birth Black & Creme.  It is a reminder that the fashion, bags, shoes, and jewelry we wear are interconnected to everything on Earth and the Cosmos.

Black & Creme Startup Costs and Customer Benefits

$10,000 Cost Breakdown

  • Sustainable Inventory (Eco-friendly clothing, vegan bags, and recyclable accessories)
  • Scholarship Program for an emerging designer to launch their design on our platform
  • 1st Official Photoshoot Campaign (Finances to pay the photographer, models, and creative expenses)
  • Advertisements for social media (Instagram, Google, and Facebook)
  • Upgrade costs for website development
  • Packaging Supplies (Boxes, envelopes, business cards, etc)

-All of the funds will still go towards any startup costs if we do not reach our target financial goal.

  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Community and Environmental Impact

  • You will be supporting one of the first Black-owned sustainable boutiques
  • You will be supporting emerging and existing sustainable designers.
  • You will be supporting Nature and the environment by being more conscious with the types of clothes you buy that doesn't leave a harmful impact on the Earth.
  • You will be supporting a scholarship fund that will give to an new Black-owned designer to startup their business to sell their designs on our boutique.
  • You will be supporting marginalized communities and offering them the opportunity to be trained in retail, fashion, and sustainability.
  • You will be supporting a re-education sustainable education program that will use scholarly research to renew sustainable fashion.

Risks & Challenges

We are a startup Black-owned sustainable boutique who is making a space for a market that is not seen by Black startups.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Repost our crowdfunding campaign on your social media pages.  Make sure in your repost to tell one other person to repost on their pages.  This will create a domino effect where we can reach a wider audience.
  • Share our website and main social media pages.
  • Subscribe to our website at: www.blackandcreme.com

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary:

My Name is Justin Capoccia and I am an entrepreneur at heart and love to see my ideas become reality. I am starting a new Venture called KickFly's Sunglasses. We are Unique in that we manufacture sunglasses to our customers specifications and you get our name brand at an affordable price yet keeping a high quality. Here is a little secret, Sunglasses have one of the biggest mark ups of any product on the market, But not with us, we truly give you the quality you payed for. we are changing the eye-wear industry, and it starts with us!

What We Need & What You Get 

  • We need around $1000 to fully complete and execute our web design for full customization. All extra money above this amount will go towards product design,machinery, advertising, and Also Employment!
  • This is the perk with donating with us, you will be a part of the movement in what will be changing the eye-wear industry. In return you will be noted on our website as a supporter and greatly thanked(if you choose). We will be the only company to fully create a pair of sunglasses to your dreams and it will be a truly one of a kind pair people cant get anywhere else.
  • If we do not reach our goal, the money will be going towards whatever will make the biggest impact on moving our company forward (most likely Advertising).

The Impact

Here is the impact of our Campaign:

I am an entrepreneur at heart and I love to bring new ideas and bring them to life. This is my first "out-of-the-box" business start up, but it is industry changing. We offer lower prices to high quality eye-wear and give people the chance to own a truly unique pair of sunglasses. We also create a fun atmosphere for customers and the consumers. Our Impact will allow people to express themselves in ways they could never before.

Risks & Challenges

As like any en devour , we are not perfect an we do have some risks and challenges. We are taking on companies that have been in the field for years and we have a lot of trust to build up as a company. Our only challenge at this point in the game is building a reputable name.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that we ask a lot when donating, we fully understand. But donating can be be done in the form of even just giving recognition to our company by spreading the word! we have an instagram, facebook, and website. Tell your friends! 

@kickflyssunglasses

www.facebook.com/kickflys

www.kickflys.com
